translation.unyo: Awon ϙmϙ egbe ile igbimo Welsh n saniyan nipa ‘wIwo bii omυgo’
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ϙmϙ ẹgbé ile ìgbìmò Welsh n ṣaniyan nipa ‘wÍwò bii òmὺgò’

translation.unyo: Iberu-bojo wa laarin awon ϙmϙ egbe kan nitori aba kan eyiti o fe ki won yi apeje won pada si MWPs (Omo Ile Asoju-sofin ti Welsh)
translation.dcyo: Ibẹru-bojo wa laarin awọn ϙmϙ ẹgbé kan nitori àbá kan eyiti o fẹ ki won yi àpèjẹ wọn pada si MWPs (Ọmọ Ile Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh)

translation.unyo: Aba yii jeyo sita nitori awon agbakale eto lati yi oruko ipejopo naa pada si Ile Asoju-sofin ti Welsh.
translation.dcyo: Àbá yíì jeyọ sita nitori awọn àgbàkalẹ ètò láti yí orúkọ ìpéjọpọ náà padà sí Ile Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh.

translation.unyo: Awon ϙmϙ egbe kaakiri gbogbo owoja oselu nsaniyan wipe lee pe itiju wole.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ϙmϙ ẹgbé kaakiri gbogbo ọwọja òșèlú nṣaniyan wipe leè pe ìtìjú wọlé.

translation.unyo: Okon lara awon omo egbe Labour sope Eyi ti o kan egbe t’ohun nipe “o fi ara pe Twp ati Pwp.”
translation.dcyo: Ọkón lára awon ọmọ ẹgbẹ Labour sọpé Èyí ti o kan ẹgbẹ t’ohun nipe “ó fi ara pè Twp àti Pwp.”

translation.unyo: Fun awon onkawe leyin odi Wales. Ni ede Welsh twp tumo si omugo ti pwp si tumo si igbee eniyan.
translation.dcyo: Fun awọn onkawe lẹyin odi Wales. Ní èdè Welsh twp tumọ sí omugọ tí pwp sì tumọ sí ìgbẹẹ eniyan.

translation.unyo: omo egbe Plaid kan sope inu egbe naa l’apapo "ko dun" ti o si da aba awon afiropo miran.
translation.dcyo: ọmọ ẹgbẹ Plaid kan sọpe inú ẹgbẹ náà l’ápapò "kò dùn" tí ó sì dá àbá àwọn àfirọ́pò miran.

translation.unyo: Omo egbe Conservative ti Welsh kan sope egbe oun “ko pa okan re rara” nipa yiyipada oruko naa, sugbon o sakiyesi wipe o je oro enu kukuru ti o fo kuro lati MVP si Omugo.
translation.dcyo: Ọmọ ẹgbẹ Conservative ti Welsh kan sọpe ẹgbẹ òun “kò pa ọkàn rẹ rárá” nipa yiyipada orúkọ náà, ṣugbọn o ṣakiyesi wipe ó jẹ ọrọ ẹnu kúkúrú ti ó fò kúrò láti MVP sí Omugọ.

translation.unyo: Ninu asoye ede yii pipee leta w ninu ede Welsh ni o farajo ipe leta u ti ede Geesi ti awon Yorkshire.
translation.dcyo: Nínú àsọyé èdé yìí pípèé lẹta w ninu èdè Welsh ni o farajọ ìpè lẹta u ti èdè Geesi ti àwọn Yorkshire.

translation.unyo: Igbimo Amusese Ipejopo naa, eyiti o nsatopo ofin lati mu awon ayipada oruko naa wole, sope: “Ipinnu eyi ti yoo gbeyin lori isapejuwe ohun ti a pe awon Omo Egbe Ipejopo Asoju-sofin naa ni yoo je oro fun awon omo egbe lati yanju funrarawon.”
translation.dcyo: Igbimọ Amuṣẹṣe Ipejọpọ náà, èyítí ó ńṣatopọ ofin lati mu awọn ayipada orukọ naa wọle, sọpe: “Ipinnu eyi ti yòó gbẹyin lori ìṣapejuwe ohun tí a pe àwon Ọmọ Ẹgbẹ Ipejọpọ Aṣoju-ṣofin náà ni yóò jẹ ọrọ fun awọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ lati yanjú funrarawọn.”

translation.unyo: Ofin odun 2017 ti Ijoba Wales fun Ipejopo Asoju-sofin ti Welsh ni agbara lati yi oruko re pada.
translation.dcyo: Òfin ọdún 2017 ti Ìjọba Wales fún Ipejọpọ Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh ni ágbára láti yi orúkọ rẹ padà.

translation.unyo: Ninu osu Okudu, Igbimo Amusese naa satejade awon esi iforolo lori awon aba eyi ti o ri atileyin to gbooro fun pipe ipejopo naa ni Igbimo Asoju-sofin ti Welsh.
translation.dcyo: Nínú oṣù Òkúdu, Igbimọ Amuṣẹṣe náà ṣatẹjade awọn èsì ifọrọlọ lórí awọn àbá èyí ti ó rí atilẹyin tó gbòòrò fún pípe ipejọpọ náà ní Igbimọ Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh.

translation.unyo: Lori oro nipa apeje awon AM, Igbimo Amusese foju rere wo awon Omo Ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin ti Welsh abi WMP, sugbon pipe egbe na ni MWP gba atileyin ti o po julo ninu iforolo awon ara ilu.
translation.dcyo: Lórí ọrọ nipa àpèjẹ́ àwọn AM, Ìgbìmọ Amúṣẹ́ṣe fojú rere wo àwọn Ọmọ Ilé Ìgbímọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin ti Welsh àbí WMP, ṣùgbọ́n pipe ẹgbẹ na ní MWP gba àtìlẹ́yìn tí ó pọ́ jùlọ nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀lọ àwọn ará ìlú.

translation.unyo: O fi han pe awon AM nda aba miran, sugbon ilakaka lati ifenuko lee je efori fun adari igbimo, Elin Jones, eniti won nreti lati fun won ni atopo abadofin lori awon iyipada naa laarin ose perete.
translation.dcyo: Ó fi hàn pe àwọn AM ńdá àbá̀ miran, ṣugbọn ìlàkàkà láti ìfẹnukò leè jẹ́ ẹ̀fọ́rí fún ádari ìgbìmọ́, Elin Jones, ẹnití wọn ńretí láti fún wọn ní àtòpọ̀ àbádòfin lórí à̀wọn ìyípadà náà láarin ọ̀sẹ̀ pérétè.

translation.unyo: Ofin nipa awon atunse naa yoo ni awon iyipada miran nipa ona ti ipejopo na ngba fi sise, pelu awon ilana lori siso awon AM di apeere ati agbekale ona imusese ti igbimo naa.
translation.dcyo: Òfin nípa àwọn àtúnṣe náà yóò ní àwọn ìyípadà miran nípa ọna ti ipejọpọ na ńgbà fi ṣiṣẹ, pẹlu àwọn ìlànà lórí sísọ awọn AM di àpẹẹrẹ ati agbekalẹ ọna ìmúṣẹṣe ti igbimọ naa.

translation.unyo: Awon AM yoo gba ibo to gbeyin  lori ibeere nipa ohun ti a nilati maa pe won nigbati won ba nse ariyanjiyan lori ofin naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn AM yóò gba ìbò tó gbẹyin  lóri ìbéèrè nípa ohun tí a níláti máa pè wọn nígbàtí wọn bá ńṣe àríyànjiyàn lórí òfin náà.

translation.unyo: Awon omo orile-ede Masidonia yoo lo di ibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko lori yiyi oruko orile-ede naa pada.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Masidóníà yóò lọ di ìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹẹni-bẹẹkọ lóri yíyí orúkọ orilẹ-ede náà padà.

translation.unyo: Awon oludibo yoo dibo lojo Aiku lori boya ki won yi oruko orile-ede naa pada si “Ile Olominira ti Ariwa Masidonia.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn olùdìbò yóò dìbò lọjọ Àìkú lórí bóyá kí wọn yí orúkọ orilẹ-ede náà padà sí “Ilẹ Olómìnira ti Àríwá Masidóníà.

translation.unyo: Ibo eyiti o gbajumo yii ni a sagbekale re nitori eredi lati yanju ede-aiyede atodunmodun kan pelu alaamulegbe orile-ede Giriki, eyiti o ni ekun ara re kan ti a npe ni Masidonia.
translation.dcyo: Ìbò èyítí ó gbajumọ yíì ni a ṣagbekalẹ rẹ nitori èrèdí láti yanjú èdè-àìyedè atọdunmọdun kan pẹlu aláàmúlégbè orilẹ-ede Gíríkì, eyiti ó ni ẹkùn ara rẹ kan tí a ńpè ní Masidóníà.

translation.unyo: Ilu Ateeni ni oti tenumoo fun igba pipe wipe oruko alaamulegbe ni iha ariwa oun duro fun sise bi oluwa lori ile oun ti o si nse atako lera-lera si awon igbiyanju re lati di omo egbe ajo EU ati NATO.
translation.dcyo: Ìlú Atẹẹni ni ótí ́tẹnumọọ fún ìgbà pipẹ wípé orúkọ aláàmúlégbè ní ìhà àríwá òun dúró fun ṣíṣe bi olúwa lóri ilẹ òun tí ó sì ńṣe àtakò léra-léra sí àwọn ìgbìyànjú rẹ láti di ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ àjọ EU àti NATO.

translation.unyo: Aare orile-ede Masidonia Gjorge Ivanov, alatako kan si ibo lori iyipada oruko naa, ti sope oun ki yoo ka ibo naa si.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ orilẹ-ede Masidóníà Gjorge Ivanov, alátakò kan sí ìbò lóri ìyípadà orúkọ náà, ti sọpé òun kì yóò ka ìbò náà sí.

translation.unyo: Botiwukori, awon alatileyin ibo onibeeni-beeko naa, pelu Adari Igbimo naa Zoran Zaev, jiyan wipe iyipada oruko je ihun kekere lati se lati le darapo mo ajo EU ati NATO.
translation.dcyo: Bótiwùkórí, àwọn alatilẹyin ìbò onibẹẹni-bẹẹkọ náà, pẹlu Adarí Igbimọ naa Zoran Zaev, jiyàn wípé ìyípadà orúkọ jẹ ihun kékeré láti ṣe lati le darapọ mọ àjọ EU àti NATO.

translation.unyo: Awon Agogo St. Martin dakeroro bi awon Ijo Harlem se n lakaka.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn Agogo St. Martin dákẹ́rọrọ bí awọn Ijò Harlem ̣ṣe n ̀làkàka.

translation.unyo: ''Ninu itan, awon agba ti mo ti ba soro sowipe ile oti ati ile ijosin ma nwa ni kaakiri gbogbo igun,'' Ogbeni Adam ni o so bee.
translation.dcyo: ''Nínu ìtàn, àwọn àgbà tí mo ti bá sọ̀rọ̀ sọwípé́ ilé ọtí àti ilé ìjọsìn ma nwà ní káàkiri gbogbo igun,'' Ògbẹ́ni Adam ni o so bèẹ́.

translation.unyo: ''Looni, kosi okan ninu won mo.''
translation.dcyo: ''Lóòní, kòsí ọkàn nínú wọn mọ́.''

translation.unyo: O sope ipoora awon ile oti yeni.
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé ìpòórá àwọn ilé ọtí̀ yéni.

translation.unyo: o wipe ''Awon eniyan lesee asepo ni orisirisi ona'', lode oni.
translation.dcyo: ó wípé ''Awọn eniyan lesee àṣepọ̀ ní oríṣiríṣi ọ̀nà'', lóde òní.

translation.unyo: Awon ile oti kii se iyara igbalejo ti awon eniyan maa nlo loore-koore mo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ilé ọtí kìí ṣe iyàrá ìgbàlejò tí àwọn èniyàn máa ńlọ lóòrè-kóòrè mọ́.

translation.unyo: Amoo fun awon ile ijosin, o nsaniyan wipe owo ti yoo ti ara tita awon dukia jade koni pe lo titi bi awon adari ti nreti, ''atipe bope boya won yoo pada si'bi ti won ti bere.
translation.dcyo: Àmọò fún àwọn ilé ìjọsìn, ó ńṣàníyàn wípé owó tí yóò ti ara títa àwọn dúkìá jáde kòní pẹ́ lọ títí bí àwọn adarí ti ńretí́, ''àtipé bópe bóyạ́́ wọn yóò padà sí'bi tí wọ́n ti bẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: o tun fikun pe a le ropo awon ile ijosin pelu awon ile ti a pin si ojule ti osi kun fofo pelu irufe awon eniyan ti koni ran awon ibi mimo iyoku towa laadugbo lowo.
translation.dcyo: ó tun fikún pè a lè rọpò àwọn ilé ìjọsìn pẹlu àwọn ile tí a pín sí ojúlé̀ tí ósì kún fọ́fọ́ pẹ̀lú irufẹ àwọn eniyan tí kòní ran àwọn ibi mimọ ìyókù tówà láàdúgbò lọwọ.

translation.unyo: "Opo ninu awon eniyan ti o nra ojule ninu awon ile onibugbe wonyi yoo je alawo funfun," ni o wi, "atipe nitorinaa won yoo mu awon ojo ti awon soosi wonyi yoo kogba wole ya kiakia nitoripe koni see se wipe pupo ninu awon eniyan ti yoo ko sinu awon ojule wonyi di omo ijo ninu awon soosi wonyi."
translation.dcyo: "Ọpọ ninu awọn eniyan ti o nra ojule ninu awọn ile onibugbe wọnyi yoo jẹ alawọ funfun," ni o wi, "atipe nitorinaa wọn yoo mu awọn ọjọ ti awọn sọọsi wọnyi yoo kogba wọle ya kiakia nitoripe koni ṣee ṣe wipe pupọ ninu awọn eniyan ti yoo ko sinu awọn ojule wọnyi di ọmo ijọ ninu awọn sọọsi wọnyi."

translation.unyo: Awon ile ijosin mejeeji yii ni awon ijo alawo funfun ko ki Harlem to di ilu to kun fofo fun awon eniyan dudu - Awujo Olopo Eniyan lodun 1870, St. Martin, leyin odun mewaa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ilé ìjọsìn méjeejì yìí ni àwọn ìjọ alawọ funfun kọ kí Harlem tó di ìlú tó kún fọfọ fún àwọn eniyan dúdú - Àwùjọ Ọlọpọ Eniyan lọdun 1870, St. Martin, lẹyin ọdún mẹwaa.

translation.unyo: Ijo Eleto ti awon alawo funfun toje alaakoko ko jade laarin awon odun 1930.
translation.dcyo: Ìjọ Elétò ti àwọn aláwọ̀ funfun tójẹ́ aláàkọ́kọ́ kó jáde làárín àwọn ọdún 1930.

translation.unyo: Ijo awon eniyan alawo dudu ti o ti njosin nitosi gba iwe-eri emi-ni-mo-ni  fun ile naa.
translation.dcyo: Ìjọ àwọn eniyan aláwọ dúdú tí o ti ńjọsin nítòsí gba ìwé-ẹrí èmi-ni-mo-ni  fún ilé náà.

translation.unyo: Awon ijo eniyan alawo dudu gba isakoso St. Martin ni abe idari Alufaa John Howard Johnson, eniti o dari ideyesi awon olutaja oja eleyo ni Opopona 125, opopona pataki kan fun oja rira ni Harlem, ti won ko lati gba awon eniyan dudu si ise tabi lati fun won ni igbega.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìjọ eniyan aláwo dúdú gbà ìsàkóso St. Martin ni ábẹ ìdárí Àlùfáà John Howard Johnson, ẹnití ó darí ìdẹyẹsí àwọn olùtajà ọja ẹlẹyọ ní Òpópónà 125, òpópónà pàtàkì kan fun ọjà rírà ní Harlem, tí wọn kọ lati gba àwọn eniyan dúdú si iṣẹ́ tàbí lati fún wọn ní ìgbéga.

translation.unyo: Ijamba ina kan lodun 1939 ba ile na je gidigan, sugbon awon omo ijo Baba Johnson se awon eto lati tun un ko, won si si awon aago na.
translation.dcyo: Ìjàm̀bá iná kan lọ́dún 1939 ba ilé na ̀jẹ́ gidigan, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọmọ ìjọ Baba Johnson ṣe àwọn ètò láti tún un kọ́, wọ́n sì ṣí àwọn aago nạ́.

translation.unyo: Alufaa David Johnson, omo Baba Johnson ati eni ti o gba isakoso lowo baba re ni St. Martin, pe awon aago naa, pelu iyangan, ni ''awon aago otosi eniyan”.
translation.dcyo: Àlùfáà David Johnson, ọmọ Baba Johnson àti ẹni tí ó gba ìsàkósọ́ lọ́wọ́ baba rẹ̀ ní St. Martin, pe àwọn aago náà, pẹ̀lú ìyangàn, ní ''àwọn aago òtòsi eniyan”.

translation.unyo: Akosemose kan ti o lu aago naa ninu osu Owawa pe e ni nnkan miran: ''Isura asa'' ati ''irin-ise ibalaye ti ko see paaro.''
translation.dcyo: Akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ kan tí ó lu aago náà nínú oṣù Ọ̀wàwà pè é ní nǹkan miran: ''Ìṣúra àṣà'' àti ''irin-isẹ́ ìbáláyé tí kò ṣeé pààrọ̀.''

translation.unyo: Akosemose kan, Tiffany Ng ti ile-eko Yunifasiti ti Misigaani, bakanaa so wipe o je agogo akoko ni agbaye ti akorin alawo dudu, Dionisio A. Lind lu, eniti o kuro lo s'odo awon agogo nla ni ile ijosin ti Riverside ni odun mejidinlogun seyin.
translation.dcyo: Akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣé kaǹ, Tiffany Ng ti ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ Yunifasiti ti Miṣigaani, bakanaa so wipé ó jẹ́ agogo àkọ́kọ́ ní àgbáyé tí akorin aláwò dudù, Dionisio A. Lind lu, ẹnití o kúrò̀ lọ̀ s'ọ́dọ̀ àwọn agogo ńlá ní ilé ìjọsìn ti Riverside ní odún méjìdínlógún sẹ́yìn.

translation.unyo: Ogbeni Merriweather so wipe St. Martin ko paaro re.
translation.dcyo: Ọgbéni Merriweather sọ wípé St. Martin kò pààrọ rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ohun ti o ti sele ni St. Martin laarin awon osu die seyin ti je itan awon ayaworan ile ati awon agbasese eyiti o loju po kan, awon kan ti awon adari ti kii se akosemose alufaa mu wole, awon miran nipase awon ile ijo ti awon Bisoobu ndari.
translation.dcyo: Ohun tí o ti ṣẹlẹ́ ni St. Martin láàrin àwọn oṣù díẹ̀ sẹ́yìn ti jẹ́ ìtàn àwọn ayàwòrán ilé àti àwọn agbaṣẹ́ṣé eyiti ó lójú pọ kan, àwọn kan tí àwọn adari tí kìí ṣe akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ àlùfáà mú wọlé, àwọn miran nípaṣẹ̀ àwọn ile ijo tí àwọn Bíṣọọbu ńdarí.

translation.unyo: Igbimo alase naa - awon alaamojuto ti eka ijo naa, ti awon adari ti kii se akosemose alufaa ti je omo egbe - ko leta ninu osu Owawa pelu ikayasoke wipe ekun isakoso bisoobu naa ''yoo wa ona lati dari gbogbo inawo naa'' s'odo igbimo alase naa, ani botilejepe igbimo alase naa ko tii ko ipa ri ninu gbigba awon ayaworan ile ati awon agbasese eyiti ekun isakoso bisoobu fi ranse si ise kankan ri.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ naa - àwọn aláàmójútó ti ẹ̀ka ìjọ náà, tí àwọn adarí tí kìí ṣe akọ́ṣémọṣẹ́ àlùfáà ti jẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ - kọ lẹ́tà nínú oṣù Ọ̀wàwà pẹ̀lú ìkáyàsókè wípé ẹkùn ìṣàkóso bisọọbu náà ''yóò wá ọ̀nà láti darí gbogbo ìnáwó náà'' s'ọdọ ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ náà, àni botilẹjepe ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ náà kò tíì kó ipa rí nínú gbígba àwọn ayaworan ilé àti àwọn agbaṣẹ́ṣe eyiti ẹkùn ìṣàkóso bisọọbu fi ranṣẹ sí iṣẹ́ kankan rí.

translation.unyo: Awon omo ijo kan fi esun kan awon isakoso bisoobu naa nipa pe kosi iko-akoyawo lori ipa tiwon
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ ìjọ kan fi ẹ̀sùn kàn àwọn ìṣàkóso bisọọbu náa nípa pe kòsí ìkó-àkóyawọ lórí ipa tiwon

translation.unyo: Eja nla se omo odun metala kan lese nipase ibelumi fun kiko awon ako ede ni ilu Kalifonia
translation.dcyo: Ẹja ńlá ṣè ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàla kan léṣe nípaṣẹ̀ ìbẹ̵̵́lumi fún kíkó àwọn ako edé ní ìlú Kalifóníà

translation.unyo: Eja nla kan se ikolu ti o si pa omokunrin odun metala kan lara lojo Abameta nigbati o n belumi lati mu ako ede ni ilu Kalifonia lojo ti won nside ayeye kiko ako ede, gege bii awon osise se so.
translation.dcyo: Ẹja ńlá kan ṣe ìkọlu tí ó sì pa ọmọkùnrin ọdún mẹtala kan lára lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta nigbati ó n ́bẹ́lumi láti mú ako edé ní ìlú Kalifónía lọjọ tí wọ́n ńsíde ayẹyẹ kiko ako edé, gẹgẹ bíi àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ se sọ.

translation.unyo: Ikolu naa waye ki aago meje owuro to lu nitosi Etikun Beacon ni Encinitas.
translation.dcyo: Ìkọlù náà wáyé kí aago méje òwúrọ̀ tó lù nítòsí Etíkun Beacon ní Encinitas.

translation.unyo: Chad Hammel so fun KSWB-TV ni ilu San Diego pe omode kυnrin naa ti nbelumi pelu awon ore re fun bii ϙgbon iseju ni owuro ojo Abameta nigbati oun gbo ti omokunrin naa npariwo fun iranlowo atipe leyin naa ni oun tuko s’ori omi pelu awon miran lati fa a jade kuro ninu omi naa.
translation.dcyo: Chad Hammel sọ fún KSWB-TV ní ìlú San Diego pé ọmọdé kὺnrin náà́ ti ńbẹ́lumi pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ fún bíi ϙgbòn ìṣẹjú ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta nígbàtí òun gbọ́ tí ọmọkùnrin náà ńpariwo fún ìrànlọ́wọ́ àtipé lẹ́yìn náà ni òun tukọ̀ s’órí omi pẹ̀lú àwọn ̣́miran láti fà á jade kúrô nínú omi náà.

translation.unyo: Hammel sowipe ni akoko oun ro wipe idunnu riri ako ede mu lasan ni, sugbon leyin naa oun ''wa sakiyesii pe o nkigbe, 'nkan ti bu mi je!
translation.dcyo: Hammel sowịpé ní àkọ́kọ́ òun rò wípé ìdùnnú rírí ako edé mú lásán ni, ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn náà òun ''wá ṣàkìyèsìị́ ̀pé ó ńkígbe, 'nkań ti bù mí jẹ!

translation.unyo: nkan ti bu mi je!'
translation.dcyo: nkan ti bù mí jẹ!'

translation.unyo: Gbogbo egungun ejika re lo han sita nitori eran ara to ti faya,'' Hammel sope oun sakiyesi re ni kete ti oun gba omokunrin naa mu.
translation.dcyo: Gbogbo egungun èjìká rẹ̀ ló hàn síta nítorí ẹran ara tó ti fàya,'' Hammel sọpé òun ṣàkíyèsí rẹ̀ ní kété tí òun gbà ọmọkùnrin náà mú.

translation.unyo: ''Mo pariwo si gbogbo eniyan lati jade kuro ninu omi naa: 'Eja nla saaki wa ninu omi!'' Hammel fi kun un.
translation.dcyo: ''Mo pariwo sí gbogbo eniyan láti jáde kúrò nínú omi náà: 'Ẹja ńlá sáàki wà nínú omi!'' Hammel fi kún un.

translation.unyo: Omokunrin naa ni a fi oko ofurufu gbe lo si Ile-iwosan Awon Omode ni ilu San Diego nibiti ti a ti se atoko re wipe o wa ni ipo to lewu.
translation.dcyo: Ọmọkùnrin náà ni a fi ọkọ òfurufú gbé lọ sí Ilé-ìwòsàn Àwọn Ọmọdé ní ìlú San Diego níbití tí a ti ṣe àtòkọ rẹ̀ wípé ó wà ní ipò tó léwu.

translation.unyo: Iru eya eja nla ti o se ikoluni naa ni a ko mo.
translation.dcyo: Irú ẹ̀yà ẹja ńlá tí ó ṣe ìkọluni náà ni a kò mọ̀.

translation.unyo: Ogagun Lifeguard LarrycGiles so nibi ifitonileti kan pelu awon oniroyin wipe eja nla saaki naa ni won ti ri ni agbegbe naa ni awon ose die saaju isele naa, sugbon won ti pinnu wipe kii se irufe eya saaki to lewu.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀gágun Lifeguard LarrycGiles sọ níbi ìfitónilétí kan pẹ̀lú àwọn oníròyìn wípé ẹja ńlá sáàkì náà ni wọ́n ti rí ní agbègbè náà ní àwọn ọ̀sẹ̀ díẹ̀ saájú ìṣẹ̀lẹ́ náà, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n ti pinnu wípé kìí ṣe irufẹ́ ẹ̀yà sáàkì tó léwu.

translation.unyo: Giles fi kun un wipe omode naa gba awon ipalara sibi agbegbe apa oke ago ara re.
translation.dcyo: Giles fi kún un wípé ọmọdé̀ náà gba àwọn ìpalára síbi agbègbè apá òké àgọ́ ara rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Awon osise ti ibi atiwole si etikun naa pa lati Etikun Ponto ni Casablad si Swami ni Ecinitas fun wakati mejidinlaadota fun eredi iwaadi ati aabo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ti ibi àtiwọlé sí etíkun náà pa láti Etíkun Ponto ní Casablad sí Swami ní Ecinitas fún wákàtí méjìdínláàdọ́ta fún èrèdí ìwáàdí àti ààbó.

translation.unyo: Giles sakiyesi pe awon irufe eya saaki to maarundinlogoji ni o wa ni agbegbe naa, sugbon opo ninu won ni awon ko ka si eyiti o lewu.
translation.dcyo: Giles ṣàkíyèsí pé àwọn irúfẹ́ ẹ̀yà sáàkì tó máàrùndínlógójì ni o wà ní agbègbè náà, ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀ ninu wọn ni àwọn kò kà sí eyiti ó léwu.

translation.unyo: Sainsbury's nsagbekale eto lati wole sinu oja awon nnkan afunnilewa ti orile-ede UK
translation.dcyo: Sainsbury's ńṣàgbékalẹ̀ ètò láti wọlé sínú ọjà àwọn nǹkan afúnnilẹ́wà ti orilẹ-ede UK

translation.unyo: Sainsbury's nta kangbon pelu Boots, Superdrug ati Debenhams pelu ile itaja eleka-eyiti o ni awon ona laarin ibiti a to oja afunnilewa si pelu iranlowo lati awon osise akosemose.
translation.dcyo: Sainsbury's ńta kàǹgbọ̀n pẹ̀lú Boots, Superdrug àti Debenhams pẹ̀lú ilé ìtajà ẹlẹ́ka-eyiti ó ní àwọn ọ̀nà láàrin ibití a to ọjà afúnnilẹ́wà sí pẹ̀lú ìrànlọwọ lati àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́.

translation.unyo: Gegebi ara ti atiwole sinu oja nnkan afunnilewa ti owo re to bilioonu poun 2.8 ti orile-ede UK, eyiti o si ntesiwaju lati maa dagba nigbati oja aso ati ohun elo ile nfa seyin, awon ibiti a to awon eroja afunnilewa si ni a o danwo ninu awon ile itaja mokanla kaakiri orile-ede naa ti a o si gbe e losi awon ile itaja die sii lodun to mbo bi o ba fihan pe o je aseyori.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bí ara ti àtiwọlé sínú ọjà nǹkan afúnnilẹ́wà tí owó rẹ̀ tó biliọọnu pọ́ùn 2.8 ti orilẹ-ede UK, eyiti ó sì ńtẹ̀síwájù láti máa dàgbà nigbati ọjà asọ̀ ati ohun èlò ilé nfà sẹ́yìn, àwọn ibití a tò àwọn érójà afúnnilẹ́wà sí ni a ó dánwò ninu awọn ilé ìtajà mọ́kànlá kaakiri orilẹ-ede náà tí a ó sì gbé e lọsí́ àwọn ilé ìtajà díẹ̀ síi lọ́dun tó ḿbọ̀ bí ó bá fihàn pé o jẹ́ àṣeyọrí.

translation.unyo: Idokoowo sinu eroja afunnilewa naa nwaye bi awon ile itaja nla se ndode fun awon ona lati lo awon aaye ti won nlo tele fun tito awon ero amohunmaworan ati ohun elo ile si.
translation.dcyo: Ìdókòòwò sínú érójà afúnnilẹ́wà náà ńwáyé bí àwọn ilé ìtajà ńlá ṣe ńdọdẹ fún àwọn ọ̀nà láti lo àwọn àayè tí wọn ńlò tẹ́lẹ̀ fún títo àwọn ẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán àti ohun èlò ilé sí.

translation.unyo: Sainsbury's sope oun yoo maa so iwon ore eroja afunnilewa di ilopomeji ti yoo si pese oja to egberun meta, pelu awon oja oloruko bii Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman ati Dr. PawPaw fun igba akoko.
translation.dcyo: Sainsbury's sọpé òun yóò máa sọ ìwọn ọrẹ érójà afúnnilẹ́wà di ìlọ́poméjì tí yóò sì pèsè ọjà to ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́ta, pẹ̀lú àwọn ọjà olórúkọ bíi Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman àti Dr. PawPaw fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́.

translation.unyo: Awon oja totiwa tele lati owo L'Oreal, Maybelline ati Burt's Bees yoo gba aaye die sii pelu awon agbegbe ti o loruko to farajo awon eyiti a nri ninu awon ile itaja bii Boots.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọjà tótiwà tẹ́lẹ̀ láti ọwọ́ L'Oreal, Maybelline àti Burt's Bees yóò gba àayè díẹ̀ síi pẹ̀lú àwọn agbègbè tí o lórúkọ tó farajọ àwọn eyiti a ńrí ninu àwọn ilé ìtajà bíi Boots.

translation.unyo: Ile itaja naa tun nse atunfilole awon oja isojuloge re ki opo ninu awon oja re lee je eyiti awon ti kii je eran nfe - nnkan ti awon odo to nraja nbeere fun julo.
translation.dcyo: Ilé ìtajà náà tún ńṣe àtúnfilọ́lẹ̀ àwọn ọjà ìṣojúlóge rẹ̀ kí ọ̀pọ̀ ninu àwọn ọjà rẹ̀ leè jẹ eyiti àwọn tí kìí jẹ ẹran ńfẹ́ - nǹkan ti àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tó ńrajà ńbèèré fún jùlọ.

translation.unyo: Ni afikun, ile itaja-eleyo ti nnkan olooorun-didun ti Fragrance Shop naa yoo maa dan awon ibiti a yonda fun won wo ninu awon ile itaja Sainsbury's meji, akoko ti a si ni Croydon, ni guusu ilu London, lose to koja nigbati ikeji yo di sisi ni Selly Oak, Birmingham, laarin odun yii.
translation.dcyo: Ni àfikún, ilé ìtajà-ẹlẹ́yọ ti nǹkan olóòórùn-dídun ti Fragrance Shop náà yóò máa dán àwọn ibití a yọ̀ǹda fún wọn wò ninu àwọn ilé ìtajà Sainsbury's méjì, àkọ́kọ́ tí a sí ní Croydon, ní gúúsù ìlú Lọndọn, lọsẹ tó kọjá nigbati ikeji yo di sísí ní Selly Oak, Birmingham, láàrin ọ́dún yìí.

translation.unyo: Oja rira lori itakun ayelujara ati sisun si rira awon ounje die lojoojumo ni awon ile itaja irorun towa lagbegbe tumo sipe awon ile itaja nla ti nni ise die sii lati se lori pipa arowa fun awon eniyan lati sabewo si odoo won.
translation.dcyo: Ọjà rírà lórí ìtàkùn ayélujára àti sísún sí rirá àwọn oúnjẹ díẹ̀ lojoojumọ ní àwọn ilé ìtajà ìrọ̀rùn tówà lágbègbè túmọ sípé àwọn ilé ìtajà ńlá ti ńní iṣẹ́ díẹ̀ síi láti ṣe lórí pípa àrọwà fún àwọn eniyan láti ṣàbẹ̀wo sí ọdọọ wọǹ.

translation.unyo: Mike Coupe, oludari agba ni Sainsbury's, ti sope irisi awon ibi itaja naa lona to npo sii yoo jo ti awon ile itaja eleka bi ile itaja nla alatagba naa ti ngbiyanju lati koju ija si awon adinnilowo Aldi ati Lidl pelu awon ise die sii ati ohun ti kii se ounje.
translation.dcyo: Mike Coupe, olùdarí àgbà ni Sainsbury's, ti sọpé ìrísí àwọn ibi ìtajà náà lọna tó ńpọ̀ síi yóò jọ ti àwọn ilé ìtajà ẹlẹ́ka bí ilé ìtajà ńlá alátagbà náà ti ngbiyanju láti kọjú ìjà̀ sí àwọn adínnilówó Aldi àti Lidl pẹ̀lú àwọn iṣẹ́ díẹ̀ síi àti ohun tí kìí ṣe oúnjẹ.

translation.unyo: Ile itaja Sainsbury ti nfi awon ibi itaja Argos sinu awon ile itaja bii ogoorun ti o si ti se ifinimole fun iye Habitats leyin ti o ra awon  alatagba mejeeji lodun meji seyin, eyiti o sope o ti mu ki oja awon ounje ta sii ti o si jeki awon alatagba je ere die sii.
translation.dcyo: Ilè ìtàjà Sainsbury ti ńfi àwọn ibi ìtajà Argos sínú àwọn ilé ìtajà bii ọgọ́ọ̀rún tí o sì ti ṣe ìfinimọlé fún iye Habitats lẹ́yìn tí o ra àwọn  alátagbà méjèèjì lọ́dún méjì sẹ́yìn, eyiti ó sọpé ó ti mú ki ọjà àwọn oúnjẹ̀ tà síi tí ó sì jẹ́kí àwọn alátagbà jẹ érè díẹ̀ síi.

translation.unyo: Igbiyanju ti ile itaja nla yii se seyin lati so awon eka afunnilewa ati ti oogun tita re ji kuna.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbìyànjú ti ilé ìtajà ńlà yíì ṣe sẹyìn láti ṣọ àwọn ẹ̀ka afúnnilẹ́wà ati ti òògùn títà rẹ̀ jí ̀kùnà.

translation.unyo: Ni ibere awon odun 2000,ile itaja Sainsbury dan oko-owo alajoni wo pelu Boots sugbon asopo naa pari leyin aawo kan lori bi won yoo ti maa pin owo to nwole lati ibi itaja oogun towa ninu awon ile itaja nla re.
translation.dcyo: Ni ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn ọdún 2000,ilé ìtaja Sainsbury dán oko-òwò alájọni wò pẹ̀lu Boots sùgbọ́n àsopọ náà pári lẹ́yìn aáwọ̀ kan lórí bí wọn yóò tí máa pín owó tó ńwọlé láti ibi ìtajà oogun tówà ninu àwọn ilé ìtajà ńlá rè̀.

translation.unyo: igbeyewo tuntun naa waye leyin ti Sainsbury's ta oko-owo ile-itaja oogun orinlenigba le kan re fun Celesio, eniti o ni ile itaja alatagba Lloyds Pharmacy, fun milionu maarundinlogoje poun, ni odun meta seyin.
translation.dcyo: ìgbeyẹwò tuntun náà ́wáyé lẹ́yìn ti Sainsbury's ta oko-òwò ílé-ìtajà òògùn ọrìnlénigba lé kan rẹ̀ fún Celesio, ẹnití ó ni ilé ìtajà alátagbà Lloyds Pharmacy, fún miliọnu máàrúndínlọ́gojè pọ́ùn, ni ọ́dún mẹ́ta sẹ́yìn.

translation.unyo: O sope Lloyds yoo ko ipa ninu eto naa, nipa sise afikun awon oja itoju awo ara oloruko togbooro bii La Roch-Posay ati Vichy sinu ibi itaja merin.
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé Lloyds yóò kó ipa nínú ètò náà, nípa ṣíṣe àfikún àwọn ọjà itọju awọ ara olorúkọ tógbòòrò bíi La Roch-Posay àti Vichy sínú ibi ìtajà mẹ́rin.

translation.unyo: Paul Mills-Hicks, oludari oko-owo fun Sainsbury's, sope: ''A ti yi irisi ati imolara ti awon oju ona ibi itaja eroja afunnilewa wa pada lati jeki ayika naa dara sii fun awon oniibara wa.
translation.dcyo: Paul Mills-Hicks, olùdarí oko-òwò fún Sainsbury's, sọpé: ''A ti yí ìrísí àti ìmọ̀lára ti àwọn ojú ọ̀nà ibi ìtajà èròjà afúnnilẹwà wa padà láti jẹ́kí àyíká náà dára síi fún àwọn oníìbárà wa.

translation.unyo: A tun ti dokoowo ninu kiko awon alabasisepo wa lekoo akanse awon ti yoo maa wa laarowoto lati funni ni imoran.
translation.dcyo: A tún ti dókòòwò nínú kíkọ́ àwọn alábàṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ wa lẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àkànṣe àwọn tí yóò máa wà láàrọ́wọ́tó láti fúnni ni ímọ̀ràn.

translation.unyo: Awon orisirisi oja oloruko wa ni a sagbekale won lati ba gbogbo ilo pade atipe ayika wa to fanimora ati awon ibi ti ile itaja wa wa ni o rorun eyi si tumo sipe a ti di ibi kan to pon dandan eyiti awon eniyan yoo fe de ti o si npe ona oja rira atijo nija.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn oríṣiríṣi ọjà olórúkọ wa ní a ṣàgbékalẹ̀ wọn láti bá gbogbo ìlò pàdé àtipé àyíká wa tó fanimọ́ra àti àwọn ibi tí ilé ìtajà wa wà ni ó rọrùn èyí sì túmọ sípé a ti di ibi kan tó pọn dandan eyiti àwọn eniyan yóò fẹ́ dé tí ó sì ńpe ọ̀nà ọjà rírà àtijọ́ níjà.

translation.unyo: Peter Jones 'binu fufu' leyin ti Holly Willoughby jade kuro ninu adehun oni-milionu mokanla poun
translation.dcyo: Peter Jones 'bínu fùfù' lẹ́yìn ti Holly Willoughby jáde kúrò nínú àdéhùn oní-mílíọ́nù mọ́kànlá pọ́uǹ

translation.unyo: Irawo Dragons Den Peter Jones kuro pelu 'ibinu fufu' leyin ti atokun eto Holly Willoughby jade kuro ninu adehun oni-milionu mokanla poun pelu oko-owo oloruko re ti igbesi-aye re lati lee gbajumo awon ise agbase tuntun re pelu Marks and Spencer ati ITV
translation.dcyo: Ìràwọ̀ Dragons Den Peter Jones kúrò pẹ̀lú 'ìbínú fùfù' lẹ́yìn tí atọ́kùn ètò Holly Willoughby jáde kúrò nínú àdéhùn oní-mílíọ̀nù mọ́kànlà pọ́ùn pẹ̀lú oko-òwò olorúkọ rẹ̀ ti ìgbésí-ayé rẹ̀ láti leè gbájúmọ́ àwọn iṣẹ́ àgbàṣe tuntun rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Marks and Spencer àti ITV

translation.unyo: Willoughby oni aye fun oja oloruko aso iwo nile ati oja asopoTruly won mo.
translation.dcyo: Willoughby òní àyè fún ọjà olórúkọ aso iwọ nílé àti ̀ọja àsopọ̀Truly wọn mọ́.

translation.unyo: Oko-owo awon mejeeji ni won fiwe ti idokoowo oloruko Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow.
translation.dcyo: Oko-òwò àwọn méjèèjì ni wọ́n fiwe ti ìdókóòwò olórúkọ Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow.

translation.unyo: Atokun Owuro yii, eni odun metadinlogoji losi Instagram lati kede wipe o nkuro.
translation.dcyo: Atọ́kùn Òwúrọ̀ yìí, ẹni oḍún mẹ́tàdínlógòjì lọsí Instagram láti kéde wípé ó ńkúrò.

translation.unyo: Holly Willoughby ti kuro ni Dragons'' eni irawo Den Peter Jones nbinu fufu nipa jijade kuro ninu oko-owo elere oloruko ti ona igbesi-aye ni iseju to gbeyin - lati lee gbajumo awon ise agbase eleekunrere tuntun re pelu Marks and Spencer ati ITV.
translation.dcyo: Holly Willoughby ti kúrò ni Dragons'' eni ìràwọ̀ Den Peter Jones ńbínú fùfù nípa jíjáde kúrò nínú oko-òwò elérè olórúkọ ti ọ̀nà ìgbésí-ayé ní ìṣẹ́jú tó gbẹ̀yìn - láti leè gbájúmọ́ àwọn iṣẹ́ àgbàṣe ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ tuntun rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Marks and Spencer àti ITV.

translation.unyo: Awon orisun so wipe Jones ''binu fufu'' nigbati omobinrin wura amohυnmaworan gba ninu ipade to le koko kan lojo Isegun ni olu ile-ise oko-owo re toti gboregedige ni Marlow, Buckinghamshire. wipe awon adehun tuntun re - eyiti o to milionu kan ati aabo poun - tumo sipe ohun koni akoko pupo mo lati fi fun aso iwo nile ati awon asopo oloruko Truly won mo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn orísun sọ wípé Jones ''bínù fùfù'' nigbati ọmọbìnrin wúrà amóhὺnmawòràn gbà nínú ìpàdé tó le koko kan lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun ní olú ilé-iṣẹ́ oko-òwò rẹ̀ toti gbọ̀rẹ̀gẹ̀digẹ̀ ní Marlow, Buckinghamshire. wípé àwọn àdéhùn tuntun rẹ̀ - eyiti ó tó mílíọ̀nù kan àti ààbọ̀ pọ́ùn - túmọ̀ sípé òhun kòní àkókò púpò mọ́ láti fi fún asọ íwọ̀ nílé àti àwọn àsopọ̀ olórúkọ Truly wọn mọ́.

translation.unyo: Oko-owo naa ni won ti fiwe oloruko Oko-owo Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow atipe won ti sope awon dukia re yoo di ilopo meji ti Willoughby ti won ni o to milionu mokanla poun.
translation.dcyo: Oko-òwò náà ni wọ́n ti fiwé olorúkọ Oko-òwò Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow àtipé wọ́n ti sọpé àwọn dúkìá rẹ̀ yóò di ìlọ́po méjì ti Willoughby tí wọ́n ní ó tó mílíọ̀nù mọ́kànlá pọ́ùn.

translation.unyo: Bi Willoughby, 37, losi Instagram lati kede wipe oun nfi Truly sile, Jones wo oko ofurufu jade kuro ni ile geesi ti osi forile okan lara awon ile isinmi re
translation.dcyo: Bí Willoughby, 37̀, lọsí Instagram láti kéde wípé òun ńfi Truly sílẹ̀, Jones wọ ọkọ òfurufú jáde kúrò ní ilẹ gẹẹsì ti ósì forílẹ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ilé ìsinmi rẹ̀

translation.unyo: Orisun kan sope: Truly je okan lara awon ohun ti ose Pataki fun Holly.
translation.dcyo: Orísun kan sọpé: Truly jẹ ọkan lára àwòn ohun ti óṣe Pàtàkì fún Holly.

translation.unyo: Ohun nii ibaje ere ojo iwaju gigun fun un eyiti yoo  mu un la ninu awon odun tonbo niwaju.
translation.dcyo: Òhun níì ìbájẹ́ èrè ọjọ́ iwájú gígùn fún un eyiti yóò  mú un là ninú àwọn ọdún tónbo níwájú́.

translation.unyo: Ipinnu re lati jade kuro ya gbogbo awon  olυkopa lenu patapata.
translation.dcyo: Ìpinnu rẹ̀ láti jáde kúrò ya gbogbo àwọn  ólὺkópa ̀lẹ́nu pátápátá.

translation.unyo: Kosi eni ti o gba ohun to sele lojo Isegun naa gbo, leyin ti oti sunmo ifilole tan.
translation.dcyo: Kòsí ẹni t́i ó̀ gba ohun tó ́ṣẹlẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun naa gbọ́, lẹyìn ti oti súnmọ́ ìfilọ́lẹ̀ taǹ.

translation.unyo: Ile ikojasi kan wa ti o kun fun awon oja ni Marlow HQ ti won ti setan fun tita.''
translation.dcyo: Ilé ìkọ́jàsí kan wà tí o kún fun àwọn ọjà ni Marlow HQ tí wọn ti ṣetán fun títà.''

translation.unyo: Awon akosemose gbagbo wipe kikuro atokun Owuro yii, eniti o wa ninu awon irawo Briteeni to see kowo le lori, lee na ile-ise naa ni awon milionu poun nitori idokowo to wuwo ninu awon oja eyiti to bere lati awon timu-timu ati awon abela si aso ati aso iwo nile, eyii le mu idaduro siwaju ba ifilole re.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ gbàgbọ́ wipe kíkúrò atọ́kùn Òwúrọ̀ yìí, enití ó wà ninu àwọn ìràwọ̀ Briteeni tó ṣeé kówó lé lori, leè ná ilé-iṣẹ́ nàà ni àwọn mílíọ̀nụ̀ pọ́ùn nitori ìdókòwò tó wúwo ninu àwọn ọjà eyiti tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti àwọn tìmù-tìmu àti àwọn àbẹ́là sí asọ àti asọ íwọ́ nílé, èyíì le mú ìdádúró siwaju bá ìfilọ́lẹ̀ rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Atipe o lee tumo si opin fun ibanidoore olojo pipe.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé o leè túmọ̀ sí òpin fún ìbánidọ́ọ̀rẹ́ ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́.

translation.unyo: Iya-olomo-meta Willoughby ati oko re Dan Baldwin ti je eniti o sunmo Jones ati aya re Tara Capp gidigidi fun odun mewaa.
translation.dcyo: Ìyá-ọlómọ-mẹ́ta Willoughby àti ọkọ rẹ̀ Dan Baldwin ti jẹ́ ẹniti ó súnmọ́ Jones àti aya rẹ̀ Tara Capp gidigidi fún ọdún mẹ́wàá.

translation.unyo: Willoughby da Truly sile pelu Capp lodun 2016 ti Jones, eni odun mejilelaaadota, si darapo bi alaga ninu osu Erena.
translation.dcyo: Willoughby dá Truly sílẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Capp lọ́dún 2016 tí Jones, ẹni ọdún méjìléláàádọ́ta, sì darapọ̀ bí alága nínú oṣù Erénà.

translation.unyo: Isinmi awon tokotaya naa lapapo ati Jones ni ipin idookowo ida ogoji ninu ogoorun ti ile ise asagbejade amohυmaworaan ti Baldwin.
translation.dcyo: Ìsinmi àwọn tọkọtaya náà lápapọ̀ àti Jones ní ìpín ìdóòkòwò ìdá ogójì ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti ilé iṣẹ́ aṣàgbéjáde amóhὺmáwòràán ti Baldwin.

translation.unyo: Willioughby tife di asoju oloruko kan fun M&S ti yoo si ropo Ant McPartlin gege bii olugbalejo lori eto Mo je Ilumonka Gbajumo ni ITV.
translation.dcyo: Willioughby tifẹ di aṣojú olorúkọ kan fún M&S tí yóò sì rọ́pò Ant McPartlin gẹgẹ bíi olùgbàlejò lórí ètò Mo jẹ́ Ìlúmọ̀ńká Gbajúmọ̀ ni ITV.

translation.unyo: Orisun kan to sunmo Jones lale ana sowipe ''A koni so oro lori awon ohun to niise pelu oko-owo re.''
translation.dcyo: Orísun kan tó súnmọ́ Jones lálẹ́ àná sowípẹ́ ''A kòní sọ ọrọ lórí àwọn ohun tó nííṣe pẹ̀lú oko-òwò rẹ̀.''

translation.unyo: Oro lile ‘leyin naa a abere sini n’ife arawa'
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀rọ líle ‘léyìn náà a ábẹrẹ siní n’ìfẹ arawá́'

translation.unyo: O se awada nipa oro ifasise-enihanni eyiti ma n gba l’owo awon oniroyin fun siso oro ti awon kan yoo ro wipe ''Ko to si aare'' ati fun nini ireti rere nipa olυdari orile-ede Ariwa Koria.
translation.dcyo: Ó ṣe àwàdà nípa ọ̀rọ̀ ìfàṣìṣe-ẹnihànni eyiti ma ǹ gbà l’ọwọ́ àwọn oníròyìn fún sísọ ọ̀rọ̀ tí àwọn kan yóò rò wípé ''Kò tọ si ààrẹ̀'' àti fún níní írètí rere nipa olὺdarí orilẹ-ede Ariwa Kòríà.

translation.unyo: Kinni idi ti Aare Trump fi ju awa sile to bee?
translation.dcyo: Kínni ìdí tí Ààrẹ Trump fi jú awà sílẹ̀ to bẹ́ẹ̀?

translation.unyo: Trump so pelu ohun efe ''atokun iroyin re.
translation.dcyo: Trump sọ pẹ̀lú ohùn ẹ̀fẹ̀ ''atọ́kùn ìròyìn rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Emi ko ju awa kankan sile.''
translation.dcyo: Èmi kò ju awà kankan sílẹ̀.''

translation.unyo: O pe akiyesi pe Kim ni ife si ipade eleekeji leyin ipade akoko won ni Singapore ninu osu Okudu eyiti Trump gboriyin fun bi igbese nla lati pale ohun ija ado oloro mo kuro ni orile-ede Ariwa Koria.
translation.dcyo: Ó pe ̣àkíyèsí pé Kim ní ìfẹ́ sí ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀keji lẹ́yìn ìpàdé àkọ́kọ́ wọn ní Singapore nínú oṣu Òkúdu eyiti Trump gbóríyìn fún bí ìgbésẹ̀ ńlá láti palẹ̀ ohun ìjà àdó olóró mọ́ kúrò ní orilẹ-ede Àriwá Kòrià.

translation.unyo: Sugbon awon ifikunlukun nipa pipale ado oloro mo kuro nile ti duro tiiri.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ìfikùnlukùn nípa pípalẹ àdó olóró mọ kúrò nílẹ̀ ti dúró tiiri.

translation.unyo: Leyin osu meta o le die leyin ipade ti osu Okudu ni Singapore, asoju agba orile-ede Ariwa Koria Ri Yong Ho so fun awon olori agbaye nibi ipade ajo U.N. ti Ipejopo Gbogbogboo ni ojo Abameta wipe Ariwa naa kori ''idahun to bojumu'' lati owo orile-ede U. S. si awon igbese toyara ti Ariwa Koria lati ko awon nnkan ogun danu.
translation.dcyo: Lẹyìn oṣù mẹ́ta o le diẹ lẹyìn ìpàdé ti oṣù Òkúdu ni Singapore, aṣojú àgbà orilẹ-ede Àríwa Kòríà Ri Yong Ho sọ fún àwọn olórí àgbáyé níbi ìpàdé àjọ U.N. ti Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbòò ni ọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta wípé Àríwá náà kòrí ''ìdáhùn tó bójúmu'' láti ọwọ́ orilẹ-ede U. S. sí àwọn ìgbésẹ tóyára ti Àríwá Kòríà láti kó àwọn nǹkàn ogun dánù.

translation.unyo: Dipo re, o pe akiyesi pe, orile-ede U.S. si ntesiwaju pelu awon ijeniniya pelu afojusun lati maa mu inira posii.
translation.dcyo: Dípò rẹ̀, ó pe àkíyèsí pé, orilẹ-ede U.S. si ńtẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú àwọn ìjẹniníyà pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn láti máa mú ìnira pọ̀síi.

translation.unyo: Trump lo oju iwoye eyiti o nireti ninu oro imoriya re.
translation.dcyo: Trump lo ojú ìwòye eyiti ó nírètí nínú ọ̀rọ̀ ìmóríyá rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: ''A nse ohun nla pelu Ariwa Koria,'' ni o wi.
translation.dcyo: ''À ńṣe ohun ńlá pẹ̀lú Àriwá Kòríà,'' ní o wí.

translation.unyo: A fe lo jagun pelu orile-ede Ariwa Koria tele.
translation.dcyo: À fẹ́ lọ jagun pẹ̀lú orilẹ-ede Àríwá Kòría télẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Opo milionu awon eniyan ni koba di pipa.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀pọ̀ mílíọ̀nù àwọn eniyan ní kòbá di pípa.

translation.unyo: Bayii a ni ibasepo nla.''
translation.dcyo: Báyìí a ní ìbáṣepọ̀ ńlá.''

translation.unyo: O sope awon igbiyanju oun lati jeki itesiwaju ba ibasepo pelu Kim ti mu awon esi rere jade - fifi opin si didan awon ado oloro wo, sise iranwo lati tu awon ti won de sile ati gbigba awon toku ninu awon omo ogun Amerika pada sile.
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé àwọn ìgbìyànjú òun láti jẹ́kí ìtẹ̀síwájú bá ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Kim ti mú àwọn èsì rere jáde - fífi òpin sí dídán àwọn àdó olóró wò, ṣíṣe ìrànwọ́ láti tú àwọn ti wọn ̀dè sílẹ̀ àti gbígba àwọn tókù nínú àwọn ọmọ ogun Amẹrika padà sílé.

translation.unyo: O gbe ara re nija lori ona ti ko gbajumo to ngba soro nipa ibasepo pelu Kim.
translation.dcyo: Ó gbe ara rẹ̀ níjà lórí ọ̀nà tí kò gbajúmọ̀ tó ńgbà sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Kim.

translation.unyo: ''O rorun lati se bi aare, sugbon dipo ki a ni awon eniyan egberun mewaa ti won ngbiyanju lati wo ibi to kun fofo yii, a o ni bii eniyan igba to nduro nibi,'' gege bii  Trump se wi, osi na ika si ero towa niwaju re.
translation.dcyo: ''Ó rọrùn láti ṣe bí ààrẹ, sùgbọ́n dípò ki a ní àwọn ènìyàń ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́wàá ti woń ńgbìyànjú láti wọ ibi tó kún fọ́fọ́ yìí, a ó ní bíi ènìyàn igba tó ńdúró níbí,'' gẹgẹ bíi  Trump ṣe wí, ósi ́na ìka sì èrò tówà níwájú rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ikun omi Tsunami ati Ile riri ni orile-ede Indonesia sebaje nla si erekusu kan,ti osi pa Awon eniyan bii Ogoorun
translation.dcyo: Ìkún omi Tsunami ati Ilẹ̀ rírì ni orilẹ-ede Indonẹsia ṣèbàjẹ́ nlá si erékùsù kan,ti ósí pa Àwọn ènìyàn bii Ọgọ́ọ̀rún

translation.unyo: Fun apeere,leyin isele ile riri ti Lombok,  awon ajo ti kii se ti ijoba lati ile okeere ni won so fun awon ko nilo won.
translation.dcyo: Fún àpẹẹrẹ,lẹ́yìn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ilẹ̀ rírí tí Lombok,  àwọn àjọ tí kìí ṣe ti ìjọba láti ilẹ̀ òkèèrè ni wọ́n sọ fún àwọn kò nílò wọn.

translation.unyo: Botilejepe o ju ida mewaa ninu ogoorun awon to ngbe ni Lombok to di eniti a mu kuro ni ibugbe re, kosi ikede ajalu gbogbogboo kankan ti won kede, eyi tiise amuye fun mimu iranwo wole lati eka iranlowo agbaye.
translation.dcyo: Bótilèjẹpé ó ju ìdá mẹ́wàá nínú ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn tó ńgbé ní Lombok tó di ẹniti a mú kúrò ní ibugbe rẹ̀, kòsì ìkéde àjálù gbogbogbòò kankan tí wọ́n kéde, eyi tííṣe àmúyẹ fún mímú ìrànwọ́ wọlé láti ̀ẹka ìrànlọwọ àgbáyé.

translation.unyo: Arabirin Sumbung so wipe o seni laaanu wipe ni pupo igba won ma n fihan gbangba wipe awon ko beere iranwo lati owo eka iranlowo gbogbo agbaye, nitorinaa o je nnkan to peni nija,''
translation.dcyo: Arábìrin Sumbung sọ wipe ó ṣeni láàánú wípé ní pụ̀pọ̀ igbà wọn ma n fihàn gbangba wípé àwọn kò béèrè ìraǹwọ́ láti ọwọ́ ̀ẹka ìrànlọwọ gbogbo àgbáyé, nitorinaa ó jẹ́ nǹkan tó peni níjà,''

translation.unyo: Nigbati Save the Children nko iko kan jo lati rin irin ajo losi Palu, ko tii dani loju boya awon osise ile okeere lee sise lori ile naa.
translation.dcyo: Nígbàtí Save the Children ńkó ikọ̀ kan jọ láti rin ìrìn àjò lọsí Palu, kò tíì dáni lójú bóyá àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè leè ṣiṣẹ́ lórí ilẹ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Ogbeni Sutopo, agbenuso ajo to nrisi isele ajalu lorile ede naa, sope awon osise Indonesia nse odiwon bi oro tise ri ni Palu lati rii boya won yoo gba awon ajo kaakiri agbaye laaaye lati kopa ninu iyanju fun iranwo naa.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Sutopo, agbẹnusọ àjọ tó ńrísí ìṣẹ́lẹ̀ àjálù lórílẹ̀ èdè náà, sọpé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ Indonesia ńṣe òdiwọ̀n bí ọ̀rọ̀ tiṣe rí ní Palu láti rii bóyá wọn yóò gba àwọn àjọ kaakiri àgbáyé láàáyé láti kópa nínú ìyànjú fún ìrànwọ́ náà.

translation.unyo: Pelu ile mimi ti Indonesia nfarada yii, orile-ede naa kosi tii murasile fun ibinu iseda.
translation.dcyo: Pẹlú ilẹ̀ mímí̀ tí Indonesia ńfaradà yii, orilẹ-ede náà kosì tíì múrasílẹ̀ fún ìbínú ìṣẹ̀dá.

translation.unyo: Botilejepe a ti ko awon ibugbe ikun omi tsunami ni Aceh, kii se ohun to wopo lati ri ni awon aala etikun miran.
translation.dcyo: Bótilèjẹpé a ti kọ́ àwọn ibùgbé ìkún omi tsunami ní Aceh, kìí ṣe ohun tó wọ́pọ̀́ láti rí ní àwọn ààlà etíkun miran.

translation.unyo: O fi han gbangba pe aisi ikilo fun ikun omi tsunami ni Palu, ni o see se pe o kopa ninu ipadanu emi, botilejepe ikilo kan ti wa fun lilo.
translation.dcyo: Ó fi hàn gbangba pe aìsí ìkìlọ fún ìkún omi tsunami ni Palu, ni ó ṣeé ṣe pe ó kópạ̀ nínú ipàdánù ẹmì, botilẹjepe ìkìlọ̀ kan ti wà fún lílò.

translation.unyo: Ni awon akoko to dara julo, rinrin irin-ajo laarin awon erekusu Indonesia je eyiti o npeni nija.
translation.dcyo: Ní àwọn àkókò tó dára jùlọ, rínrín ìrìn-àjò láàrin àwọn erékùsù Indonesia jẹ́ eyiti ó ńpeni níjà.

translation.unyo: Awon isele ajalu atorunwa njeki eeto igboke-gbodo di eyiti o pakaso.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù àtọ̀runwá ńjẹ́kí eètò ìgbòkè-gbodò di eyiti o pakasọ.

translation.unyo: Oko oju omi kan ti oni ile iwosan ti won ti wa gunle si Lombok eyiti won fi maa toju awon to fara kaasa ajalu ile riri ti wa loju ona si Palu, sugbon yoo gba o kere tan ojo meta lati de ibi ajalu tuntun naa.
translation.dcyo: Ọkọ ojú omi kan ti óní ilé ìwòsàn ti wọ́n ti wà gúnlẹ̀ si Lombok èyítí won fi máa tọ́jú àwọn tó fara káásá àjálù ilẹ̀ rírí tí wà lójú ọ̀nà si Palu, ṣùgbọ́n yóò gbà ó kéré tán ọjọ́ mẹ́ta láti dé ibi àjálù tuntun náà.

translation.unyo: okan lara ohun ti Aare Joko Widodo nlo fun ipolongo ibo lati yan an sipo ni mimu igbega ba awon ohun amayederun ni Indonesia toti baje tan, o si nawo lori awon ona ati opopona oko oju-irin.
translation.dcyo: ọkan lárà ohun ti Ààrẹ Joko Widodo nlo fún ìpolongo ìbò láti yàn án sípo ni mímú ìgbéga bá àwọn ohun amáyédẹrùn ni Indonesia tóti bàjẹ́ tán, ó sì náwó lórí àwọn ọ̀nà àti òpópónà ọkọ̀ ojú-irin.

translation.unyo: Sugbon awon edinku owo ti ko aisan ba isakoso ogbeni Joko bi o ti ndojuko ibo didi lati tun yan an sipo.
translation.dcyo: Súgbọ̀n àwọn ẹ̀dínkù́ owó́ ti kó àìsàn bá ìṣàkóso ọgbẹni Joko bí ó ti ńdojúkọ ìbò dídì láti tún yàn an sípò.

translation.unyo: Ogbeni Joko nkoju inira latari awon aawo alaiduro laarin awon elesin ni Indonesia, nibiti awon omo egbe ti Musulumi topoju ti faramo irufe igbagbo alakatakiti tole die sii.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Joko ńkóju ìnira látàrí àwọn aáwọ̀ aláìdúró láàrin àwọn ẹlẹ́sìn ní Indonesia, níbití àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ti Musulumi tópọ̀jù ti faramọ́ irúfẹ́ ìgbàgbọ́ alákatakíti tóle díẹ̀ síi.

translation.unyo: Awon eniyan to le ni egberun kan ni won ku ti egbe-egberun sii ti kuro nile won bii egbe Kristieni ati Musulumi se koju ija ni awon opopona, pelu awon ada, orun ati ofa, ati awon ohun ija atowoda miran.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn eniyan tó lé ni ẹgbẹ̀rún kan ni wọn kú tí ẹgbẹ-ẹgbẹ̀run síì ti kúrò nílé wọn bii ẹgbẹ́ Kristiẹni àti Musulumi se koju ìjà ní àwọn òpópónà, pẹ̀lú àwọn àdá, ọrún àti ọfà, àti àwọn ohun ìjà àtọwọ́dá miran.

translation.unyo: Woran: Daniel Sturridge ti Liverpool ti ayo wole lati di omi dojuko. Chelsea
translation.dcyo: Wòran: Daniel Sturridge ti Liverpool ti ayò wọlé láti di ọ̀mì dojúkọ. Chelsea

translation.unyo: Daniel Sturridge gba Liverpool la kuro lowo ipadanu Liigi Piremia sowo Chelsea pelu ami ayo kan ni iseju kokandinlaaadorun lojo Abameta ni Stamford Bridge ni Londonu.
translation.dcyo: Daniel Sturridge gba Liverpool là kúrò lọ́wọ́ ìpàdánù Líìgì Pírẹ́míà sọ́wọ́ Chelsea pẹ̀lú àmì ayò kan ní ìṣẹ́jú kọkàndínláàádọ́rún lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta ní Stamford Bridge ní Lọndọnu.

translation.unyo: Sturridge gba boolu ti a gba sii lati odo Xherdan Shakiri nigbati o wa ni bii iwon yaadi ogbon si oju ile Chelsea ati wipe iko re nto alatako won leyin pelu ami ayo 1-0.
translation.dcyo: Sturridge gba bọ́ọ̀lù tí a gbá sii láti ọ̀dọ̀ Xherdan Shakiri nigbati ó wà ní bíi ìwọ̀n yáàdì ọgbọ̀n sí ojú ilé Chelsea àti wípé ikọ̀ rẹ̀ ńtọ alátakò wọn lẹ́yìn pẹ̀lú àmì ayò 1-0.

translation.unyo: O taari boolu si apa osi re ki o to tun gba si igun to jinna soju ile.
translation.dcyo: Ó taari bọ́ọ̀lù sí apá òsì rẹ̀ kí ó tó tun gbá sí igun tó jiǹnà sójú ilé.

translation.unyo: Igbiyanju naa lo soke ju apoti ojule penariti lo bi o ti nyapa si oke igun apa otun awon naa.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbìyànjú náà lọ sókè ju àpótí ojúlé̀ pẹnáritì lọ bí o ti ńyapa sí òkè igun apá ọ̀tún àwọn náà.

translation.unyo: Lopin re boolu naa jabo loke Kepa Arrizalaga to nfo ti o si bo sinu awon naa.
translation.dcyo: Lópin rẹ̀ bọ́ọ̀lù náà jábọ́ lókè Kepa Arrizalaga tó ńfò tí ó sì bọ́ sínu àwọn náà.

translation.unyo: ''O kan ngbiyanju lati wo inu ipo yen, lati de ori boolu naa ti awon agbaboolu bii Shaq ti won maa ngba a siwaju niwon bi o bati see se si, nitorinaa Mo kan gbiyanju lati seda bi o bati see se si funrami,'' Sturridge wi fun LiverpoolFC.com.
translation.dcyo: ''Ó kàn ńgbiyanju láti wọ inú ipò yẹn, láti dé orí bọ́ọ̀lù náà tí àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù bíi Shaq tí wọn máa ńgbá a siwaju níwọn bí ó báti ṣée ṣe sí, nitorinaa Mo kàn gbìyànjú láti ṣẹ̀dá bí o báti ṣée ṣe sí funrami,'' Sturridge wí fún LiverpoolFC.com.

translation.unyo: Mo ri Kante bi oti nbo ti o si fowokan o si gba boolu naa ni kiakia.''
translation.dcyo: Mo rí Kante bi oti nbọ tí ó sì ̀fọwọ́kàn o sì gbà bọ́ọ̀lù náà ní kíakíá.''

translation.unyo: Chelsea saaju pelu ami ayo 1-0 ni idaji akoko idije leyin ti irawo omo Belijiomu Eden Hazard gba ami ayo kan ni iseju meedogbon.
translation.dcyo: Chelsea ́saájú pẹ̀lú àmi ayò 1-0 ní ìdajì àkókò ìdíje lẹ́yìn ́ti ìràwọ̀ ọmọ Bẹlijiọmu Eden Hazard gbá àmi ayò kan ní ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́ẹ̀dọ́gbọ̀n.

translation.unyo: Agbabooluwonu-awon Blues fi gigirise re gba boolu seyin si Mateo Kovacic lojo naa, ki o to ta a lookoto kuro nitosi aarin-gungun papa ti o si ta a boun si iha Liverpool.
translation.dcyo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lùwọnú-àwọ̀n Blues fi gìgìrísẹ̀ rẹ̀ gbá bọ́ọ̀lu sẹ́yìn sí Mateo Kovacic lọ́jọ́ náà, kí ó tó ta á lóókòtó kúrò nítòsí ààrin-gùngùn pápá tí ó sì ta á bọ̀ùn sí ìhà Liverpool.

translation.unyo: Kovacic yara se fun-un-ko-maa-lo ni aarin-gungun.
translation.dcyo: Kovacic yára ṣe fún-un-kó-máa-lọ ní ààrin-gùngùn.

translation.unyo: Leyin naa o gba boolu gbigbona to rewa eyiti to dari Hazard wole sinu apoti penariti naa.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn náà ó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù gbígbóná tó rẹwà eyiti to darí Hazard wọlé sínú àpòtí pẹnáritì náà.

translation.unyo: Hazard sare tayo awon alaaabo ti o si pari re sinu igun ojule loohun o si fi sinu awon pelu ese osi kan to tayo Alisson Becker ti Liverpool.
translation.dcyo: Hazard sáré tayọ àwọn aláààbò tí o sì pari rẹ̀ sínú igun ojúlé lọ́ọ̀hún ó sì fi sínú àwọn pẹ̀lú ẹ̣́sẹ̀ òsì kan tó tayọ Alisson Becker ti Liverpool.

translation.unyo: Liverpool maa dije pelu Napoli ni ipele onisori ti Liigi Awon Asegun ni aago meta osan lojo 'Ru ni Stadio San Paolo ni ilu Naples, lorile-ede Itali.
translation.dcyo: Liverpool maa díje pẹ̀lú Napoli ní ipele oníṣọ̀rí ti Líìgì Àwọn Aṣẹ́gun ní aago mẹ́ta ọ̀sán lọ́jọ́ 'Ru ní Stadio San Paolo ni ìlú Naples, lorilẹ-ede Itali.

translation.unyo: Chelsea maa dojuko Videoton ninu Liigi ti UEFA Europa ni aago meta osan lojo ‘Bo ni ilu Londonu.
translation.dcyo: Chelsea maa dojúkọ Videoton nínú Líìgi ti UEFA Europa ní aago mẹ́ta ọ̀sán lọ́jọ́ ‘Bọ̀ ní ìlú Lọndọnu.

translation.unyo: Iye awon eniyan toku nitori isele ikun omi tsunsmi ni Indonesia ti fo soke si egberinlelogbon ati meji.
translation.dcyo: Iye àwọn eniyan tókú nítorí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ìkún omi tsunsmi ni Indonesia tí fò sókè sí ẹgbẹ̀rinlélọ́gbọn àti méji.

translation.unyo: Iye awon eniyan toku ninu isele ile riri ati ikun omi tsunami ni Indonesia ti fo soke si egberinlelogbon ati meji, ajo to nrisi isele ajalu lorile-ede naa so ni kutukutu ojo Aiku.
translation.dcyo: Iye àwọn eniyan tókú nínú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ilẹ̀ rírì àti ìkún omi tsunami ní Indonesia ti fò sóke sí ẹgbẹ̀rinlélọ́gbọ̀n àti méjì, àjọ tó ńrísí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù lorilẹ-ede náà sọ ní kùtùkùtù ọjọ́ Àìkú.

translation.unyo: Opo eniyan ni iroyin so wipe won ha sinu ogiri awon ile to wo lule ninu isele ile riri oniwon 7.5  eyiti o se ose lojo Eti ti o si sokunfa irusoke omi toga to iwon ese bata ogun, agbenuso ajo Sutopo Purwo Nugroho ni o so fun ipejopo awon oniroyin kan.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀pọ eniyan ní ìròyìn sọ wípé wọ́n há sínú ògiri àwọn ilé tó wó lulẹ̀ nínú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ilẹ̀ rírì oníwọ̀n 7.5  eyiti ó ṣe ọṣẹ́ lọjọ Ẹtì tí ó sì ṣokùnfà ìrusókè omi tóga tó ìwọ̀n ẹsẹ̀ bàtà ogún, agbẹnusọ àjọ Sutopo Purwo Nugroho ni o sọ fún ìpéjọpọ̀ àwọn oníròyìn kan.

translation.unyo: Ilu Palu naa, eyiti o ni ju egberun-lona-irinwodinlogun eniyan lo, ni o bo bamubamu pelu ogiri alapa lati ara awon ile towo lule.
translation.dcyo: Ìlú Palu náà, eyiti ó ní ju ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-irinwódínlógún eniyan lọ, ni ó bò bámúbámú pẹ̀lú ògiri àlàpà láti ara àwọn ilé tówó lulẹ̵̀.

translation.unyo: Awon oloopa mu okunrin, eni odun mejilelogbon, lori ifurasi ipaniyan leyin iku obinrin ti a gun lobe
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá mú ọkùnrin, ẹni ọdùn méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n, lórí ìfurasí ìpànìyàn lẹ́yín ikú obìnrin tí a gún lọ́bẹ

translation.unyo: Iwaadi ipaniyan kan ni won ti bere leyin ti won ri ago-ara obinrin kan ni Birkenhead, Merseyside ni owuro yii.
translation.dcyo: Ìwáàdí ìpànìyàn kan ni wọ́n ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n rí àgọ́-ara obìnrin kaǹ ní Birkenhead, Merseyside ní òwúrọ̀ yìí.

translation.unyo: Eni odun merinlelogoji naa ni won ri ni aago mejo owuro ku iseju maarun pelu awon oju-ogbe lara re ni Grayson Mews ni opopona John, pelu okunrin eni odun mejilelogbon ti won mu lori ifurasi wipe o paniyan.
translation.dcyo: Ẹni ọdún mẹ́rìnlélógójì náà ni wọ́n rí ní aago mẹ́jọ òwúrọ̀ ku ìṣẹ́jú máàrún pẹ̀lú àwọn ojú-ọgbẹ́ lára rẹ̀ ni ́Grayson Mews ní òpòpóna John, pẹ̀lú ọkùnrin ẹni ọdún méjilélọ́gbọ̀n tí wọ́n mú lórí ìfurasì wípé ó pànìyàn.

translation.unyo: Awon oloopa ti ro awon eniyan lagbegbe naa ti won ri tabi gbo ohunkohun lati jade wa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ti rọ àwọn eniyan lágbègbè náà tí wón rí tàbí gbọ́ ohunkóhun latí jáde wa.

translation.unyo: Otelemuye Inspector Brian O'Hagan sope: 'Iwaadi sese bere sugbon Emi yoo rawo ebe si enikeni ti o wa ni ayika Opopona John ni Birkenhead ti o ri tabi gbo ohunkohun ti o mu ifura dani lati kan si wa.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀tẹlẹ̀múyẹ́ Inspector̀ Brian O'Hagan sọpé: 'Ìwáàdí ṣèṣẹ bẹ̀rẹ̀ ṣùgbọ́n Èmi yóò rawọ́ ẹ̀bẹ̀ sí ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó wà ní àyíká Òpópónà John ní Birkenhead tí ó rí tàbí gbọ́ ohunkóhun tí ó mú ìfura dání láti kàn sí wa.

translation.unyo: Mo tun nrawo ebe si enikeni, paapaa jυlo awon awako elero, ti o lee ti gba aworan sile sori kamera opon iwaju oko lati kan si wa nitori won lee ni iroyin eyiti o se pataki fun iwaadi wa.
translation.dcyo: Mo tún ńrawọ́ ẹ̀bẹ̀ sí ẹnikẹ́ni, pàápàá jὺlọ́ àwọn awakọ̀ elérò́, tí ó leè tí gba àwòrán sílẹ̀ sórí kámẹ́rà ọpọ́n iwájú ọkọ̀ láti kàn sí wa nítorí wọn leè ní ìròyìn eyiti ó ṣe pàtàkì fún ìwáàdí wa.

translation.unyo: Agbenuso awon oloopa kan ti fidi re mule wipe obinrin naa eniti won ri ago-ara re je ara Birkenhead atipe won rii ninu ile kan.
translation.dcyo: Agbẹnusọ àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá kan ti fìdí rẹ múlẹ̀ wípé obìnrin náà ẹniti wọ́n rí àgọ́-ara rẹ̀ jẹ ará Birkenhead àtipé wọn ríi nínú ilé kan.

translation.unyo: Ni osan yii awon ore ti o gbagbo wipe won mo obinrin naa ti de ibi isele naa lati beere  ibiti won ti ri i ni owuro yii.
translation.dcyo: Ní ọ̀sán yìí àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ tí ó gbàgbọ́ wípé ̀wọn mọ obìnrin náà ti dé ibi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà láti bèèrè  ibití wọ́n ti rí i ni òwúrọ̀ yìí.

translation.unyo: Awon iwaadi si nlo lowoi awon oloopa naa ti so wipe awon fegbe igbese lati jeki eniti o sunmo arabinrin ohun mo nipa isele naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìwáàdí sì ńlọ lọ́wọ́í àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá naa ti sọ wípé àwọn fẹgbé́ ìgbésẹ̀ láti jẹ́kí ẹnití ó súnmọ́ arábìnrin ọhúṇ mọ̀ nípa ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ naa.

translation.unyo: Awako akero kan to ngbe ni Grayson Mews gbiyanju lati wo inu ibugbe re sugbon awon oloopa nso fun un wipe won kogba enikeni laaye lati wole tabi jade kuro ninu ile naa.
translation.dcyo: Awàkọ akérò kan tó ńgbé ní Grayson Mewṣ gbìyànjù láti wọ inú ibùgbé rẹ ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ńsọ fún un wípé wọn kògba ́ẹnikẹ́nì láàyè láti wọlé tàbí jáde kúrò nínú ilé náà.

translation.unyo: Ko lee soro kankan nigbati o sawari ohun ti o sele.
translation.dcyo: Kó lèe sọ̀rọ̀ kankan nigbati ó ṣàwárí ohun tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Bayii won nso fun awon olugbe agbegbe naa wipe yoo to wakati die ki won to lee faaye gba won lati wole pada.
translation.dcyo: Báyìí wọ́n ńsọ fún àwọn olùgbé agbègbè naa wìpè yóò tó wákàtí diẹ kí wọn tó leè fààyè gbà wọ́n láti wọlé padà.

translation.unyo: Osise oloopa kan ni won gbo ti o nso fun okunrin kan wipe gbogbo agbegbe naa ni won nfowo mu bii ibi isele oran.
translation.dcyo: Òṣìṣẹ́ ọlọ́ọ̀pá kan ni wọn gbọ́ tí ó ńsọ fún ọkùnrin kan wípé gbogbo agbègbè náà ni wọn ńfọwọ́ mú bíi ibi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ọ̀ràn.

translation.unyo: Obinrin kan farahan nibi ibi isele naa pelu omije loju.
translation.dcyo: Obìnrin kan farahàn níbí ibi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà pẹ̀lú omijé lójú.

translation.unyo: O saa ntenumo 'o buru jai'.
translation.dcyo: Ó sáà ńtẹnumọ́ 'ó burú jáì'.

translation.unyo: Ni aago meji osan oko oloopa meji ti wa ninu ibiti isele naa pelu oko miran ni ita.
translation.dcyo: Ní aago méjì ọ̀sán ọkọ̀ ọlọ́ọ̀pá méji ti wà nínú ibití ìṣẹlẹ náà pẹ̀lú ọkọ̀ miran ní ìta.

translation.unyo: opo awon osise oloopa  kan ni won duro sinu ibiti isele naa fun imojuto ojule ni ibugbe naa.
translation.dcyo: ọ̀ṕọ̀́ àwọn òṣìṣe ọlọ́ọ̀pá ̣́ kan ni wọ́n dúró sínú ibití ìṣẹlẹ naa fun ìmójútó ojúle ní ìbùgbé náà.

translation.unyo: Enikeni ti o bani iroyin ni a ro lati DM @MerPoICC, pe 101 tabi kan si Crimestoppers laidaruko lori 08000 555 111 ki o si lo oro ayolo log 247 ti Ogbonjoo Osu Owara.
translation.dcyo: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bání ìròyìn ni a rọ̀ láti DM @MerPoICC, pe 101 tàbí kàn sí Crimestoppers láìdárúkọ lórí 08000 555 111 kí ó sì ́lo ọ̀rọ̀ àyọlò log 247 ti Ọgbọ́njọ́ọ́ Oṣù Ọwara.

translation.unyo: Eere ti ile Asoju-sofin ti Cromwell ti ndi nnkan iranti tayenwi to tuntun julo nipa awuye-wuye 'titun itan ko'
translation.dcyo: Èère ti ile Aṣojú-ṣòfin ti Cromwell ti ńdi nǹkan ìrántí táyénwí tó tuntun jùlọ nípa awuye-wuye 'títún ìtàn kọ'

translation.unyo: Ilekuroni-ilu re yoo je idajo elewi fun iparun bii ti awon elesin Taliban ti o gbe se lori opo awon nnkan isembaye asa ati esin ile Geesi nipase awon olutele Elesin alakataki tire.
translation.dcyo: Ìlékúróní-ìlú rẹ̀ yóò jẹ́ ìdájọ̀ eléwì fún ìparun bíi ti àwọn ẹlẹ́sìn Taliban tí ó gbé ṣe lóri ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn nǹkan ìṣẹ̀ḿbáyé àṣà àti ẹ̀sìn ilẹ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì nípaṣẹ̀ àwọn olùtẹ̀lé Ẹlẹ́sìn alákatakí tirẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Sugbon Egbe Cromwell sapejuwe aba Ogbeni Crick bii ''iwa omugo'' ati ''igbiyanju lati tun itan ko.''
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n Ẹgbẹ́ Cromwell ṣàpèjúwe àbà Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Crick bíi ''ìwà òmùgọ̀'' àti ''ìgbìyànjú láti tún ìtàn kọ.''

translation.unyo: John Goldsmith, alaga ti Egbe Cromwell, sope: “O je ohun ti ko see dena ninu ariyanjiyan to nlo lowo nipa iyokuro awon eere wipe aworan eere ti Oliver Cromwell towa nita Aafin ti Westminster ni yoo di afojusun kan.
translation.dcyo: John Goldsmith, alága ti Ẹgbẹ́ Cromwell, sọpé: “Ó jẹ́ ohun tí kò ṣée dènà nínú àríyànjiyàn tó ńlọ lọ́wọ́ nípa ìyọkúrò àwọn èère wípé àwòrán èèrè ti Oliver Cromwell tówà níta Ààfin ti Westminster ni yóò di àfojúsùn kan.

translation.unyo: Iwoye awon ti npa aworan eere run ti awon ogun abele ile Geesi ni a ko pase re tabi gbe won se lati owo Cromwell.
translation.dcyo: Ìwòye àwọn tí ńpa àwòrán èère run ti àwọn ogun abẹ́lé ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì ni a kò pàṣẹ rẹ̀ tàbí gbé wọn ṣe láti ọwọ́ Cromwell.

translation.unyo: Boya Cromwell to se asise naa ni won yoo fi rubo fun awon ise Thomas baba-nla re ni awon ogoorun odun to saaju.
translation.dcyo: Bóyá Cromwell tó ṣe àṣìṣe náà ni wọn yóò fi rúbọ fún àwọn ìṣe Thomas baba-ńlá rẹ̀ ní àwọn ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún tó saájú.

translation.unyo: Isatunfihan nla ti Ololajυlo William Hamo Thorneycroft nipa Cromwell ni eri ti ero ogoorun odun ikokandinlogun ati ara akosile itan enikan ti opo eniyan si gbagbo wipe o si ye leniti a nsajoyo.
translation.dcyo: Ìṣátúnfihàn ńlá ti Ọlọ́lajὺlọ́ William Hamo Thorneycroft nípa Cromwell ni ẹ̀rí ti èrò ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún ìkọkàndínlógún àti ara àkọsílẹ̀ ìtàn ẹnikan tí ọ̀pọ̀ eniyan sí gbàgbọ́ wípé ó sì yẹ lẹ́nití a ńṣàjọyọ̀.

translation.unyo: Ogbeni Goldsmith so fun Sunday Telegraph: “Cromwell ni opo eniyan kasi, boya ju bee lo lopin ogoorun odun kokandinlogun ju oni lo, gegebi oludaaabo igbimo asoju-sofin kuro lowo inira to nwa lati ita, niti ejo tire ani awon ori-ade.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Goldsmith sọ fún Sunday Telegraph: “Cromwell ni ọ̀pọ̀ eniyan kàsí, bóyá jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ lópin ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún kọkàndínlógún ju òní lọ, gẹ́gẹ́bí olùdáààbó ìgbìmọ̀ aṣojú-ṣofiń kúrò lọ́wọ́ ìnira tó ńwá láti ìta, níti ẹjọ́ tirẹ̀ àní àwọn orí-adé.

translation.unyo: Boya iyen je isatunfihan kan to peye ti o si bojumu je ori oro ariyanjiyan itan to ntesiwaju.
translation.dcyo: Bóyá ìyẹn jẹ ìsàtúnfihàn kan tó péye tí ó sì bójúmu jẹ́ orí ọ̀rọ̀ àríyànjiyàn ìtàn tó ńtẹ̀síwájú.

translation.unyo: Ohun to daju nipe aawo ti aarin awon ogoorun odun ketadinlogun se apejuwe bi a se ko idagbasoke orileede wa, Cromwell sii je enikan Pataki ti o duro fun ipin apa kan.
translation.dcyo: Ohun tó dáju nipé aáwọ̀ ti ààrin àwọn ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún kẹtàdínlógún se àpèjuwè bi a se kọ ìdàgbàsókè oríléède wa, Cromwell sìí jẹ ẹnìkan Pàtàkì tí o dúró fún ìpín apá kan.

translation.unyo: Awon aseyori re bi Oluwa Oludaaabo ni won tun ye lati maa sajoyo ati lati maa ranti.''
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àṣeyọrí rẹ̀ bí Oluwa Olùdáààbò ni wọ́n tún yẹ láti máa sàjọyọ̀ àti láti maá rántí.''

translation.unyo: Elede Apaniyan Seku pa Agbe Saina kan.
translation.dcyo: Ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ Apànìyàn Ṣekú pa Àgbẹ̀ Ṣáína kan.

translation.unyo: Agbe kan ni elede kan kolu ti o si pa a ninu oja kan ni apa iwo-oorun guusu orile-ede Saina, gegebi awon iroyin agbegbe naa ti so.
translation.dcyo: Àgbẹ̀ kan ni ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan kọlù tí ó sì pa á nínú ọjà kan ní apá ìwọ̀-oòrùn gúúsù orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà, gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn ìròyìn agbègbè náà ti sọ.

translation.unyo: Okunrin naa, ti won da mo pelu oruko molebi re ''Yuan,'' ni won ri toti ku pelu oju-opo eje nla kan eyiti o ti ge, ti eje si bo o nitosi ile elede kan ni oja ni ilu Liupanshui ni ekun Guizhou, iwe iroyin Morning Post ti Guusu Saina ni o so iroyin naa lojo Aiku.
translation.dcyo: Ọkùnrin náà, tí wọ́n dá mọ̀ pẹ̀lú orúkọ mọ̀lẹ́bí rẹ̀ ''Yuan,'' ni wọ́n rí tóti kù pẹ̀lú ojú-òpó ẹ̀jẹ̀ ńlá kan eyiti ó ti gé, tí ẹ̀jẹ̀ sì bò ó nítòsì ilé ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan ní ọjà ní ìlú Liupanshui ní ẹkùn Guizhou, ìwé ìròyín Morning Post ti Gúúsù Ṣáínà ni o sọ íròyìn naa lọ́jọ́ Àìkú.

translation.unyo: Agbe elede kan ngbaradi lati fun awon elede labere ajesara ni ile elede kan logbonjo, Osu Ebibi, lodun 2005 nilu Xining ti Ekun Qinghai, lorile-ede Saina.
translation.dcyo: Àgbẹ̀ ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan ńgbaradì láti fún àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ lábẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára ní ilé ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan lọ́gbọ̀njọ́, Oṣù Ẹ̀bibi, lọ́dun 2005 nílù Xining ti Ẹkùn Qinghai, lorilẹ-ede Ṣáínà.

translation.unyo: Gegebi iroyin ti wi o ti rin irin-ajo pelu ibatan re lati alaamulegbe ekun Yunnan lojo 'Ru lati ta awon elede meedogun ni oja naa.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bí ìròyìn ti wí ó ti rin ìrìn-àjò pẹ̀lú ìbátan rẹ láti aláàmúlégbé ẹkùn Yunnan lọ́jọ́ 'Ru láti ta àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ mẹ́ẹ̀dógún ní ọjá náà.

translation.unyo: Ni owuro ojo keji, ibatan re rii toti ku, ti o si sawari wipe ilekun kan si ile elede alaamulegbe kan wa ni sisi sile.
translation.dcyo: Ní òwurọ̀ ọjọ́ kejì, ìbátan rẹ̀ ríi tóti kú, tí ó sì ṣàwári wípé ìlẹ̀kùn kan sí ilé ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ aláàmúlégbe kan wà ní sísí sílẹ̀.

translation.unyo: O sope ni inu ile elede naa ni ako elede kan gbe wa pelu eje lenu re.
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé ní inú ilé ẹlẹ́dẹ náà ni akọ ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan gbé wá pẹ̀lú ẹ̀jẹ̀ lẹ́nu rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ayewo lati sawari awon eri fi idi re mule pe ako elede to niwon iwuwo egbetadinlaaadota poun naa ti se ipalara fun agbe naa titi doju iku, gegebi iroyin naa ti so.
translation.dcyo: Àyẹ̀wò láti ṣàwárí àwọn ẹ̀rí fi ìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé akọ ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ tó níwọn ìwúwo ẹgbẹ̀tadínláàádọ́ta pọ́un náà ti ṣe ìpalára fún àgbẹ̀ náà títí dójú ikù, gẹ́gẹ́bí ìròyìn náà ti sọ.

translation.unyo: iwe iroyin Guiyang Evening News yo oro ibatan arakυnrin naa lo o wipe ''Awon ese ibatan mi lo je kikida eje tiwon si ti faya,''  eni tiwon tokasi nipa oruko idile re ''Wu,''
translation.dcyo: ìwé ìròyìn Guiyang Evening News yọ ọ̀ro ìbátaṇ̀ arákὺnrin náà lò o wipe ''Àwọn ẹsẹ̀ ìbátan mi ló jẹ́ kìkìdá ẹ̀jẹ̀ tíwọn sì ti fàya,''  ẹni tíwọ́n tọ́kasí nípa orúkọ ìdílé rẹ̀ ''Wu,''

translation.unyo: Ayaworan alaabo fi Yuan han bi o ti nwonu oja lo ni aago maarun-ku-ogun iseju lojo 'Bo lati fun awon elede re lounje.
translation.dcyo: Ayawòrán aláàbò fi Yuan hàn bí ó ti ńwọnú ọjà lọ ní aago máàrún-ku-ogún ìsẹ́jú lọjọ 'Bọ̀ láti fún àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ rẹ̀ lóúnjẹ.

translation.unyo: oku re ni won ri ni wakati kan leyin naa.
translation.dcyo: òkú rẹ̀ ni wọ́n rí ní wákàtí kan lẹ́yìn náà.

translation.unyo: Eranko ti o pa okunrin naa kii se ti Yuan tabi ibatan re.
translation.dcyo: Ẹranko tí ó pa ọkùnrin náà kìí ṣe ti Yuan tàbí ìbátan rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Olusakoso oja kan so fun Evening News wipe elede naa ni won ti ti mole lati dena kikolu elomiran, nigbati awon oloopa nko eri jo nibi isele naa.
translation.dcyo: Olùṣàkóso ọjà kan sọ fún Evening News wipe ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ náà ni wọn ti tì mọ́lé láti dènà kíkọlu ẹlomiran, nigbati àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ńkó ẹ̀rí jọ níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Idile Yuan ati awon alase oja ni iroyin sope won ti njiroro lori ati san owo gba-maa-binu fun iku re.
translation.dcyo: Ìdíle Yuan àti àwọn aláṣẹ ọjà ni ìròyìn sọpé wọn ti ńjíròrò lórí àti san owó gbà-maá-bínu fún ikú rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Botilejepe ko wopo, awon isele ki awon elede maa kolu awon eniyan ni won ti se akosile won saaju ri.
translation.dcyo: Botilẹjepe kò wọ́pọ̀, àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kí àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ máa kọlu àwọn eniyan ni wọ́n ti ṣe àkọsílẹ wọn saáju rí.

translation.unyo: Lodun 2016, elede kan kolu obinrin kan ati oko re ni oko won ni ilu Massachusetts, ti o si fi okunrin naa sile pelu awon ipalara baaku-baaye.
translation.dcyo: Lọ́dún 2016, ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan kọlu obìnrin kan àti ọkọ rẹ̀ ní oko wọn ní ìlú Massachusetts, tí ò sì fi ọkùnrin náà sílẹ pẹ̀lú àwọn ìpalára báákú-bááyè.

translation.unyo: Ni odun mewaa saaju, elede oniwon iwuwo egbetalelaaadota poun kan mu okunrin agbe Welsh kan mo ara katakata re titi ti aya re fi deruba eranko naa lati salo.
translation.dcyo: Ní ọdún mẹ́wàá saáju, ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ oníwọ̀n ìwúwo ẹgbẹ̀taléláààdọ́ta pọ́un kan mú ọkùnrin àgbẹ̀ Welsh kan mọ́ ara katakata rẹ títí ti aya rẹ̀ fi dẹ́rùba ẹranko náà láti sálọ.

translation.unyo: Leyin ti agbe Oregon kan di jije tan lati owo awon elede re lodun 2012, agbe Manitoba kan so fun CBC News wipe niti botiye awon elede kii ya ehanna sugbon itowo eje lee se bii ''oko ibon.''
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn tí àgbẹ̀ Oregon kan di jíjẹ tán láti ọwọ́ àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ rẹ̀ lọ́dún 2012, àgbẹ̀ Manitoba kan sọ fún CBC News wípé níti bótiyẹ àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kìí ya ẹhànnà ṣùgbọ́n ìtọ́wò ẹ̀jẹ̀ leè ṣe bíi ''okó ìbọn.''

translation.unyo: Won kan maa nje elere ni.
translation.dcyo: Wọ́n kàn máa ńjẹ eléré ni.

translation.unyo: Won je omode eleeekanna, to nfe mo ohun to nsele...won ko wa lati pa o lara.
translation.dcyo: Wọn jẹ ọmọdé eléèékánná, tó ńfẹ́ mọ ohun tó ńṣẹlẹ̀...wọ́n ko wa láti pa ọ́ lára.

translation.unyo: O kan nilati fun won ni iye owo ti o ye, ni o wi.
translation.dcyo: O kàn níláti fún wọn ní iye ọ̀wọ̀ tí ó yẹ, ni ó wí.

translation.unyo: Awon iyoku Iji-lile Hurricane Rosa yoo mu ojo wo kaakakiri iwo-oorun orile-ede US
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìyókù Ìjì-lílè Hurricane Rosa yóò mú òjò wọ káàkàkiri ìwọ̀-oòrùn orilẹ-ede US

translation.unyo: Gegebi asotele oju-ojo ti so, agbara Hurricane Rosa ti ndinku bi o ti goke lo sori awon omi ti o tutu die sii ni ariwa bebe okun ti orile-ede Mesiko.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ ojú-ọjọ́ ti sọ, agbára Hurricane Rosa ti ńdínkù bí ó ti gòkè lọ sórí àwọn omi tí ó tútú díẹ̀ síi ní àríwá bèbè òkun ti orilẹ-ede Mẹ́síkò.

translation.unyo: Botiwukori, Rosa yoo awon ojo oniikun omi lowo bi o ti nla ariwa Mesiko ati iwo-oorun orile-ede U.S. koja ni awon ojo to mbo.
translation.dcyo: Bótiwùkórí, Rosa yóò àwọn òjò oníìkún omi lọ́wọ́ bí ó ti ńla àríwá Mẹ́ṣíkò àti ìwọ̀-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. kọ́ja ní àwọn ọjọ́ tó ḿbọ.

translation.unyo: Rosa ni awon afefe ti iwon isowosare re je maarundinlaaadoorun ibuso ni wakati kan, Iji-lile Hurricane Onisori 1 kan, titi aago maarun owuro. Akoko ila-oorun lojo Aiku, ti won ti ri i ni maili irinwodinmeedogun ni iwo-oorun guusu ti ilu Punta Eugenia, lorile-ede Mesiko.
translation.dcyo: Rosa ní àwọn afẹ́fẹ́ tí ìwọn ìṣọwọ́sáré rẹ̀ jẹ́ máàrúndínláàádọ́ọ̀rún ìbùṣọ̀ ní wákàtí kan, Ìji-líle Hurricane Oníṣọ̀rí 1 kan, títí aago máàrún òwúrọ̀. Àkókò ìlà-oòrùn lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, tí wọn tí rí i ní máìlí irinwódínmẹ́ẹ̀dógún ní ìwọ̀-oòrùn gúúsù ti ìlú Punta Eugenia, lorilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò.

translation.unyo: Rosa ni won nreti lati losi iha ariwa lojo Aiku.
translation.dcyo: Rosa ni wọ́n ńretí láti lọsí ìhà àríwá lọjọ́ Àìkú.

translation.unyo: Ewe, alafo jinjin kan ti bere si farahan lori omi Okun Pacific ti o si nlo si apa ila-oorun lati dojuko Etikun Iwo-oorun orile-ede U.S. Bi Rosa ti nsunmo erekusu Baja Carlifonia lojo aje bii iji ile olooru yoo bere si taari omi jinjin ti ile olooru si iha ariwa losi iwo-oorun guusu orile-ede U.S.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, àlàfo jìnjìn kan ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí farahàn lórí omi Òkun Pacific tí ó sì ńlọ sí apá ìlà-oòrùn láti dójúkọ Etíkun Ìwọ̀-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. Bí Rosa ti ńsúnmọ́ erékùsù Baja Carlifonia lọ́jọ́ ajé bíi ìjì ilẹ̀ olóoru yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí taari omi jínjìn ti ilẹ̀ olóoru sí ìhà àríwá lọsí ìwọ̀-oòrùn gúúsù orilẹ̀-ede U.S.

translation.unyo: Rosa yoo mu iwon ojo ti o to insi mewaa wo awon apa Mesiko lojo Aje.
translation.dcyo: Rosa yóò mú ìwọn òjò tí ó tó íǹsì mẹ́wàá wọ àwọn apá Mẹ́ṣíkò lọ́jọ́ Ajé.

translation.unyo: Leyin naa, omi ile olooru to nfara kan alafo jinjin to mbo yoo seda ekunrere jakejado apa Iwo-oorun Guusu ni awon ojo to mbo.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn náà, omi ilẹ̀ olóoru tó ńfara kan àlàfo jínjìn tó ḿbọ̀ yóò ṣẹ̀dá ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ jákejádò apá Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Gúúsù ní àwọn ọjọ́ tó ḿbọ̀.

translation.unyo: Ni ti agbegbe, iwon ojo insi 1 si 4 yoo fa ikun omi alayalu to lewu, awon isan panti atipe o see se ki awon ile ya sinu omi ninu asale.
translation.dcyo: Ní ti agbègbè, ìwọ̀n òjò íǹsì 1 sí 4 yóò fa ìkún omi aláyalù tó léwu, àwọn ìsàn pàǹti àtipé ó ṣeé ṣe kí àwọn ilẹ̀ ya sínú omi nínú aṣálẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Omi olooru tojinle yoo fa iwon ojo riro ti o sunmo insi 2 si 3 ni wakati kan ni awon ibi kan, papaa julo ni awon apa ti guusu Nevada ati Arizona.
translation.dcyo: Omi olóoru tójínlẹ̀ yóò fa ìwọ̀n òjò rírọ̀ tí ó súnmọ́ íǹsì 2 sí 3 ni wákàtí kan ní àwọn ibi kan, papàá jùlọ ní àwọn apá ti gúúsù Nevada àti Arizona.

translation.unyo: Bi iwon ojo insi 2 si 4 ni won nreti ni awon apa Iwo-oorun  Guusu naa, papaa julo ni opo agbegbe ti Arizona.
translation.dcyo: Bi ìwọ̀n òjò íǹsì 2 si 4 ni wọ́n ńretí ní àwọn apá Ìwọ-oòrùn  Gúúsù náà, papàá jùlọ ní ọ̀pọ̀ agbègbè ti Arizona.

translation.unyo: O see se ki ikun omi alayalu waye pelu awon ipo to nburu sii nitori abuda onisege-sege ti ojo olooru naa.
translation.dcyo: Ó ṣeé ṣe kí ìkún omi aláyalù wáyé pẹ̀lú àwọn ipò tó ńburú síi nitori àbùdá onísége-sège ti òjò olóoru náà.

translation.unyo: Yoo je amoran ti ko dara lati jade sita si inu asale naa pelu ese nibiti ojo olooru ti ndunkooko lati ro.
translation.dcyo: Yóò jẹ́ àmọ̀ràn tí kò dára láti jáde síta sí inú aṣálẹ̀ náà pẹ̀lú ẹsẹ̀ níbití òjò olóoru tí ńdúnkóókò láti rọ̀.

translation.unyo: Opo ojo lee fa ki awon afonifoji di awon odo to nbinu fufu ti awon iji abojorin yoo si mu awon afefe agbegbe ati eruku to nfe lowo.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀pọ̀ òjò leè fa kí àwọn àfonífojì di àwọn odò tó ńbínú fùfù tí àwọn ìjì abójòrìn yóò sì mú àwọn afẹ́fẹ́ agbègbè àti eruku tó ńfẹ́ lọ́wọ́.

translation.unyo: Alafo jinjin to mbo naa yoo mu opo ojo agbegbe wo awon apa ti bebe okun iha Guusu California.
translation.dcyo: Àlàfo jínjìn tó ḿbọ̀ náà yóò mú ọ̀pọ̀ òjò agbègbè wọ àwọn apá ti bèbè okùn ìhà Gúúsù California.

translation.unyo: Awon aropo ojo riro ti o ju ilaji insi kan lo see se, eyiti o lee fa awon isan panti ranpe ati awon oju ona moto to nyo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àrọ̀pọ̀ òjò rírọ̀ tí ó ju ìlàjì íǹsì kan lọ ṣeé ṣe, eyiti ó leè fa àwọn ìsàn pàǹtí ráńpẹ́ àti àwọn ojú ọ̀nà mọ́tò tó ńyọ́.

translation.unyo: Eyi ni yoo je iro ojo akoko ti agbegbe naa ti igba ojo won.
translation.dcyo: Èyí ni yóò jẹ́ ìrọ̀ òjò àkọ́kọ́ ti agbègbè náà ti ìgbà òjò wọn.

translation.unyo: Awon iro ojo olooru onisege-sege kan yoo bere si sunmo Arizona lowo ale ojo Aiku ati kutukutu ojo Aje, ki ojo naa to di eyiti o nro kaakiri lale ojo Aje ati ojo Isegun.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìrọ̀ òjò olóoru onísége-sège kan yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí súnmọ́ Arizona lọ́wọ́ alẹ́ ọjọ́ Àìkú àti kùtùkùtù ọjọ Ajé, kí òjò náà tó di eyiti ó ńrọ̀ káàkiri lálẹ́ ọjọ́ Ajé àti ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun.

translation.unyo: Opo ojo yoo tan kaakiri de Awon Origun Merin lojo Isegun ati nigbeyin ni gbogbo ojo 'Ru.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀pọ̀ òjò yóò tàn káàkiri dé Àwọn Orígun Mẹ́rin lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun àti nígbẹ̀yìn ni gbogbo ọjọ 'Ru.

translation.unyo: Osu Owara lee ri awon ilosoke-sodo kan ninu iwon ooru tabi otutu jake-jado orile-ede U.S. bi iha Arctic ti ntutu sii, sugbon agbegbe olooru si m'ooru sibe.
translation.dcyo: Oṣù Ọ̀wàrà leè rí àwọn ìlọsókè-sódò kan nínú ìwọn ooru tàbi otútú jákè-jádò orilẹ-ede U.S. bí ìhà Arctic tí ńtutù síi, ṣùgbọ́n agbègbè olóoru sì m'óoru síbẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Nigba miran eyi nyorisi awon iyipada to yanilenu ninu iwon otutu tabi ooru ni awon ona irin to kuru.
translation.dcyo: Nigba miran èyí ńyọrísí àwọn ìyípadà tó yanilẹ́nu nínú ìwọ̀n otútù tàbí ooru ní àwọn ọ̀nà ìrìn tó kúrú.

translation.unyo: Apeere nla toyanilenu kan wa nipa ti awon iyato iwon otutu tabi ooru ni gbogbo aarin gungun orile-ede U.S. lojo Aiku.
translation.dcyo: Àpẹẹrẹ ńlá tóyanilẹ́nu kan wà nípa ti àwọn ìyàtọ̀ ìwọ̀n otútù tàbí ooru ní gbogbo ààrin gùngùn orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́jọ́ Àìkú.

translation.unyo: Iyato to fere to iwon ogun digiri ti otutu tabi ooru lowa laarin Ilu Kansas, Missouri, ati Omaha, Nebraska, ati laarin St. Louis ati Des Moines, ni Iowa.
translation.dcyo: Ìyàtọ̀ tó fẹ́rẹ̀ tó ìwọ̀n ogún dìgírì ti otútù tàbí ooru lówà láàrin Ìlú Kansas, Missouri, àti Omaha, Nebraska, àti láarin St. Louis àti Des Moines, ní Iowa.

translation.unyo: Ninu awon ojo die to mbo lona, imooru igba ooru ti yoo pe yoo gbiyanju lati kole ti yoo si gbooro leekan sii.
translation.dcyo: Nínú àwọn ọjọ́ díẹ̀ tó ḿbọ̀ lọ́nà, ìmóoru ìgbà ooru tí yóò pẹ́ yóò gbiyanju láti kọ́lé tí yóò sì gbòòrò lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi.

translation.unyo: Opo ninu agbegbe aarin gungun ati ila-oorun orile-ede U.S. ni won nreti lati ri ibere ooru titi de osu Owara pelu awon iwon ogorin kaakiri lati Awon Odan Guusu naa si awon apa ti Ila-oorun Ariwa.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀pọ̀ nínú agbègbè ààrin gungun àti ìlà-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. ní wọ́n ńretí láti rí ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ooru títí dé oṣù Ọ̀wàrà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìwọ̀n ọgọ́rin káàkiri láti Àwọn Ọ̀dàn Gúúsù náà sí àwọn apá ti Ìlà-oòrùn Àríwá.

translation.unyo: Ilu New York lee de awon iwon ogorin digiri lojo Isegun, eyiti yoo fi bii iwon digiri mewaa ju agbedemeji lo.
translation.dcyo: Ìlú New York leè dé àwọ̀n ìwọ̀n ọgọ́rin dìgírì lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun, èyítí yóò fi bíi ìwọ̀n dìgírì mẹ́wàá ju agbedeméjì lọ.

translation.unyo: Asotele oju-ojo olojopipe wa ntokasi awon isowoseese toga fun awon iwon otutu tabi ooru eyiti o ju agbedemeji lo fun ila-oorun orile-ede U.S. ninu gbogbo ilaji akoko ti osu Owara.
translation.dcyo: Àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ ojú-ọjọ́ ọlọ́jọ́pípẹ́ wa ńtọ́kasí àwọ̀n ìṣọwọ́ṣeéṣe tóga fún àwọ̀n ìwọ̀n otútù tàbí ooru eyiti ó ju agbedeméjì lọ fún ìlà-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. nínú gbogbo ìlàjí àkọ́kọ́ ti oṣù Ọ̀wàrà.

translation.unyo: Awon eniyan toju milionu ogun lo lo wo igbejo Kavanaugh
translation.dcyo: Àwọn eniyan tóju mílíọ̀nù ogún lọ ló wo ìgbẹ́jọ́ Kavanaugh

translation.unyo: Awon eniyan toju milionu ogun lo wo ijeeri amoriya ti eniti a fakale fun Ile Ejo togajulo Brett Kavanaugh ati ti obinrin ti o fesun kan an pe o ba oun lopo lona aito eyiti o sope o sele ninu awon odun towa laarin1980 si 1989, Christine Blasey Ford, lori awon itakun ero amohunmaworan mefa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn eniyan tóju mílíọ̀nù ogún ló wo ìjẹ́ẹ̀rí amóríyá ti ẹnití a fàkalẹ̀ fún Ilé Ẹjọ́ tógajùlọ Brett Kavanaugh àti ti obìnrin tí o fẹ̀suǹ kàn án pé ó bá òun lòpọ̀ lọ́nà àìtọ́ eyiti ó sọpé ó ṣẹlẹ̀ nínú àwọn ọdún tówà láàrin1980 si 1989, Christine Blasey Ford, lórí àwọn ìtàkùn ẹrọ amóhùnmáwòrán mẹ́fà.

translation.unyo: Lona miran ewe, ipo oselu emikogba-iwokogba naa tesiwaju, pelu awon agbohunsafefe to nda awon eto tiwon nse idakureku fun awon eto toye fun iyipada iseju togbeyin ojo Eti: adehun kan ti Asoju-sofin Agba Jeff Flake ti Arizona seto re fun ajo FBI lati se iwaadi olose kan lori awon esun naa.
translation.dcyo: Lọ́nà miran ẹ̀wẹ̀, ipò òṣèlú èmikògbà-ìwọkògbà náà tẹ̀síwájú, pẹ̀lú àwọn agbóhùnsáfẹ́fẹ́ tó ńdá àwọn èto tíwọn ńṣe ìdákúrekú fún àwọn ètò tóyẹ fún ìyípadà ìṣẹ́jú tógbẹ̀yìn ọjọ́ Ẹtì: àdéhùn kan tí Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà Jeff Flake ti Arizona ṣètò rẹ̀ fún àjọ FBI láti ṣe ìwáàdí ọlọ́sẹ̀ kan lórí àwọn ẹ̀sùn náà.

translation.unyo: Ford so fun Igbimo Eto Idajo ti Awon Asoju-sofin Agba wipe o da oun loju ni gbogbo ona pe Kavanaugh fi owo pa oun lara fun itelorun ara re leyin ti o mutiyo atipe o gbiyanju lati bo aso kuro lara oun ni ode ariya ile-eko giga kan.
