translation.dcyo: Ford sọ fún Ìgbîmọ̀ Ètò Ìdájọ́ ti Àwọn Àṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà wípé ó dá òun lójù ní gbogbo ọ̀nà pé Kavanaugh fí ọwọ́ pa òun lára fún ìtẹ́lọ́rún ara rẹ lẹ́yìn tí ó mutíyò àtipé ó gbìyànjú láti bọ asọ kúrò lára òun ní òde àríya ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga kan.

translation.unyo: Kavanaugh, ninu eri ti ko ka oun funrare lara, sope o da oun loju ni gbogbo ona pe ko sele rara.
translation.dcyo: Kavanaugh, nínú ẹ̀rí tí kò ká òun fúnrarẹ̀ lára, sọpé ó dá oùn lójú ní gbogbo ọ̀na pé kó ṣẹlẹ̀ rárá.

translation.unyo: O see se ki o jepe awon eniyan to ju milionu ogun ati egberun lona irinwo ti Nielsen royin re lo wo o.
translation.dcyo: Ó ṣeé ṣé kí ó jẹ́pé àwọn eniyan tó ju mílíọ̀nù ogun àti ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà irinwo ti Nielsen ròyìn rẹ̀ ló wò o.

translation.unyo: Ile-ise naa nse onka iye agbedemeji awon oluworan lori CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News, Channel ati MSNBC.
translation.dcyo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ńṣe òǹka iye agbedeméjí àwọn olùwòran lórí CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News, Channel àti MSNBC.

translation.unyo: Awon iye oluworan kowa nile loju ese fun awon itakun miran to fi i han, pelu PBS, C-SPAN ati Itakun Oko-owo Fox.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn iye olùwòran kòwá nílẹ̀ lójú ẹsẹ fún àwọn ìtàkùn miran tó fi i hàn, pẹ̀lú PBS, C-SPAN àti Ìtàkùn Oko-òwò Fox.

translation.unyo: Atipe Nielsen saaba maa nni isoro isodiwon iye awon eniyan ti o nworan ni awon ofiisi.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé Nielsen sáábà máa ńní ìṣòro ìṣòdiwọ̀n iye àwọn eniyan ti o ńwòran ní àwọn ọ́fíìsì.

translation.unyo: Lati fi iyen soju iwoye, iyen je iwon oluworan to dabi ti idije ere boolu alaafesegba kan tabi ti Igbami-idalola Academy.
translation.dcyo: Láti fi ìyẹn sójú ìwòye, ìyẹn jẹ́ ìwọn olùwòran tó dàbí ti ìdíje eré bọ́ọ̀lù aláàfẹ̵sẹ̀gbá kan tàbí ti Ìgbàmì-ìdálólá Academy.

translation.unyo: Ikanni Fox News, ti ero awon olugbalejo re ti satileyin gidigidi fun fifun Kavanaugh nise, lo siwaju gbogbo awon ikanni pelu agbedemeji awon oluworan tiise milionu mefa din legberun mewaa ninu igbejo to gba gbogbo ojo kan naa, ni Nielsen so.
translation.dcyo: Ìkànnì Fox News, tí èrò àwọn olùgbàlejò rẹ̀ ti ṣàtìlẹ́yìn gidigidi fún fífún Kavanaugh níṣẹ́, ló síwáju gbogbo àwọn ìkànnì pẹ̀lú agbedeméjí àwọn olùwòran tííṣe mílíọ̀nù mẹ́fà dín lẹ́gbẹ̀rún mẹ́wàá nínú ìgbẹ́jọ́ tó gba gbogbo ọjọ kan náà, ni Nielsen sọ.

translation.unyo: ABC lo se ipo keji pelu awon oluworan milionu meta ati egberun lona oodundinlogoji.
translation.dcyo: ABC ló ṣe ipò kejì pẹ̀lú àwọn olùwòran mílíọ̀nù mẹ́ta àti ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ọ̀ọ́dúndínlógójì.

translation.unyo: CBS ni milionu 3.1, NBC ni milionu 2.94, MSNBC ni milionu 2.89 ti CNN si ni milionu 2.52, ni Nielsen so.
translation.dcyo: CBS ní mílíọ̀nù 3.1, NBC ní mílíọ̀nù 2.94, MSNBC ní mílíọ̀nù 2.89 tí CNN sì ní mílíọ̀nù 2.52, ni Nielsen sọ.

translation.unyo: Ife lati mo ohun to nlo si ga sibe leyin igbejo naa.
translation.dcyo: Ìfẹ̀ láti mọ ohun tó nlọ sì ga síbẹ̀ lẹ́yìn ìgbẹ́jọ́ náà.

translation.unyo: Flake je eni afojusun pataki ninu isele ojo Eti.
translation.dcyo: Flake jẹ ẹni àfojúsùn pàtàkì nínú ìṣẹ̀lẹ ọjọ́ Ẹtì.

translation.unyo: Leyin ti ofiisi oselu alabode ti Republican se atejade gbolohun kan wipe oun yoo dibo fun Kavanaugh, awon kamera CNN ati CBS gba a mu ni owuro ojo Eti bi awon to nfi ibinu won han ti npariwo le e lori bi o ti ngbiyanju lati wo inu ero agbenigoke-aja losi ibi igbejo Igbimo Eto Idajo kan.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn tí ọ́fíìsì òṣèlú alábọ́dé ti Republican ṣe àtẹ̀jáde gbólóhùn kan wípé òun yóò dìbò fún Kavanaugh, àwọn kámẹ́rà CNN àti CBS gbá a mú ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ẹtì bí àwọn tó ńfì ìbínú wọn hàn ti ńpariwo lé e lórí bí ó ti ńgbiyanju láti wọ inú ẹ̀rọ agbénigòke-àjà lọ́si ibi ìgbéjọ́ Ìgbìmọ̀ Ètò Ìdájọ́ kan.

translation.unyo: O dide pelu awon eyinju to dorikodo fun opo iseju bi  won tise kan an labuku, ti won si gbe e jade boti nsele lori ero amohunmaworan CNN.
translation.dcyo: Ó dìde pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹyinjú tó doríkodò fún ọ̀pọ̀ ìṣẹ́jú bí  wọ́n tiṣe kàn an lábùkù, tí wọ́n sì gbé e jáde bóti ńṣẹlẹ̀ lori ẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán CNN.

translation.unyo: ''Mo nduro nibi gan-an ni iwaju yin,'' ni obinrin kan so.
translation.dcyo: ''Mo ńdúró níbí gan-an ní ìwájú yín,'' ni obìnrin kan sọ.

translation.unyo: ''Nje o ro wipe o nso otito fun orile-ede?
translation.dcyo: ''Ǹjẹ́ o rò wípé ó ńsọ òtítọ́ fún orilẹ-ede?

translation.unyo: Won so fun un, ''iwo ni agbara nigbati opo awon obinrin je alailagbara.''''
translation.dcyo: Wọ́n sọ fún un, ''ìwọ ní agbára nigbati ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn obìnrin jẹ aláìlágbára.''''

translation.unyo: Flake sope ofiisi oun ti se atejade gbolohun kan ti o si tun wi, ki ero agbenigoke-aja to palekunde, pe oun yoo ni opo nnkan lati so nibi igbejo igbimo naa.
translation.dcyo: Flake sọpé ọ́fíìsí òun ti ṣe àtẹ̀jáde gbólóhùn kan tí ó sì tún wí, kí ẹ̀rọ agbénigòkè-àjà tó palẹ̀kùndé, pé òun yóò ní ọ̀pọ̀ nǹkan láti sọ níbi ìgbẹ́jọ́ ìgbìmọ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Awon itakun olokun ati ti agbohunsafefe ni won ngbe isele naa botise nwaye leyin awon wakati, nigbati Igbimo Eto Idajo nilati dibo lati jeki ifanikale fun ise ti Kavanaugh tesiwaju sodo gbogbo awon Asoju-sofin Agba.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìtàkùn olókùn àti ti agbóhùnsáfẹ́fẹ́ ní wọ́n ńgbé ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà bótiṣe ńwáyé lẹ́yìn àwọn wákàtí, nigbati Ìgbìmọ̀ Ètò Ìdájọ́ níláti dìbò láti jẹ́kí ìfanikalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ ti Kavanaugh tẹ̀síwájú sọ́dọ̀ gbogbo àwọn Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà.

translation.unyo: Sugbon Flake sope oun yoo se bee nikan pelu oye wipe awon FBI yoo se iwaadi lori awon esun ti won fi kan eniti won fakale fun ise naa fun ose to nbo, eyiti awon asoju-sofin Democrats to kere niye ti nsope awon nfe.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n Flake sọpé òun yóò ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ nìkan pẹ̀lú òye wípé àwọn FBI yóò ṣe ìwáàdì lórí àwọn ẹ̀sùn tí wọ́n fi kan ẹnití wọ́n fàkalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ náà fún ọ̀sẹ̀ tó ńbọ̀, eyiti àwọn aṣoju-ṣofin Democrats tó kéré níye ti ńsọpé àwọn ńfẹ́.

translation.unyo: Flake ni won mu ni idaniloju ni apa kan nipase awon ijiroro pelu ore re Asoju-sofin Agba Chris Coons ti egbe oselu Democrats.
translation.dcyo: Flake ni wọ́n mú ní ìdánilójú ni apá kan nípaṣẹ́ àwọn ìjíròrò pẹ̀lú ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà Chris Coons ti ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Democrats.

translation.unyo: Leyin ijiroro kan pelu Coons ati opo awon asoju-sofin agba towaye leyin naa, Flakes se ipinnu re.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn ìjíròrò kan pẹ̀lú Coons àti ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn aṣojú-ṣòfin àgbà tówáyé lẹ́yìn náà, Flakes ṣe ìpinnu rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Eyan Flakes ni agbara, nitoripe o ti foju han gbangba pe awon ti Repubicans koni ni awon ibo lati fowosi Kavanaugh laisi iwaadi naa.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀yàn Flakes ni agbára, nitoripe ó ti fojú hàn gbangba pé àwọn ti Repubicans kòní ní àwọn ìbò láti fọwọ́sí Kavanaugh láìsí ìwáàdí náà.

translation.unyo: Aare Trump ti si iwaadi FBI kan sile lati bojuwo awon esun ti won fi kan Kavanaugh.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ Trump ti sí ìwáàdí FBI kan sílẹ̀ láti bojúwo àwọn ẹ̀sùn tí wọn fi kan Kavanaugh.

translation.unyo: Adari Igbimo Ijoba ile Geesi May nfesun kan awon to ntokasi asise re wipe won 'nse oselu' pelui oro Brexit
translation.dcyo: Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì May ńfẹ̀sùn kan àwọn tó ńtọ́kasí àṣiṣe rẹ̀ wípé wọ́n 'ńṣe òṣèlú' pẹlúi ọ̀rọ̀ Brexit

translation.unyo: Adari Igbimo Ijoba Theresa May fesun kan awon to nso nipa asise towa ninu awon eto agbekale re lati fi Ajo Awon Orile-ede Yuroopu sile wipe won ''nse oselu'' pelu ojo iwaju ile Geesi ti won si nse akoba fun ife-fun-ire ile naa ninu iforowanilenuwo kan pelu iwe iroyin Sunday Times.
translation.dcyo: Àdari Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba Theresa May fẹ̀sùn kan àwọn tó ńsọ nípa ȧṣiṣe tówà nínú àwọn ètò àgbékalẹ rẹ̀ láti fi Àjọ Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Yuroopu sílẹ̀ wipe wọ́n ''ńṣe òṣèlú́'' pẹ̀lú ọjọ́ iwájú ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì tí wọn sì ńṣe àkóbá fún ìfẹ́-fún-ire ilẹ̀ náà nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò kan pẹlu ìwé ìròyìn Sunday Times.

translation.unyo: Adari Igbimo Ijoba Briteeni Theresa May de sibi ipade Apero Egbe Oselu Conservative ni Birmingham, lorile-ede Briteeni, lojo kokandinlogbon, osu Owewe, lodun 2018.
translation.dcyo: Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba Briteeni Theresa May dé síbi ipade Àpèro Ẹgbẹ́ Òṣèlu Conservative ní Birmingham, lórilẹ-ede Briteeni, lọ́jọ́ kọkàndínlọ́gbọ́n, oṣù Owewe, lọ́dún 2018.

translation.unyo: Ninu iforowanilenuwo miran eyi tokan si okan pelu re loju ewe iwaju ti iwe iroyin naa, alaakoso re tele ri fun oro ile okeere Boris Johnson teramo itakoni to nse lori eto agbekale re to pe ni Alarambara fun Brexit, to si nsope aba kan ti o wipe Briteeni ati ajo EU nilati maa gba awon owo-ori ara won je eyiti ''o nbeere abuku ni gbogbo ona.''
translation.dcyo: Nínú ìfọ̀ròwánilẹ́nuwò miran èyí tókàn sí ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ lójú ewé iwájú ti iwe iroyin náà, aláàkóso rẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ rí fún ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè Boris Johnson tẹramọ́ ìtakoni tó ńṣe lórí ètò àgbékalẹ̀ rẹ̀ tó pè ní Aláràm̀barà fún Brexit, tó sì ńsọpé àbá kan tí ó wípé Briteeni àti àjọ EU níláti máa gba àwọn owó-orí ara wọn jẹ́ eyiti ''ó ńbéèrè àbùkú ní gbogbo ọ̀nà.''

translation.unyo: Ibon yinyin ti Wayde: Awon oloopa mu Dyteon Simpson lori iku agbaboolu alapere LSU
translation.dcyo: Ìbọn yínyín ti Wayde: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá mú Dyteon Simpson lórí ikú agbábọ́ọ̀lù alápẹ̀rẹ̀ LSU

translation.unyo: Awon oloopa ti mu afurasi kan nitori ibon yinyin to jasi iku Wayde Sims, eni ogun odun kan toje agbaboolu alapere ni LSU.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ti mú afurasí kan nitori ìbọn yínyín tó jásí ikú Wayde Sims, ẹni ogún ọdún kan tójẹ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù alápẹ̀rẹ̀ ní LSU.

translation.unyo: Dyteon Simpson, omo ogun odun, ni won mu ti won si fi si ogba ewon lori esun apaniyan onipele keji, Eka Awon Oloopa Baton Rouge ni o so.
translation.dcyo: Dyteon Simpson, ọmọ ogún ọdún, ní wọ́n mú tí wọ́n sì fi sí ọgbà ẹ̀wọ̀n lórí ẹ̀sùn apànìyan onípele kejì, Ẹ̀ka Àwọn Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Baton Rouge ni o sọ.

translation.unyo: Awon osise gbe aworan fidio kan sita to safihan itaporogan laarin Sims ati Simpson, ti awon oloopa si sope Sims padanu awon awo oju re ninu ija naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ gbé àwòrán fídíò kan síta tó ṣàfihàn ìtàpórógan láàrin Sims àti Simpson, tí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá sì sọpé Sims pàdánù àwọn awò ojú rẹ̀ nínú ìjá náà.

translation.unyo: Awon oloopa ri awon awo oju mu kuro nibi isele naa ti won si sope won ri koko abuda ajebi DNA ti Simpson lara won, ni WAFB tiise alajose CBS so ninu iroyin.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá rí àwọn awò ojú mú kúrò níbì ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà tí wọ́n sì sọpé wọ́n rí kókó àbùdá àjẹbí DNA ti Simpson lára wọn, ní WAFB tííṣe alájọṣe CBS sọ nínú ìròyìn.

translation.unyo: Leyin ti won beere oro lowo Simpson, awon oloopa ni o gba wipe oun yin ibon to jasi iku Wayde.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n bèèrè ọ̀rọ̀ lọ́wọ́ Simpson, àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ní ó gbà wípé òun yin ìbọn tó jásí ikú Wayde.

translation.unyo: Owo oniiduro re ni won ti fi si egberun-lona-irinwodinlaaadota dola, iwe Advocate  ni o iroyin bee,
translation.dcyo: Owó oníìdúró rẹ̀ ní wọ́n ti fi sí ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́ná-irinwódínláàádọ́ta dọ́la, ìwé Advocate  ní ́o ìròyìn bẹẹ,

translation.unyo: Ofiisi Oluwaadi Iku ti Eka Ila Oorun Baton gbe iroyin ibere kan jade lojo Eti, to nsope ohun to sokunfa iku ni ogbe ibon kan ti won yin si ori naa sinu orun.
translation.dcyo: Ọ́fíisì Olùwáàdí Ikú ti Ẹ̀ka Ìla Oòrùn Baton gbé ìròyìn ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ kan jadé lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì, tó ńsọpé ohun tó ṣokùnfa ikù ní ọgbẹ́ ìbọn kan tí wọn yìn sí orí náà sínú ọrùn.

translation.unyo: Eka naa nkan saara si iko amusese lori awon isansa ti Awon Oloopa Ipinle Louisiana, ile ise asayewo iwa odaran ti awon oloopa ipinle, awon oloopa Yunifasiti Gusuu ati awon olugbe agbegbe naa fun riran won lowo ninu iwaadi eyiti o jeki won mu afurasi naa.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀ka náà ńkan sáará sí ikọ̀ amúṣẹ́ṣe lóri àwọn ìsáǹsá ti Àwọn Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Ìpínlẹ̀ Louisiana, ilé iṣẹ́ aṣàyẹ̀wò ìwà ọ̀daràn ti àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ìpínlẹ̀, àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá Yunifasiti Gúsúù àti àwọn olùgbé agbègbè náà fún ríràn wọ́n lọ́wọ́ nínu ìwáàdí eyiti o jẹ́kí wọ́n mú afurasí náà.

translation.unyo: Oludari ere idaraya LSU Joe Alleva dupe lowo awon agbofinro agbegbe fun ''ise takun-takun ati ilepa idajo'' won.
translation.dcyo: Olùdarí eré ìdárayá LSU Joe Alleva dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn agbófinró agbègbè fún ''iṣẹ́ takun-takun àti ilépa ìdájọ́'' wọn.

translation.unyo: Sims je omo ogun odun lojo ori.
translation.dcyo: Sims jẹ́ ọmọ ogún ọdún lọ́jọ́ orí.

translation.unyo: Onipo-iwaju naa toga niwon ese bata mefa ati insi mefa dagba ni Baton Rouge, nibiti baba re, Wayne, bakannaa ti gba boolu alapere fun LSU.
translation.dcyo: Onípo-iwáju náà tóga níwọ̀n ẹsẹ̀ bàtà mẹ́fà àti íǹsì mẹ́fà dàgbà ní Baton Rouge, nibiti bàbá rẹ̀, Wayne, bákannáà ti gbá bọ́ọ̀lù alápẹ̀rẹ̀ fún LSU.

translation.unyo: O gba koko 5.6 ati awon atuntasoke 2.6 niti agbedemeji ninu ere ni saa to koja.
translation.dcyo: Ó gba kókó 5.6 ati àwọn àtúntasókè 2.6 níti agbedeméji nínú eré ní sáà tó kọjá.

translation.unyo: Ni owuro ojo Eti, akonimo-on-gba boolu alapere ti LSU Will Wade sope iko naa wa ninu ''ipo alailagbara'' atipe ''haa se won'' nipase iku Wayde.
translation.dcyo: Ní òwúrọ ọjọ́ Ẹtì, akọ́nimọ̀-ọ́n-gbá bọ́ọ̀lù alápẹ̀rẹ̀ ti LSU Will Wade sọpé ikọ̀ náà wà nínú ''ipò aláìlágbára'' àtipé ''háà ṣe wọ́n'' nípaṣẹ̵̀ ikú Wayde.

translation.unyo: Wade sowipe ''Eyi ni ohun ti o ma nsaniyan re ni gbogbo igba,'.
translation.dcyo: Wade sowipe ''Èyí ní ohun ti ó ma ńṣàníyàn rẹ̀ ní gbogbo igbà,'̣.

translation.unyo: Ori-ile to lanu Folikano npo eeru jade ni Ilu Mesiko
translation.dcyo: Orí-ilẹ̀ tó lanu Fòlikánò ńpọ̀ eérú jáde ní Ìlú Mẹ́ṣíkò

translation.unyo: Eeru ti a npo jade lati ori-ile ti o lanu Folikano Popocatepetl ti de awon agbegbe guusu ti olu-ilu orile-ede Mesiko.
translation.dcyo: Eérú tí a ńpọ̀ jáde láti orí-ilẹ́ tí ó lanu Fòlìkánò Popocatepetl ti dé àwọn agbègbe gúúsù ti olú-ìlú orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò.

translation.unyo: Ibudo to Nrisi Didena Isele Ajalu Lorile-ede ti kilo fun awon omo orile-ede Mesiko lojo Abameta wipe ki won kuro nibi folikano naa leyin ti ise re gbera soke lenu iho ti won si sakosile awon itujade afefe ati eeru nigba metalelogosan laarin wakati merinlelogun.
translation.dcyo: Ibùdò tó Ńrísí Dídènà Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ Àjálù Lorilẹ-ede ti kìlọ fún àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta wípé kí wọn kùrò níbi fòlìkánò náà lẹ́yìn tí iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ gbéra sókè lẹ́nu ihò tí wọ́n sì ṣàkọsílẹ̀ àwọn ìtújáde afẹ́fẹ́ àti eérú nígbà mẹ́tàlélọ́gọ́sán láàrin wákàtí mẹ́riǹlélógún.

translation.unyo: Ibudo naa nsakiyesi opolopo awon irokeke ati imititi ile.
translation.dcyo: Ibùdó náà ńṣàkíyèsí ọpọlọpọ àwọn ìrọ́kẹ̀kẹ̀ àti ìmìtìtì ilẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Awon aworan lori awon oju-opo ibasepo ti ayelujara safihan awon ipele ferefe eeru lara gilaasi awon oko ayokele ni awon agbegbe ti Ilu Mesiko bii Xochimilco.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn aworan lori àwọn ojú-òpó ìbáṣepọ̀ ti ayelujara ṣàfihàn àwọn ipele fẹ́rẹfẹ́ éerú lárá gíláàsì àwọn ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ ní àwọn agbègbè ti Ìlú Mẹ́ṣíkò bíi Xochimilco.

translation.unyo: Awon onimo-orile-aye ti sakiyesi piposii ninu ise nibi folikano naa eyiti o jokoo ni maili maarundinlaaadota (kilomita mejilelaaadorin) ni ila-oorun guusu ti olu-ilu naa leyin ti ile riri oniwon-7.1 kan to se ose ni aarin-gungun Mesiko ninu osu Owewe lodun 2017.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn onímọ-orilẹ-ayé ti ṣàkíyèsí pípọ̀síi nínú iṣẹ́ níbí fòlìkánò náà eyiti ó jókòó ní máìlì máàrúndínláàádọ́ta (kilomita méjìléláàádọ́rin) ní ìlà-oórùn gúúsù ti olú-ìlú náà lẹ́yìn ti ilẹ̀ rírì oníwọ̀n-7.1 kan tó ṣe ọṣẹ́ ní ààrin-gùngùn Mẹ́ṣíkò nínú oṣù Owewe lọ́dún 2017.

translation.unyo: Folikano naa ti won mo bii ''Don Goyo'' ti nsise di isinsinyi lati odun 1994.
translation.dcyo: Fòlìkánò náà tí wọ́n mọ̀ bíi ''Don Goyo'' ti ńṣiṣé di ìsinsìnyí láti ọdún 1994.

translation.unyo: Ikolu awon oloopa pelu awon ajafominira Catalan saaju ajodun ibo ominira
translation.dcyo: Ìkọlù àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá pẹ̀lú àwọn ajàfómìnira Catalan sáájú àjọ̀dun ìbò òmìnira

translation.unyo: Eniyan mefa ni won mu satimole ni ilu Barcelona lojo Abameta leyin ti awon to nfehonuhan nitori ati-gbominira kolu awon oloopa apana-ote, ti bii awon egberun eniyan si darapo mo awon ifehonuhan olorogun miran lati saami ajodun akoko ti ibo topin ile Catalonia si meji lori ati da duro bii olominira.
translation.dcyo: Eniyan mẹ́fà ni wọ́n mú sátìmọ́lé ní ìlú Barcelona lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta lẹ́yìn tí àwọn tó ńfẹ̀hónúhàn nitori àti-gbòmìnira kọlú àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá apaná-ọ̀tẹ̀, tí bíi àwọn ẹgbẹ̀rún eniyan sì darapọ̀ mọ awọn ìfẹ̀hónúhàn olórogún miran láti ṣààmi àjọ̀dún àkọ́kọ́ ti ìbò tópín ilẹ̀ Catalonia sì méjì lórí àti dá dúró bíi olómìnira.

translation.unyo: Egbe kan ti awon tofe ominira tiwon lo iboju ti awon oloopa apana-ote dina mo nju won loko pelu awon eyin ti won si tun nfe oda alaatike si won, eyiti o seda awon kurukuru eruku dudu ni awon opopona ti o maa nsaaba kun fofo fun awon arinrin-ajo igbafe.
translation.dcyo: Ẹgbẹ́ kan ti àwọn tófẹ́ omìnira tíwọn lo ìbòjú tí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá apaná-ọ̀tẹ̀ dínà mọ́ ńju wọ́n lókò pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹyin ti wọn sì tún ńfẹ́ ọ̀dà aláàtíkè sí wọn, eyiti ó ṣẹ̀dá àwọn kùrukùru eruku dúdú ní àwọn òpópónà tí ó máa ńsáábà kún fọ́fọ́ fún àwọn arìnrìn-àjò ìgbafẹ́.

translation.unyo: Ijangbon tun be sile nigba toya lojo naa pelu awon oloopa tiwon nlo kondo won lati kapa ija naa.
translation.dcyo: Ìjàngbọ̀n tún bẹ́ sílẹ̀ nígbà tóyá lọ́jọ́ náà pẹ̀lú àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá tíwọn ńlo kóńdò wọn láti kápá ìjà náà.

translation.unyo: Fun opo wakati ni awon egbe tofe ominira fi nkorin ''Kosi gbigbagbe, kosi idarijin'' tiwon si koju ija si awon to nfehonuhan fun isokan to npariwo, ''K Sipeeni ki o pe.''
translation.dcyo: Fún ọ̀pọ̀ wákàtí ni àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tófẹ́ òmìnira fi ńkọrin ''Kòsí gbígbàgbé, kòsí ìdáríjìn'' tíwọ́n sì kọjú ìjà sí àwọn tó ńfẹ̀hónúhàn fún ìsọkan tó ńpariwo, ''Ḱ Sipeeni kí ó pẹ́.''

translation.unyo: Eniyan merinla lo gba itoju fun ifarapa die ti won ni nibi awon ifehonuhan naa, ni awon oniroyin agbegbe so.
translation.dcyo: Eniyan mẹ́rìnlá ló gba ìtọ́jú fún ìfarapa díẹ̀ tí wọ́n ní níbí àwọn ìfẹ̀hónúhàn náà, ni àwọn oníròyìn agbègbè sọ.

translation.unyo: Awon aibale-okan toga si wa ni agbegbe tofe ominira leyin odun kan tiwon dibo onibeeni-beeko ni ojo Kin-in-ni osu Owara eyiti Madrid sope o lodi sofin sugbon ti awon omo ile Catalonia tofe ominira nsajoyo re
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àìbalẹ̀-ọkàn tóga sì wà ní agbègbe tófẹ́ òmìnira lẹ́yìn ọdún kan tíwọn dìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ ní ọjọ́ Kìn-ín-ní oṣù Ọ̀wàrà eyiti Madrid sọpé ó lòdì sófin ṣùgbọ́n tí àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Catalonia tófẹ òmìnira ńṣàjọyọ̀ rẹ̀

translation.unyo: Awon oludibo yan lona ti kosee dojuko lati di olominira, botilejepe iye awon to jade dibo kere pelu opo awon to ntako didaduro tiwon deye si ibo naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn olùdìbò yàn lọ́ná tí kòṣeé dojúkọ láti di olómìnira, botilẹjepe iye àwọn tó jáde dìbò kéré pẹ̀lú ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn tó ńtako dídádúró tíwọn dẹ́yẹ sí ìbò náà.

translation.unyo: Gegebi awon alase Catalonia ti wi o fere to egberun eniyan ti o farapa lodun to koja leyin ti awon oloopa gbiyanju lati da ibo to nlo duro ni awon ibudo idibo kaakiri agbegbe naa ninu awon ikolu ipa.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn aláṣẹ Catalonia ti wí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ tó ẹgbẹ̀rún eniyan tí ó farapa lọ́dún tó kọjá lẹ́yìn tí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá gbìyànjú láti dá ìbò tó ńlọ dúró ní àwọn ibùdó ìdìbò káàkiri agbègbè náà nínú àwọn ìkọlù ipá.

translation.unyo: Awon egbe tofe ominira ti pago sita ni gbogbo oru ojo Eti lati iwode kan tiwon fe fi satileyin fun awon oloopa orile-ede naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tófẹ́ òmìnira ti pàgọ́ síta ní gbogbo òru ọjọ́ Ẹtì láti ìwọ́de kan tíwọ́n fẹ́ fi ṣàtìlẹyìn fún àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá orilẹ-ede náà.

translation.unyo: Iwode naa tesiwaju sugbon won fi ipa mu un lati gba ona kan to yato.
translation.dcyo: Ìwọ́de náà tẹ̀síwájú ṣùgbọn wọ́n fi ipá mú un láti gba ọ̀nà kan tó yàtọ̀.

translation.unyo: Narcis Termes, eni odun mejidinlaaadorin, osise ina manamana to nlo sibi ifehonuhan awon tofe ominira pelu aya re sope oun koni ireti mo nipa isowoseese aseyori fun Catalonia lati gba ominira.
translation.dcyo: Narcis Termes, ẹni ọdún méjìdínláàádọ́rin, òṣìṣẹ́ iná mànàmáná tó ńlọ síbí ìfẹ̀hónúhàn àwọn tófẹ òmìnira pẹ̀lú aya rẹ̀ sọpé òun kòní ìrètí mọ́ nípa ìṣọwọ́ṣeéṣe àṣeyọrí fún Catalonia láti gba òmìnira.

translation.unyo: ''Lodun to koja a gbe ninu okan ninu awon akoko to dara julo.
translation.dcyo: ''Lọ́dún tó kọjá a gbé nínù ọ̀kan nínú àwọn àkókò tó dára jùlọ.

translation.unyo: Mo wo awon obi mi bi won ti nsokun ayo nitori pe won lee dibo sugbon nisinsinyi a ti ha soju kan,'' ni o so.
translation.dcyo: Mo wo àwọn òbí mi bí wọ́n ti ńsọkún ayọ̀ nitori pe wọ́n leè dìbo sùgbọ́n nísinsìnyí a ti há sójú kan,'' ni o sọ.

translation.unyo: Pelu wipe won rapala lati jawe olubori tose pataki ninu awon ibo agbegbe ninu osu Ope to koja, awon egbe oselu Catalonia tofe ominira ti lakaka lati tun di agbara mu lodun yii pelu wipe opo ninu awon adari won ti won gbajumo julo ti salo lo sajo funrawon tabi ki won wa latimole nibiti won ti nduro de igbejo fun ipa ti won ko ninu sise eto idibo onibeeni-beeko ati kikede ominira leyin re.
translation.dcyo: Pẹ̀lú wípé wọ́n rápálá láti jáwé olúborí tóṣe pàtakì nínú àwọn ìbò agbègbè nínú oṣù Ọpẹ́ tó kọjá, àwọn ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Catalonia tófẹ́ òmìnira ti làkàkà láti tún di agbára mú lọ́dún yìí p̀ẹlú wípé ọ̀pọ̀ nínú àwọn adarí wọn tí wọ́n gbajúmọ̀ jùlọ ti sálọ lọ sájò fúnrawọn tàbí kí wọ́n wà látìmọ́lé nibiti wọn tí ńdúró dé ìgbẹ́jọ́ fún ipa ti wọ́n kó nínú ṣíṣe ètò ìdìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ àti kíkéde òmìnira lẹ́yìn rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Joan Puig, osise atokose eni odun mejilelogoji to nse igbasile ifehonuhan han fun atileyin awon oloopa lori foonu re, sope aawo naa ni awon oselu ti ru ina si ni awon iha mejeeji.
translation.dcyo: Joan Puig, òṣìṣẹ́ àtọkọ̀ṣe ẹni ọdún méjìlélógójì tó ńṣe ìgbàsílẹ̀ ìfẹ̀hónúhàn hàn fún àtìlẹ́yìn àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá lórí fóònu rẹ̀, sọpé aáwọ̀ nàà ní àwọn òṣèlu ti rú iná sí ní àwọn ìhà méjèèjì.

translation.unyo: ''O kan tunbo ngbona siwaju ati siwaju sii,'' ni o so.
translation.dcyo: ''Ó kàn túnbọ̀ ńgbóná síwájú àti síwájú síi,'' ní ó sọ.

translation.unyo: Lojo Abameta, Oriol Junqueras, okan ninu awon adari Catalonia towa lewon ki igbejo to bere lati opin odun to koja, kede wipe oun yoo dije ninu awon idibo sile Igbimo Asoju-sofin ti Ajo Yuroopu lodun to nbo.
translation.dcyo: Lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, Oriol Junqueras, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn adarí Catalonia tówà lẹ́wọ̀n kí ìgbẹ́jọ́ tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti òpin ọdún tó kọjá, kéde wípé òun yóò díje nínú àwọn ìdìbò sílé Ìgbímọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin ti Àjọ Yuroopu lọ́dún tó ńbọ̀.

translation.unyo: ''Diduro bii oludije kan fun awon idibo ti Yuroopu ni ona kan to dara julo lati ko ifaseyin to ndeba awon ohun rere ti ijoba awarawa ati inira ti a ti lati owo ijoba Sipeeni.
translation.dcyo: ''Dídúró bíi olùdíje kan fún àwọn ìdìbò ti Yuroopu ni ọ̀nà kan tó dára jùlọ láti kọ ìfàsẹ́yìn tó ńdébá àwọn ohun rere ti ìjọba àwarawa àti inira tí a tí láti ọwọ́ ìjọba Sipeeni.

translation.unyo: Ilu Londonderi: Won mu awon okunrin satimole leyin ifipawa-oko ayokele wonu ile
translation.dcyo: Ìlú Lọndọnderi: Wọ́n mú àwọn ọkùnrin sátìmọ́lé lẹ́yìn ìfipáwa-ọkọ́ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ wọnú ilé

translation.unyo: Awon okunrin meta, ti ojo-ori won je odun metalelogbon, merinlelogbon ati okandinlogoji ni won ti mu satimole leyin ti won fi ipa wa oko ayokele wo inu ile kan lera-lera ni ilu Londonderi.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọkùnrin mẹ́ta, tí ọjọ́-orí wọn jẹ́ ọdún mẹ́tàlélọ́gbọ̀n, mẹ́rìnlélọ́gbọ̀n àti ọ̀kàndínlógójì ni wọn ti mú sátìmọ́lé lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n fi ipá wa ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ wọ inú ilé kan léra-léra ní ìlú Lọndọndẹri.

translation.unyo: Isele naa foju han sita ni Ballynagard Crescent lojo 'Bo ni bii aago meje ati aabo ale Akoko ti Geesi.
translation.dcyo: Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà fojú hàn síta ní Ballynagard Crescent lọ́jọ́ 'Bọ̀ ní bíi aago méje àti ààbọ̀ alẹ́ Àkókò ti Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.

translation.unyo: Osise Otelemuye Bob Blemmings sope o fa idibaje fun enu-ona ile ati ile gan-an funrare.
translation.dcyo: Òṣiṣẹ́ Ọ̀tẹlẹ̀múyẹ́ Bob Blemmings sọpé ó fa ìdíbàjẹ́ fún ẹnu-ọ̀nà ilé àti ile gan-an fúnrarẹ̀.

translation.unyo: O see se ki won ti fi orun alasomogi kan ta ofa mo oko ayokele naa nigba kan ri.
translation.dcyo: Ó ṣeé ṣe kí wọ́n ti fi ọrún alásomọ́gi kan ta ọfà mọ́ ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ nàà nigba kan rí.

translation.unyo: Gbigba alaitase ti Menga fun Livingston ni ibori 1-0 lori Rangers.
translation.dcyo: Gbígbá aláìtàsé ti Menga fún Livingston ní ìborí 1-0 lórí Rangers.

translation.unyo: Boolu akoko ti Dolly Menga gba wole fun Livingston lo mu isegun daju
translation.dcyo: Bọ́ọ̀lù àkọ́kọ́ tí Dolly Menga gbá wọlé fún Livingston ló mú ìṣẹ́gun dájú

translation.unyo: Livingston to gba igbega so Ranger di omugo lati fi Steven Gerrard sinu ijakule eleekeji re ninu idije mejidinlogun gegebi alaakoso fun egbe Ibrox naa.
translation.dcyo: Livingston tó gba ìgbéga sọ Ranger di òmùgọ̀ láti fi Steven Gerrard sínù ìjákulẹ̀ ẹlẹ́ẹ̀keji rẹ nínú ìdíje méjìdínlógún gẹ́gẹ́bí alaakoso fún ẹgbẹ́ Ibrox náà.

translation.unyo: Gbigba alaitase ti Dolly Menga fihan gbangba pe ohun ni iyato naa bi egbe ti Gary Holt sun ipele pelu Hibernian ni ipo keji.
translation.dcyo: Gbígbá aláìtàsé ti Dolly Menga fihàn gbangba pé ohun ni ìyàtọ̀ náà bí ẹgbẹ́ ti Gary Holt sún ipele pẹ̀lú Hibernian ní ipò keji.

translation.unyo: Egbe ti Gerrard si wa sibe laini ibori kankan leyin odi ninu Isori Liigi Akoko ni saa yii ti won si nkoju awon olori tiise Hearts, eniti won ntele pelu ami koko mejo, lojo Abameta to nbo.
translation.dcyo: Ẹgbẹ́ ti Gerrard sì wà síbẹ̀ láìní ìbori kankan lẹ́yìn odi nínú Ìṣọ̀rí Líìgí Àkọ́kọ́ ní sáà yìí tí wọ́n sí ńkojú àwọn olóri tííṣe Hearts, ẹniti wọ́n ńtẹ̀lé pẹ̀lú àmì kókó mẹ́jọ, lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta tó ńbọ̀.

translation.unyo: Saaju re, Rangers ti gbalejo Rapid Vienna ninu Liigi Yuropa lojo 'Bo.
translation.dcyo: Saájú rẹ̀, Rangers ti gbàlejò Rapid Vienna nínú Líìgì Yuropa lọjọ 'Bọ̀.

translation.unyo: Livingston, ewe, si nmu are ailani-ijakule re gbooro sii ninu ipin naa losi idije mefa, pelu olori akonimo-on-gba Holt ti ko tii to ijakule wo leyin ti o ti paaro Kenny Miller losu to koja.
translation.dcyo: Livingston, ẹ̀wẹ̀, sì ńmú aré aílàní-ìjákulẹ̀ rẹ gbòòrò síi nínú ìpín náà lọsí ìdíje mẹ́fà, pẹ̀lú olórí akọ́nimọ̀-ọ́n-gbá Holt tí kò tíì tọ́ ìjákulẹ̀ wo lẹ́yìn tí ó ti pààrọ̀ Kenny Miller lóṣu tó kọjá.

translation.unyo: Livinston padanu awon anfaani toye ki o lo lodi si awon olubewo kogbereegbe
translation.dcyo: Livinston pàdánù àwọn àǹfààní tóyẹ kí ó lò lòdì sí àwọn olùbẹwò kògbérèégbè

translation.unyo: Iko ti Holt ye koti wa niwaju tipe ki won to gba boolu wole, pelu igbajumo si ilepa won eyiti o fa orisirisi awon iyonu fun Rangers.
translation.dcyo: Ìkọ ti Holt yẹ kóti wà níwájú tipẹ́ kí wọ́n tó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù wọlé, pẹ̀lú ìgbájúmọ́ sí ìlépa wọn eyiti ó fa oŕiṣiriṣi àwọn ìyọnu fún Rangers.

translation.unyo: Scott Robinson la aluyo sugbon o fa igbiyanju re nile nigbati o koju sile lati gba boolu wole, leyin naa Alan Lithgow kan lee koju ipa tire si igbo leyin to ti yo wole lati pade aforigba ti Craig Halkett loju ile.
translation.dcyo: Scott Robinson la àlùyọ ṣùgbọ́n ó fa igbiyanju rẹ nílẹ̀ nìgbàtí ó kọjú sílé latí gbá bọ́ọ̀lù wọlé, lẹ́yìn náà Alan Lithgow kàn leè kọjú ipá tirẹ̀ sí igbó lẹ́yìn tó ti yọ wọlé láti pàdé àforìgbá ti Craig Halkett lójú ilé.

translation.unyo: Awon olugbalejo naa ti ni itelorun lati jeki Rangers gba boolu niwaju won, pelu pe won mope awon lee da awon naa ni eyo-eyo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn olùgbàlejò náà ti ní ìtẹ́lọ́rùn láti jẹ́kí Rangers gbá bọ́ọ̀lú níwájú wọn, pẹ̀lu pé wọ́n mọ́pè àwọn leè da àwọn náà ní ẹyọ-ẹyọ.

translation.unyo: Iyen si ni ona naa ti ami ayo tose pataki naa fi wa.
translation.dcyo: Ìyẹn sì ni ọ̀nà náà tí àmì ayò tóṣe pàtàkì náà fi wá.

translation.unyo: Rangers faaye gba ijiya boolu gbigba alaisi-atako ti Livinston si sise lati si ona kan sile, Declan Gallagher ati Robinson npa ise po lati fun Menga ni anfaani, eniti o gba ifowokan kan ti o si gba boolu wole ni aarin apoti ijiya penariti naa.
translation.dcyo: Rangers fáàyè gba ìjìya bọ́ọ̀lù gbígbá aláìsí-àtakò tí Livinston sì ṣiṣẹ́ láti sí ọ̀nà kan sílẹ̀, Declan Gallagher àti Robinson ńpá iṣẹ́ pọ̀ láti fún Menga ni àǹfààní, ẹniti ó gba ìfọwọ́kàn kàn tí ó sì gbá bọ́ọ̀lù wọlé ní ààrin àpótí ìjìya pẹnariti náà.

translation.unyo: Ni ipele yen, Rangers ti bori nipa ki boolu pe lese eni sugbon won ti ri i pe aabo awon onile kosee wo ti kosi si ipaya rara fun olusole Liam Kelly.
translation.dcyo: Ní ipele yẹn, Rangers ti borí nípa kí bọ́ọ̀lù pẹ́ lẹ́sẹ̀ ẹni sùgbọ́n wọ́n ti rí i pé ààbò àwọn onile kòṣeé wọ tí kòsí sí ìpayá rárá fún olùṣọ́lé Liam Kelly.

translation.unyo: Batani yen tesiwaju wo inu abala keji idije naa botilejepe Alfred Morelos fi ipa mu Kelly lati dena iwole boolu kan.
translation.dcyo: Bátàni yẹn tẹsiwaju wọ inú abala keji ìdíje náà botilẹjẹpe Alfred Morelos fi ipa mú Kelly láti dènà ìwọlé bọ́ọ̀lù kan.

translation.unyo: Scott Pittman ni a fi anfaani dun nipase ese olusole Rangers Allan McGregor ti Lithgow si gba boolu miran ti Livingston fun un danu sigbo.
translation.dcyo: Scott Pittman ní a fi àǹfàànì dùn nípaṣẹ̀ ẹsẹ̀ olùṣọ́lé Rangers Allan McGregor tí Lithgow sì gbá bọ́ọ̀lù miran tí Livingston fún un dànù sígbó.

translation.unyo: Boolu ntesiwaju lati maa wa sinu apoti penariti ti Livinston lati awon igun-ile ti won si ngba won danu, nigbati awon ibeere fun eto ijiya penariti meji -leyin ikolu Halkett lori afiropo Glenn Middleton, ati okan fun boolu afowomu - ni won bi danu.
translation.dcyo: Bọ́ọ̀lù ńtẹ̀síwájú láti máa wá sínú àpòtí pẹnariti ti Livinston láti àwọn igun-ilé tí wọ́n sì ńgbá wọn dànu, nigbati àwọn ìbèèrè fún ẹ̀tọ́ ìjìyà pẹnariti méjì -lẹ́yìn i̇̀kọlù Halkett lórí àfirọ́pò Glenn Middleton, àti ọ̀kan fún bọ́ọ̀lù àfọwọ́mù - ni wọ́n bí dànù.

translation.unyo: 'Iyanu Ara-oto' lati Livingston - isatupale
translation.dcyo: 'Ìyanu Àrà-ọ̀tọ̀' láti Livingston - ìṣàtúpalẹ̀

translation.unyo: Alasdair Lamont ti BBC Scotland ni Gbagede Tony Macaroni
translation.dcyo: Alasdair Lamont ti BBC Scotland ní Gbàgede Tony Macaroni

translation.unyo: Ise takun-takun ara-oto to yanilenu ati esi fun Livingston.
translation.dcyo: Iṣẹ́ takun-takun àra-ọ̀tọ̀ tó yanilẹ́nu àti èsì fún Livingston.

translation.unyo: Si enikan, won je ohun to tayo, titesiwaju lati tayo awon ireti loju ipa ona oke yii.
translation.dcyo: Sí ẹnìkan, wọ́n j̇ẹ́ ohun tó tayọ, títẹ̀síwájú láti tayọ àwọn ìrètí lójú ipa ọ̀nà òké yìí.

translation.unyo: Irufe ona boolu gbigba won ati awon osise ko fi bee yipada lati igba ipadabo won soke, sugbon osuba nla nilati lo sodo Holt fun ona ti o gba sekoriya fun iko naa lati igba ti o ti de.
translation.dcyo: Ìrúfẹ ọ̀nà bọ́ọ̀lù gbígbá wọn àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ kò fí bẹ́ẹ̀ yípadà láti ìgbà ìpadàbọ̀ wọn sókè, sùgbọn òṣùbà ńlá nilati lọ́ sọ́dọ̀ Holt fun ọ̀nà tí ó gbà ṣékóríyá fún ikọ̀ náà láti ìgbà tí ò ti dé.

translation.unyo: O ni opo awon akoni.
translation.dcyo: Ó ní ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn akọni.

translation.unyo: Balogun Halkett polokan, ti o ndari aabo eyiti aato re lagbara, nigbati Menga fi Connor Golson ati Joe Worall sipo ainisinmi lori ese titi ti idije fi pari.
translation.dcyo: Balògun Halkett pọ̀lọ́kan, tí ó ndarí ààbò eyiti ààtò rẹ̀ lágbára, nigbati Menga fi Connor Golson àti Joe Worall sípò àìnísinmi lórí ẹsẹ̀ títí tí ìdíje fi parí.

translation.unyo: Rangers koni imisi, botiwukori.
translation.dcyo: Rangers kòní ìmísí, bótiwùkórí.

translation.unyo: Bi won ti dara to ni awon akoko tiwon labe Gerrard, won kuna gidi lati de iru awon odiwon wonyen.
translation.dcyo: Bí wọ́n ti dára tó ni àwọn àkókò tíwọ́n lábẹ́ Gerrard, wọ́n kùnà gidi láti dé irú àwọn òdiwọ̀n wọ̀nyẹn.

translation.unyo: Boolu won to gbeyin se alaipeye - eekan soso ni won si ile awon onile sile - ti eyi si je nnkan bii ipe itaniji kan fun Rangers, awon ti won ti ri ara won laarin tabili isori.
translation.dcyo: Bọ́ọ̀lù wọn tó gbẹ̀yìn ṣe aláìpéye - ẹ̀ẹ̀kan ṣoṣo ni wọ́n sí ilé awọn onílé sílẹ̀ - tí èyí sì jẹ nǹkan bíi ìpè ìtanijí kan fún Rangers, àwọn tí wọn ti rí ara wọn laàrin tábìlì ìṣòrí.

translation.unyo: Erdogan gba igbanilalejo aladalu ni Cologne
translation.dcyo: Erdogan gba ìgbanilálejò aládàlú ní Cologne

translation.unyo: Awon erin ati oju-orun alawo aro lowa lojo Abameta (ikokandinlogbon osu Owewe) bi awon adari orile-ede Toki ati orile-ede Jamani se pade fun ounje owuro ni ilu Berlin.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ẹ̀rín àti ojú-ọrun aláwọ aró lówà lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́tà (ìkọkàndínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣ̀ù Owewe) bí àwọn adari orilẹ-ede Tọ́kì àti orilẹ-ede Jamani ṣe pàdé fún oúnjẹ òwúrọ̀ ní ìlú Berlin.

translation.unyo: O je ojo to gbeyin ti ibewo alaariyanjiyan Aare Erdogan si orile-ede Jamani - eyiti o fi lepa ona  lati tun ibasepo towa laarin alajose NATO se.
translation.dcyo: Ó jẹ́ ọjọ tó gbẹ̀yìn ti ìbẹ̀wò aláàríyànjiyàn Aàrẹ Erdogan sí orilẹ-ede Jamani - eyiti ó fi lépa ọ̀nà  láti tún ìbáṣepọ̀ tówà láàrin alájọṣe NATO ṣe.

translation.unyo: Won ti ni ede-aiyede lori awon oro to niise pelu eto omoniyan, ominira awon oniroyin ati eto isafikun orile-ede Toki sinu ajo EU.
translation.dcyo: Wọn tí ni èdè-àìyede lórí àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tó nííṣe pẹ̀lú ẹ̀tọ̀ ọmọniyàn, òmìnira àwọn oníròyìn àti ètò ìṣàfikún orilẹ-ede Tọki sínú àjọ EU.

translation.unyo: Leyin naa ni Erdogan dari lo si ilu Cologne lati si mosalasi nla kan.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn náà ni Erdogan dári lọ sí ìlú Cologne láti sí mọ́sálásí ńlá kan.

translation.unyo: Ilu naa je ile fun awon omo ile Toki topo julo leyin odi Toki.
translation.dcyo: Ìlú náà jẹ́ ilé fún àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Tọki tópọ̀ jùlọ lẹ́yìn odi Tọki.

translation.unyo: Awon oloopa sope fun idi aabo awon nilati dina mo ero  elegberun meeedogbon eniyan ki won ma baa lee pejo niwaju mosalasi naa, sugbon opo awon alatileyin jade wa nitosi lati ri aare won.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá sọpé fún ìdí ààbò àwọn nilati dínà mọ́ èrò  ẹlẹ́gbẹ̀rún mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dọ́gbọ̀n eniyan kí wọ́n má baà leè péjò niwaju mọ́sálásí náà, ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹ́yìn jáde wa nítòsí láti rí ààrẹ wọn.

translation.unyo: Ogo-ogoorun awon afehonuhan tiwon je alatako Erdogan - ti opo ninu won je eya Kurd - bakannaa fo ohun won faye gbo, tiwon si nbu enu ate lu awon ilana isejoba Erdogan ati ipinnu ijoba ile Jamani lati ki i kaabo si orile-ede naa.
translation.dcyo: Ọgọ-ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn afẹ̀hónúhàn tíwọ́n jẹ́ alátakò Erdogan - tí ọ̀pọ̀ ninu wọn jẹ ẹ̀yà Kurd - bákannáà fọ ohùn wọn fáyé gbọ́, tíwọn sì ńbu ẹnu atẹ́ lu àwọn ìlànà ìṣejọba Erdogan àti ìpinnu ìjọba ilẹ̀ Jamani láti kì i káàbọ sí orilẹ-ede náà.

translation.unyo: Awon ifehonuhan onija naa fi isegbe olubewo kan han eniti awon omo Toki ile Jamani kan nyin bi akoni ti awon miran si nsoro re laburu bi afipasejoba kan.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìfẹ̀hónúhàn oníjà náà fi ìṣègbè olùbẹ̀wò kan hàn ẹniti àwọn ọmọ Tọki ilẹ̀ Jamani kan ńyìn bí akọni tí àwọn miran sì ńsọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ láburú bí afipáṣejọba kan.

translation.unyo: Ijamba opopona Deptford: Agunkeke ku ninu iforisorawon pelu oko ayokele
translation.dcyo: Ìjàm̀bá òpópónà Deptford: Agunkẹ̀kẹ́ kú nínú ìforísọrawọn pẹ̀lú ọkọ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́

translation.unyo: Agunkeke kan ti ku ninu iforisorawon kan ti o niise pelu oko ayokele kan ni ilu Londonu.
translation.dcyo: Agunkẹ̀kẹ́ kan ti kú nínú ìforísọrawọn kan tí ó nííṣe pẹ̀lú ọkọ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ kan ní ìlú Lọndọnu.

translation.unyo: Ijamba naa sele nitosi orita ti Opopona Bestwood ati Opopona Evelyn, ona kan ti kii sinmi ni Deptfird, ni ila-oorun ilu naa ni bii aago mewaa koja isegun meeedogun Akoko Geesi.
translation.dcyo: Ìjàm̀bá náà ṣẹlẹ̀ nítòsí oríta ti Òpópónà Bestwood àti Òpópònà Evelyn, ọ̀nà kàn tí kìí sinmi ní Deptfird, ní ìlà-oòrùn ìlú náà ní bíi aago mẹ́wàá kọjá ìṣẹ́gún mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún Àkókò Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.

translation.unyo: Awako oko ayokele naa duro ti awon osise ilera si mojuto o, sugbon okunrin naa ku nibi isele naa.
translation.dcyo: Awakọ̀ ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ náà dúró tí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìlera sì mójútó o, s̀ugbọ́n ọkùnrin náà kú níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Ijamba naa waye leyin osu die ti agunkeke miran ku ninu isele o-gba-a-o-salo kan ni Opopona Childers ni bii maili kan sibi ijamba ti ojo Abameta.
translation.dcyo: Ìjàm̀bá náà wáyé lẹ́yìn oṣu diẹ̀ ti agunkẹ̀kẹ́ miran kú nínú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ó-gbá-a-ó-sálọ kan ní Òpópónà Childers ní bíi máìlì kan síbi ìjàm̀bá ti ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.

translation.unyo: Awon Oloopa Metropolitan sope awon osise nsise lati da okunrin naa mo ki won si fi to ibatan re to sunmo on julo leti.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Metropolitan sọpé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ńṣiṣẹ́ láti dá ọkùnrin náà mọ̀ kí wọ́n sì fi tó ìbátan rẹ̀ tó súnmọ́ ọ́n jùlọ létí.

translation.unyo: Awon ona titipa ati idari boosi-akero sibomiran  wa nipo ti won si gba awon awako lamoran lati  yago fun agbegbe naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọ̀nà títìpa àti ìdarí bọ́ọ̀sì-akérò síbòmíràn  wá nípò tí wọ́n sì gba àwọn awakọ̀ lámọ̀ràn láti  yàgò fún agbègbè náà.

translation.unyo: Ogba-ewon Long Lartin: Awon osise mefa farapa ninu idarudapo
translation.dcyo: Ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n Long Lartin: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ mẹ́fà farapa nínú ìdàrúdàpọ̀

translation.unyo: Awon osise ogba-ewon mefa niwon farapa nibi idadaradapo kan ninu ogba-ewon alaaabo giga ti awon okunrin, Ofiisi Ogba-ewon naa ti so.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn òṣiṣẹ́ ogbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n mẹ́fà níwọn farapa níbi ìdàdarádàpọ̀ kan nínú ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n aláààbò gíga ti àwọn ọkùnrin, Ọ́fíìsì Ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà ti sọ.

translation.unyo: Idarudapo be sile ni HMP Long Lartin ni Worcestershire ni bii aago meesan ati aabo Akoko Geesi lojo Aiku atipe o si nlo lowo.
translation.dcyo: Ìdàrúdàpọ̀ bẹ́ sílẹ̀ ní HMP Long Lartin ní Worcestershire ní bíi aago mẹ́ẹ̀sán àti ààbọ̀ Àkókò Gẹ̀ẹ́sì lọ́jọ́ Àìkú àtipé ó sì ńlọ lọ́wọ́.

translation.unyo: Awon osise akosemose ''Tornado'' niwon ti ko wole lati yanju aawo naa, eyiti o niise pelu awon elewon mejo ti o si dawa ni apa kan ogba-ewon naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ''Tornado'' níwọ́n ti kó wọlé láti yanjú aáwọ̀ náà, eyiti o nííṣe pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹlẹ́wọ̀n mẹ́jọ tí ó sì dáwà ní apá kan ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà.

translation.unyo: Awon osise naa niwon toju awon ifarapa oju tomo niwonba nibi isele naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn òṣiṣẹ́ náà níwọ́n tọ́jú àwọn ìfarapa ojú tómọ̀ níwọ̀nba níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Agbenuso Ise Ogba-ewon kan so: ''Awon osise ogba-ewon ti a ti ko lekoo akanse ni a ti ko lo lati yanju isele to nwaye lowo ni HMP Long Lartin.
translation.dcyo: Agbẹnusọ Ìṣẹ́ Ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n kan sọ: ''Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ọgbà-ẹ̀wọn tí a ti kọ́ lẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àkànṣ̵e ní a ti kó lọ láti yanjú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tó ńwáyé lọ́wọ́ ní HMP Long Lartin.

translation.unyo: Awon omo egbe osise mefa ni a ti toju fun awon ipalara.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣìṣẹ́ mẹ́fà ni a ti tọ́jú fún àwọn ìpalára.

translation.unyo: A ko faaye gba iwa ipa ninu awon ogba-ewon wa, ti a si fihan gbangba pe awon ti o se e ni a o fa le awon oloopa lowo ti won si lee lo akoko  to gun die sii leyin awon irin ahamo.
translation.dcyo: A kò fààyè gba ìwà ipá nínú àwọn ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n wa, tí a sì fihàn gbangba pé àwọn tí ó ṣe é ni a o fà lé àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá lọ́wọ́ tí wọ́n sì leè lo àkókó  tó gùn díẹ̀ síi lẹ́yìn àwọn irin àhámọ́.

translation.unyo: HMP Long Lartin ntoju awon elewon toju eedegbeta lo, pelu awon kan ninu awon odaran naa tolewu julo ni orile-ede.
translation.dcyo: HMP Long Lartin ńtọ́jú àwọn ẹlẹ́wọn tóju ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ̀gbẹ̀ta lọ, pẹ̀lú àwọn kan nínú àwọn ọ̀daràn náà tóléwu jùlọ ní orilẹ-ede.

translation.unyo: Ninu osu Okudu niwon royin wipe gomina ogba-ewon naa gba itoju ile-iwosan leyin ti elewon kan ko lu u.
translation.dcyo: Nínú oṣù Òkúdu níwọ́n ròyìn wípé gómìnà ọgba-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà gba ìtọ́jú ilé-ìwòsàn lẹ́yìn tí ẹlẹ́wọn kan kọ lù ú.

translation.unyo: Atipe ninu osu Owara lodun to koja won pe awon osise apana-ote sinu ogba-ewon naa lati yanju aawo lile kan ninu eyiti won ti kolu awon osise pelu awon boolu alekoko-bi-irin.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé nínú oṣù Ọ̀wàrà lọ́dún tó kọjá wọ́n pé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ apaná-ọ̀tẹ̀ sínú ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà láti yanjú aáwọ̀ líle kan nínú eyiti wọ́n ti kọlu àwọn òṣìsẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù alekoko-bí-irin.

translation.unyo: Iji-lile Hurricane Rosa ndunkooko mo Phoenix, Las Vegas, Ilu Salt Lake pelu Ikun-omi alayalu (Awon agbegbe Ogbele lee je Anfaani)
translation.dcyo: Ìjì-líle Hurricane Rosa ńdúnkòokò mọ́ Phoenix, Las Vegas, Ìlú Salt Lake pẹ̀lú Ìkún-omi aláyalù (Àwọn agbègbè Ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ leè jẹ́ Àǹfààní)

translation.unyo: sowon fun ijinwonu ile olooru kan lati kolu Arizona, sugbon iyen gan-an ni o see se ki o sele  nibere ose to nbo bi agbara Iji lile Hurricane Rosa toseku se nto ipa lo lati la Asale Iwo-oorun Guusu ja, ti o si awon ewu ikun-omi alayalu sile.
translation.dcyo: ṣọ̀wọ́n fún ìjìnwọnú ilẹ̀ olóoru kan láti kọlu Arizona, ṣùgbọn ìyẹn gan-an ní ó ṣeé ṣe kí ó ṣẹlẹ̀  níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọ̀sẹ̀ tó ńbọ bí agbara Ìjì líle Hurricane Rosa tóṣẹ́kù ṣe ńtọ ipa lọ láti la Asálẹ Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Gúúsù já, tí ó sì àwọn ewu ìkún-omi aláyalù sílẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ile-ise Oju-ojo ti Orile-ede naa ti sagbejade awon isona fun ikun-omi alayalu fun ojo Aje ati ojo Isegun fun apa iwo-oorun Arizona sinu guusu ati ila-oorun Nevada, ila-oorun guusu California ati Utah, pelu awon ilu ti Phoenix. Flagstaff, Las Vegas, ati Ilu Salt Lake.
translation.dcyo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ojú-ọjọ́ ti Orilẹ-ede náà ti ṣàgbéjáde àwọn ìṣọ́nà fún ìkún-omi aláyalù fún ọjọ́ Ajé àti ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun fún apà ìwọ-oòrùn Arizona sínu gúùsù àti ìlà-oòrùn Nevada, ìlà-oòrùn gúúsù California àti Utah, pẹ̀lú àwọn ìlú ti Phoenix. Flagstaff, Las Vegas, ati Ìlú Salt Lake.

translation.unyo: Rosa ni a reti lati gba ona taara kan lori Phoenix lojo Isegun, tosi nsunmo ale ojo Aje pelu ojo.
translation.dcyo: Rosa ni a retí láti gba ọ̀nà tààrà kan lórí Phoenix lọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun, tósì ńsúnmọ́ alẹ́ ọjọ́ Ajé pẹ̀lú òjò.

translation.unyo: Ile-ise Oju-ojo ti Orile-ede ni Phoenix sakiyesi ninu atejade tuwiti kan wipe ''awon iji-lile cyclone mewaa nikan niwon nmu efuufu lile tile olooru tabi ijinwonu-ile dani laarin igba maili ti Phoenix lati odun 1950!
translation.dcyo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ojú-ọjọ́ ti Orilẹ-ede ní Phoenix ṣàkíyèsí nínú àtẹ̀jade tuwiti kan wípé ''àwọn ìjì-líle cyclone mẹ́wàá nìkan níwọn nmú ẹ̀fúùfú lílé tilẹ̀ olóoru tàbi ìjìnwọnú-ilẹ̀ dání láàrin igba máìlì ti Phoenix láti ọdún 1950!

translation.unyo: Katrina (1967) je iji-lile hurricane kan laarin ogoji maili ti aala AZ naa.''
translation.dcyo: Katrina (1967) jẹ́ ìjì-líle hurricane kan laàrin ogójì máìlì ti ààlà AZ náà.''

translation.unyo: Awon asesejade awokose ti Ibudo Iji-lile ti Orile-ede sasotele awon iwon insi 2 si 4 ti ojo-riro, pelu iye awon iwon insi ti o le to 6 onikele-kele ni Mologon Rim ti Arizona.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀jáde àwòkọ́ṣe ti Ibùdó Ìjì-líle ti Orilẹ-ede ṣàsọtẹ́lẹ̀ àwọn ìwọn íǹsì 2 sí 4 ti òjò-rírọ, pẹ̀lú iye àwọn ìwọn ínsí tí ó le tó 6 oníkéle-kèle ní Mologon Rim ti Arizona.

translation.unyo: Awon agbegbe miran ti Iwo-oorun Guusu pelu aarin gungun Rockies ati Great Basin naa ni o see se ki won gba iwon insi 1 si 2, pelu awon aropo onisege-sege ti o see se ki o to insi 4.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn agbègbè miran ti Ìwọ-oòrùn Gúúsù pẹ̀lú ààrin gúngún Rockies àti Great Basin náà ní ó ṣeé ṣe kí wọ́n gba ìwọn íǹsì 1 sí 2, pẹ̀lú àwọn àropọ̀ onísége-sège tí ó ṣeé ṣe kí ó tó íǹsì 4.

translation.unyo: Fun awon ti kosi nibiti ewu ikun-omi alayalu wa, ojo Rosa lee je ibukun niwon bi agbegbe naa ti je eyiti ogbele nba ja.
translation.dcyo: Fún àwọn tí kòsí níbiti ewu ìkún-omi aláyalù wà, òjò Rosa leè jẹ́ ìbùkún níwọ́n bí agbègbè náà ti jẹ́ eyiti ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ ńbá jà.

translation.unyo: Botilejepe ikun-omi je ohun to funni ni ipaya gidi, awon ojo-riro  kan yoo je eyiti yoo seni lanfaani niwon igbati Iwo-oorun guusu ti nni iriri awon ipo ogbele lowolowo.
translation.dcyo: Botilẹjẹpe ìkùn-omi jẹ ohun tó fúnni ní ìpayà gidi, àwọn òjò-rírọ̀  kan yóò jẹ́ eyiti yóò ṣeni láǹfààní níwọ̀n igbati Iwọ-oòrùn gúúsù ti ńní ìrírí àwọn ipò ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.

translation.unyo: Gegebi orile-ede U.S. ti wi Alaamojuto Ogbele, o le ni ida ogoji ninu ogoorun ti Arizona lo nni iriri o kere tan ogbele to bo sodi, isori toga julo eleekeji,'' ni weather.com so niroyin.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bí orilẹ-ede U.S. ti wí Aláàmójútó Ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀, ó lé ní ìdá ogójì nínú ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti Arizona ló ńní ìrírì ó kéré tán ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ tó bọ́ sódì, ìṣọ̀rí tóga jùlọ ẹlẹ́ẹ̀keji,'' ní weather.com sọ níròyìn.

translation.unyo: Akoko, ipa ona Iji-lile Hurricane Rosa ndari losi  akori ile lati inu okun wo gbogbo erekusu Baja California ti Mesiko.
translation.dcyo: Àkọ́kọ́, ipa ọ̀nà Ìjì-líle Hurricane Rosa ńdarí lọsí  àkọ́rí ilẹ láti inú òkun wọ gbogbo erékùsù Baja California ti Mẹ́síkò.

translation.unyo: Rosa, tosi wa sibe pelu agbara hurricane lojo Aiku pelu awon efuufu toga julo ti maili maarunlelogorin ni wakati kan, nbe ni maili irinwo-din-meeedogun guusu ti Punta Eugenia, Mesiko ti o si nlo si ariwa ni maili mewaa ni wakati kan.
translation.dcyo: Rosa, tósì wà síbẹ̀ pẹ̀lú agbára hurricane lọ́jọ́ Àìkú pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹ̀fúùfù tóga jùlọ ti máìlì máàrúnlélọ́gọ́rin ní wákàtí kan, ńbẹ ní máìlì irinwó-dín-mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún gúúsù ti Punta Eugenia, Mẹ́ṣíkò tí ó sì ńlọ sí àríwá ní máìlì mẹ́wàá ní wákàtí kan.

translation.unyo: Efuufu naa npade awon omi to tutu die sii lona ni Pacific ti agbara re si ndinku nitori idi eyi.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀fúùfù náà ńpàdé àwọn omi tó tutú díẹ̀ síi lọ́nà ní Pacific tí agbára rẹ̀ sì ńdínkù nitori ìdí èyí.

translation.unyo: Nitorinaa, a nreti wipe yoo fori sole ni Mesiko ninu agbara efuufu ti oloorun ni osan tabi irole  lojo Aje.
translation.dcyo: Nitorinaa, a ńretí wípé yóò forí sọlẹ̀ ní Mẹ́ṣíkò nínú agbára ẹ̀fúùfù ti olóorun ní ọ̀sán tábi ìrọ̀lẹ́  lọ́jọ́ Ajé.

translation.unyo: Ojo-riro kaakiri awon ipin ti Mesiko lee po pupo, ti o si nfi ewu ikun-omi tose pataki kan han.
translation.dcyo: Òjò-rírọ̀ káàkiri àwọn ìpin ti Mẹ́ṣíkò leè pọ púpọ̀, tí ó sì ńfi ewu ìkún-omi tóṣe pàtakì kàn hàn.

translation.unyo: Awon aropo ojo-riro ti iwon insi 3 si 6 ni a reti lati Baja California wo inu iwo-oorun ariwa Sonora ti eyiti o to insi 10 si see se.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àropọ òjò-rírọ̀ ti ìwọn íǹsì 3 sí 6 ni a retí láti Baja California wọ inú ìwọ̀-oòrùn àríwá Sonora tí eyiti ó tó íǹsì 10 sì ṣeé ṣe.

translation.unyo: Rosa yoo la ipa leyin naa si apa ariwa lati la Mesiko ja bii efuufu olooru kan ki o to de aala Arizona ni awon wakati isaaju ti owuro ojo Isegun bii ijinwonu-ile olooru kan, eyiti yoo la ipa leyin naa goke gba inu Arizona ati sinu guusu Utah ki o to di ale ojo Isegun.
translation.dcyo: Rosa yóò la ipa lẹ́yìn náà sí apá àríwá láti la Mẹ́síkò já bíi ẹ̀fùúfú olóoru kan kí ó tó dé ààlà Arizona ní àwọn wákàtí ìsáájú ti òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun bíi ìjìnwọnú-ilẹ̀ olóoru kan, eyiti yóò la ipa lẹ́yìn náà gòkè gba inú Arizona àti sínú gúúsù Utah kí ó tó di alẹ́ ọjọ Ìṣẹ́gun.

translation.unyo: Okunfa ewu gboogi naa ti a reti lati owo Rosa tabi awon iyoku re ni opo ojo-riro gidi ni Baja California, ni iwo-oorun ariwa Sonora, ati orile-ede U.S. Asale Ila-oorun Guusu,'' ni Ibudo Iji-lile Hurricane ti Orile-ede naa so.
translation.dcyo: Okùnfà ewu gbòógì náà tí a reti láti ọwọ́ Rosa tàbí àwọn ìyókù rẹ̵̀ ni ọ̀pọ̀ òjò-rírọ̀ gidi ní Baja California, ní ìwọ-oòrùn àríwá Sonora, àti orilẹ-ede U.S. Asálẹ Ìlà-oòrùn Gúúsù,'' ni Ibùdó Ìjì-líle Hurricane ti Orilẹ-ede náà sọ.

translation.unyo: Awon ojo ni a reti wipe won yoo fa ikun-omi alayalu ati awon isan panti eyiti o lee gba emi eniyan ninu awon asale, ati awon ile yiya ni awon ibiti o je oke.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn òjò ni a rètí wípé wọn yóò fa ìkún-omi aláyalù àti àwọn ìsàn pàǹtí eyiti ó leè gba ẹ̀mí eniyan nínú àwọn asálẹ̀, àti àwọn ilẹ̀ yíya ní awọn ibití ó jẹ́ òkè.

translation.unyo: Ikolu Midsomer Norton: won ti awon merin satimole fun gbigbiyanju lati paniyan
translation.dcyo: Ìkọlù Midsomer Norton: wọn tì awon mẹ́rin ́sátìmọ́lé fún gbìgbìyànjú láti pànìyàn

translation.unyo: Awon omokunrin majesin meta ati okunrin eni ogun kan ni won ti mu satimole lori ifurasini fun igbiyanju lati paniyan leyin ti won ri omo odun merindinlogun kan pelu awon oju-ogbe obe ni Somerset.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọkùnrin màjèsín mẹ́ta àti ọkùnrin ẹni ogún kan ni wọ́n ti mú sátìmọ́lé lórí ìfurasínì fún ìgbìyànjú láti pàniyàn lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n rí ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rìndínlógún kan pẹ̀lú àwọn ojú-ọgbẹ́ ọ̀bẹ ní Somerset.

translation.unyo: Omokunrin majesin naa ni won ri pelu ipalara ni agbegbe Excelsior Terrace ti Midsomer Norton, ni bii aago merin Akoko Geesi lojo Abameta.
translation.dcyo: Ọmọkùnrin màjèsín náà ni wọn ri pẹ̀lú ìpalára ní agbègbe Excelsior Terrace ti Midsomer Norton, ní bíi aago mẹ́rin Àkókò Gẹ̀ẹ́sì lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.

translation.unyo: Won gbe e losi ile-iwosan nibiti o gbe wa ni ipo ''ailewu'' kan.
translation.dcyo: Wọ́n gbé e lọsí ilé-ìwòsàn níbití ó gbé wà ní ipò ''àìléwu'' kan.

translation.unyo: Gege bii awon Oloopa Avon ati Somerset se so,eni odun metadinlogun kan,awon eni odun mejidinlogun meji ati okunrin eni ogun odun kan ni won mu satimole ni agbegbe Radstock.
translation.dcyo: Gẹgẹ bíi àwọn Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Avon àti Somerset ṣe sọ,ẹni ọdún mẹ́tadínlógún kan,àwọn ẹni ọdún méjìdínlógún méji àti ọkùnrin ẹni ogún ọdún kan ní wọ́n mú ṣátìmọ́lé ní agbègbe Radstock.

translation.unyo: Awon osise ti rawo ebe si enikeni ti o lee ni igbasile fidio ohun ti o sele sori foonu alaagbeka lati jade wa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ ti rawọ́ ẹ̀bẹ̀ sí ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó leè ní ìgbàsílẹ̀ fídíò ohun tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ sórí fóònù aláàgbéká láti jáde wá.

translation.unyo: Trump sope Kavanaugh 'jiya, iko-irira naa, ibinu naa' ti Egbe Oselu Awon Democrat
translation.dcyo: Trump sọpé Kavanaugh 'jìya, ìkó-ìrira náà, ìbínú náà' ti Ẹgbé Òṣèlú Àwọn Democrat

translation.unyo: Ibo kan fun Adajo Kavanaugh je ibo kan lati ko awon eto agbekale alailaaanu ti o buru ti Egbe Oselu Awon Democrat,'' ni Trump so nibi ipejopo kan ni Wheeling, West Virginia.
translation.dcyo: Ìbò kan fún Adájọ́ Kavanaugh jẹ́ ìbò kan láti kọ àwọn ètò agbékalẹ̀ aláìláàánú tí ó burú ti Ẹgbé Òṣèlú Àwọn Democrat,'' ni Trump sọ níbi ìpéjọpọ̀ kan ní Wheeling, West Virginia.

translation.unyo: Trump sope Kavanaugh ti ''jiya ikoriira naa, ibinu naa'' ti Egbe Oselu Awon Democrat ninu gbogbo igbese ifanikale fun ise re.
translation.dcyo: Trump sọpé Kavanaugh ti ''jìya ìkórìíra náà, ìbínú náà'' ti Ẹgbẹ́ Òṣèlú Àwọn Democrat nínú gbogbo ìgbésẹ̀ ìfanikalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Kavanaugh je eri niwaju Igbimo lojo 'Bo, pelu ipa ati imolara ti o si nse si esun kan lati owo Christine Blasey Ford wipe o kolu oun nitori ibalopo ni awon odun seyin nigbati awon je majesin.
translation.dcyo: Kavanaugh jẹ́ ẹ̀rí niwaju Ìgbìmọ̀ lọ́jọ́ 'Bọ̀, pẹ̀lú ipá àti ìmọ̀lára tí ó sì ńṣẹ́ sí ẹ̀sùn kan láti ọwọ́ Christine Blasey Ford wípé ó kọlu òun nitori ìbálòpọ̀ ní awọn ọdún sẹ́yìn nígbàti àwọn jẹ́ màjèsín.

translation.unyo: Bakannaa ni Ford je eri nibi igbejo nipa esun re.
translation.dcyo: Bákannáà ni Ford jẹ́ ẹ̀rí níbi ìgbẹ́jọ́ nípa ẹ̀sùn rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Aare naa so lojo Abameta pe ''Awon eniyan Amerika ri opolo pipe ati isowodara ati igboya'' ti Kavanaugh lojo yen.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ náà sọ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta pé ''Àwọn eniyan Amẹ́ríkà rí ọpọlọ pípé àti ìsọwọ́dára àti ìgboyà'' ti Kavanaugh lọ́jọ́ yẹn.

translation.unyo: ''Ibo kan lati satileyin fun Adajo Kavanaugh je ibo kan satileyin fun okan ninu awon onimo ofin to saseyori julo ni akoko wa, adajo ti akosile isinru ilu to yanrannti,'' ni o so fun ipejopo awon alatileyin re ni West Virginia.
translation.dcyo: ''Ìbò kan láti ṣàtìlẹ́yìn fún Adájọ́ Kavanaugh jẹ́ ìbò kan ṣàtìlẹ́yìn fún ọ̀kan ninu àwọn onímọ òfin tó ṣàṣeyọrí jùlọ ni àkokó wa, adájọ́ tí àkọsílẹ̀ ìsìnrú ìlú tó yanranntì,'' ní ó sọ fún ìpéjọpọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹ́yìn rẹ̀ ní West Virginia.

translation.unyo: Aare naa fi iyapa kuro lona ti o to tokasi ifanikale fun ise Kavanaugh nigbati o nsoro nipa bi jijade sita awon egbe Republican tise pataki to ninu awon idibo ti aarin-saa.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ náà fi ìyapa kuro lọ́nà tí ó tọ́ tọ́kasí ìfanikalẹ fún iṣẹ́ Kavanaugh nigbati ó ńsọrọ nípa bí jíjáde síta àwọn ẹgbẹ́ Republican tiṣe pàtakì tó ninu àwọn ìdìbò ti ààrin-sáà.

translation.unyo: Ose mefa loku si okan ninu awon idibo tose pataki julo ninu awon akoko igbesi-aye wa.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀sẹ mẹ́fa lókù sí ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ìdìbò tóṣe pàtàkì jùlọ nínú àwọn àkóko ìgbésí-ayé wa.

translation.unyo: Emi ko dije, sugbon Mo ndije nitooto,'' ni o so.
translation.dcyo: Emi ko díje, ṣùgbọn Mo ńdíje nítòótọ́,'' ni ó sọ.

translation.unyo: ''Idi niyi ti Mo fi nlosi ibi gbogbo ti Mo si nja fun awon oludije nla.''
translation.dcyo: ''Ìdí nìyí tí Mo fi ńlọsí ibi gbogbo tí Mo sì ńjà fún àwọn olùdíje ńlá.''

translation.unyo: Trump wi awijare wipe awon omo egbe oselu Democrat wa ninu ilepa lati ''dojukoni ati lati dinilowo.''
translation.dcyo: Trump wí àwíjàre wípé àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Democrat wà nínú ìlépa láti ''dojúkọ̀ni àti láti dínilọ́wọ̀.''

translation.unyo: Ibo oniigbese tose pataki akoko ti yoo waye ninu ile igbimo Asoju-sofin Agba lori ifakale fun ise Kavanaugh ni a reti lati waye nigbati ko gbodo ju ojo Eti lo, ni oluranlowo fun adari agba ti egbe GOP kan so fun CNN.
translation.dcyo: Ìbò oníìgbésẹ̀ tóṣe pàtàkì àkọ́kọ́ tí yóò wáyé nínú ilé ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà lórí ìfàkalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ Kavanaugh ni a réti lati waye nígbàtí kò gbọdọ̀ ju ọjọ́ Ẹtì lọ, ni olùránlọ́wọ́ fún adarí àgbà ti ẹgbẹ́ GOP kan sọ fún CNN.

translation.unyo: Ogo-ogoorun eniyan lo ku nipase ile riri, ikun-omi tsunami ti ile Indonesia, ti a si nrii pe iye naa si nga sii
translation.dcyo: Ọgọ-ọgọ́ọ̀rún eniyan ló kú nípaṣẹ̀ ilẹ̀ rírì, ìkún-omi tsunami ti ilẹ Indonesia, tí a sì ńríi pé iye náà sì ńga síi

translation.unyo: O kere tan eniyan irinwo-dinni-merindinlogun lo ku, opo nisan omi gbe lo bi iji nla ti kolu awon etikun. nigbati ile riri pupo kan ati ikun-omi tsunami kolu erekusu orile-ede Indonesia ti Sulawesi, ni awon alase so lojo Abameta.
translation.dcyo: Ó kéré tán eniyan irinwó-dínní-mẹ́rindínlógún ló kú, ọ̀pọ̀ nísàn omi gbé lọ bí ìjì ńlá ti kọlu àwọn etíkun. nigbati ilẹ̀ rírì púpọ̀ kan àti ìkún-omi tsunami kọlu erékùsù orilẹ-ede Indonesia ti Sulawesi, ni àwọn aláṣẹ sọ lọ́jọ́ Àbamẹ́ta.

translation.unyo: Ogo-ogoorun eniyan niwon tipejo fun ajodun kan ni etikun ti ilu Palu lojo Eti nigbati awon iji okun toga to iwon mita mefa (ese bata 18) fagbara wolule letikun ni aasale, ti won si gba opo lo sinu iku won ti won si pa ohunkohun towa ni ipa ona won.
translation.dcyo: Ọgọ-ọgọ́ọ̀rún eniyan niwọń tipéjọ fun àjọ̀dún kan ní etíkun ti ìlú Palu lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì nigbati àwọn ìjì òkun tóga tó ìwọ̀n mítà mẹ́fà (ẹsẹ̀ bàtà 18) fagbára wólulẹ̀ létíkun ní àásálẹ́, tí wọ́n sì gba ọ̀pọ̀ lọ sínú ikú wọn tí wọ́n sì pa ohunkóhun tówà ní ipa ọ̀nà wọn.

translation.unyo: Ikun-omi tsunami naa tele ile riri oniwon agbara 7.5 kan.
translation.dcyo: Ìkún-omi tsunami náà tẹ̀lé ilẹ̀ rírì oníwọ̀n agbara 7.5 kan.

translation.unyo: ''Nigbati idunkooko tsunami naa dide ni ana, awon eniyan si nse ise won letikun tiwon kosi sa kuro loju-ese ti won si di eniti o farako-aasa,'' ni Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, agbenuso fun ajo to nrisi dindin ewu isele ajalu ku lorile-ede Indonesia BNPB so ninu ifitonileti kan Jarkata.
translation.dcyo: ''Nigbati ìdúnkoòkò tsunami náà dìde ní àná, àwọn eniyan sì ńṣe iṣẹ́ wọn létíkun tíwọn kòsì sá kuro lójú-ẹsẹ̀ tí wọ́n sì di ẹniti o farakó-áásá,'' ni Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, agbẹnusọ fún àjọ tó ńrísí díndín ewu ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù kù lorilẹ-ede Indonesia BNPB sọ nínú ìfitónilétí kan Jarkata.

translation.unyo: Ikun-omi tsunami naa kowa nipa ara re, o wo awon oko ayokele, awon igi, awon ile, o kolu ohun gbogbo lori ile,'' ni Nugroho so, ti o si fikun un pe ikun-omi tsunami naa ti rin irin-ajo koja gbangba okun ni awon iwon isowosare kilomita egbejo ni wakati kan (maili 497 ni wakati kan) ki o to kolu bebe okun.
translation.dcyo: Ìkún-omi tsunami náà kòwá nípa ara rẹ̀, ó wọ́ àwọn ọkọ́ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́, àwọn igi, àwọn ilé, ó kọlu ohun gbogbo lórí ilẹ̀,'' ni Nugroho sọ, tí ó sì fikún un pé ìkún-omi tsunami náà ti rin ìrìn-àjò kọjá gbangba òkun ní àwọn ìwọ̀n ìṣọwọ́sáré kìlómítà ẹgbẹ̀jọ̀ ní wákàtí kan (máìlí 497 ní wákàtí kan) kí ó tó kọlu bèbè òkun.

translation.unyo: Awon eniyan kan gun igi lati sa asala kuro lowo ikun omi tsunami naa ti won si ye, ni o so.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn eniyan kan gun igi láti sá àsálà kuro lọ́wọ́ ìkún omi tsunami náà tí wọ́n sì yè, ni ó sọ.

translation.unyo: Awon eniyan bii egberun metadinlogundin-loodun ni won yara gbelo si awon ibudo ni Palu.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn eniyan bíi ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́tadínlógúndín-lọ́ọ̀dún ni wọn yára gbélọ sí àwọn ibùdó ní Palu.

translation.unyo: Awon foto atokeya ti ajo to nrisi isele ajalu naa gbejade fi opo awon ile ati awon soobu ti o ti baje, awon afara ti o ti wo ti o si wo lule ati mosalasi kan ti omi ti yipo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn fọ́tò àtòkèya tí àjọ tó ńrísí ìṣẹ̀lẹ àjálù náà gbéjáde fi ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ilé àti àwọn sọ́ọ̀bù tí o ti bàjẹ́, àwọn afárá tí ó ti wọ́ tí ó sì wọ́ lulẹ̀ àti mọ́sálásí kan tí omi ti yípo.

translation.unyo: Awon imititi-ile tesiwaju lati maa mu ilu eba okun naa rokeke lojo Abameta.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìmìtìtì-ilẹ̀ tẹ̀síwájú láti máa mú ìlú ẹ̀bá òkun náà rọ́kẹ̀kẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.

translation.unyo: Awon ile riri oni-sise-n-tele naa ni won molara ni agbegbe kan toni milionu meji ati irinwo eniyan.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ilẹ̀ rírì oní-ṣiṣẹ̀-ń-tẹ̀lé náà ní wọ́n mọ̀lára ní agbègbe kan tóní mílíọ̀nù méjí àti irinwó eniyan.

translation.unyo: Ajo to Nse Agbelewon ati Isamulo Imo-ero ti ile Indonesia (BPPT) so ninu gbolohun wipe agbara ti opo ile-riri ojo Eti naa tu sita to bii ilopo igba ti ado-oloro ti won ju sori ilu Hiroshima nigba Ogun Agbaye Keji.
translation.dcyo: Àjọ tó Ńse Àgbéléwọ̀n àti Ìsàmúlò Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ti ilẹ̀ Indonesia (BPPT) sọ ninu gbólóhùn wipe agbára tí ọ̀pọ̀ ilẹ̀-rírì ọjọ́ Ẹtì náà tú síta tó bíi i̇̀lopọ̀ igba ti àdó-olóró tí wọ́n jù sórí ìlú Hiroshima nigba Ogun Àgbáyé Kejì.

translation.unyo: Iseda ori-ile ilu naa, eyiti o jokoo si opin ile towonu okun, gigun kan, lee ti mu iwon ikun-omi tsunami naa gbooro sii, ni o wi.
translation.dcyo: Ìṣẹ̀dá orí-ilẹ̀ ìlú náà, eyiti ó jókòó sí òpin ilẹ̀ tówọnú òkun, gíguǹ kan, leè ti mú ìwọ̀n ìkún-omi tsunami náà gbòòrò síi, ní ó wí.

translation.unyo: Nugroho sapejuwe idibaje naa bii eyiti ''o koja aala'' ti o si sope egbe-egberun awon ile, awon ile-iwosan, awon ile itaja nla ati awon ile-itura niwon ti wo lule.
translation.dcyo: Nugroho ṣàpèjúwe ìdibàjẹ́ náà bíi eyiti ''ó kọjá ààlà'' tí ó sì sọpé ẹgbẹ-ẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn ilé, àwọn ilé-ìwòsàn, àwọn ilé ìtaja ńlá àti àwọn ilé-ìtura niwọ́n ti wó lulẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Awon ago-ara ti awon to farako-aasa niwon ri labe alapa awon ile towo lule, ni o so, ti o si fi kun un pe egbetadinlogota eniyan lo farapa ti okandinlogbon si sonu.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àgọ́-ara ti àwọn tó farakó-áásá niwọ́n rí lábẹ́ àlàpà àwọn ilé tówó lulẹ̀, ní ó sọ, tí ó sì fi kún un pé ẹgbẹ̀tadínlọ́gọ́tá eniyan ló farapa tí ọ̀kaǹdińlọ́gbọ̀n sì ṣọnù.

translation.unyo: Nugroho sope awon to farako aasa ati idibaje naa lee poju bee lo ni awon bebe okun  kilomita 300 (maili 190) ariwa ti Palu, agbegbe kan tiwon npe ni Donggala, eyiti o sunmo aarin gungun agbara ile riri naa.
translation.dcyo: Nugroho sọpé àwọn tó farakó áásá àti ìdibàjẹ́ náà leè pọ̀jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ ní àwọn bèbè òkun  kílòmìtà 300 (máìlì 190) àríwá ti Palu, agbègbe kan tíwọn ńpè ní Donggala, eyiti ó súnmọ́ ààrin gungun agbára ilẹ̀ rírì náà.

translation.unyo: Awon ikansira-eni ni ''di aro alailese patapata laisi iroyin kankan'' lati Donggala, ni Nugroho so.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìkànsíra-ẹni ni ''di àrọ aláìlẹ́sẹ̀ pátápátá láìsì ìròyìn kankan'' láti Donggala, ni Nugroho sọ.

translation.unyo: O le ni egberun lona oodun awon eniyan to ngbe nibe, ni Egbe Alaagbeleebu Pupa so ninu gbolohun kan, ti won si fi kun un pe awon osise won ati awon to yonda ara won fun ise niwon ti nlo si awon agbegbe ti isele naa ti waye.
translation.dcyo: Ó lé ni ẹgbẹ̀run lọ́nà ọ̀ọ́dún àwọn eniyan tó ńgbé níbẹ̀, ni Ẹgbẹ́ Aláàgbéléèbú Pupa sọ ninu gbólóhùn kan, tí wọn sì fi kún un pe àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ wọn àti awọn tó yọ̀ǹda ara wọn fún iṣẹ́ niwọ́n ti ńlọ sí àwọn agbègbe tí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà ti wáyé.

translation.unyo: ''Eyi ti di isele ajalu buburu kan, sugbon o lee tun buru siwaju sii,'' ni o wi.
translation.dcyo: ''Èyí ti di ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù buburú kan, ṣùgbọ́n o leè tún burú síwájú síi,'' ni o wí.

translation.unyo: Ajo naa ni opo bu enu ate lu lojo Abameta nitoripe ko fito awon eniyan leti pe ikun-omi tsunami ti kolu Palu, botilejepe awon osise sope awon iji okun ti de laarin akoko naa ti won se agbejade ikilo naa.
translation.dcyo: Àjọ náà ni ọ̀pọ̀ bu ẹnu àtẹ́ lù lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta nitoripe kò fitó àwọn eniyan létí pe ìkún-omi tsunami ti kọlu Palu, botilẹjẹpe àwọn òṣiṣẹ́ sọpé àwọn ìjì òkun ti dé láàrin àkókò náà tí wọ́n ṣe àgbéjáde ìkìlọ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Ninu aworan fidio ti kii se ti akosemose tiwon pin lori oju-opo ibasepo ti ayelujara ni eniyan ti lee gbo ti okunrin kan towa ni aja oke ile kan ti npariwo ikilo nipa ti ikun-omi tsunami to nbo si awon eniyan towa ni opopona nisale.
translation.dcyo: Nínú àwòrán fídíò tí kìí ṣe ti akọṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ tíwọn pín lórì ojú-òpò ìbáṣepọ̀ ti ayelujara ni eniyan ti leè gbọ́ ti ọkùnrin kan tówà ní àjà òkè ilé kan ti ńpariwo ìkìlọ̀ nípa ti ìkún-omi tsunami tó ńbọ̀ sí àwọn eniyan tówà ní òpópóna nísàlẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Laarin awon iseju ogiri omi kan wo si bebe okun naa, ti o si ngbe awon ile ati awon oko ayokele lo.
translation.dcyo: Láàrin àwọn ìṣẹ́jú ògiri omi kan wó sí bèbè òkun náà, tí ó sì ńgbé àwọn ilé àti àwọn ọkọ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ lọ.

translation.unyo: Reuters ko lee fi idi aworan fidio naa mule loju-ese wipe o je otito.
translation.dcyo: Reuters kò leè fi ìdí àwòrán fídíò náà múlẹ̀ lójú-ẹṣẹ̀ wípé ó jẹ òtítọ́.

translation.unyo: Ile riri ati ikun-omi tsunami se okunfa aisi ina manamana eyiti o ge awon okun ikansi-ara-eni ni ayika ilu Palu ti o si jeki o soro fun awon alase lati dari awon igbiyanju fun idoola-emi awon eniyan.
translation.dcyo: Ilẹ̀ rírì àti ìkún-omi tsunami ṣe okùnfà àìsí iná mànàmáná eyiti ó gé àwọn okùn ìkànsí-ara-ẹni ní àyíká ìlú Palu tí ó sì jẹ́kí ó ṣòro fun àwọn aláṣẹ lati darí àwọn igbiyanju fún ìdóòlà-ẹ̀mí àwọn eniyan.

translation.unyo: Awon ologun ti bere si fi awon oko ofurufu akeru ranse pelu iranwo lati Jarkata ati awon ilu miran, ni awon alase so, sugbon awon eniyan tiwon sare gbe kuro nibi isele naa si nilo ounje ati awon ohun toje dandan miran.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ológun ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí fi àwọn ọkọ̀ òfurufú akẹ́rù ránṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ìrànwọ́ lati Jarkata àti àwọn ìlú miran, ni àwọn aláṣẹ sọ, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn eniyan tíwọn sáré gbé kúro níbí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà sì nílò oúnjẹ àti àwọn ohun tójẹ́ dandan miran.

translation.unyo: Ibudoko oko ofurufu ti ilu naa ni won ti tun si pada fun awon ise itura nikan ti yoo si wa ni titipa titi di osu Owara.
translation.dcyo: Ibùdókọ̀ ọkọ̀ òfurufú ti ìlu náà ni wọ́n ti tún sí padà fún àwọn iṣẹ́ ìtura nìkan tí yóò sì wà ní títìpa títí di oṣù Ọ̀wàrà.

translation.unyo: Aare Joko Widodo ni won ti saato re lati sabewo si awon ibudo ti awon tiwon gbe kuro nibi isele naa lojo Aiku.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ Joko Widodo ni wọ́n ti ṣààtò rẹ̀ láti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí àwọn ibùdó tí àwọn tíwọn gbé kuro níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà lọ́jọ́ Àìkú.

translation.unyo: Iye eniyan toku ninu Ikun-omi Tsunami ti Indonesia ti fo soke ju egberin lo
translation.dcyo: Iye eniyan tóku nínu Ìkún-omi Tsunami ti Indonesia ti fò sòke ju ẹ̣gbẹ̀rin lọ

translation.unyo: O buru pupo
translation.dcyo: Ó burú púpọ̀

translation.unyo: Nigbati awon osise World Vision lati Donggala ti de ilu Palu lalaafia, nibiti awon abanisise ti ngbe ninu awon ago oni-tapooli ti won se atopo re ninu ogba ofiisi won, won gba awon ibi isele ajalu naa koja loju ona, ni Ogbeni Doseba so.
translation.dcyo: Nigbati àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ World Vision láti Donggala ti dé ìlú Palu lálàáfía, níbití àwọn abániṣiṣẹ́ tí ńgbé nínú àwọn àgọ́ oní-tapóólì tí wọn ṣe àtòpọ̀ rẹ̀ ninu ọgbà ọ́fíìsì wọn, wọ́n gba àwọn ibi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù náà kọjá lójú ọ̀nà, ni Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Doseba sọ.

translation.unyo: ''Won so funmi wipe awon ri opolopo awon ile ti won ti parun, ni o wi.
translation.dcyo: ''Wọ́n sọ fuńmi wipe àwọn rí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ilé tí wọn ti parun, ni ó wí.

translation.unyo: O buru pupo ju.
translation.dcyo: Ó burú púpọ̀ ju.

translation.unyo: Ani bi awon egbe oniranlowo ti bere awon irin aisinmi fun bibere awon igbese lati pese itura fun ajalu, awon kan fesun kan pe won dina mo awon onise iranwo lati ile-okeere lati mase rin irin-ajo si Palu.
translation.dcyo: Àní bí àwọn ẹgbẹ́ onírànlọ́wọ́ ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn ìrìn àìsinmi fún bíbẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ láti pèsè ìtura fún àjálù, àwọn kan fẹ̀sùn kan pé wọ́n dínà mọ́ àwọn oníṣẹ́ ìrànwọ́ láti ilẹ̀-òkèèrè láti máṣe rin ìrìn-àjò sí Palu.

translation.unyo: Gegebi awon ofin ile Indonesia ti wi, fifunnilowo, awon ipese ati fifunnilosise lati oke-okun lee bere si wole nikan bi won ba kede ibi isele kan bii agbegbe isele ajalu ti orile-ede.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn òfin ilẹ̀ Indonesia ti wí, fífúnnilówó, àwọn ìpèsè àti fífúnnilóṣìṣẹ́ láti òkè-òkun leè bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí wọlé nìkan bí wọ́n bá kéde ibi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kan bíi agbègbè ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù ti orilẹ-ede.

translation.unyo: Sibe eyi ko tii sele.
translation.dcyo: Síbẹ̀ èyí kò tìí ṣẹlẹ̀.

translation.unyo: ''O si je isele ajalu onipele ti ekun kan sibe,'' ni Aulia Arriani, agbenuso kan fun Egbe Alaagbeleebu Pupa ti Indonesia ni o so bee.
translation.dcyo: ''Ó sí jẹ́ ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù onípele tí ẹkùn kan síbẹ̀,'' ni Aulia Arriani, agbẹnusọ kan fún Ẹgbẹ́ Aláàgbéléèbú Pupa ti Indonesia ni o so bẹẹ̣.

translation.unyo: ''Ni kete ti ijoba ba sope, ''O dara, eyi je iselu ajalu ti orile-ede kan,'' a lee silekun sile fun iranwo agbaye sugbon ko tii si iru ipo yen sibe.
translation.dcyo: ''Ní kété tí ìjọba bá sọpé, ''Ó dára, èyí jẹ́ ìṣẹ̀lù àjálù ti orilẹ-ede kan,'' a leè sílẹ̀kùn sílẹ̀ fún ìrànwọ́ àgbáyé ṣùgbọ́n kò tìí sí irú ipò yẹn síbẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Bi ale ojo keji  ti nle ni Palu leyin ile riri ati ikun-omi tsunami ti ojo Eti, awon ore ati idile awon ti  o sonu si nni ireti wipe awon olufe won yoo je awon ise iyanu naa ti o lee wu akara awon ila itan alainireti ti awon isele ajalu atorunwa naa.
translation.dcyo: Bí alẹ́ ọjọ́ kejì  ti ńlẹ́ ní Palu lẹ́yìn ilẹ̀ rírì àti ìkún-omi tsunami ti ọjọ́ Ẹtì, àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ ati ìdílé àwọn tí  ó ṣọnù sì ńní ìrèti wipe àwọn olùfẹ́ wọn yóò jẹ́ àwọn iṣẹ́ ìyanu náà tí ó leè wú àkàrà àwọn ìlà ìtàn aláìnírètí ti àwọn iṣ̵ẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù àtọ̀runwá náà.

translation.unyo: Lojo Abameta, won fa omokunrin kekere kan yo jade lati inu egboro to ngbe igbonse kan.
translation.dcyo: Lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, wọ́n fa ọmọkùnrin kékeré kan yọ jáde láti inú egboro tó ńgbé ìgbọ̀nṣẹ̀ kan.

translation.unyo: Lojo Aiku, awon adoola-emi yo obinrin kan ti ogiri alapa ti mu mole sabe fun ojo meji pelu ago-ara iya re leegbe re
translation.dcyo: Lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, àwọn adóòlà-ẹ̀mí yọ obìnrin kan ti ògiri àlàpà ti mú mọ́lẹ̀ sábẹ́ fún ọjọ́ méjì pẹ̀lú àgọ́-ara ìyá rẹ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀gbẹ́ rẹ̀

translation.unyo: Gendon Subandono, akonilekoo ti awon iko to nlo apo-alategun lori omi ti orile-ede Indonesia, ti ko meji ninu awon to nlo apo-alategun naa to sonu fun Awon Idije Asia, eyiti won pari ni ibere osu yii ni Indonesia.
translation.dcyo: Gendon Subandono, akọ́nilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ti àwọn ikọ̀ tó ńlo àpò-alátẹ́gùn lórí omi ti orilẹ-ede Indonesia, ti kọ́ méjì ninu awọn tó ńlo àpò-alátẹgùn náà tó ṣọnù fún Àwọn Ìdíje Asia, eyiti wọ́n parí ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ oṣù yìí ní Indonesia.

translation.unyo: Awon miran ninu awon to boha sinu Ile Itura Roa Roa, ti Ogbeni Mandagi wa ninu won, je awon akekoo re.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn miran ninu àwọn tó bọ́há sínú Ilé Ìtura Roa Roa, tí Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Mandagi wà ninu wọn, jé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: o wipe ''Gegebi oga kan ninu ise lilo apo alategun lori omi, Mo ni eru imolara temi''.
translation.dcyo: ó wipe ''Gẹ́gẹ́bí ọ̀gá kan nínú iṣẹ́ lílo àpò alátẹ́gùn lórí omi, Mo ní ẹrù ìmọ̀lára tèmi''́.

translation.unyo: Ogbeni Gendon tun so bi, ninu awon wakati leyin ti iroyin iwolule Ile Itura Roa Roa tan kale laarin awujo awon to nlo apo alategun lori omi, oun ti sare ran awon ateranse WhatsApp si awon oludije Palu, ti won nkopa ninu ajodun etikun naa.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Gendon tún sọ bí, ninu àwọn wákàtí lẹ́yìn ti ìròyìn ìwólulẹ̀ Ilé Ìtura Roa Roa tàn kalẹ̀ láàrin àwùjọ àwọn tó ńlo àpò alátẹ́gùn lórí omi, òun ti sáré rán àwọn àtẹ̀ránṣẹ́ WhatsApp sí àwọn olùdíje Palu, tí wọ́n ńkópa ninu àjọ̀dún etíkun náà.

translation.unyo: Botilejepe, awon ifiranse re, kan yorisi ami isami alawo eeru kan, dipo awon isami alawo aro onibeji kan.
translation.dcyo: Botilẹjepe, àwọn ìfiránṣẹ́ rẹ̀, kàn yọrísí àmì ìṣàmi aláwọ̀ eérú kan, dípò àwọn ìṣàmì aláwọ̀ aró oníbejì kan.

translation.unyo: Mo rope iyen tumosi pe awon ifiranse naa ni won ko fi jise,'' ni o so.
translation.dcyo: Mó ròpé ìyẹn túmọ̀sí pé àwọn ìfirańṣẹ́ náà ni wọn kò fi jíṣẹ́,'' ni ó sọ.

translation.unyo: Awon ole gba egberun lona merindinlogbon ati egberindinlaaadota dola nibiti won ti nkowosi inu ero powo-powo ATM ni Newport lori Levee
translation.dcyo: Àwọn olè gba ẹgbẹ́rùn lọ́nà mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ̀n àti ẹgbẹ̀rindínláàádọ́ta dọ́là níbití wọ́n ti ńkówósí inú ẹ̀rọ pọwọ́-pọwọ́ ATM ní Newport lórí Levee

translation.unyo: Awon ole ni owuro ojo Eti gba egberun lona merindinlogbon ati egberindinlaaadota dola lowo osise Brink kan to nkowo sinu ero powo-powo ATM ni Newport lori Levee, gegebi agbejade iroyin kan lati Eka Ile ise Oloopa Newport.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn olè ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ẹti gba ẹgbẹ́rùn lọ́nà mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ̀n àti ẹgbẹ̀rindínláàádọ́ta dọ́là lọ́wọ́ òṣìṣẹ́ Brink kan tó ńkówó sínú ẹ̀rọ pọwó-pọwó ATM ní Newport lórí Levee, gẹ́gẹ́bí àgbéjáde ìròyìn kan láti Ẹ̀ka Ilé iṣẹ́ Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Newport.

translation.unyo: Awako oko ayokele naa ti njeki ero powo-powo naa sofo ninu ile idanilaraya nla naa ti o si ngbaradi lati ko owo pupo sii, ni Otelemuye Dennis McCarthy ko sinu agbejade naa.
translation.dcyo: Awạko ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ náà ti ńjẹ́kí ẹ̀rọ pọwó-pọwó náà sófo ninu ilé ìdánilárayá ńlá náà tí ó sì ńgbaradì láti kó owó púpọ̀ síi, ni Ọ̀tẹlẹ̀múyẹ Dennis McCarthy kọ sínú àgbéjáde náà.

translation.unyo: Nibiti owo re ti kun fun ise, okunrin miran ''sare goke lati eyin osise Brink naa'' ti o si ji apo owo kan ti o wa fun ifijise gbe.
translation.dcyo: Níbití ọwọ́ rẹ̀ ti kún fún iṣẹ́, ọkùnrin miran ''sáré gòkè láti ẹ̀yìn òṣìṣẹ́ Brink náà'' tí ó sì jí àpò owó kan tí ó wà fún ìfijíṣẹ́ gbé.

translation.unyo: Awon eleeri ri opolopo awon afurasi tiwon nsa kuro nibi isele naa, gegebi agbejade naa, sugbon awon oloopa ko soni pato iye awon tiwon kopa ninu isele naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ẹlẹ́ẹ̀rí rí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn afurasí tíwọn ńsá kúrò níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà, gẹ́gẹ́bí àgbéjadé náà, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá kò sọní pàtó iye àwọn tíwọ́n kópa ninu ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Enikeni ti o bani iwifunni nipa awon idanimo won ki o kan si awon oloopa Newport ni 859-292-3680.
translation.dcyo: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bání ìwífúnni nípa àwọn ìdánimọ̀ wọn kí ó kàn sí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá Newport ní 859-292-3680.

translation.unyo: Kanye West: Akorinbieniti-nsoro yi oruko re pada si Ye
translation.dcyo: Kanye West: Akọrinbíẹnití-ńsọ̀rọ̀ yí orúkọ rẹ̀ padá sí Ye

translation.unyo: Akorinbieniti-nsoro Kanye West nyi oruko re pada - si Ye.
translation.dcyo: Akọrinbíẹnití-ńsọ̀rọ̀ Kanye West ńyí orúkọ rẹ̀ padà - sí Ye.

translation.unyo: Boti nkede iyipada naa lori Twitter lojo Abameta, o kowe: ''Eni naa ti a mo tele nipa ti ise bii Kanye West.''
translation.dcyo: Bóti ńkéde ìyípadà náà lórí Twitter lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, ó kọ̀wé: ''Ẹni náà tí a mọ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ nípa ti iṣẹ́ bíi Kanye West.''

translation.unyo: West, eni odun merinlelogoji, ni won ti so ni oruko inagije Ye fun awon akoko kan ti o si lo oruko apeje naa bii akole fun awo orin ikejo re, eyiti o gbejade ninu osu Okudu.
translation.dcyo: West, ẹni ọdún mẹ́rinlélógójì, ni wọ́n ti sọ ní orúkọ ìnagijẹ Ye fún àwọn àkókò kan tí ó sì lo orúkọ àpèjẹ́ náà bíi àkọlé fún àwo orin ìkẹjọ rẹ̀, eyiti ó gbéjáde ninu oṣù Òkúdu.

translation.unyo: Ayipada naa waye saaju ifarahan re lori Saturday Night Live, nibiti won ti nreti re lati fi awo orin re tuntun Yandhi lole.
