translation.dcyo: Àyípadà náà wáyé saájú ìfarahàn rẹ̀ lórí Saturday Night Live, níbití wọ́n ti ńreti rẹ̀ láti fi àwo orin rẹ̀ tuntun Yandhi lọ́lẹ̀.

translation.unyo: O nropo akorin Ariana Grande lori eto naa eniti o fagile e fun ''awon idi imolara,'' ni aseda eto naa so.
translation.dcyo: Ó ńrọ́pò akọrin Ariana Grande lórí ètò náà ẹniti ó fagilé e fún ''àwọn ìdí ìmọ̀lára,'' ni aṣẹ̀dá ètò náà sọ.

translation.unyo: Pelu wipe o je ikekuru ti oruko akosemose re to nlo lowolowo, West ti so saaju wipe oro naa  ni isepataki nipa ti esin fun oun
translation.dcyo: Pẹ̀lú wípé ó jẹ́ ìkékúrú ti orúkọ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ rẹ̀ tó ńlò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́, West ti sọ saájú wípé ọ̀rọ̀ náà  ní ìṣepàtàkì nípa ti ẹsìn fún òun

translation.unyo: ''Mo gbagbo pe 'ye' ni oro naa ti a lo ti o wopo julo ninu Bibeli, atipe ninu Bibeli o tumo si 'iwo,''' ni West so ni ibere odun yii, nigbati o nsoro nipa akole awo orin re pelu olugbalejo redio Big Boy.
translation.dcyo: ''Mo gbàgbọ́ pe 'ye' ni ọ̀rọ̀ náà tí́ a lò tí o ́wọ́pò jùlọ nínú Bíbélì, àtipé nínú Bíbélì ó túmọ̀ sí 'ìwọ,''' ni West sọ ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọdún yìí, nígbàtí ó ńsọ̀rọ̀ nípa àkọlé àwo orin rè pẹ̀lú olùgbàlejò rédíò Big Boy.

translation.unyo: ''Nitorinaa Emi ni iwo, Emi ni awa, ohun ni awa.
translation.dcyo: ''Nítorínáà Èmi ni ìwọ, Èmi ni àwa, òhun ni àwa.

translation.unyo: O lo lati Kanye, ti o tumo si okan soso naa, si Ye nikan - nikan je aworan ti ire wa, ti iporuuru  wa, ohun gbogbo.
translation.dcyo: Ó lọ láti Kanye, tí ó túmọ̀ sí ọ̀kan ṣoṣo náà, sí Ye nìkan - nìkan jẹ́ àwòrán ti ire wa, ti ìpòrúùru  wa, ohun gbogbo.

translation.unyo: Awo orin naa lopolopo je aworan eniti a je.''
translation.dcyo: Àwo orin náà lọ́pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ jẹ́ àwòrán ẹnití a jẹ́.''

translation.unyo: O je okan ninu onka awon akorinbieniti-nsoro to yi oruko won pada.
translation.dcyo: Ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú òǹka àwọn akọrinbíẹnití-ńsọ̀rọ̀ tó yí orúkọ wọn padà.

translation.unyo: Sean Combs ni won ti mo lorisirisi ona bii Puff Daddy, P. Diddy tabi Diddy, sugbon lodun yii kede ife toga julo re fun awon oruko Love and Brother Love.
translation.dcyo: Sean Combs ni wọń ti mọ lóríṣiríṣi ọ̀nà bíi Puff Daddy, P. Diddy tàbí Diddy, ṣùgbọn lọ́dún yìí kéde ìfẹ́ tóga jùlọ rẹ̀ fún àwọn orúkọ Love and Brother Love.

translation.unyo: Abanisajosepo West kan teleri, JAY-Z, bakannaa ti se nnkan ri pelu tabi laisi ami idanuduro laarin awon oro kan ati awon alifabeeti nla.
translation.dcyo: Abániṣàjọṣepọ̀ West kan tẹ́lẹ̀rí, JAY-Z, bákannáà ti ṣe nǹkan rí pẹ̀lú tàbi láìsí àmì ìdánudúró láàrin àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ kan àti àwọn álífábẹ̵́ẹ̀tì ńlá.

translation.unyo: AMLO ti Mesiko je eje lati mase lo awon omo ogun lodi si awon ara ilu.
translation.dcyo: AMLO ti Mẹ́ṣíkò jẹ́ ẹ̀jẹ̵́ láti máṣe lo àwọn ọmọ ogun lòdì sí àwọn ara ìlú.

translation.unyo: Aare-tiwonsese-diboyan ti orile-ede Mesiko Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador ti je eje lati mase lo awon omo ogun lodi si awon ara ilu lailai bi orile-ede naa ti nsunmo ayeye ajodun aadota ti igbesan odi si awon akekoo kan ninu eyiti eje ti san.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ-tíwọnṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀-dìbòyàn ti orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador ti jẹ́ ẹ̀jẹ́ láti máṣe lo àwọn ọmọ ogun lòdì sí àwọn ara ìlú láíláí bí orilẹ-ede náà ti ńsúnmọ́ ayẹyẹ àjọ̀dún àádọ́tá ti ìgbẹ̀san òdì sí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan nínú eyiti ẹ̀jẹ̀ ti sàn.

translation.unyo: Lopez Obrador se ileri lojo Abameta ni Gbagede Tlatelolco lati ''mase lo awon omo ogun fun ifipate-ori awon eniyan Mesiko naa ba.''
translation.dcyo: Lopez Obrador ṣe ìlérí lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹta nì Gbàgede Tlatelolco láti ''máṣe lo àwọn ọmọ ogun fún ìfipatẹ-orí àwọn eniyan Mẹ́ṣíkò náà ba.''

translation.unyo: Awon omo ogun yinbon lu iwode alalaafia kan ni gbagede naa lojo keji osu Owara, lodun 1968, tiwon si pa opo ti o to bii oodurun eniyan ni akoko kan ti awon egbe akekoo oselu olowo-osi nfi gbongbo mule jake-jado ile Latini Amerika.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ ogun yìnbọn lu ìwọ́de alálàáfíà kan ni gbàgede náà lọ́jọ́ kejì oṣù Ọ̀wàrà, lọ́dún 1968, tíwọ́n sì pa ọ̀pọ̀ tí ó tó bíi ọ̀ọ́dúrun ènìyàn ní àkókò kan tí àwọn ẹgbẹ́ àkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ òṣèlú ọlọ́wọ́-òsì ńfi gbòǹgbò múlẹ̀ jákè-jádò ilẹ̀ Látìnì Amẹ́ríkà.

translation.unyo: Lopez Obrador ti je eje lati satileyin fun awon odo orile-ede Mesiko nipa fifun awon to nkekoo ni owo irorun oloosoosu ati sisi awon ile eko yunifasiti oloofe ti ara ilu die sii.
translation.dcyo: Lopez Obrador ti jẹ́ ẹ̀jẹ́ láti ṣàtìlẹ́yîn fun àwọn ọ̀dọ́ orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò nípa fífún àwọn tó ńkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní owó ìrọ̀rùn olóoṣooṣù àti sísí àwọn ilẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ yunifásitì ọlọ́ọ̀fẹ́ ti ara ìlú díẹ̵̀ síi.

translation.unyo: O ti sope airisese ati aisi awon anfaani eto-eko  nfa awon odo wonu awon egbe odaran.
translation.dcyo: O tí sọpé àìríṣẹ́ṣe àti àìsí àwọn àǹfààní ètò-ẹ̀kọ́  ńfa àwọn ọ̀dọ́ wọnú àwọn ẹgbẹ́ ọ̀daràn.

translation.unyo: Orile-ede U.S. nilati so ifunnilowo ti A.I di ilopomeji
translation.dcyo: Orilẹ-ede U.S. níláti sọ ìfúnnilówó ti A.I di ìlọ́poméjì

translation.unyo: Oludoko-owo ati osise AI kan, Kai-Fu Lee, eniti o ti sise fun Google, Microsoft ati Apple ti so wipe bi orile-ede Saina ti nsise takutakun ninu opolo atowoda, orile-ede U.S nilati so iye owo ti o nna lori iwaadi ninu eka imo naa di ilopo meji.
translation.dcyo: Olùdóko-òwò àti òṣìṣẹ́ AI kan, Kai-Fu Lee, ẹniti ó ti ṣiṣẹ́ fún Google, Microsoft àti Apple tí sọ wipe bí orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ti ǹṣíṣẹ́ tákútákún ninu ọpọlọ àtọwọ́dá, orilẹ-ede U.S níláti sọ iye owó tí ó ńná lórí ìwáàdí ninu ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀ náà di ìlọ́po méjì.

translation.unyo: Awon oro naa jade leyin ti orisirisi awon eka ijoba orile-ede U.S. tise awon ikede AI, ani bii orile-ede U.S. lona gbogbo tise alaini ona agbekale fun atise AI.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọ̀rọ náà jáde lẹ́yìn tí oríṣiríṣi àwọn ẹ̀ka ìjọba orilẹ-ede U.S. tiṣe àwọn ìkéde AI, àní bíi orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́nà gbogbo tisẹ aláìní ọ̀nà àgbékalẹ̀ fun àtiṣe AI.

translation.unyo: Ewe, orile-ede Saina ti safihan agbekale eto re lodun to koja: o nlepa lati wani ipo ikinni ninu ogbon isagbejade AI ki o to di odun 2030.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, orilẹ-ede Ṣáìnà ti ṣàfihàn àgbékalẹ̀ ètò rẹ̀ lọ́dún tó kọjá: ó ńlépa láti wàní ipò ìkínní nínú ọgbọ́n ìṣàgbéjáde AI kí ó tó di ọdún 2030.

translation.unyo: Lee tunbo so wipe ''Siso owo ti a nya soto fun iwaadi AI di ilopomeji yoo je ibere rere kan, pelu wipe awon orile-ede miran wa lona tojinna pupo leyin orile-ede U.S., ti awa si nfoju soju sona fun aluyo tokan ninu AI.
translation.dcyo: Lee tunb́o ̣so wipẹ ''Sísọ owò tí a ńyà ṣọ́tọ̀ fún ìwáàdí AI di ìlọ́pòméjì yóò jẹ́ ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ rere kan, pẹ̀lú wipe àwọn orilẹ-ede miran wà lọ́nà tójìnnà púpọ̀ lẹ́yìn orilẹ-ede U.S., tí àwá sì ńfojú sójú sọ́nà fún àlùyọ tókan ninu AI.

translation.unyo: Siso ifunnilowo di ilopomeji lee so awon isowoseese naa di meji lati rii pe aseyori AI titobi tokan ni yoo di sise ni orile-ede U.S., gege bii Lee se so fun CNBC ninu iforowanilenuwo kan lose yii.
translation.dcyo: Sísọ ìfúnnilówó dí ìlọ́poméjì leè sọ àwọn ìṣọwọṣéeṣe náà di méjì láti ríi pé àṣeyọrí AI títóbi tókàn ní yóò di ṣíṣe ní orilẹ-ede U.S., gẹgẹ bíi Lee ṣe sọ fún CNBC ninu ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò kan lọ̣́̀sẹ́ yìí.

translation.unyo: Lee, eniti iwe re ''AI Superpowers”: Orile-ede Saina, Afonifoji Silikon ati Aato Aye Tuntun'' ni won sagbejade losu yii lati owo Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, toje Oludari Awon Idokoowo Sinovation, eyiti o ti dokoowo ninu okan ninu awon ile ise AI to gbaju-gbaja ni orile-ede Saina, Face++.
translation.dcyo: Lee, ẹnití ìwé rẹ̀ ''AI Superpowers”: Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà, Àfonífojì Silikọn ati Ààtò Ayé Tuntun'' ni wọ̀n ṣàgbéjáde lóṣù yìí láti ọwọ́ Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, tójẹ́ Olùdarí Àwọn Ìdókòòwò Sinovation, eyiti ó ti dókòòwò ninu ọ̀kan ninu àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ AI tó gbajú-gbajà ní orilẹ-ede Ṣáìnà, Face++.

translation.unyo: Ni awon odun 1980 si 1989 ni Yunifasiti Carnegie Mellon o sise lori ilana eto amulosise kan eyiti o tayo ti elere Othelo ti Amerika towa loke julo, atipe leyin naa o di alase ti Iwaadi Microsoft ati aare ti eka Google ni orile-ede Saina.
translation.dcyo: Ní àwọn ọdún 1980 sí 1989 ní Yunifásítì Carnegie Mellon ó ṣiṣẹ́ lórí ìlànà ètò àmúlòṣiṣẹ́ kan eyiti ó tayọ ti elére Othelo ti Amẹ́ríkà tówà lókè jùlọ, àtipé lẹ́yìn náà ó di aláṣẹ ti Ìwáàdí Microsoft àti ààrẹ ti ẹ̀ka Google ní orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà.

translation.unyo: Lee se idanimo awon idije imo-ero ti ijoba orile-ede U.S. bii Ipenija ti Awon Ero Alaadasise ti Ajo Awon Ise Akanse Iwaadi Tojinle nipa aabo ti o si beere igbati omiran tokan jade, lati lee se iranwo dida awon eniyan oniran mo.
translation.dcyo: Lee ṣe ìdánimọ àwọn ìdíje ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ti ìjọba orilẹ-ede U.S. bíi Ìpèníjà ti Àwọn Ẹ̀rọ Aláàdáṣiṣẹ́ ti Àjọ Àwọn Ìṣẹ́ Àkànṣe Ìwáàdí Tójinlẹ̀ nípa ààbò tí ó sì bèèrè igbati òmíràn tókàn jáde, láti leè ṣe ìrànwọ dídá àwọn eniyan oníran mọ̀.

translation.unyo: Awon oni-iwaadi ni orile-ede U.S. lopo igba nilati sise takun-takun lati lee ri awon owo ijoba gba, ni Lee so.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn oní-ìwáàdí ní orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà níláti ṣiṣẹ́ takun-takun láti leè rí àwọn owó ìjọba gbà, ni Lee sọ.

translation.unyo: Lee tun so wipe ''Ki i se orile-ede Saina lo nko awon adari ninu eko lo; bikose wipe awon ile ise nla''.
translation.dcyo: Lee tun so wipe ''Kì í ṣe orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ló ńkó àwọn adarí ninu ẹ̀kọ́ lọ; bíkoṣe wipe àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ nla''.

translation.unyo: Facebook, Google ati awon ile ise imo-ero miran ti gba awon ilumooka sise lati awon yunifasiti ki won lee sise lori AI ni awon odun aipe.
translation.dcyo: Facebook, Google àti àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ miran ti gba àwọn ìlúmọ̀ọ́ká ṣiṣẹ́ láti àwọn yunifásitì kí wọn leè ṣiṣẹ́ lórí AI ní àwọn ọdún àìpẹ́.

translation.unyo: Lee sope awon iyipada ninu ilana lori ijade ati iwole awon alejo bakannaa lee ran orile-ede U.S. lowo lati mu igbega ba awon ipa re lori AI.
translation.dcyo: Lee sọpé àwọn ìyípadà ninu ìlàna lórí ìjáde àti ìwọlé àwọn àlejò bákannáà leè ran orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́wọ́ láti mú ìgbéga bá àwọn ipá rẹ̀ lórí AI.

translation.unyo: ''Mo lero wipe won nilati maa fun awon to kekoo gboye PhD ninu AI ni awon kaadi iwe igbe-ilu alawo ewe laisi tabi-sugbon, ni o so.
translation.dcyo: ''Mo lérò wípé wọ́n nílatí máa fún àwọn tó kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ gboyè PhD ninu AI ni àwọn káàdi ìwé ìgbé-ìlú aláwọ̀ ewé láìsí tàbí-ṣùgbọ́n, ni ó sọ.

translation.unyo: Igbimo Orile-ede Saina sagbejade Agbekale Eto Idagbasoke Opolo Atowoda ti Iran Tokan ninu osu Agemo lodun 2017.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbìmọ̀ Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ṣàgbéjáde Àgbékalẹ Ètò Ìdàgbàsókè Ọpọlọ Àtọwọ́dá ti Ìran Tókàn nínú oṣù Agẹmọ lọ́dún 2017.

translation.unyo: Ajo Imo Sayensi fun Nnkan Atorunwa ti Orile-ede Saina npese owo fun awon eniyan ni awon ile eko ni ona to farajo bi Ajo Imo Sayensi ti Orile-ede ati awon ajo miran se nfun awon onise-iwaadi orile-ede U.S., sugbon isowodara ise ikekoo wa nile lorile-ede Saina, gege bii Lee se so.
translation.dcyo: Àjọ Ìmọ̀ Sáyẹ́ńsì fún Nǹkan Àtọ̀runwá ti Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ńpèsè owó fún àwọn eniyan ní àwọn ilé ẹ̀kọ́ ní ọ̀nà tó farajọ bí Àjọ Ìmọ̀ Sáyẹ́ńsì ti Orilẹ-ede àti àwọn àjọ miran ṣe ńfún àwọn oníṣẹ́-ìwáàdí orilẹ-ede U.S., ṣùgbọ́n ìṣọwọ́dára iṣẹ́ ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wá nílẹ̀ lorilẹ-ede Ṣáínà, gẹgẹ bíi Lee ṣe sọ.

translation.unyo: Nibere odun yii orile-ede U.S. Eka ti Aabo se idasile Ibudo Opolo Atowoda Alajoni kan, eyiti to ni awon alajosisepo lati ile ise ati ile eko ninu, ti Ile Ijoba Funfun si kede iseda Igbimo Asayan lori Opolo Atowoda kan.
translation.dcyo: Níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọdún yìí orilẹ-ede U.S. Ẹ̀ka ti Ààbò ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ Ibùdó Ọpọlọ Àtọwọdá Alájọni kan, eyiti tó ní àwọn alájọ́ṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ láti ilé iṣẹ́ àti ilé ẹ̀kọ́ nínú, ti Ilé Ìjọba Funfun sì kéde ìṣẹ̀dá Ìgbìmọ̀ Àsàyàn lórí Ọpọlọ Àtọwọ́dá kan.

translation.unyo: Atipe losu yii DARPA kede idokoowo oni-bilionu meji dola ninu ironu-dogbon kan ti won pe ni AI Tokan.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé lóṣù yìí DARPA kéde ìdókòòwò oní-bílíọ̀nù méjì dọ́là nínú ìrònú-dọgbọ́n kan tí wọ́n pè ni AI Tókàn.

translation.unyo: Nipa ti NSF naa, o ndooko-owo ogoorun milionu dola lodoodun ninu iwaadi AI.
translation.dcyo: Nípá ti NSF náà, ó ńdóoko-òwò ọgọ́ọ̀rún mílíọ̀nù dọ́là lọ́dọ́ọdún nínú ìwáàdí AI.

translation.unyo: Ewe, ofin orile-ede U.S. ti o nwa lati seda Igbimo Amusese ti Aabo Orile-ede lori Opolo Atowoda kan ko tii ri ise se ninu awon osu.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, òfin orilẹ-ede U.S. tí ó ńwá láti ṣẹ̀dá Ìgbìmọ̀ Amúṣẹ́ṣe ti Ààbò Orilẹ-ede lórí Ọpọlọ Àtọwọ́da kan kò tíì rí iṣẹ́ ṣe ninu awọn oṣù.

translation.unyo: Awon omo orile-ede Macedonia ndibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko lori boya ki won yi oruko orile-ede pada
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Macedonia ńdìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ lórí bóyá kí wọn yí orúkọ orilẹ̵-ede padà

translation.unyo: Awon eniyan Macedoni dibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko kan lojo Aiku lori boya ki won yi oruko re pada si ''Ile Olominira ti Ariwa Masidonia,'' igbese kan ti yoo yanju ede-aiyede atodunmodun kan pelu orile-ede Giriki eyiti o ti dina mo awon igbiyanju re lati di omo egbe Ajo Awon Orile-ede Yuroopu ati NATO.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn eniyan Macedoni dìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹ́èni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ kan lọ́jọ́ Àìkú lórí bóyá kí wọ́n yí orúkọ rẹ̀ padà si ''Ilẹ̀ Olómìnira ti Àríwá Masidónià,'' ìgbésẹ kan tí yóò yanjú èdè-àìyedè atọdunmọdun kan pẹlu orilẹ-ede Gíríkì eyiti ó ti dínà mọ́ àwọn ìgbìyànjú rẹ̀ lati di ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Àjọ Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Yuroopu àti NATO.

translation.unyo: Orile-ede Giriki, eyiti o ni ekun ti a npe ni Masidonia, ntenumo fun igba pipe wipe oruko alaamulegbe oun ni iha ariwa nduro fun sise bi oluwa lori ile oun ti o si ti dibo lati dina mo wiwole re sinu ajo NATO ati EU.
translation.dcyo: Orilẹ-ede Gíríkì, eyiti ó ni ẹkùn tí a ńpè ni Masidóníà, ńtẹnumọ fún ìgbà pipẹ wípé orúkọ aláàmúlégbè òun ní ìhà àríwá ńdúró fun ṣíṣe bi olúwa lóri ilẹ̀ òun tí ó sì ti dìbò láti dínà mọ́ wíwọlé rẹ sínú àjọ NATO àti EU.

translation.unyo: Awon ijoba mejeeji naa se adehun kan ninu osu Okudu ni iduro lori oruko tuntun naa ti won da aba re, sugbon awon omo orile-ede toje alatako wi awijare pe oruko naa yoo din agbara idanimo awon eya Slavic ti Masidonia tiwon po julo ku.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìjọba méjèèjì náà ṣe àdéhùn kan ninu oṣù Òkúdu ní ìdúró lórí orúkọ tuntun náà tí wọn dá àbá rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede tójẹ́ alátakò wí àwíjàre pé orúkọ náà yóò dín agbára ìdánimọ̀ àwọn ẹ̀yà Slavic ti Masidóníà tíwọ́n pọ̀ jùlọ kù.

translation.unyo: Aare Gjorge Ivanov ti sope oun koni dibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko atipe ipolongo fun ideyesi kan ti jeki awon isiyemeji wa lori boya ijadedibo yoo to ida aadota ninu ogoorun eyiti i se iye to kere julo ti won nilo fun ibo onibeeni-beeko naa lati je eyiti o wulo.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ Gjorge Ivanov ti sọpé òun kòní dìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ àtipé ìpolongo fún ìdẹ́yẹsí kan ti jẹ́kí àwọn ìsiyèméjì wà lórí bóyá ìjádedìbò yóò tó ìdá àádọ́ta ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún eyiti i ṣe iye tó kéré jùlọ tí wọ́n nílò fún ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà láti jẹ́ eyiti ó wúlò.

translation.unyo: Ibeere naa lori iwe amutekasi fun ibo onibeeni-beeko naa ka bayii: ''Se o faramo ijomo-egbe ajo NATO ati EU pelu itewogba ti adehun naa pelu orile-ede Giriki.''.
translation.dcyo: Ìbéèrè náà lóri ìwé àmútẹ̀kasí fún ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà kà báyìí: ''Ṣe o faramọ́ ìjọ́mọ-ẹgbẹ́ àjọ NATO àti EU pẹ̀lú ìtẹ́wọ́gbà ti àdéhùn náà pẹ̀lú orilẹ-ede Gíríkì.''.

translation.unyo: Awon alatileyin ti iyipada oruko naa, pelu Adari Igbimo Ijoba Zoran Zaev, wi awijare wipe o je idiyele toye kan lati san lati lee lepa igbaniwole sinu awon ajo bii EU ati NATO fun Masidonia, okan ninu awon orile-ede to yo jade sita lati inu iwolule ti Orile-ede Yugosilafia.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn alátìlẹyìn ti ìyípadà orúkọ náà, pẹ̀lú Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba Zoran Zaev, wí àwíjàre wipe ó jẹ́ ìdíyelé tóyẹ kan láti san láti leè lépa ìgbaniwọlé sinu àwọn àjọ bíi EU àti NATO fún Masidóníà, ọ̀kan ninu àwọn orilẹ̀-ede tó yọ jáde síta láti inú ìwólulẹ̀ ti Orilẹ-ede Yugosilafia.

translation.unyo: Mo wa looni lati di ibo fun ojo iwaju orile-ede naa, fun awon odo ni Masidonia ki won lee maa gbe ni ominira labe agboorun ti Ajo Awon Orile-ede Yuroopu nitoripe o tumo si awon igbesi aye alailewu pupo sii fun gbogbo wa,'' gege bii Olivera Georgijevska, eni odun mokandinlogorin se so, ni ilu Skopje.
translation.dcyo: Mó wá lóòní láti di ìbò fún ọjọ́ iwájú orilẹ-ede náà, fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní Masidóníà kí wọ́n leè máa gbé ní òmìnira lábẹ́ agboòrùn ti Àjọ Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Yuroopu nitoripe ó túmọ̀ sí àwọn ìgbésí ayé aláìléwu púpọ̀ síi fún gbogbo wa,'' gẹgẹ bíi Olivera Georgijevska, ẹni ọdún mọ́kàndínlọ́gọ́rin ṣe sọ, ní ìlú Skopje.

translation.unyo: Botilejepe kii se adehun to nfipa muni labe ofin, awon omo egbe ile igbimo asoju-sofin ti o toniye ti sope awon faramo abajade ibo naa lati see ni eyiti enu re mule.
translation.dcyo: Botilẹjepe kìí ṣe àdéhùn tó ńfipá múni lábẹ̀ òfin, àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ilé ìgbìmọ aṣojú-ṣòfin tí ó tóníye ti sọpé àwọn faramọ̀ àbájáde ìbò náà láti ṣeé ní eyiti ẹnu rẹ̀ múlẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Iyipada oruko naa yoo nilo ida meji topoju ninu ida meta awon omo ile igbimo asoju-sofin.
translation.dcyo: Ìyípadà orúkọ náà yóò nílò ìdá méjì tópọ̀jù ninu ìdá mẹ́ta àwọn ọmọ ilé ìgbìmọ aṣojú-ṣòfin.

translation.unyo: Igbimo amusese lori idibo ti orile-ede naa sope kosi awon iroyin aisedeedee kankan titi aago meji osan.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbìmọ̀ amúṣẹ́ṣe lori ìdìbò ti orilẹ-ede náà sọpé kòsí àwọn ìròyìn àìṣedéédéé kankan títí aago méjì ọ̀sán.

translation.unyo: Botiwukori, ijade-dibo duro ni ida merindinlogun ninu ida ogoorun, bi a safiwe re si ida merinlelogbon ti inu idibo awon asoju-sofin tokoja lodun 2016 nigbati ida merindinlaaadorin awon oludibo to foruko sile fi iwe amutekasi lati dibo won sile.
translation.dcyo: Bótiwùkórí, ìjáde-dìbò dúró ní ìdá mẹ́rìndínlógún ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀run, bí a ṣafiwé rẹ̀ sì ìdá mẹ́rìnlélọ́gbọ̀n ti inú ìdìbò àwọn aṣojú-ṣòfin tókọjá lọ́dún 2016 nigbati ìdá mẹ́rìndínláàádọ́rin àwọn olùdìbò tó forúkọ sílẹ̀ fi ìwé àmútẹkasí láti dìbo wọn sílẹ̀.

translation.unyo: ''Mo jade sita lati dibo nitori awon omo mi, ipo wa wa ninu Yuroopu,'' gege bii Gjose Tanevski, eni odun mejilelogota, oludibo kan ni olu-ilu naa, Skopje se so.
translation.dcyo: ''Mo jáde síta láti dìbò nitori àwọn ọmọ mi, ipò wa wà ninu Yuroopu,'' gẹgẹ bíi Gjose Tanevski, ẹni ọdún méjìlélọ́gọ́ta, olùdìbo kan ní olù-ìlú náà, Skopje ṣe sọ.

translation.unyo: Adari Igbimo Ijoba ti Masidonia Zoran Zaev, aya re Zorica ati omodekunrin re Dushko fi iwe amutekasi lati dibo won sile fun ibo onibeeni-beeko ni Masidonia lori yiyi oruko orile-ede naa pada eyiti yoo si ona fun un lati darapo mo ajo NATO ati Egbe Awon Orile'ede Yuroopu ni ilu Strumica, lorile-ede Masidonia ni ogbonojo osu Owewe lodun 2018.
translation.dcyo: Adarí Ìgbìmọ Ìjọba ti Masidóníà Zoran Zaev, aya rẹ̀ Zorica àti ọmọdékùnrin rẹ̀ Dushko fi ìwé àmútẹ̀kasí láti dìbò wọn sílẹ̀ fún ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ ní Masidónía lori yíyí orúkọ orilẹ-ede náà pada eyiti yóò sí ọ̀nà fún un láti darapọ mọ àjọ NATO àti Ẹgbẹ́ Àwọn Orilẹ'ede Yuroopu ní ìlú Strumica, lorilẹ-ede Masidóníà ni ọgbọ̀nọ́jọ́ oṣù Owewe ĺọ̀dún 2018.

translation.unyo: Niwaju ile igbimo awon asoju-sofin ni ilu Skopje, Vlamirir Kavardarkov, eni odun merinlelaaadota, ngba itage kekere kan laradi ti o si fa awon aga towa niwaju awon ago ti awon ti yoo deye si ibo onibeeni-beeko naa satopo won soke.
translation.dcyo: Níwájú ilé ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn aṣoju-ṣòfin ní ìlú Skopje, Vlamirir Kavardarkov, ẹni ọdún mẹ́rìnléláàádọ́ta, ńgba ìtàgé kékeré kan láradì tí ó sì fa àwọn àga tówà niwaju àwọn àgọ́ tí àwọn ti yóò dẹ́yẹ sí ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà ṣàtòpọ̀ wọn sókè.

translation.unyo: ''Awa wa fun ajo NATO ati EU, sugbon a fe darapo pelu ori wa loke, kii se nipase ise enu ona'' Kadarkov ni o so bee .
translation.dcyo: ''Àwa wà fún àjọ NATO àti EU, ṣugbọn a fẹ́ darapọ̀ pẹ̀lú orí wa lókè, kìí ṣe nípaṣẹ̀ iṣe ẹnu ọ̀nạ̀́'' Kadarkov ni o so bẹẹ̣́ ̣.

translation.unyo: “Awa je orile-ede ti o kuuse, sugbon a ni owo ara-eni.
translation.dcyo: “Àwá jẹ́ orilẹ-ede tí ò kúùṣẹ́, ṣ̵ùgbọ́n a ní ọ̀wọ̀ ara-ẹni.

translation.unyo: Bi won koba fe gba wa gegebi Masidonia, a lee koju si awon elomiran bii orile-ede Saina ati Rosia ki a si di ara ti ajosepo Euro-Asia.
translation.dcyo: Bí wọn kòbá fẹ́ gbà wá gẹ́gẹ́bí Masidóníà, a leè kọjú sí àwọn ẹlòmíràn bíi orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà àti Rọ́síà kí á sì dí ara ti àjọṣepọ̀ Euro-Asia.

translation.unyo: Adari Igbimo Zaev sope ijomo-egbe NATO yoo mu idokoowo tiwon nilo pupo wo orile-ede Masidonia, eyiti ti o ni odiwon airisese ti o ju ida ogun ninu ida ogoorun lo.
translation.dcyo: Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Zaev sọpé ìjọ́mọ-ẹgbẹ́ NATO yóò mú ìdókòòwò tíwọ́n nílò púpọ̀ wọ orilẹ-ede Masidóníà, eyiti tí ó ní òdiwọn àìríṣẹ́ṣe tí o ju ìdá ogún ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún lọ.

translation.unyo: ''Mo gbagbo wipe awon eniyan pupo yoo fi oju rere han sii nitori awon omo ilu wa toju ida ogorin ninu ogoorun lo nfi oju rere han si ti ajo EU ati NATO,'' Zaev ni o so bayii leyin ti o ju iwe amutekasi re sinu apoti.
translation.dcyo: ''Mo gbàgbọ́ wípé àwọn eniyan pupọ̀ yóò fi ojú rere hàn síi nitori àwọn ọmọ ìlú wa tóju ìdá ọgọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún lọ ńfi ojú rere hàn sí ti àjọ EU àti NATO,'' Zaev ni o sọ báyií lẹ́yìn tí o ju ìwé amútẹ̀kàsí rẹ̀ sínu àpótí.

translation.unyo: O sope ibo ''beeni'' yoo je ''ijeriisi ojo iwaju wa.”
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé ìbò ''bẹ́ẹ̀ni'' yóò jẹ ''ìjẹ́ríìsí ọjọ́ iwájú wa.”

translation.unyo: Idibo ero ara ilu kan tiwon sagbejade re lojo Aje lati owo Ajo fun Iwaadi nipa Ilana Isejoba sope laarin ida ogbon ati ida metalelogoji ninu ida ogoorun awon oludibo ni yoo kopa ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko naa - ti o lo sile ju iye ijade-dibo tiwon nilo lo.
translation.dcyo: Ìdìbò èrò ara ìlú kan tíwọ́n ṣàgbéjáde rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ Ajé láti ọwọ́ Àjọ fún Ìwáàdí nípa Ìlàna Ìṣèjọba sọpé láàrin ìdá ọgbọ̀n àti ìdá mẹ́tàlélógójì ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn olùdìbò ni yóò kópa ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà - tí o ́lọ sílẹ̀ ju iye ìjáde-dìbò tíwọ́n nílò lọ.

translation.unyo: Idibo ero ara ilu miran, ti ile ise Amohunmaworan Telma se, rii pe ida metadinlogota ninu ida ogoorun awon oludahun ni won ngbero lati di ibo naa lojo Abameta.
translation.dcyo: Ìdìbò èrò ara ìlú miran, tí ilé iṣẹ́ Amóhùnmáwòrán Telma ṣe, ríi pé ìdá mẹ́tàdínlọ́gọ́ta ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn olùdáhùn ni wọ́n ńgbèrò láti di ìbò náà lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.

translation.unyo: Ninu won, ida aadorin ninu ida ogoorun sope awon yoo dibo fun beeni.
translation.dcyo: Nínú wọ̀n, ìdá àádọ́rin nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún sọpé àwọn yóò dìbò fún bẹ́ẹ̀ni.

translation.unyo: Fun ki ibo onibeeni-beeko naa lati je aseyori ijade-dibo nilo lati je ibo ida aadota ninu ida ogoorun ati eyo kan.
translation.dcyo: Fún ki ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà láti jẹ́ àṣeyọrí ìjáde-dìbò nílò láti jẹ́ ìbò ìdá àádọ́ta ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àti ẹyọ kan.

translation.unyo: Ikuna ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko naa yoo duro fun abuku gboogi akoko ti yoo kan ilana isejoba ti ijoba to nseti awon orile-ede Yuroopu ati ile Amerika latigba toti gba ijoba losu Ebibi lodun to koja.
translation.dcyo: Ìkùnà ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà yóò duro fún àbùkù gbòógì àkọ́kọ́ tí yóò kan ìlànà ìṣèjọba ti ìjọba tó ńṣeti awọn orilẹ-ede Yuroopu ati ilẹ Amẹ́ríkà látígbà tóti gba ìjọba lóṣù Ẹ̀bibi lọ́dún tó kọjá.

translation.unyo: Woran: Sergio Aguero ti Manchester City boti ntuko ara re kaakiri gbogbo aabo Brighton lati gba ayo wole
translation.dcyo: Wòran: Sergio Aguero ti Manchester City bóti ńtukọ̀ ara rẹ káàkiri gbogbo àabo Brighton láti gbá ayò wọlé

translation.unyo: Sergio Aguero ati Raheem Sterling ran ise sinu aabo Brighton ninu bibori oni 2-0 ti Manchester City lojo Abameta ni Papa Isere ti Etihad ni ilu Manchester, lorile-ede Geesi.
translation.dcyo: Sergio Aguero àti Raheem Sterling rán iṣẹ́ sínú ààbò Brighton ninu bíborí oní 2-0 ti Manchester City lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹta ni Pápá Ìṣeré ti Etihad ní ìlú Manchester, lorilẹ-ede Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.

translation.unyo: Aguero jeki o dabi pe o ti rorun ju nipa ayo afinisesin re eyiti o gba wole ni iseju karundinlaadorin naa.
translation.dcyo: Aguero jẹ́kí ó dàbí pé ó ti rọrùn ju nípa ayò afiniṣẹ̀ṣín rẹ̀ eyiti ó gbá wọlé ni ìṣẹ́jú karùndínláàdọ́rin náà.

translation.unyo: Agbaboolumatase omo ile Ajentina gba igbasini kan laarin gungun ori papa ni ibere ti sise-n-tele naa.
translation.dcyo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lùmátàṣé ọmọ ilẹ̀ Ajẹntína gba ìgbásíni kan láàrin gungun orí pápá ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ti ṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé náà.

translation.unyo: O sare laarin awon oludaaabobo ile Brighton meta ki o to lo bi abe ninu papa tosi sile naa.
translation.dcyo: Ó sáré láàrin àwọn olùdáààbòbò ilé Brighton mẹ́ta kí ó tó lọ bí abẹ ninu pápá tósí sílẹ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Leyin naa Aguero ri ara nibiti awon elewu alawo ewe merin ti yii ka.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn náà Aguero rí ara níbití àwọn ẹlẹ́wù aláwọ̀ ewé mẹ́rin ti yìí ká.

translation.unyo: O taari yika oludaaabobo kan ki o to sare tayo awon pupo sii ni eti apoti ijiya penariti ti Brighton.
translation.dcyo: Ó taari yíka olùdáààbòbò kan kí ó tó sáré tayọ àwọn pupọ síi ni etí ̀apoti ìjìyà pẹnariti ti Brighton.

translation.unyo: Leyin naa o taari igbasini kan si apa osi re, tosi ri Sterling.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn náà ó taari ìgbásíni kan sí apá òsì rẹ̀, tósì rí Sterling.

translation.unyo: Onipo-iwaju omo ile Geesi naa ifesekan akoko re ninu apoti naa lati da boolu pada sodo Aguero, eniti o lo bata ese otun re lati ta asole Brighton Mathew Ryan yo pelu boolu ayarabi-asa kan sinu apa otun awon naa.
translation.dcyo: Onípò-iwájú ọmọ ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì náà ìfẹsẹ̀kàn àkọ́kọ́ rẹ̀ ninu apoti náà láti dá bọ́ọ̀lù padà sọ́dọ̀ Aguero, ẹniti ó lo bàtà ẹsẹ̀ ọ̀tún rẹ̀ láti ta aṣọ́lé Brighton Mathew Ryan yọ pẹ̀lú bọ́ọ̀lù ayárabí-àṣá kan sínú apá ọ̀tún àwọn náà.

translation.unyo: ''Aguero nlakaka pelu awon isoro kan ni atelese re,'' ni alaakoso City Pep Guardiola so fun awon oniroyin.
translation.dcyo: ''Aguero ńlàkàkà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìṣòro kan ní àtẹ́lẹs̵ẹ̀ rẹ̀,'' ni aláàkóso City Pep Guardiola sọ fún àwọn oníròyìn.

translation.unyo: ''A soro nipa ki oun gba boolu fun awon iseju marundinlogota, ogota.
translation.dcyo: ''A sọ̀rọ̀ nípa kí òun gbá bọ́ọ̀lù fún àwọn ìṣẹ́jú márùndínlọ́gọ́ta, ọgọ́ta.

translation.unyo: Iyen ni ohun ti o sele.
translation.dcyo: Ìyẹn ni ohun tí ó ṣẹlẹ̵̀.

translation.unyo: A se oriire nigbati o gba boolu kan wole ni akoko yen.''
translation.dcyo: À ṣe oríire nigbati ó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù kan wọlé ní àkókò yẹn.''

translation.unyo: Sugbon Sterling ni eni naa ti o fun Sky Blues ni anfaani ibere ninu idarudapo ti Liigi Alaakoko.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n Sterling ni ẹni náà tí ó fún Sky Blues ní àǹfààní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ninu ìdàrúdàpọ̀ ti Líìgì Aláàkọ́kọ́.

translation.unyo: Boolu ti o wole yen wa ni iseju ikokandinlogbon.
translation.dcyo: Bọ́ọ̀lù tí ó wọlé yẹn wá ní ìṣẹ́jú ìkọkàndínlọ́gbọ̀n.

translation.unyo: Aguero gba boolu naa nibi towonu lori ile Brighton ninu idije yen.
translation.dcyo: Aguero gba bọ́ọ̀lù náà níbi tówọnú lórí ilẹ̵̀ Brighton ninu ìdíje yẹn.

translation.unyo: O fi boolu kan to rewa ranse wonu lona igun apa si Leroy Sane.
translation.dcyo: Ó fi bọ́ọ̀lù kan tó rẹwà ránṣ̵ẹ́ wọnú lọ́na igun apá sí Leroy Sane.

translation.unyo: Sane se awon ifesekan die kan ki o to dari Sterling si ona igun oju-ile naa.
translation.dcyo: Sane ṣe àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀kàn diẹ́ kan kí ó tó darí Sterling sí ọ̀nà igun ojú-ilé náà.

translation.unyo: Onipo-iwaju Sky Blues naa taari boolu sinu awon ki o to yo jade kuro ninu aala.
translation.dcyo: Onípò-iwáju Sky Blues náà taari bọ́ọ̀lú sínú àwọn kí ó to yọ́ jáde kuro ninu ààlà.

translation.unyo: City ndojuko Hoffenheim ninu idije onisori ti Liigi Awon Akoni ni aago kan ku iseju maarun loosan ojo Isegun ni Rhein-Neckar-Arena ni ilu Sinsheim, lorile-ede Jamani.
translation.dcyo: City ńdojúkọ Hoffenheim ninu ìdíje oníṣòrí ti Líìgì Àwọn Akọni ní aago kan ku ìṣẹ́jú máàrún lọ́ọ̀sán ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun ní Rhein-Neckar-Arena ní ìlú Sinsheim, lorilẹ̵-ede Jamani.

translation.unyo: Scherzer nfe gba ayo abaseje dojuko. Rockies
translation.dcyo: Scherzer ńfẹ́ gba ayò abàṣèjẹ́ dojúkọ. Rockies

translation.unyo: Pelu Awon Nationals naa tiwon ti yo kuro ninu ariyanjiyan asekagba idije, kosi idi pupo mo lati fi ipa bere omiran.
translation.dcyo: Pẹ̀lú Àwọn Nationals náà tíwọ́n ti yọ kuro ninu àríyànjiyàn àṣekágbá ìdíje, kòsí ìdí púpọ̀ mọ́ láti fi ipá bẹ̀rẹ̀ òmíràn.

translation.unyo: Sugbon Scherzer tojepe igba gbogbo lo ndije nreti lati mu oke gun lodi si Colorado Rockies lojo Aiku, sugbon bi awon itokasi ba tun wa fun idije asekagba fun Awon Rockies, ti o nfi idije kan siwaju Los Angeles Dodgers ni Iwo-oorun NL naa.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọn Scherzer tójẹ́pé ìgbà gbogbo ló ndíje ńretí láti mú òkè gùn lòdì sí Colorado Rockies lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, ṣùgbọ́n bí àwọn ìtọ́kasí bá tún wà fún ìdíje àṣekágbá fún Àwọn Rockies, tí ó ńfi ìdíje kan síwáju Los Angeles Dodgers ní Ìwọ̀-oòrùn NL náà.

translation.unyo: Awon Rockies gba o kere tan ogangan-ibi ti kosee sotele kan pelu isegun kan tiwon ni lori Awon Nationals lale ojo Eti, sugbon won si nwa lati pa ilekun de mo oye akoko won ni ipin ikinni.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn Rockies gba ó kéré tán ọ̀gangan-ibi tí kòṣeé sọtẹ́lẹ̀ kan pẹ̀lú ìṣẹ́gun kan tíwọ́n ní lórí Àwọn Nationals lálẹ̵́ ọjọ́ Ẹtì, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n sí ńwá láti pa ìlẹ̀kùn dé mọ oyè àkọ́kọ́ wọn ní ìpín ìkínní.

translation.unyo: ''Ani botilejepe a ndije fun ofo, o kere tan a saa lee fi omo-ika ese taari roba naa pelu imo wipe ayika Denver nibi pelu awon ero ati iko miran yoo maa gba boolu ni ipele tosee se koje eyiti o ga julo ti emi yoo koju lodun yii.
translation.dcyo: ''Àní botilẹjepe à ńdíje fún òfo, ó kéré tán á sáà leè fi ọmọ-ìka ẹsẹ̀ taari rọ́bà náà pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ wípé àyíká Denver níbí pẹ̀lú àwọn èrò àti ikọ̀ miran yóò maá gba bọ́ọ̀lù ní ipele tóṣeé ṣe kójẹ́ eyiti ó ga jùlọ ti emi yóò kojú lọ́dún yìí.

translation.unyo: Kinni idi ti emi kofi ni nife lati dije ninu iyen?''
translation.dcyo: Kínni ìdí ti emi kòfi ní nifẹ́ láti díje ninu ìyẹn?''

translation.unyo: Awon Nationals sibesibe si nilati kede onibere kan  fun ojo Aiku, sugbon iroyin sope won faramo lati jeki Scherzer maa ju boolu ninu iru ipo bee.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn Nationals síbẹ̀síbẹ̀ sì níláti kéde oníbẹ̀rẹ̀ kan  fún ọjọ́ Àìkú, ṣùgbọ́n ìròyìn sọpé wọn faramọ́ láti jẹ́kí Scherzer máa ju bọ́ọ̀lù ninu irú ipò bẹ́ẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Scherzer, eniti yoo maa je onibere fun igba kerinlelogbon re, ju boolu saa kan lati ibi igbaradi aju-boolu lojo 'Bo ti yoo si maa ju boolu lojo Aiku tiise ojo isinmi re.
translation.dcyo: Scherzer, ẹniti yóò máa jẹ́ oníbẹ̀rẹ̀ fún ìgbà kẹrìnlélọ́gbọ̀n rẹ̀, ju bọ́ọ̀lù sáà kan láti ibi ìgbaradì aju-bọ́ọ̀lù lọ́jọ́ 'Bọ̀ ti yóò sì máa ju bọ́ọ̀lu lọ́jọ́ Àìkú tííṣe ọjọ́ ìsinmi rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Olowo-otun ti Washington naa je 18-7 pelu 2.53 ERA kan ati awon ikolu oodun ninu awon iyiwopada ni saa yii.
translation.dcyo: Ọlọ́wọ́-ọ̀tún ti Washington náà jẹ́ 18-7 pẹ̀lú 2.53 ERA kan àti àwọn ìkọlù ọ̀ọ́dún ninu àwọn i̇̀yíwọ́padà ní sáà yìí.

translation.unyo: Awon ipejopo ero ti Trump ni Iwo-oorun Virginia
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìpéjọpọ̀ èrò ti Trump ní Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia

translation.unyo: Aare naa fi ogbon tokasi ipo toyi mimu Adajo Brett Kavanaugh fun ise ka nigbati o nsoro nipa pataki jijade awon omo egbe Republican ninu awon ibo aarin saa.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ náà fi ọgbọ́n tọ́kasí ipò tóyí mímú Adájọ́ Brett Kavanaugh fún iṣẹ̀ ká nigbati ó ńsọ̀rọ̀ nípa pàtàkì jíjáde àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Republican ninu àwọn ìbò ààrin sáà.

translation.unyo: ''Gbogbo ohun ti a tise ni o wa ninu ewu ni osu Belu.
translation.dcyo: ''Gbogbo ohun tí a tíṣe ní ó wà ninu ewu ní oṣù Bélú.

translation.unyo: Awon ose mefa si okan ninu awon idibo tose pataki julo ni awon akoko igbesi-aye wa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọ̀sẹ̀ mẹ́fà sí ọ̀kan ninu àwọn ìdìbò tóṣe pàtàkì jùlọ ní àwọn àkókò ìgbésí-ayé wa.

translation.unyo: Eyi je okan ninu awon titobi, titobi-- Emi ko dije sugbon Mo ndije nitooto idi niyi ti Mo fi nwa nibi gbogbo ti mo si nja fun awon oludije nla,'' ni o so.
translation.dcyo: Èyí jẹ́ ọ̀kan ninu àwọn títóbi, títóbi-- Èmi kò díje ṣùgbọ́n Mo ńdíje nítòótọ ìdí nìyí tí Mo fi ńwa níbi gbogbo tí mo sì ńjà fún àwọn olùdíje ńlá,'' ni ó sọ.

translation.unyo: Trump tesiwaju, ''Se e ri okanran egbe buburu, buburu ti Awon Democrats, e ri i to nsele lowolowo bayii.
translation.dcyo: Trump tẹ̀síwájú, ''Se ẹ̀ rí ọ̀kànràn ẹgbẹ́ búburú, búburú ti Àwọn Democrats, ẹ́ rí i tó ńṣẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ báyìí.

translation.unyo: Won si ti pinnu lati gba agbara pada nipa lilo ona eyikeyii to pon dandan, se e ri iwa ailaaanu, aiseesunmo naa.
translation.dcyo: Wọ́n sì ̈ti pinnu láti gba agbára padà nípa lílo ọ̀nà èyíkéyìí tó pọn dandan, sé ẹ rí ìwà aìláàánu, àiṣ̵̵eésúnmọ náà.

translation.unyo: Won ko bikita nipa eniti won pa lara, eniti won nilati koja lori re lati lee gba agbara ati isakoso, iyen nipe ohun tiwon fe ni agbara ati isakoso, a ko ni fi i fun won.
translation.dcyo: Wọn kò bìkítà nípa ẹnití wọ́n pa lára, ẹnití wọ́n nilati kọjá lórí rẹ̀ láti lee gba agbára àti ìṣàkóso, ìyẹn nípe ohun tíwọ́n fẹ́ ni agbára àti ìṣàkóso, a kò ní fi i fún wọn.

translation.unyo: Awon Democrats, ni o sope, won wa ninu ilepa lati ''dinilowo ati dinamoni.''
translation.dcyo: Àwọn Democrats, ni ó sọpé, wọn wà ninu ìlépa láti ''dínilọ́wọ àti dínamọ́ni.''

translation.unyo: ''Bee e ri iyen laarin ojo merin seyin,''ni o so, to si npe Awon Democrats ni ''binubinu ati alailaaanu ati alaiseesunmo ati alaisotito.
translation.dcyo: ''Bẹ́ẹ̀ ẹ rí ìyẹn láàrin ọjọ́ mẹ́rin ṣẹ́yìn,''ni o sọ, tó sì ńpe Awọn Democrats ní ''bínubínú àti aláìláàánú àti aláìṣeésúnmọ àti aláiṣòtítọ́.

translation.unyo: O tokasi omo egbe Democrats Asoju-sofin Agba Dianne Feinstein ti Igbimo Eto Idajo ti Ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin Agba nipa oruko, eyiti o gba ariwo oni-ibinu lati odo awon olutetigbo naa.
translation.dcyo: Ó tọ́kasí ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Democrats Àsojú-ṣòfin Àgbà Dianne Feinstein ti Ìgbìmọ̀ Ètò Ìdájọ́ ti Ilé Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà nípa orúkọ, eyiti o gba ariwo oní-ìbínú láti ọdọ́ àwọn olùtẹ́tígbọ náà.

translation.unyo: ''Ranti idahun re?
translation.dcyo: ''Ránti ìdáhùn rẹ̀?

translation.unyo: Nje iwo tu asiri iwe apileko naa?
translation.dcyo: Ǹjẹ ìwọ tú àṣ̵írí ìwé àpilẹ̀kọ náà?

translation.unyo: Uh, uh, kinni.
translation.dcyo: Uh, uh, kínni.

translation.unyo: Beeko, uh beeko, Mo duro okan - iyen je ede ifarasoro ti ko dara - ede ifarasoro naa to buru julo ti Mo ti i riri.''
translation.dcyo: Bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́, uh bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́, Mo dúró ọ̀kan - ìyẹn jẹ́ èdè ìfarasọ̀rọ̀ tí kò dára - èdè ìfarasọ̀rọ̀ náà tó burú jùlọ tí Mo tí ì rírí.''

translation.unyo: Egbe oselu Labour ko dabii ile ijosin to gbooro kan mo.
translation.dcyo: Ẹgbẹ òṣèlú Labour ko dàbíi ilé ìjọsín tó gbòòrò kan mọ.

translation.unyo: Koni ipamora fun awon ti won nso ero okan won
translation.dcyo: Kòní ìpamọ́ra fún àwọn ti wọ́n ńsọ èrò ọkàn wọn

translation.unyo: Nigbati awon asatunse ti Momentum ni egbe oselu agbegbe mi dibo lati bami wi, ko fi gbogbo ara je iyalenu.
translation.dcyo: Nigbati àwọn aṣatúnṣe ti Momentum ni ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlu agbègbè mi dìbò láti bámi wí, kò fi gbogbo ara jẹ́ ìyàlẹ̵́nu.

translation.unyo: Leyin gbogbo re, Emi ni eni to tuntun julo lori ila awon MP ti egbe oselu Labour tiwon yoo so fun pe awon kofe ri - gbogbo re fun siso awon ero okan wa.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn gbogbo rẹ̀, Èmi ni ẹni tó tuntun jùlọ lórí ìlà àwọn MP ti ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour tíwọn yóò sọ fún pé àwọn kòfẹ́ rí - gbogbo rẹ̀ fún sísọ àwọn èrò ọkàn wa.

translation.unyo: Akegbe mi ni ile igbimo asoju-sofin Joan Ryan gba iru ifowomuni kan naa nitoripe o fi okan to pinnu dide duro si igbogun ti awon Juu.
translation.dcyo: Akẹgbẹ́ mi ní ilé ìgbìmọ aṣojú-ṣòfin Joan Ryan gba irú ìfọwọ́múni kan náà nitoripe o fi ọkàn tó pinnu díde dúró sí ìgbógun ti àwọn Júù.

translation.unyo: Nitemi, aba lati bami wi bu enu ate lu mi nitoripe N ko fohunsokan pelu Jeremy Corbyn.
translation.dcyo: Nítèmi, àbá láti bámi wi bú ẹnu àtẹ́ lù mi nitoripe N ko fohùnṣọ̀kan pẹ̀lú Jeremy Corbyn.

translation.unyo: Lori isepataki ti ilana eto oro aje kan, lori aabo orile-ede, lori Yuroopu, lona to panileerin awom oro to farajo ohun ti Jeremy kofi fohunsokan pelu awon adari to saaju.
translation.dcyo: Lórí ìṣepàtàkì ti ìlànà ètò ọ̀rọ̀ ajé kan, lórí ààbò orilẹ-ede, lórí Yuroopu, lọ́nà tó panilẹ́ẹ̀rín àwọm ọ̀rọ̀ tó farajọ ohun tí Jeremy kòfi fohùnṣọ̀kan pẹ̀lú àwọn adarí tó saáju.

translation.unyo: Ifitonileti fun ipade egbe oselu Labour ti Ila-oorun Nottingham lojo Eti sope ''a fe ki ipade naa je eyiti o faaye gba gbogbo eniyan ti o si lere.''
translation.dcyo: ̀Ìfitónilétí fún ìpàdé ẹ̵gbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour ti Ìlà-oòrùn Nottingham lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì sọpé ''a fẹ́ kí ìpàdé náà jẹ́ eyiti ó fààyè gba gbogbo eniyan tí ó sì lérè.''

translation.unyo: Fun pupo ninu odun mejo mi gegebi MP egbe oselu Labour agbegbe, awon ipade GC ale ojo Eti naa ti ri bee gele.
translation.dcyo: Fún púpọ̀ ninu ọdún mẹ́jọ mi gẹ́gẹ́bí MP ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour agbègbè, àwọn ìpàdé GC àlẹ́ ọjọ́ Ẹtì náà ti rí bẹ́ẹ̀ gẹ́lẹ́.

translation.unyo: O banilokan pe looni, kii se ohun ti opo awon ipade atipe ileri ti oselu ''to laaanu, to nse jeje die sii'' ni a ti gbagbe tipe bi o bajepe, lootito, o tie bere ri rara.
translation.dcyo: Ó banilọ́kàn pé lóòní, kìí ṣe ohùn ti ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ìpàdé àtipe ìlérí ti òṣèlú ''tó láàánú, tó ńṣe jẹ́jẹ́ díẹ̀ síi'' ni a ti gbàgbé tipẹ́ bí ó bájẹ̀pé, lóòtítọ́, ó tiẹ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ rí rárá.

translation.unyo: O ti wa nhan gbangba siwaju sii wipe won ko faaye awon oju iwoye to yato ninu egbe oselu Labour atipe gbogbo ero okan ni won nsedajo won lori boya o je itewogba si awon adari egbe oselu naa.
translation.dcyo: Ó ti wá ńhàn gbangba síwájú síi wipe wọn kò fààyè àwọn ojú ìwòye tó yàtọ̀ ninu ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour àtipé gbogbo èrò ọkàn ni wọn ńṣédájọ́ wọn lórí bóyá ó jẹ́ ìtẹ́wọ́gbá sí àwọn adarí ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú náà.

translation.unyo: Eyi bere laipe leyin ti Jeremy di olori, bi awon akegbe ti Mo ti ro teletele wipe a jo nsajopin oju-iwoye oselu kan tojorawon beresi reti wipe ki nya bara lati gba awon ipo ti N koni fe se ohun miran lati fohunsokan pelu re lailai - boya lori aabo orile-ede tabi lori oja kan soso ti ajo EU.
translation.dcyo: Èyí bẹ̀rẹ̀ láìpẹ́ lẹ́yìn tí Jeremy di olórí, bí àwọn akẹgbẹ́ tí Mo ti rò tẹ́lẹ̀tẹ́lẹ̀ wípé a jọ ńṣàjọpín ojú-ìwòye òṣèlú kan tójọrawọn bẹ̀rèsí rétí wipe kí ńyà bàrà láti gba àwọn ipò tí N kòní fẹ́ ṣe ohun miran láti fohùnṣọ̀kan pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ láilái - bóyá lórí ààbò orilẹ-ede tàbí lórí ọjà kan ṣoṣo ti àjọ EU.

translation.unyo: Nigbakuugba ti Mo ba soro ni gbangba - ti kosi ni fise iru ohun ti Mo so - nibe ni awon oro eebu alasofitakoni kan yoo ti tele e lori awon oju-opo ibasepo ti ayelujara tiwon npe fun iyokuro, titako oselu ti aarin naa, to si nso fun mi wipe koye ki N wa ninu egbe oselu Labour.
translation.dcyo: Nígbàkúùgbà tí Mo bá sọ̀rọ̀ ni gbangba - tí kòsì ní fiṣe irú ohun ti Mo sọ - níbẹ̀ ni àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ èèbú alásọfitakoni kan yóò ti tẹ̀lé e lórí àwọn ojú-òpó ìbáṣepọ̀ ti ayelujara tíwọn ńpè fún ìyọkúrò, títako òṣèlú ti ààrin náà, tó sì ńsọ fún mi wipe kòyẹ ki N wà ninu ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour.

translation.unyo: Atipe iyen kii se iriri temi nikan.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé ìyẹn kìí ṣe ìrírí tèmi nìkan.

translation.unyo: Ni tooto, Mo mo wipe Mo je oloriire ju awon kan ninu awon akegbe mi lo bi o se jepe awon oro ti a dari sodo mi ti maa nje ti oselu.
translation.dcyo: Ní tòótọ́, Mo mọ̀ wipe Mo jẹ́ olóríire ju àwọn kan ninu àwọn akẹgbẹ́ mi lọ bí ó ṣe jẹ́pé àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tí a darí sọ́dọ̀ mi tí máa ńjẹ́ ti òṣèlú.

translation.unyo: Enu maa nya mi nipa ti iwa akosemose ati isokangiri ti awon akegbe wonyen ti won ndojuko ojo eebu ti awon ti koka obinrin si nnkan ati awon eleyameya lojoojumo sugbon tiwon ko salo nigba kankan.
translation.dcyo: Ẹnu máa ńyà mi nípa ti ìwà akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ àti ìṣọkàngírí ti àwọn akẹgbẹ́ wọ̀nyen tí wọ́n ńdojúkọ òjò èèbù ti àwọn tí kòka obìnrin sí nǹkan àti àwọn ẹlẹ́yàmẹ̀yà lójoojúmọ́ ṣùgbọ́n tíwọn kò sálọ nígbà kankan.

translation.unyo: Okan ninu awon nnkan to njanikule julo ninu oselu ti ode-iwoyi ni bi awon ipele eebu bibu ti wa di asa to bojumu.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀kan ninu àwọn nǹkan tó ńjánikulẹ̀ jùlọ ninu òṣèlú ti òde-ìwòyí ni bí àwọn ipele èèbù bíbú ti wá di àṣà tó bójúmu.

translation.unyo: Jeremy Corbyn  so lose tokoja wipe egbe oselu Labour nilati jeki idagbasoke ba asa ipamora.
translation.dcyo: Jeremy Corbyn  sọ lọ́sẹ̀ tókọjá wipe ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlu Labour níláti jẹ́kí ìdàgbàsókè bá àṣà ìpamọ́ra.

translation.unyo: Otito naa nipe a kii se soosi to gbooro yen mo atipe pelu gbogbo aba ''kosi-igbekele'' tabi awon ilana iyipada ti iyannisipo egbe oselu naa ndi eyiti o ntin-in-rin pupo sii.
translation.dcyo: Òtítọ náà nipé a kìí ṣe sọọsi tó gbòòrò yẹn mọ́ àtipé pẹ̀lu gbogbo àbá ''kòsí-ìgbẹkẹ̀lé'' tabi àwọn ìlàna ìyípadà ti ìyannisipò ẹgbẹ òṣèlu náà ńdi eyiti ó ńtín-ín-rín púpọ síi.

translation.unyo: Mo ti ni opo imoran laarin odun meji tokoja to nparowa fun mi lati jeki ori mi wa nisale, ki nma fi bee soro mo atipe leyin naa N o ''wa daadaa.''
translation.dcyo: Mo ti ní ọpọ ìmọràn láàrin ọdún méjì tókọjá tó ńpàrọwà fún mi láti jẹ́kí orí mi wà nísàlẹ̀, kí ńmá fí bẹ́ẹ̀ sọ̀rọ̀ mọ́ àtipé lẹ́yìn náà N ó ''wà dáadáa.''

translation.unyo: Sugbon iyen kii se ohun ti Mo wa sinu oselu lati se.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n ìyẹn kìí ṣe ohun tí Mo wá sínú òṣèlú láti ṣe.

translation.unyo: Lati igba ti Mo ti darapo mo egbe oselu Labour bi omo ile iwe kan, leyin inu to bi mi nipa aibikita ijoba Thatcher eyiti o fi kilaasi ile-iwe onigbogbo-eko mi sile nipo toti fere wolule tan, Mo ti se awari lati maa ja fun imudara sii awon ise ilu fun awon ti won nilo won julo - boya gegebi kansilo agbegbe kan tabi alaakoso ijoba.
translation.dcyo: Láti ìgbà tí Mo ti darapọ̀ mọ́ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour bí ọmọ ilé ìwé kan, lẹ́yìn inú tó bí mi nípa àìbìkítà ìjọba Thatcher eyiti ó fi kíláàsì ilé-ìwé onígbogbo-ẹ̀kọ́ mi sílẹ̀ nípò tóti fẹ́rẹ̀ wólulẹ̀ tán, Mo ti ṣe àwárí láti máa jà fún ìmúdára síi àwọn iṣẹ́ ìlú fún àwọn tí wọ́n nílò wọn jùlọ - bóyá gẹ́gẹ́bí káńsílọ̀ agbègbè kan tàbí aláàkóso ìjọba.

translation.unyo: Emi kofi igba kankan fi oselu mi pamo, ati ninu idibo tokoja naa.
translation.dcyo: Èmi kòfi ìgbà kankan fi òṣèlú mi pamọ́, àti ninu ìdìbò tókọjá náà.

translation.unyo: Kosi enikan ninu Ila-oorun Nottingham ti o lee ni iporuuru okan lonakona nipa awon ipo ilana mi ati awon ipele aileefohunsokan pelu awon adari towanipo lowolowo.
translation.dcyo: Kòsí ẹnikan ninu Ìla-oòrùn Nottingham tí ó leè ní ìpòrúùru ọkàn lọ́nàkọnà nípa àwọn ipò ìlànà mi àti àwọn ipele àìleèfohùnṣọ̀kan pẹ̀lú àwọn adàri tówànípò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.

translation.unyo: Fun awon tiwon jeki itesiwaju ba aba naa lojo Eti, gbogbo ohun ti N o so nipe nigbati orile-ede naa nroko sona odo Brexit kan eyiti yoo pa awon ara-ile, awon oko-owo, ati awon ise ilu lara, Emi koni oye ife naa lati maa fi akoko ati agbara mi sofo lori jije olootito si adari egbe oselu Labour.
translation.dcyo: Fún àwọn tíwọn jẹ́kí ìtẹ̀síwájú bá àbá náà lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì, gbogbo ohun ti N ó sọ nipé nigbati orilẹ-ede náà ńroko sọ́nà ọ̀dọ̀ Brexit kan eyiti yóò pa àwọn ara-ilé, àwọn oko-òwò, àti àwọn iṣé ìlú lára, Èmi kòní òye ìfẹ́ náà láti máa fi àkókò àti agbára mi ṣofo lórí jíjẹ́ olóòtítọ́ si adarí ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour.

translation.unyo: Sugbon lootito ise iranse kan ti Mo ni kii se si Nothingham Momentum, o wa fun awon to dibo fun mi, boya won je omo egbe oselu Labour tabi beeko: Mo n yangan lati sin yin ti Mo si se ileri wipe kosi iye awon idunkooko iyonikuro tabi ti oselu   kosele-kiakia ti yoo dami lowo ko lati mase kopa mo ninu ohun ti Mo gbagbo wipe won je awon ohun dara julo fun gbogbo yin.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọn lóòtítọ iṣẹ ìránṣẹ́ kan tí Mo ní kìí ṣe sí Nothingham Momentum, o wá fún àwọn to dìbò fún mí, bóyá wọ́n jẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour tàbí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́: Mo ń yangàn láti sìn yín tí Mo sì ṣe ìlérì wipe kòsí iye àwọn ìdúnkookò ìyọnikúrò tàbi ti òṣèlú   kòṣẹlẹ̀-kíákíá tí yóò dámi lọ́wọ́ kọ́ láti máṣe kópa mọ́ ninu ohun tí Mo gbàgbó wipe wọ́n jẹ́ àwọn ohun dára jùlọ fún gbogbo yín.

translation.unyo: Chris Leslie  ni MP fun Ila-oorun Nottingham
translation.dcyo: Chris Leslie  ni MP fún Ìla-oòrùn Nottingham

translation.unyo: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Ayr tiwon kolu ri lo soke
translation.dcyo: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Ayr tíwọn kòlù rí lọ sóke

translation.unyo: Awon igbiyanju igbeyin meji lee ti sun esi ipari naa bakan-bakan, sugbon kosi ani-ani wipe Ayr ye lati bori ninu idije ojo naa yii toje apanileerin totun yanilenu ninu Isori Alaakoko ti Tennent.
translation.dcyo: Awọn ìgbìyànjú ìgbẹ̀yìn méjì leè ti sún èsì ìpari náà bákan-bákan, ṣùgbọ́n kòsí àni-àní wipe Ayr yẹ láti borí ninu ìdíje ọjọ́ náà yìí tójẹ́ apanilẹ́ẹ̀rín tótún yanilẹ́nu ninu Ìṣọ̀rí Aláàkọ́kọ́ ti Tennent.

translation.unyo: Bayii awon ni o wa looke tabili naa, iko kan soso ninu mewaa tiwon ko tii lu ri.
translation.dcyo: Báyìí àwọn ni ó wà lóòkè tábìlì náà, ikọ̀ kan ṣoṣo ninu mẹ́wàá tíwọn kò tíì lù rí.

translation.unyo: Ni opin re, aabo won togbopon ni, pelu pe won nsamulo awon anfaani lona todara ju, eyiti o gbe iko ti ile naa ti olukoni won si ni gbogbo eto lati maa dunnu.
translation.dcyo: Ní òpin rẹ̀, ààbò wọn tógbópọn ni, pẹ̀lú pé wọ́n ńṣàmúlò àwọn àǹfààní lọ́ná tódára jù, eyiti ó gbé ikọ̀ ti ilé náà tí olùkọ́ni wọn sì ní gbogbo ẹ̀tọ́ láti máa dunnú.

translation.unyo: ''A ti dan wa wo ninu awon ayo wa titi de ibi yii, atipe sibe kosi eniti o tii lu wa, nitorinaa Mo nilati maa dunnu,'' ni o so.
translation.dcyo: ''A ti dán wa wò nínú àwọn ayò wa tìtí dé ibí yìí, àtipé síbẹ̀ kòsí ẹnití ó tíì lù wá, nitorinaa Mo nílatí máa dunnú,'' ni ó sọ.

translation.unyo: Robyn Christie ti Melrose sope: ''Osuba lo sodo Ayr, won samulo awon anfaani won lona todara ju bi awa tise lo.''
translation.dcyo: Robyn Christie ti Melrose sọpé: ''Òṣùba lọ sọ́dọ̀ Ayr, wọ́n ṣàmúlò àwọn àǹfààní wọn lọ́nà tódára ju bí àwa tiṣe lọ.''

translation.unyo: Igbiyanju iseju ikerinla ti Grant Anderson, ti a yipada nipase Frazier Climo, fi Ayr siwaju, sugbon kaadi alawo ofeeefe kan fun onifila ile Scotland Rory Hughes, ti Warriors fi sile fun idije naa, gba Melrose laye lati jeki awon nomba soro ti Jason Baggot si sare di igbiyanju kan ti a ko yipada mu.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbìyànjú ìṣẹ́jú ìkẹrìnlá ti Grant Anderson, ti a yípada nípaṣẹ̀ Frazier Climo, fi Ayr síwájú, ṣùgbọ́n káàdì aláwọ̀ òfééèfé kan fún onífìla ilẹ̀ Scotland Rory Hughes, tí Warriors fi sílẹ̀ fún ìdíje náà, gba Melrose láyè láti jẹ́kí àwọn nọmba sọ̀rọ̀ tí Jason Baggot sì sáré di ìgbìyànjú kan tí a kò yípadà mu.

translation.unyo: Climo fe ilewaju Ayr loju pelu ijiya penariti kan, saaju, ni idaji akoko gan-an, o gba ayo wole leyin naa o yi igbiyanju alaadase kan pada lati so o di 17-5 fun Ayr ni akoko isinmi naa.
translation.dcyo: Climo fẹ ìléwájú Ayr lójú pẹ̀lú ìjìyà pẹnariti kan, saájú, ní ìdajì àkókò gan-an, ó gbá ayò wọlé lẹ́yìn náà ó yí ìgbìyànjú aláàdáṣe kan padà láti sọ ọ́ di 17-5 fún Ayr ní àkókò ìsinmi náà.

translation.unyo: Sugbon Melrose bere idaji idije eleekeji naa lona todara ti igbiyanju Patrick Anderson, ti Baggot yipada si din iyato naa ku si awon koko maarun.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n Melrose bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìdajì ìdíje ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì náà lọ́nà tódára tí ìgbìyànjú Patrick Anderson, tí Baggot yípadà sì dín ìyàtọ̀ náà kù sí àwọn kókó máàrún.

translation.unyo: Idaduro gigun kan wa leyin naa fun ifarapa pupo ti Ruaridh Knott ni, eniti won gbe jade kuro, atipe lati atunbere naa, Ayr tun yori siwaju nipase igbiyanju Stafford McDowall kan, eyiti won yipada lati owo Climo.
translation.dcyo: Ìdádúró gígùn kan wà lẹ́yìn náà fún ìfarapa púpọ̀ tí Ruaridh Knott ní, ẹnití wọ́n gbé jáde kúrò, àtipé láti àtúnbẹ̀rẹ̀ náà, Ayr tún yọrí síwájú nípaṣẹ̀ ìgbìyànjú Stafford McDowall kan, eyití wọ́n yípadà láti ọwọ́ Climo.

translation.unyo: Adele balogun ti Ayr Blair Macpherson niwon fun ni kaadi alawo ofeeefe leyin naa, atipe leekan sii, Melrose jeki okunrin afikun naa sanwo pelu igbiyanju Bruce Colvine kan tiwon ko yipada, ni opin eedi oni-idaamu to gbona gidigidi kan.
translation.dcyo: Adele balógun ti Ayr Blair Macpherson niwọ́n fún ní káàdì aláwọ̀ òfééèfé lẹ́yìn náà, àtipé lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi, Melrose jẹ́kì ọkùnrin àfikún náà sanwó pẹ̀lú ìgbìyànjú Bruce Colvine kan tíwọn kò yípadà, ní òpin èèdi oní-ìdààmu tó gbóná gidigidi kan.

translation.unyo: Iko onile naa pada wa, labe botiwukori, atipe nigbati won fun Struan Hutchinson ni kaadi alawo ofeeefe fun titako Climo laisi boolu, lati ibi ila ijiya penariti, MacPherson fese kan ile leyin oolu awon Ayr to ntesiwaju.
translation.dcyo: Ikọ̀ onílé náà padà wá, lábẹ̀ botiwukori, àtipé nigbati wọ́n fún Struan Hutchinson ni káàdì aláwọ̀ òfééèfé fún títako Climo láìsí bọ́ọ̀lù, láti ibi ìlà ìjìyà pẹnariti, MacPherson fẹṣẹ̀ kan ilẹ̀ lẹ́yìn òòlù àwọn Ayr tó ńtẹ̀síwájú.

translation.unyo: Climo yi pada, bi o tunse se n’ibere, leyin ti Kyle Rowe gba boolu ti David Armstrong gba lati inu apoti ti o si fi onipo-igun ranse sita fun igbiyanju eleekaarun fun awon iko onile naa.
translation.dcyo: Climo yí padà, bí ó tunṣe ṣe n’ibẹ̀rẹ̀, lẹ́yìn tí Kyle Rowe gba bọ́ọ̀lù ti David Armstrong gbá lati inú apoti tí ó sì fi onípò-igun ránṣẹ́ síta fún ìgbìyànjú ẹlẹẹ̀kaàrún fun àwọn ikọ̀ onílé náà.

translation.unyo: Irawo Still Game dabi eniti oti setan fun ise-ise tuntun ni ile ise eka ti olounje.
translation.dcyo: Ìràwọ Still Game dábì ẹniti óti ṣetán fún iṣẹ́-ìṣe tuntun ní ilé iṣẹ́ ẹka ti olóúnjẹ.

translation.unyo: Irawo Still Game Ford Kieran dabi enito setan lati lo sinu ile ise ti eka olounje leyin tiwon sawari wipe won ti daruko re gegebi oludari ile ise toni awon ile isounjeta oniiwe-ase kan.
translation.dcyo: Ìràwọ Still Game Ford Kieran dábì ẹnitó ṣetán láti lọ sínú ilé iṣẹ́ ti ẹka olóúnjẹ lẹ́yìn tíwọ́n ṣàwárí wipe wọ́n ti dárúkọ rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́bí olùdarí ile iṣẹ́ tóní àwọn ile ìsoúnjẹta oníìwé-àṣẹ kan.

translation.unyo: Eni odun merindinlogota naa lo nkopa bii Jack Jarvis lori eto BBC to gbajumo naa, nibiti o ti nkowe to si ndijo sere pelu akegbe alaawada olojo-pipe Greg Hemphill.
translation.dcyo: Ẹni ọdún mẹ́rìndínlọ́gọ́ta náà ló ńkópa bíi Jack Jarvis lórí ètò BBC tó gbajúmọ̀ náà, níbití ó ti ńkọ̀wé tó sì ńdìjọ ṣeré pẹ̀lú akẹgbẹ́ aláàwàdà ọlọ́jọ́-pípẹ́ Greg Hemphill.

translation.unyo: Awon mejeeji ti kede wipe onisise-n-tele ikeesan to nbo naa yoo je ikeyin ninu ere ti eto naa, ti o si dabi wipe Kiernan nseto fun igbesi-aye leyin Craiglang.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn méjèèjì ti kédé wipe oníṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé ìkẹẹ̀sán tó ńbọ náà yóò jẹ́ ìkẹyìn ninu eré ti ètò náà, tí o sì dàbí wípé Kiernan ńṣètò fún ìgbésí-ayé lẹ́yìn Craiglang.

translation.unyo: Gegebi awon atoko akosile ile ise, oun ni oludari Adriftmorn Limited.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn àtòkọ àkọsìlẹ́ ilé iṣẹ́, òun ni olùdarí Adriftmorn Limited.

translation.unyo: Osere naa ko lati soro itan naa, botilejepe orisun iwe iroyin Scottish Sun yo o sope Kiernan ti nfoju wa ona lati dasi ''oko-owo ile ise olounje to ngberu'' ti Glasgow.
translation.dcyo: Òṣèré náà kọ láti sọ̀rọ̀ ìtàn náà, botilẹjẹpe orísun ìwé ìròyìn Scottish Sun yọ́ ọ sọpé Kiernan tí ńfojú wá ọ̀nà láti dásí ''oko-òwò ilé iṣẹ́ olóúnjẹ tó ńgbèrú'' ti Glasgow.

translation.unyo: 'Okun naa je tiwa': Orile-ede Bolifia ti ile gbigbe yipo patapata nreti wipe ile ejo yoo tun si ona sinu okun Pasifiiki
translation.dcyo: 'Òkun náà jẹ́ tiwa': Orilẹ-ede Bolifia tí ilẹ̀ gbígbẹ yípo pátápátá ńretí wipe ilé ẹjọ́ yóò tún sí ọ̀nà sínú òkun Pàsífíìkì

translation.unyo: Awon omo ogun ori-omi nlo kaakiri yika awon olu ile ise awon omo ogun ori-omi tiwon wo laso ni ilu La Paz.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ ogun orí-omi ńlọ káàkiri yíka àwọn olú ilé iṣẹ àwọn ọmọ ogun orí-omi tíwọn wọ̀ lásọ ní ìlú La Paz.

translation.unyo: Awon ile ijoba ngbe asia alawo omi okun soke.
translation.dcyo: Awọn ilé ìjọba ńgbé àsìá aláwọ omi òkun sókê.

translation.unyo: Awon ibudo awon omo ogun ori-omi lati adagun Titicaca si Amazon naa ni won le akomona naa mope: ''Okun naa je tiwa nipa eto.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ibùdó àwọn ọmọ ogun orí-omi láti adágún Titicaca sí Amazon náà ni wọ́n lẹ àkọmọ̀nà náà mọ́pé: ''Òkun náà jẹ́ tiwa nípa ẹ̀tọ́.

translation.unyo: Lati gba a pada je ojuse kan.''
translation.dcyo: Láti gbà á padà jẹ́ ojúṣe kan.''

translation.unyo: Jake-jado orile-ede Bolifia ti ile gbigbe yi kaakiri, iranti ti bebe okun tiwon padanu sowo orile-ede Sile ninu aawo ohun amusoro ti ogoorun odun ikokandinlogun ninu eyiti eje ti san si han kedere - gegebi ipongbe lati tun tuko lori okun Pasifiiki leekan sii.
translation.dcyo: Jákè-jádò orilẹ-ede Bolifia tí ilẹ̀ gbígbẹ yí káàkiri, ìrántí ti bèbè òkun tíwọ́n pàdánù sọ́wọ́ orilẹ-ede Ṣílè nínú aáwọ̀ ohun àmúṣọrọ̀ ti ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún ìkọkàndínlógún ninu eyiti ẹ̀jẹ̀ ti sàn sì hàn kedere - gẹ́gẹ́bí ìpòǹgbẹ láti tún tukọ̀ lórí òkun Pasífíìkì lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi.

translation.unyo: Awon ireti wonyen ni won wa ni boya nipo toga julo ninu awon odun, bi orile-ede Bolifia ti nduro de idajo ile ejo agbaye lojo ikinni osu Owara leyin awon ifikunlukun odun maarun.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìrètí wọ̀nyẹn ní wọ́n wà ní bóyá nípò tóga jùlọ ninu àwọn ọdún, bí orilẹ-ede Bolifia ti ńdúró dé ìdájọ́ ilé ẹjọ́ àgbáyé lọ́jọ́ ìkínní oṣù Ọ̀wàrà lẹ́yìn àwọn ìfikùnlukùn ọdún máàrún.

translation.unyo: ''Bolifia ni ipa naa to nti, emi isokan ati ibale-okan, ti o si nreti abajade naa pelu oju-iwoye rere,'' gege bii Roberto Calzadilla, asoju orile-ede Bolifia kan se so.
translation.dcyo: ''Bolifia ni ipá náà tó ńti, ẹ̀mí ìṣọ̀kan àti ìbàlẹ̀-ọkàn, tí ó sì ńretí àbájáde náà pẹ̀lú ojú-ìwòye rere,'' gẹgẹ bíi Roberto Calzadilla, aṣojú orilẹ-ede Bolifia kan ṣe sọ.

translation.unyo: Opo awon omo orile-ede Bolifia yoo idajo ICJ naa lori awon oju-iworan nla jake-jado orile-ede naa, pelu ireti wipe igbimo idajo naa ni The Hague yoo fi oju rere wo awijare Bolifia wipe - leyin awon odun ti awon oro ti ko yorisi rere - orile-ede Sile wa labe ojuse toje danfan eyiti o nfun Bolifia ni eto si ona lati jade si okun naa.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Bolifia yóô ìdájọ́ ICJ náà lórí àwọn ojú-ìwòran ńlá jáke-jádò orilẹ-ede náà, pẹ̀lú ìrètí wipe ìgbìmọ ìdájọ́ náà ní The Hague yóò fi ojú rere wo àwíjàre Bolifia wipe - lẹ́yìn àwọn ọdún ti àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tí kò yọrísí rere - orilẹ-ede Ṣílè wà lábẹ́ ojúṣe tójẹ́ danfan eyiti ó ńfún Bolifia ní ẹ̀tọ́ sí ọ̀nà láti jade sí òkun náà.

translation.unyo: Evo Morales, aare orile-ede Bolifia toje ojulowo omo ilu taye nfe - eniti on ja ija alaariyanjiyan atun dibo yan lodun to nbo - ti o si ni igun pupo lati se bakannaa lori idajo ti ojo Aje .
translation.dcyo: Evo Morales, ààrẹ orilẹ-ede Bolifia tójẹ́ ojúlówó ọmọ ìlú táyé ńfẹ́ - ẹniti on ja ìjà aláàríyànjiyàn atún dìbò yàn lọ́dún tó ńbọ̀ - tí ó sì̀ ní igùn púpọ̀ láti ṣe bákannáa lórí ìdájọ́ ti ọjọ́ Aje ́.

translation.unyo: o seleri ni opin osu Ogun pe ''A ti sunmo pipada si Okun Pasifiki gidi gaan''.
translation.dcyo: ó ṣèlérí ní òpin oṣù Ògún pe ''A ti súnmọ pípadà sí Òkun Pàsif́ìkì gidi gáàn''.

translation.unyo: Sugbon awon omoran kan gbagbo wipe kosee se ki ile ejo pinnu lona ti yoo se orile-ede Bolifia ni rere - atipe nnkan kekere ni yoo yipada bi o ba see.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọ̀mọràn kan gbàgbọ́ wipe kòṣeé ṣe kí ilé ẹjọ́ pinnu lọ́nà ti yóò ṣe orilẹ-ede Bolifia ní rere - àtipé nǹkan kékeré ni yóò yípadà bí ó bá ṣée.

translation.unyo: Ajo UN naa tofidi kale si orile-ede Nedalandi koni agbara lati fi ile Sili danilola, atipe o ti so wipe oun koni pinnu abajade awon oro ti o see se.
translation.dcyo: Àjọ UN náà tófìdí kalẹ̀ sí orilẹ-ede Nẹdáláǹdi kòní agbára láti fi ilẹ̀ Ṣílì dánilọ́lá, àtipé ó ti sọ wipe òun kòni pinnu àbájáde àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tí ó ṣeé ṣe.

translation.unyo: Wipe idajo ICJ naa nwaye ni osu mefa pere leyin tiwon gbo awon awijare igbeyin tokasii pe ejo naa ''ko ta koko’,-  gege bii Paz Zarate, omo orile-ede Sile kan toje akosemose ninu ofin agbaye se so.
translation.dcyo: Wipe ìdájọ́ ICJ náà ńwáyé ní oṣù mẹ́fà péré lẹ́yìn tíwọ́n gbọ́ àwọn àwíjàre ìgbẹ̀yìn tọ́kasíi pé ẹjọ́ náà ''kò ta kókó’,-  gẹgẹ bíi Paz Zárate, ọmọ orilẹ-ede Ṣílè kan tójẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ninu òfin àgbáyé ṣe sọ.

translation.unyo: Atipe ni jijinna si mimu itesiwaju ba ilepa orile-ede Bolifia, awon odun merin naa tokoja lee ti fa a seyin.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé ní jíjìnnà sí mímú ìtẹ̵̀síwájú bá ìlépa orilẹ-ede Bolifia, àwọn ọdún mẹ́rin náà tókọjá leè ti fà á sẹ́yìn.

translation.unyo: “Oro nipa atironade okun naa ni isakoso orile-ede Bolifia towa lowolowo naa ti ja gba,'' gege bii Zarate se so.
translation.dcyo: “Ọ̀rọ̀ nípa àtirọ́nàde òkun náà ni ìṣàkóso orilẹ-ede Bolifia tówà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ náà ti já gbà,'' gẹgẹ bíi Zárate ṣe sọ.

translation.unyo: Oro onija dundun ti Morales ti fa ife inu rere toseku ti orile-ede Bolifia mu tan, ni o da laaba.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀rọ̀ oníjà dúndùn ti Morales ti fa ìfẹ́ inú rere tóṣékù ti orilẹ-ede Bolifia mu tán, ni ó dá láàbá.

translation.unyo: Orile-ede Bolifia ati Sili yoo tesiwaju lati maa soro ni awon ibi kan, sugbon yoo soro gidigidi lati ni awon ijiroro leyin eyi.
translation.dcyo: Orilẹ-ede Bolifia àti Ṣílì̀ yóò tẹ̀síwajú láti máa sọ̀rọ̀ ni àwọn ibi kan, ṣùgbọ́n yóò ṣòro gidigidi láti ní àwọn ìjíròrò lẹ́yìn èyí.

translation.unyo: Awon orile-ede meji naa ko tii se pasipaaro awon asoju lati odun 1962.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn orilẹ-ede méjì náà kò tíì ṣe pàsípààrọ̀ àwọn aṣoju láti ọdún 1962.

translation.unyo: Aare teleri Eduardo Rodriguez Veltze, asoju orile-ede Bolifia ni The Hague, ko erongba naa wipe ipinnu-sise ti ile-ejo naa tiya kiakia ju botiye lo.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ tẹ́lẹ̀rí Eduardo Rodriguez Veltzé, aṣojú orilẹ-ede Bolifia ní The Hague, kọ èròǹgbà náà wipe ìpinnu-ṣíṣe ti ilé-ẹjọ́ náà tiyá kíakía ju bótiyẹ lọ.

translation.unyo: O sowipe Ojo Aje yoo mu orile-ede Bolifia wonu ''anfaani tose ara-oto kan lati si igba otun ti awon ibasepo pelu orile-ede Sili'' ati aaye kan lati ''fi opin si awon odun mokandinlogoje ti awon ede-aiyede pelu awon anfaani alaajumoje”.
translation.dcyo: O sowipe Ọjọ́ Ajé yóò mu orilẹ-ede Bolifia wọnú ''ànfààní tóṣe àrà-ọ̀tọ̀ kan láti sí ìgbà ọ̀tun ti àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú orilẹ-ede Ṣílì̀'' àti ààyè kan láti ''fi òpin sí àwọn ọdún mọ́kàndínlógóje ti àwọn èdé-àìyedè pẹ̀lú àwọn àǹfààní aláàjùmọ̀je”̣̣.

translation.unyo: Bakannaa Calzadilla tun se wipe Morales - to si je okan ninu awon aare ile Latinni Amerika to gbajumo julo - nlo oro igboke-gbodo lori omi okun bi opakutele oselu kan.
translation.dcyo: Bákannáà Calzadilla tún ṣẹ́ wipe Morales - tó sí jẹ ọ̀kan ninu àwọn ààrẹ̀ ilẹ Latinni Amẹ́ríkà tó gbajúmọ̀ jùlọ - ńlo ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbòke-gbodò lórí omi òkun bí ọ̀pákùtẹ̀lẹ̀ òṣèlú kan.

translation.unyo: o tun fi kun un pe Bolifia koni fi eto re si Okun Pasifiiki naa sile lailai’.
translation.dcyo: ó tun fi kún un pe Bolifia kòní fi ẹ̀tọ́ rẹ̀ sí Òkun Pàsífíìkì náà sílẹ̀ láíláí’.

translation.unyo: ''Idajo naa je anfaani lati ri i pe a ni lati bori ohun atijo naa
translation.dcyo: ''Ìdájọ́ náà jẹ àǹfààní láti rí i pé a nì láti borí ohun àtijọ́ náà

translation.unyo: Orile-ede Ariwa Koria sope kiko awon ado oloro danu koni sele ayafi ti oun ba lee gba orile-ede US gbo
translation.dcyo: Orilẹ-ede Àrìwá Kòríà sọpé kíkó àwọn àdó olóro dánù kòní ṣẹlẹ́ àyàfi tí òun bá leè gba orilẹ-ede US gbọ́

translation.unyo: Alaakoso Oro Ile Okeere ti orile-ede Ariwa Koria Ri Yong sope orile-ede oun koni ko awon ohun ija ado oloro re danu lailai bi koba lee gba orile-ede Washington gbo.
translation.dcyo: Aláàkóso Ọ̀rọ̀ Ilẹ̀ Òkèèrè ti orilẹ-ede Àrìwá Kòríà Ri Yong sọpé orilẹ-ede òun kòni kó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóro rẹ̀ dánù láilái bí kòbá leè gba orilẹ-ede Washingtọn gbọ́.

translation.unyo: Ri nsoro lojo Abameta nibi Ipejopo Gbogbogboo ti Ajo Isokan Agbaye naa.
translation.dcyo: Ri ńsọ̀rọ̀ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta níbi Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbòò ti Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àgbáyé náà.

translation.unyo: O pe orile-ede Amerika lati tele awon ileri ti o se nigba ipade kan ni orile-ede Singapore laarin awon adari ti nba ara won se orogun naa.
translation.dcyo: Ó pe orilẹ-ede Àmẹ́ríkà láti tẹ̀lé àwọn ìlérí tí ó ṣe nígbà ìpàdé kan ní orilẹ-ede Singapore láàrin àwọn adarí tí ńbá ara wọn ṣe orogún náà.

translation.unyo: Awon oro re wa bi US. Akowe ti Ile Okeere Mike Pompeo ti nse bi eniti o wa ni bebe atitunbere ijiroro lori oro ado oloro toti duro soju kan ju osu meta leyin ti Singapore naa pelu Kim Jong Un ti Ariwa Koria.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ wá bí US. Akọwe ti Ilẹ̀ Òkèèrè Mike Pompeo ti ńṣe bí ẹnití ó wà ní bèbe àtítúnbẹ̀rẹ̀ ìjíròrò lórí ọ̀rọ̀ àdó olóró tóti dúró sójú kan ju oṣù mẹ́ta lẹ́yìn ti Singapore náà pẹ̀lú Kim Jong Un ti Àríwá Kòríà.

translation.unyo: Ri sope o je ''ala ti ko lee se'' kan wipe awon ijeniniya to ntesiwaju ati atako ti U.S. si ikede kan to npari Ogun Koria yoo mu Ariwa naa wa sori awon orunkun re.
translation.dcyo: Ri sọpé ó jẹ́ ''àlá tí kò leè ṣẹ'' kan wipe àwọn ìjẹniníyà tó ńtẹ̀síwájú àti àtakò ti U.S. sí ìkéde kan tó ńparí Ogun Kòríà yóò mú Àríwá náà wá sórí àwọn orúnkún rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Washington nsorase lati faramo ikede naa laije wipe Pyongyang koko gbe awon igbese pataki lati ko awon nnkan ogun danu.
translation.dcyo: Washington ńsọ́raṣè láti faramọ́ ìkéde náà láijẹ́ wipe Pyongyang kọ́kọ́ gbé àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ pàtàkì láti kó àwọn nǹkan ogun dánù.

translation.unyo: Kim ati U.S. Aare Donald Trump fe ipade eleekeji.
translation.dcyo: Kim àti U.S. Ààrẹ Donald Trump fẹ́ ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì.

translation.unyo: Sugbon isiyemeji totan kaakiri wa wipe Pyongyang  kofi oro sere nipa kiko awon nnkan ogun ti orile-ede naa ri bi ona kan soso lati jeki aabo re daju sile.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n ìsiyèméjì tótàn káàkiri wà wipe Pyongyang  kòfi ọ̀rọ̀ ṣeré nípa kíkọ àwọn nǹkan ogun tí orilẹ-ede náà rí bí ọ̀nà kan ṣoṣo láti jẹ́kí ààbò rẹ̀ dájú sílẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Pompeo nseto lati sabewo si Pyongyang losu to nbo lati gbaradi fun ipade eleekeji Kim-Trump kan.
translation.dcyo: Pompeo ńṣètò láti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Pyongyang lóṣù tó ńbọ láti gbaradì fún ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì Kim-Trump kan.

translation.unyo: Afihan aso wiwo ti ilu Paris fi ila asesejade tuntun ninu nnkan awosori topolokan loju ona re si Opopona High nitosi re.
translation.dcyo: Àfihàn aṣọ wíwọ̀ ti ìlú Paris fi ìlà àṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀jáde tuntun ninu nǹkan àwọ̀sóri tópọlọ́kan lójú ọ̀nà rẹ̀ sí Òpópónà High nítòsí rẹ.

translation.unyo: Bi o bafe mu igbega ba akojopo ate-ori re tabi ki o dinamo oorun naa patapata mase wa a lo siwaju mo.
translation.dcyo: Bí o báfẹ́ mú ìgbéga bá àkójọpọ̀ ate-orí rẹ tàbí kí o dínàmọ́ òòrùn náà pátápátá máṣe wá a lọ síwájú mọ́.

translation.unyo: Awon aranso Valentino ati Thom Browne si oju akojopo awon aso wiwo ori won eyiti o buyaari fun akojopo SS19 won loju ona-ere naa eyiti o ta akojopo irufe won yo nibi Ose Afihan Aso ni Ilu Paris.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn aránsọ Valentino àti Thom Browne sị́́ óju àkójọpọ àwọn asọ wíwọ̀ orí wọn eyiti o bùyààri fún àkójọpọ̀ SS19 wọn lójú ọ̀nà-eré náà eyiti o ta àkojọpọ̀ irúfẹ́ wọn yọ níbi Ọ̀sẹ̀ Àfihàn Asọ ní Ìlú Paris.

translation.unyo: Awon ate-ori ti kosee lo lona toga ti gba Instagram pata nigba ooru yii ti awon aranso wonyi si ti fi awon iseda won to nseju sini ranse si isale awon ona tooro naa.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ate-ori tí kòṣeé lò lọ́nà tóga ti gba Instagram pátá nígbà ooru yìí ti àwọn aránsọ wọ̀nyí sì ti fi àwọn ìṣẹ̀dá wọn tó ńṣẹ́jú síni ránṣẹ́ sí ìsàlẹ̀ àwọn ọ̀nà tóóró náa.

translation.unyo: Ise ara-oto kan totayo lati owo Valentino ni ate alawo buraun to-n-foloke eyiti won fi asomo todabi iye si eti-oke re tokun gbogbo ori awon awose naa.
translation.dcyo: Iṣẹ́ ara-ọ̀tọ̀ kan tótayọ láti ọwọ́ Valentino ni ate aláwọ̀ búráùn tó-ń-fòlókè eyiti wọ́n fi àṣomọ́ tódàbí ìyẹ́ sí etí-òkè rẹ̀ tókún gbogbo orí àwọn àwòṣe náà.

translation.unyo: Awon asomo ti iwon won po lapoju ni awon egusi-olomi tiwon se looso, ate-ori oso kan ati opon-oyinbo kan - sugbon won ko ran won lati jeki ori re moooru.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àṣomọ tí ìwọ̀n wọn pọ̀ lápọ̀jù ní àwọn ẹ̀gúsí-olómi tíwọ́n ṣe lọ́ọ̀ṣọ́, ate-orí oṣó kan àti ọ̀pọ̀n-òyìnbó kan - ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò rán wọn láti jẹ́kí ori rẹ móooru.

translation.unyo: Thom Browne tun safihan asayan ti awon iboju tokoyinsaye - tiwon si de laakoko toye fun ajodun Halloween.
translation.dcyo: Thom Browne tún ṣàfihàn àṣàyan ti àwọn ìbòjú tókọyìnsáyé - tíwọn sí dé láàkókò tóyẹ fún àjọdún Halloween.

translation.unyo: Pupo ninu awon iboju naa niwon ran awon ete won pa ti won si jo Olori-ogun Hannibal Lecter ju awon aso to ngbayi lode iwoyi lo.
translation.dcyo: Púpọ̀ ninu àwọn ìbòjú náà niwọ́n rán àwọn ètè wọn pa ti wọ́n sì jọ Olóri-ogun Hannibal Lecter ju àwọn asọ tó ńgbayì lóde ìwòyí lọ.

translation.unyo: Iseda kan jo awon aso ero ibelumi ti o pe pelu ero amunimilabe-omi ati awon awo oju, nigbati omiran wo bii okoto ohun mimu aladun didi bii yinyin toti yo.
translation.dcyo: Ìṣẹdá kan jọ àwọn asọ ẹ̀rọ ìbẹ́lumi tí ó pé pẹ̀lu ẹ̀rọ amúnimílábẹ-omi àti àwọn awò ojú, nigbati òmíràn wò bíi òkòtó ohun mímu aládùn dídì bíi yìnyín tóti yo.

translation.unyo: Atipe bi o ba tesiwaju pelu gbolohun aso igbalode to gbooro naa- o se oriire.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé bí ó bá tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú gbólóhùn asọ ìgbàlódé tó gbòòrò náà- ó ṣe oríire.

translation.unyo: Awon oluworan ara sotele wipe awon ate-ori titobi tiwon nsomo agbon naa lee maa wa ona won de awon opopona nla nitosi re.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn olùwòran àrà sọtẹ́lẹ̀ wipe àwọn ate-ori títóbi tíwọn ńsomó àgbọ̀n náà leè máa wá ọ̀nà wọn dé àwọn òpópónà ńlá nítòsí rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Awon ate-ori oniwon-nla naa de ni yajoyajo leyin gigirise ti 'La Bomba', ate-ori tiwon fi iko hun pelu eti oniwon ese bata meji ni fife eyiti won nri lori gbogbo eniyan lati ori Rihanna de Emily Ratajkowski.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ate-ori oníwọn-ńlá náà dé ní yàjóyàjó lẹ́yìn gìgìrísẹ̀ ti 'La Bomba', ate-ori tíwọn fi ìko hun pẹ̀lú etí oníwọn ẹsẹ̀ bàtà méjì ní fífẹ̀ eyiti wọ́n ńrí lórí gbogbo eniyan láti orí Rihanna dé Emily Ratajkowski.

translation.unyo: Alemo esin naa towa leyin ate-ori tosoro lati lo  tiwon fon kaakiri oju-opo ibasepo ayelujara fi iseda nla miran ranse sisale oju irin naa - apo etikun tiwon fi iko hun ti o fere tobi to aso iwelodo awose naa ti o ko o jo papo.
translation.dcyo: Àlẹ̀mọ́ ẹ̀ṣìn náà tówà lẹ́yìn ate-ori tóṣòro láti lò  tíwọ́n fọ́n káàkiri ojú-òpò ìbáṣepọ̀ ayelujara fi ìṣẹ̀dá ńlá miran rańṣẹ́ sísàlẹ̀ ojú ìrìn náá - àpò etíkun tíwọ́n fi ìko hun tí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ tóbi tó asọ ìwẹ̀lódò àwòṣe náà tí ó kó o jọ papọ̀.

translation.unyo: Apo raffia alawo omi-osan toti jona naa, tiwon fi raffia gba leti tiwon si fi awo funfun kan se ifalowo re, ni o daduro yato nibi akojopo ti Jacquemus' La Riviera SS19 ni Ose Afihan Aso ni Ilu Paris.
translation.dcyo: Àpọ raffia aláwọ̀ omi-ọsàn tóti jóna náà, tíwọn fi raffia gbá létí tíwọ́n sì fi awọ funfun kan ṣe ìfàlọ́wọ́ rẹ̀, ni ó dádúró yàtọ̀ níbi àkójọpọ̀ ti Jacquemus' La Riviera SS19 ní Ọ̀sẹ̀ Àfihàn Asọ ní Ìlu Paris.

translation.unyo: Ilumooka gbajumo afasodara Luke Armitage so fun FEMAIL: ''Mo nreti lati ri awon ate-ori nla ati awon apo ifalowo etikun ni opopona nla fun igba ooru tokan - bi aranso naa ti seda iru ipa titobi yoo soro lati foju fo awon ibeere fun awon asomo oniwon-topolapoju naa.
translation.dcyo: Ìlúmọ̀ọ́ká gbajúmọ̀ afasọdárà Luke Armitage sọ fún FEMAIL: ''Mo ńretí láti rí àwọn ate-ori ńlá àti awọn àpò ìfàlọ́wọ́ etíkun ní òpópónà ńlá fún ìgba ooru tókàn - bí aránsọ náà ti ṣèdá irú ipa títóbi yóò ṣòro láti fóju fo àwọn ìbéèrè fún àwọn àṣomọ́ oníwọ̀n-tópọ̀lápọ̀jù náà.

translation.unyo: John Edward: Awon imo ede je koseemaani fun awon omo ilu agbaye
translation.dcyo: John Edward: Àwọn ìmọ̀ èdè jẹ kòṣeémáàní fún àwọn ọmọ ìlú àgbáyé

translation.unyo: Awon ile iwe olominira ti ile Sikotiland nsi riipe akosile eyiti o laami-laaka won ninu eko totayo si wa sibe, ti eyi si ntesiwaju lodun 2018 pelu akojopo awon esi idanwo miran, eyiti won fun lagbara nipa aseyori enikookan ati alapapo ninu ere idaraya, ise-owo, orin ati awon idawole awujo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ti ilẹ̀ Sikọtiland ńsì ríipé àkọsílẹ̀ eyiti o lààmì-laaka wọn ninu ẹ̀kọ́ tótayọ sì wà síbẹ̀, tí èyí sì ńtẹ̀síwájú lọ́dún 2018 pẹ̀lú àkójọpọ̀ àwọn èsì ìdánwò miran, eyiti wọ́n fún lágbára nípa àṣeyọrí ẹnìkọ̀òkan àti alápapọ̀ ninu eré ìdárayá, iṣẹ́-ọwọ́, orin àti àwọn ìdáwọlé àwùjọ.

translation.unyo: Pelu awon akekoo tiwon to egberun lona ogbon jake-jado Sikotiland, awon ile iwe wonyi, ti igbimo ti awon Ile iwe olominira Ile Sikotiland nsoju fun. ngbiyanju lati maa pese ise onipele todara julo fun awon akekoo ati awon obi won.
translation.dcyo: Pẹ̀lu àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tíwọ́n tó ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ọgbọ̀n jákè-jádò Sikọtiland, àwọn ilé ìwé wọ̀nyí, ti igbìmọ̀ ti àwọn Ilé ìwé olómìnira Ilẹ Sikotiland ńṣojú fún. ńgbìyaǹjú láti máa pèsè iṣẹ́ onípele tódára jùlọ fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti àwọn òbí wọn.

translation.unyo: Awon ile iwe olominira nlepa lati gba awon akekoo won laradi fun eko tojinle ti o siga sii, ise-ise tiwon yan laayo ati ipo won gegebi omo ilu agbaye.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ńlépa láti gba àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wọn lárádi fún ẹ̀kọ́ tójinlẹ̀ tí o síga síi, iṣẹ́-ìṣe tíwọ́n yàn láàyò àti ipò wọn gẹ̵́gẹ́bí ọmọ ìlú àgbáyé.

translation.unyo: Bi eka eto eko kan eyiti o lee sagbekale eto ti o si lee samulo eto ikekoo ti ile iwe asetera-enilorun kan, a nri awon ede olaju to ntesiwaju bi ise kan togbajumo taye-nfe laarin awon ile iwe.
translation.dcyo: Bí ẹ̀ka ètò ẹ̀kọ́ kan eyiti ó leè ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ètò tí ó sì leè ṣàmúlò ètò ìkẹkọ̀ọ́ ti ilé ìwé àṣetẹ́ra-ẹnilọ́rùn kan, a ńrí àwọn èdè ọ̀làjù tó ńtẹ̀síwájú bí iṣẹ́ kan tógbajúmọ̀ táyé-ńfẹ́ láàrin àwọn ilé ìwé.

translation.unyo: Nelson Mandela sope: ''Bi o ba soro si okunrin kan ni ede ti o ye e, iyen yoo wo inu ori re lo.
translation.dcyo: Nelson Mandela sọpé: ''Bí o bá sọ̀rọ̀ sí ọkùnrin kan ní èdè tí ó yé e, ìyẹn yóò wọ inú orí rẹ lọ.

translation.unyo: Bi o ba soro si i ni ede tie gan-an iyen yoo wo inu okan re lo.''
translation.dcyo: Bí o bá sọ̀rọ̀ sí i ní èdè tiẹ gan-aṇ̀ ìyẹn yóò wọ inú ọkàn rẹ lọ.''

translation.unyo: Eyi je irannileti tolagbara kan wipe a ko kan lee gbarale ede Geesi nigbati a bafe sagbero awon ibasepo pelu awon eniyan lati awon orile-ede miran.
translation.dcyo: Èyí jẹ́ ìránnilétí tólágbára kan wipe a kò kàn leè gbáralé èdé Gẹ́ẹ̀si nigbati a báfẹ ṣàgbéró àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn eniyan latí àwọn orilẹ-ede miran.

translation.unyo: Lati awon esi idanwo aipe ti odun yii, a lee rii pe awon ede lo nwa loke awon tabili liigi naa  pelu awon odiwon isowoyege laarin awon ile iwe olominira.
translation.dcyo: Láti àwọn èsì ìdánwò àìpẹ́ ti ọdún yìí, a leè ríi pé àwọn èdè ló ńwà lókè àwọn tábìlì líìgí náà  pẹ̀lú àwọn òdiwọn ìṣọwọ́yege láàrin àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira.

translation.unyo: Apapo ida mejidinlaadorin ninu ida ogoorun awon akekoo ti won ko ede ile okeere logba giredi Giga A.
translation.dcyo: Àpapọ ìdá méjìdínláàdọrin ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí wọ́n kọ́ èdè ilẹ̀ òkèèrè lógba giredi Giga A.

translation.unyo: Akosile data naa, tiwon gba lati owo awon ile iwe merinlelaaadorin toje omo egbe SCIS fihan pe ida mejilelaaadorin ninu ida ogoorun awon akekoo gba giredi A Giga ninu ede Mandarin, nigbati ida mejilelaaadorin ninu ida ogoorun ti awon to nko ede Jamani, ida mokandinlaaadorin ninu ogoorun ti awon to nko ede Faranse, ati ida metadinlaaadorin ninu ogoorun ti awon to nko ede Sipeeni bakannaa gba giredi A.
translation.dcyo: Àkọsilẹ̀ dátà náà, tíwọ́n gbà láti ọwọ́ àwọn ilé ìwé mẹ́rìnléláàádọ́rin tójẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ SCIS fihàn pé ìdá méjìléláàádọ́rin ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ gba giredi A Giga ninu èdè Mandarin, nigbati ìdá méjìléláàádọ́rin ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn tó ńkọ́ èdè Jamani, ìdá mọ́kàndínláàádọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn tó ńkọ́ èdè Faranṣe, àti ìdá mẹ́tàdínláàádọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn tó ńkọ́ èdè Sipeeni bákannáà gba giredi A.

translation.unyo: Eyi nfihan wipe awon ile iwe olominira ni ile Sikotilandi nsatileyin fun awon ede ile okeere gegebi awon imo tose pataki eyiti awon omode ati awon odo yoo nilo laisi ani-ani lojo iwaju.
translation.dcyo: Èyì ńfihàn wipe àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ní ilẹ Sikọtilandi ńṣàtílẹ́yìn fún àwọn èdè ilẹ̀ òkèèrè gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn ìmọ̀ tóṣe pàtàkì èyìtí àwọn ọmọdé àti àwọn ọ̀dọ́ yóò nílò láisì àní-àní lọ́jọ́ iwájú.
