translation.unyo: Awon ede nisinsinyi, bi ise yiyan, niwon nmu pelu owo aponle kan gegebi awon ise STEM (sayensi, tekinoloji, imo-ero ati eko isiro tojinle) ninu awon ilana ikekoo ti awon ile iwe olominira ati nibiimiran.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn èdè nísinsìnyí, bí i̇ṣẹ́ yíyàn, niwọ́n ńmú pẹ̀lú ọwọ́ àpọ́nlẹ́ kaǹ gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn iṣẹ́ STEM (sáyẹ́ńsì, tẹkinọlọji, ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti ẹ̀kọ́ ìsiró tójinlẹ̀) ninu àwọn ìlànà ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ti àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira àti níbiimíràn.

translation.unyo: Iwaadi nipa ero-okan awon eniyan lati owo Igbimo Amusese fun Igbanisise ati Awon Imo lodun 2014 sawari pe ninu awon idi ti awon agbanisise so fun lilakaka won lati di awon aaye osise to sofo, ida metadinlogun ninu ogoorun won ni won sope o je nitori aini imo ede miran.
translation.dcyo: Ìwáàdí nípa èrò-ọkàn àwọn ènìyàn láti ọwọ Ìgbìmọ̀ Amúṣẹ́ṣe fún Ìgbaniṣíṣẹ́ àti Àwọn Ìmọ̀ lọ́dún 2014 ṣàwárí pé ninu àwọn ìdí tí àwọn agbaniṣ̵íṣẹ́ sọ fún lílàkàkà wọn láti di àwọn ààyè òṣìṣẹ́ tó ṣófo, ìdá mẹ́tàdínlógún ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún wọn ni wọ́n sọpé ó jẹ́ nitori àìni ìmọ̀ ède miraǹ.

translation.unyo: Nitorinaa pupo awon imo ede niwon ndi ohun to nfe amojuto lati lee gba awon odo laradi fun awon ise-ise ojo iwaju won.
translation.dcyo: Nítorínáà púpọ̀̀ àwọn ìmọ̀ èdè níwọ́n ńdi ohun tó ńfẹ̀ àmójútó láti leè gba àwọn ọ̀dọ́ láradì fún àwọn iṣẹ́-ìṣe ọjọ́ iwájú wọn.

translation.unyo: Pelu opo awon anfaani ise towa lojo iwaju eyiti won nilo awon ede, awon imo wonyi je koseemaani ninu aye ti ikawo re ti dokan yii.
translation.dcyo: Pẹ̀lú ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn àǹfààni iṣẹ̵́ tówà lọ́jọ́ iwájú eyiti wọ́n nílò àwọn èdè, àwọn ìmọ̀ wọ̀nyí jẹ́ kòṣeémáàní ninu ayé tí ìkáwọ́ rẹ̀ ti dọ̀kan yìí.

translation.unyo: Lainifise iru ise-ise ti enikan yan, bi won bati ko ede keji, won yoo ni anfaani gidi kan ni ojo iwaju naa pelu nini imo iru eyi.
translation.dcyo: Láìnífiṣe irú iṣẹ́-ìṣe ti ẹnìkan yàn, bí wọ́n báti kọ́ èdè keji, wọn yóò ní àǹfààní gidi kan ní ọjọ́ iwájú náà pẹ̀lú níní ìmọ̀́ irú èyí.

translation.unyo: Lati lee ba awon eeyan lati awon ile okeere soro taara yoo fi eniti o gbo opo ede kan siwaju laisi tabi-sugbon ninu ifagagbaga naa.
translation.dcyo: Láti leè bá àwọn èèyàn láti àwọn ilẹ̀ òkèèrè sọrọ tààra yóò fi ẹnití ó gbọ́ ọ̀pọ̀ èdè kan síwájú láìsí tàbí-ṣùgbọ́n ninu ìfagagbága náà.

translation.unyo: Gegebi idibo YouGov eyiti egberun merin awon agba ni orile-ede UK kopa lodun 2013, ida marundinlogorin ninu ogoorun ni ko lee so ede ile okeere kan eyiti kodara to lati fise ibanisoro ati bii ede Faranse se je ede kan soso ti ida oni-dijiiti meji, ida marundinlogun ninu ogoorun nso.
translation.dcyo: Gẹ́gẹ́bi ìdìbò YouGov eyiti ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́rin àwọn àgbà ní orile-ede UK kópa lọ́dún 2013, ìdá márùndínlọ́gọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ni kò leè sọ èdè ilẹ̀ òkèèrè kan eyiti kódára tó láti fiṣe ibánisọ̀rọ̀ atí bii èdè Faranṣe sè jẹ́ èdè kan ṣoṣo tí ìdá oní-díjíìtì méjì, ìdá márùndínlógún ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ńsọ.

translation.unyo: Eyi ni idi ti fifi idokoowo sinu ikekoo ede nisinsinyi sese pataki fun awon omode ode-oni.
translation.dcyo: Èyí ní ìdí tí fífi ìdókòòwò sínú ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ èdè nísinsìnyí ṣeṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn ọmọdé òde-òní.

translation.unyo: Nini awon opolopo ede, paapa ti awon oro-aje to ndagbasoke, yoo fun anfaani todara ju fun riri ise eyiti o nitumo.
translation.dcyo: Níní àwọn ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ èdè, paàpá ti àwọn ọ̀rọ̀-ajé tó ńdàgbàsóke, yóò fún àǹfààní tódára ju fún rírí iṣẹ́ eyiti ó nítumọ̀.

translation.unyo: Laarin ile Sikotiland, ile iwe kookan yoo yato ninu awon ede naa tiwon nko.
translation.dcyo: Láàrin ilẹ̀ Sikọtiland, ilé ìwé kọ̀ọ̀kan yóò yàtọ̀ ninu àwọn èdè náà tíwọn ńkọ́.

translation.unyo: Iye onka awon ile iwe kan yoo gbajumo lori awon ede olaju toje ti igbalode die sii, nigbati awon miran yoo maa koni ni awon ede ti won kasi pataki julo fun orile-ede UK nigbati a ba nfoju sona fun odun 2020, bii ede Mandarin tabi ede Japaanu.
translation.dcyo: Iye òǹkà àwọn ilé ìwé kan yóò gbájúmọ́ lórí àwọn èdè ọ̀làjú tójẹ́ ti ìgbàlódé díẹ̀ síi, nigbati àwọn miran yóò máa kọ́ni ní àwọn êdè tí wọ́n kàsí pàtàkì jùlọ fún orilẹ-ede UK nigbati a bá ńfojú ṣọ́nà fún ọdún 2020, bíi èdè Mandarin tabi èdè Japaanu.

translation.unyo: Ohunkohun tobaje ife omo re, iye onka awon ede kan yoo maa wa nigba gbogbo lati yan ninu won laarim awon ile-iwe olominira, pelu awon osise ikonilekoo tiwon je akosemose ninu ipele eko yii.
translation.dcyo: Ohunkóhun tóbájẹ́ ìfẹ́ ọmọ rẹ, iye òǹkà àwọn èdè kan yóò máa wà nigba gbogbo láti yàn ninu wọn láàrim àwọn ilé-iwé olómìnira, pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìkọ́nilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tíwọ́n jẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ninu ipele ẹ̀kọ́ yìí.

translation.unyo: Awon ile iwe olominira ti ile Sikotilandi ni a fijin fun pipese ayika ikekoo kan eyiti yoo gba awon omode laradi ti yoo si rowon lagbara pelu imo tiwon nilo lati saseyori, ohunkohun ti ojo ola bamu dani.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ti ilẹ̀ Sikotilandi ní a fijìn fún pípèsè àyíká ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan eyiti yóò gba àwọn ọmọdé laradì tí yóò sì rówọn lágbara pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ tíwọ́n nílò láti ṣàṣeyọrí, ohunkóhùn tí ọjọ́ ọ̀la bámú dáni.

translation.unyo: Ko see se ni akoko yii, ninu ayika oko-owo agbaye kan, wipe awon ede ntesiwaju lati maa je koseemaani pataki fun ojo iwaju orile-ede naa, nitorinaa eyi ni a gbodo jeki o han ninu eto eko.
translation.dcyo: Kò ṣ̵eé ṣẹ́ ní àkókò yìí, ninu àyíká oko-òwò àgbáyé kan, wipe àwọn èdè ńtẹ̀síwájú láti máa jẹ́ kòṣeémáàní pàtàkí fún ọjọ́ iwájú orilẹ-ede náà, nítorínáà èyí ní a gbọ̀dọ̀ jẹ́kí ó hàn ninu ètò ẹ̀kọ́.

translation.unyo: Lootito, awon ede olaju ni a nilati kasi gidigidi bii ''awon imo ibaraenisoro ti agbaye''.
translation.dcyo: Lóòtítọ́, àwọn èdè ọ̀làjú ni a nílatí kàsí gidigidi bíi ''àwọn ìmọ̀ ìbáraẹnisọ̀rọ̀ ti àgbáyé''.

translation.unyo: Awon ile iwe olominira yoo tesiwaju lati maa funni ni asayan yii, opo lorisirisi ati itayo fun awon odo ile Sikotilandi.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira yóò tẹ̀síwájú láti máa fúnni ní àṣàyàn yìí, ọ̀pọ̀ lóríṣiríṣi àti ìtayọ fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ilẹ̀ Sikotilandi.

translation.unyo: O se pataki.
translation.dcyo: Ó ṣe pàtàkì.

translation.unyo: John Edward ni Oludari ti Igbimo ti Awon Ile iwe Olominira Ile Sikotilandi
translation.dcyo: John Edward ni Olùdarí ti Ìgbìmọ̀ ti Àwọn Ilé ìwé Olómìnira Ilẹ Sikotilandi

translation.unyo: LeBron yoo gba ayo akoko ninu idije ti Lakers lojo Aiku ni ilu San Diego.
translation.dcyo: LeBron yóò gba ayò àkọ́kọ́ ninu ìdíje ti Lakers lọ́jọ́ Àìkú ni ìlú San Diego.

translation.unyo: Iduro naa ti fere tan fun awon ololufe tiwon ti nfoju sona lati rii ki LeBron James gba ayo akoko fun Los Angeles Lakers.
translation.dcyo: Ìdúró náà ti fẹ́rẹ̀ tán fún àwọn olólùfẹ́ tíwọ́n ti ńfojú ṣọ́nà láti ríi kí LeBron James gba ayò àkọ́kọ́ fún Los Angeles Lakers.

translation.unyo: Olukoni Lakers Luke Walton ti kede wipe James yoo gba ayo ninu idije iside tosaaju ibere saa nibiti won yoo ti dojuko Denvers Nuggets ni San Diego.
translation.dcyo: Olùkọ́ni Lakers Luke Walton ti kéde wipe James yóò gba ayò ninu ìdíje ìsíde tósáájú ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ sáà níbití wọn yóò ti dojúkọ Denvers Nuggets ní San Diego.

translation.unyo: Sugbon fun bi awon iseju ti yoo fi gba ayo niwon ko tii pinnu re.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n fún bí àwọn ìṣẹ́jú tí yóò fi gbá ayò níwọn kò tíì pinnu rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: ''Yoo ju okan lo atipe yoo din ni mejidinlaadota,'' ni Walton so lori oju-opo ayelujara ti ile ise Lakers.
translation.dcyo: ''Yóò ju ọ̀kan lọ àtipé yóò dín ní méjìdínláàdọ́ta,'' ni Walton sọ lórí ojú-òpó ayelujara ti ilé iṣẹ́ Lakers.

translation.unyo: Oniroyin Lakers Mike Trudell ko akoranse tuwiti wipe o see se ki James gba ayo fun awon iseju to lodiwon.
translation.dcyo: Oníròyìn Lakers Mike Trudell kọ àkọránṣẹ́ túwìtì wipe ó ṣeé ṣe kí James gbá ayò fún àwọn ìṣẹ́jú tó lódiwọ̀n.

translation.unyo: Leyin igbaradi nibere ose yii, won bi James leere nipa awon eto re fun akosile ilana idije fun idije mefa tosiwaju saa ti Lakers.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn ìgbaradì níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí, wọ́n bí James léèrè nípa àwọn ètò rẹ̀ fún àkọsílẹ̀ ìlànà ìdíje fún ìdíje mẹ́fà tósíwájú sáà ti Lakers.

translation.unyo: ''Emi ko nilo awon idije tosiwaju saa ni ipele ise mi lati lee setan,'' gege bi oti wi.
translation.dcyo: ''̀̀Èmi kò nílò àwọn ìdíje tósíwáju sáà ní ipele iṣẹ́ mi láti leè ṣetán,'' gẹgẹ bi otí wí.

translation.unyo: Akoko Ipejopo Iwo-oorun Virginia ti Trump, Ikanni YouTube
translation.dcyo: Àkókò Ìpéjọpọ̀ Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia ti Trump, Ìkànnì YouTube

translation.unyo: Aare Donald Trump nbere akolukogba awon ipejopo fun ipolongo kan lale oni ni ilu Wheeling, Iwo-oorun Virginia.
translation.dcyo: Ààrẹ̵ Donald Trump ńbẹ̀rẹ̀ àkọlùkọgbà àwọn ìpéjọpọ̀ fún ìpolongo kan lálẹ́ òní ní ilù Wheeling, Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia.

translation.unyo: O je ti alaakoko ti Trump ninu awon ipejopo maarun tiwon ti sakosile re pe yoo waye ninu ose to nbo naa, pelu awon iduro ni awon ibiti won ti je ore re pelu Tennessee ati Mississippi.
translation.dcyo: Ó jẹ́ ti aláàkọ́kọ́ ti Trump ninu àwọn ìpéjọpọ̀ máàrún tíwọ́n ti ṣàkọsílẹ̀ rẹ̀ pé yóò wáyé ninu ọ̀sẹ̀ tó ńbọ̀ náà, pẹ̀lú àwọn ìdúró ni àwọn ibití wọn ti jẹ́ ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ́ pẹ̀lú Tennessee àti Mississippi.

translation.unyo: Pelu idibo ifidioromule to si nduro fun eniti o mu lati wanipo to sofo nile Ejo Togajulo naa, Trump nlepa lati gbe atileyin dide fun awon idibo aarin-saa to nbo niwon igbati awon omo egbe oselu Republican wa ninu ewu atipadanu isakoso ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin kekere nigbati won ba dibo losu Belu.
translation.dcyo: Pẹ̀lú ìdìbò ìfìdíọ̀rọ̀múlẹ̀ tó sì ńdúró fún ẹnití ó mu láti wànípò tó ṣófo nílé Ejọ́ Tógajùlọ náà, Trump ńlépa láti gbé àtìlẹ́yìn dìde fún àwọn ìdìbò ààrin-sáà tó ńbọ níwọ̀n igbati àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ̵́ òṣèlú Republican wà ninu ewu àtipàdánù ìsàkóso ilé Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin kékeré nigbati wọ́n bá dìbò lóṣù Bélú.

translation.unyo: Kinni akoko ipejopo Iwo-oorun Virginia lale oni atipe bawo ni o se lee wo o loju-opo ayelujara?
translation.dcyo: Kínni àkókò ìpéjọpọ̀ Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia lálẹ́ òní àtipé báwo ni o ṣe leè wò ó lójú-òpó ayelujara?

translation.unyo: Ipejopo Trump ti Iwo-oorun Virginia, ni ilu Wheeling niwon sakosile wiwaye re fun aago meje ale. Akoko lla-oorun lale oni, Abameta, ojo kokandinlogbon osu Owewe, odun 2018.
translation.dcyo: Ìpéjọpọ̀ Trump ti Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia, ní ìlú Wheeling níwọn ṣàkọsílẹ̀ wíwáyé rẹ̀ fún aago méjé alẹ́. Àkókò l̀là-oòrùn lálẹ́ òní, Àbámẹ́ta, ọjọ́ kọkàndínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù Owewe, ọdún 2018.

translation.unyo: O lee wo ipejopo Iwo-oorun Virginia loju-opo ayelujara nisale nipase isanwole botinsele lowolowo lori YouTube.
translation.dcyo: Ó leè wo ìpéjọpọ̀ Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia lójú-òpó ayelujara nísàlẹ̀ nípaṣẹ̀ ìsànwọlé bótíńṣẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ lórí YouTube.

translation.unyo: Trump ni o see se ki o soro lori awon igbejo ose yii fun eni-a-fakale-funse Ile Ejo Togajulo Brett Kavanaugh, eyiti o dariwo lori awon esun isiwahu nipa ibanilopo pelu idibo ifidioromule tiwon nreti to si nduro fun bi ose kan nigbati ajo FBI naa si nse iwaadi.
translation.dcyo: Trump ni ó ṣeé ṣ̵e kí ó sọ̀rọ̀ lórí àwọn ìgbẹ́jọ́ ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí fún ẹni-a-fàkalẹ̀-fúnṣẹ́ Ilé Ẹjọ́ Tógajùlọ Brett Kavanaugh, eyiti o dariwo lórí àwọn ẹ̀sùn ìsìwàhu nípa ìbánilòpọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìdìbò ìfìdíọ̀rọ̀múlẹ̀ tíwọn ńretí tó sì ńdúró fún bí ọ̀sẹ̀ kan nigbati àjọ FBI náà sì ńṣe ìwáàdí.

translation.unyo: Sugbon ilepa akoko ti akolukogba awon ipejopo yii ni lati ran awon omo egbe Republicans to ndojuko awon idibo osu Belu tole lowo lati jere awon agbara fun ilosiwaju kan.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n ìlépa àkọ́kọ́ ti àkọlùkọgbà àwọn ìpéjọpò yìí ní láti ràn àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Republicans tó ńdojúkọ àwọn ìdìbò oṣù Bélú tóle lọ́wọ́ láti jèrè àwọn agbara fún ìlọsíwájú kan.

translation.unyo: Nitorinaa, ipolongo ti Aare Trump sope awon ipejopo maarun lose to nbo nlepa fun ''fifi agbara fun awon toyonda ara won ati awon alatileyin bi awon omo egbe oselu Rebulicans se ngbiyanju lati daabo ati lati samugbooro awon omo egbe topoju tiwon nile Igbimo Asoju-sofin Agba ati ti Asoju-sofin Agba kekere,'' gegebi Reuters ti so.
translation.dcyo: Nítorínáa, ìpolongo ti Ààrẹ Trump sọpé àwọn ìpéjọpọ̀ máàrún lọ́sẹ̀ tó ńbọ̀ ńlépa fún ''fífi agbára fún àwọn tóyọ̀ǹda ara wọn àti àwọn alátìlẹ́yìn bí àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣelú Rebulicans ṣe ńgbìyànjú láti dáàbò àti láti ṣàmúgbòòrò àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ tópọ̀ju tíwọ́n nílé Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà ati ti Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà kékeré,'' gẹ́gẹ̵̵́bí Reuters ti sọ.

translation.unyo: ''Isakoso ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin kekere se pataki gidigidi fun eto re eyiti yoo jeki aare rin irin-ajo losi bii awon ipinle pupo toba see se bi a ti nkori wo inu saa ipolongo ibo tokun fofo fun ise kan,'' ni agbenuso ipolongo ibo Trump kan eniti o ko wipe ki a daruko oun so fun Reuters.
translation.dcyo: ''Ìṣàkóso ilé Ìgbìmọ Aṣojú-ṣòfin kékeré ṣe pàtàkí gidigidi fún ètò rẹ̀ eyiti yóò jẹ́kí ààrẹ rin ìrìn-àjò lọsí bíi àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ púpọ̀ tóbá ṣeé ṣe bí a tí ńkorí wọ inú sáà ìpolongo ìbò tókún fọ́fọ́ fún iṣẹ́ kan,'' ni agbẹnusọ ìpolongo ìbô Trump kan ẹnití ó kọ̀ wipe kí a dárúkọ òun sọ fùn Reuters.

translation.unyo: Bi won ti sakosile re lati waye fun Gbagede Wesbanco ni ilu Wheeling, ipejopo ale oni lee mu awon alatileyin wa lati ''Ohio ati Pennysylvania ki o si fa igbesita faye ri lati owo awon oniroyin Pittsburgh,'' gegebi Iroyin Iwo-oorun Virginia Metro tiso.
translation.dcyo: Bí wọń ti ṣ̀akọsílẹ̀ rẹ̀ láti wáyé fún Gbàgede Wesbanco ní ìlú Wheeling, ìpéjọpọ̀ alẹ́ òni leè mú àwọn alátìlẹ̵̵yìn wá láti ''Ohio àti Pennysylvania kí ó sì fa ìgbésíta fáyé rí láti ọwọ́ àwọn oníròyìn Pittsburgh,'' gẹ́gẹ̵́bí Ìròyìn Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia Metro tisọ.

translation.unyo: Ojo Abameta ni yoo je igba keji ninu osu tokoja eyiti Trump ti sabewo si Iwo-oorun Virginia, ipinle naa to bori re nipase awon koko toju ida ogoji ninu ogoorun lo ninu odun 2016.
translation.dcyo: Ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta ni yóò jẹ́ ìgbà kejì ninu oṣù tókọjá eyiti Trump ti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia, ìpínlẹ̀ náà tó borì rẹ̀ nípaṣẹ̀ àwọn kókó tóju ìdá ogójì nínú ọgọ́ọ̀rún lọ ninu ọdún 2016.

translation.unyo: Trump ngbiyanju lati se iranwo fun oludije fun ipo Asoju-sofin Agba ninu egbe Republican fun Iwo-oorun Virginia Patrick Morrisey eniti o nwa leyin ninu awon idibo lati mo ero-okan awon ara ilu.
translation.dcyo: Trump ńgbìyànjú láti ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún olùdíje fún ipò Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà ninu ẹgbẹ́ Republican fún Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia Patrick Morrisey ẹniti ó ńwà lẹ́yìn ninu àwọn ìdìbò láti mọ èrò-ọkàn àwọn ara ìlú.

translation.unyo: ''Kii se ami rere kan fun Morrisey wipe aare nilati wa lati gbiyanju lati fun un ni igbesoke ninu awon idibo naa,'' ni Simon Haeder, onimo sayensi ti oselu kan ni ile iwe Yunifasiti Iwo-oorun Virginia so gegebi Reuters ti wi.
translation.dcyo: ''Kìí ṣe àmì rere kan fún Morrisey wipe àarẹ̵ níláti wá láti gbìyànjú láti fún un ní ìgbésókè ninu àwọn ìdìbò náà,'' ni Simon Haeder, onímọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì ti òṣèlú kan ní ilé ìwé Yunifasiti Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia sọ gẹ́gẹ́bí Reuters ti wí.

translation.unyo: Ife-eye Ryder ti odun 2018 Iko orile-ede USA fi ikun tiwon ni han fun ija lati jeki awon ireti wa laaye bi won ti ngbori wonu awon ayo eleyo-kookan ti ojo Aiku
translation.dcyo: Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder tí ọdún 2018 Ikọ̀ orilẹ-ede USA fi ikùn tíwọ́n ní hàn fún ìjà láti jẹ́kí àwọn ìrètí wà láàyè bí wọ́n ti ńgbórí wọnú àwọn ayò ẹlẹ́yọ-kọ̀ọ̀kan ti ọjọ́ Àìkú

translation.unyo: Leyin awon saa meta eyiti o fi seegbe kan, awon onimerin ti osan ojo Abameta kan lee je ohun ti Ife-eye Ryder yii nilo.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn àwọn sáà mẹ́ta eyiti ó fì sẹ́ẹ̀gbẹ́ kan, àwọn onímẹ́rin ti ọ̀sán ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta kàn leè jẹ́ ohun tí Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder yìí nílò.

translation.unyo: Dugbe-dugbe ti ipa-atini to nfi naa je oro ere idije tiwon gbelero patapata kan sugbon okan ti awon oludije gbagbo ninu re nitooto, ti kori ju bee lo ri ni iru awon idije bii iwonyi.
translation.dcyo: Dùgbẹ̀-dùgbẹ̀ ti ipá-atini tó ńfì náà jẹ ọ̀rọ̀ eré ìdíje tíwọ́n gbélẹ̀rọ pátápátá kan ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀kan tí àwọn olùdíje gbàgbọ́ ninu rẹ̀ nítòótọ̀, tí kòrí jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ rí ní irú àwọn ìdíje bíi ìwọ́nyí.

translation.unyo: Nitorinaa nibo ni won yoo sope ipa-atini naa wa bayii?
translation.dcyo: Nítorínáâ níbo ni wọn yóò sọpé ipá-atini náà wà báyìí?

translation.unyo: ''Won ti ni ilewaju onikoko-mefa atipe nisinsinyi o je merin, nitorinaa a ngbe iyen bii kekere die ninu ipa-atini kan ni Emi ro,'' ni Jordan Spieth so bi o ti rin jade lo fun ojo naa.
translation.dcyo: ''Wọ́n ti ní ìléwájú oníkókó-mẹ́fà àtipé nísinsìnyí ó jẹ́ mẹ́rin, nítorínáà a ńgbé ìyẹn bíi kékeré díẹ̀ ninu ipá-atini kan ní Èmi rò,'' ni Jordan Spieth sọ bí ó tì rìn jáde lọ fún ọjọ́ náà.

translation.unyo: Ile Yuroopu ni anfaani naa, ani bi a ti nreti, awon koko merin niwaju pelu mejila die sii ninu ayo naa.
translation.dcyo: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu ní àǹfààní náà, àní bí a ti ńretí, àwọn kókó mẹ́rin níwájú pẹ̀lú méjìlà díẹ̀ síi ninu ayò náà.

translation.unyo: Awon omo ile Amerika, gegebi Spieth ti nso, rope won ni afefe kekere kan ninu awon ituko won botileje ti won si ni opo lati mu ki ori won ya nipa re, tikii se kekere julo bi irufe ti Spieth ati Justin Thomas ti won gba ayo papo ni gbogbo ojo ti ikookan won si lee fi awon koko meta lati inu merin.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Amẹrika, gẹ́gẹ́bí Spieth ti ńsọ, ròpé wọ́n ní afẹ́fẹ̵́ kékeré kan ninu àwọn ìtukọ wọn botilẹjẹ tí wọ́n sì ní ọ̀pọ̀ láti mú kí orí wọn yá nípa rẹ̀, tíkìí ṣe kékeré jùlọ bí irúfẹ́ ti Spieth àti Justin Thomas tí wọ́n gbá ayò papọ̀ ní gbogbo ọjọ́ tí ìkọ̀ọ̀kan wọn sì leè fi àwọn kókó mẹ́ta láti inú mẹ́rin.

translation.unyo: Spieth ti nje oloro lati iha tojinna si afefe sibi eweko tutu ti o si nsiwaju nipa apeere.
translation.dcyo: Spieth ti ńjẹ́ olóró láti ìhà tójìnnà sí afẹ́fẹ́ síbi ewéko tútù tí o sì ńsíwájú nípa àpẹẹrẹ.

translation.unyo: Awon igbe ikonko ti ajoyo di alariwo pupo sii bi ipin akoko tire ti nlo, ti o si gba ayo tose pataki kan sinu iho lati gba idije ikerin ni gbogbo igun mereerin nigbati oun ati Thomas ti fi meji wa nile leyin meji.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn igbe ìkọ̀ǹkọ̀ ti àjọyọ̀ di aláriwo púpọ̀ síi bí ìpín àkókò tirẹ̀ ti ńlọ, tí ó sì gbá ayò tóṣe pàtàkì kan sínú ihò láti gba ìdíje ìkẹrin ní gbogbo igun mẹ́rẹ̀ẹ̀rin nigbati òun àti Thomas ti fi méjì wà nílẹ̀ lẹ́yìn méjì.

translation.unyo: Ayo re togba lati ori koriko eyiti o bori idije naa fun won niwon pade pelu igbe tojora kan naa, iru eyiti o nso fun o pe o gbagbo wipe iko ile Amerika ko tii jade kuro ninu eyi.
translation.dcyo: Ayó rẹ̀ tógbá láti orí koríko eyiti ó borí ìdíje náà fún wọn níwọn pàdé pẹ̀lú igbe tójọra kan náà, irú eyiti ó nsọ fún ọ pé ó gbàgbọ́ wipe ikọ̀ ilẹ̀ Amẹrika kò tíì jáde kúró ninu èyí.

translation.unyo: Spieth sope ''O nilati gbe ile jin gidigidi nitooto ki o maa saniyan nipa idije tire''.
translation.dcyo: Spieth sọpe ''O níláti gbẹ́ ilẹ̀ jìn gidigidi nítòótọ́ kí ò maá ṣàníyàn nípa ìdíje tìrẹ̀''.

translation.unyo: Ohun ni gbogbo ikookan ninu awon agbaboolu  goofu wonyen ti fi sile bayii.
translation.dcyo: Ohun ni gbogbo ìkọ̀ọ̀kan nínú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù  gọ́ọ̀fù wọ̀nyẹn ti fi sílẹ̀ báyìí.

translation.unyo: Awon iho mejidinlogun lati seda maaki kan.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ihò méjìdínlógun láti ṣẹ̀dá máàkì kan.

translation.unyo: Awon agba goofu kan soso toni awon koko pupo ju Spieth ati Thomas lo laarin awon ojo meji tokoja ni Francesco Molinari ati Tommy Fleetwood, itan alaiseejaniyan ti Ife-eye Ryder naa.
translation.dcyo: ̀Àwọn agbá̀ gọ́ọ̀fù kan ṣoṣo tóní àwọn kókó púpọ̀ ju Spieth àti Thomas lọ láàrin àwọn ọjọ́ méjì tókọjá ni Francesco Molinari à̵ti Tommy Fleetwood, ìtàn aláìṣeéjàníyàn ti Ìfe-ẹ̀yẹ́ Ryder náà.

translation.unyo: Awon ibeji alaiseesalaye sugbon taye nfe ti ile Yuroopu je merin lati inu merin ti won kosi lee se ohun ti koto kankan.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ìbejì aláìṣeéṣàlàyé ṣùgbọ́n táyé ńfẹ́ ti ilẹ̀ Yuroopu jẹ́ mẹ́rin láti inú mẹ́rin tí wọn kòsí leè ṣe ohun tí kòtọ́ kankan.

translation.unyo: "Moliwood'' nikan ni awon meji tiwon kogba ayo olowokan lori akojopo awon ayo fun iho loosan ojo Abameta, sugbon won yago fun awon ayo olowokan bee ni owuro ojo Abameta, osan ojo Eti ati leyin aago meesan owuro ojo Eti.
translation.dcyo: "Moliwood'' nìkan ni àwọn méjì tíwọn kògbá ayò ọlọ́wọ́kan lórí àkójọpọ̀ àwọn ayò fún ihò lọ́ọ̀sán ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n yàgò fún àwọn ayò ọlọ́wọ́kan bẹ́ẹ̀ ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, ọ̀sán ọjọ́ Ẹtì àti lẹ́yìn aago mẹ́ẹ̀sán òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ẹtì.

translation.unyo: Are sisa yen, ati ona naa todabi pe agbara won  nsan losi ati lati odo awon ero alariwo tiwon kosi korawon niijanu yii nmu aya awon agbaboolu goofu naa le wipe awon ni alayo lati lu lojo Aiku, atipe koni si agbaboolu goofu to gbajumo kankan mo lati fi edidi kan di isegun ti ile Yuroopu kan tosee se naa bi oorun ti nwo lori Le Golf National ju Fleetwood tabi Molinari lo.
translation.dcyo: Aré sísá yẹn, àti ọ̀nà náà tódàbí pé agbára wọn  ńsàn lọ́sì àti láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn èrò aláriwo tíwọn kòsì kórawọn níìjánu yìí ńmú àyà àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù gọ́ọ̀fù náà le wipe àwọn ni aláyò láti lù lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, àtipé kòní sí agbábọ́ọ̀lù gọ́ọ̀fù tó gbajúmọ kankan mọ́ láti fi èdìdì kan di ìsẹ́gun ti ilẹ Yuroopu kan tóṣeé ṣe náà bí òòrùn ti ńwọ̀ lórí Le Golf National ju Fleetwood tàbí Molinari lọ.

translation.unyo: Ani pelu ife atokanwa awon mejeeji lori awon iho toyato.
translation.dcyo: Àní pẹ̀lú ìfẹ́ àtọkànwá àwọn méjèèjì lórí àwọn ihò tóyàtọ̀.

translation.unyo: Oro nipa ti ogo ile Yuroopu si je eyiti kotii dagba to sibesibe.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀rọ̀ nípa ti ògo ilẹ̀ Yuroopù sì jẹ́ eyiti kòtìí dàgbà tó síbẹ̀síbẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Bubba Watson ati Webb Simson se ise kukuru nipa ti Sergio Garcia, akoni oniboolu-merin naa, nigbati won fi i se enikeji pelu Alex Noren.
translation.dcyo: Bubba Watson àti Webb Simson ṣe iṣẹ́ kúkúrú nípa ti Sergio Garcia, akọni oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin náà, nigbati wọn fí i ṣe ẹnìkeji pẹ̀lú Alex Noren.

translation.unyo: Ayo olowokan lori akojopo awon ayo fun iho kan ati awon onibeji meji loju meesan iwaju gbe omo ile Sipeeni naa ati omo ile Siwidin naa sinu iho kan ti won ko figba kankan sunmo ri lati lee jade kuro ninu re.
translation.dcyo: Ayò ọlọ́wọ́kan lórí àkójọpọ̀ àwọn ayò fún ihò kan ati awọn oníbejì méji lóju mẹ́ẹ̀sán iwáju gbẹ́ ọmọ ilẹ̀ Sipeeni náà àti ọmọ ilẹ̀ Siwidin náà sínú ihò kan tí wọn kò fígbà kankan súnmọ́ rí láti leè jadé kuro ninu rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Lojo Aiku, botiwukori, kosi enikan lati ran o lowo jade kuro ninu iho re.
translation.dcyo: Lọ́jọ́ Àìku, botiwukori, kòsí ẹnikan láti ràn ọ́ lọ́wọ́ jáde kúrò ninu ihò rẹ.

translation.unyo: Awon boolu-merin ati awon onimerin kan niwon nwuni lori gidi lati sunmo fun wiwo nitori awon ibasepo towa laarin awon onibeji, imoran tiwon funni, imoran tiwon ko funni ati ona naa ti ogbon-atisenkan fi lee yipada loju-ese kan.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn bọ́ọ̀lu-mẹ́rin àti àwọn onímẹ́rin kan niwọ́n ńwúni lórí gidi láti súnmọ́ fún wíwò nitori àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ tówà láàrin àwọn oníbejì, ìmọ̀ràn tíwọn fúnni, ìmọ̀ràn tíwọn kò fúnni àti ọ̀nà náà tí ọgbọ́n-àtiṣeǹkan fi leè yípadà lójú-ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kan.

translation.unyo: Ile Yuroopu ti gba ayo todara ju gegebi iko kan titi de ihin ti won si tigba ilewaju pataki wonu ojo togbeyin naa sugbon saa onimerin yii pelu fihan wipe Iko Orile-ede USA ni ikun fun ija naa ti awon kan, papaa julo Apa-ti-Orile-ede naa, ti nsiyemeji.
translation.dcyo: Ilẹ Yuroopu ti gbá ayò tódàra ju gẹ́gẹ́bí ikọ̀ kan títí dé ìhín tí wọn sì tígba ìléwájú pàtàkí wọnú ọjọ́ tógbẹ̀yìn náà ṣùgbọn sáà onímẹ́rin yìí pẹ̀lú fihàn wipe Ìkọ Orilẹ-ede USA ní ikùn fún ìjà náà tí àwọn kan, papàá jùlọ Apá-ti-Orilẹ-ede náà, ti ńsiyèméjì.

translation.unyo: Ile Yuroopu gba ilewaju 10-6 wonu ojo asekagba Ife-eye Ryder.
translation.dcyo: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu gba ìléwájú 10-6 wọnú ọjọ́ àṣèkágbá Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder.

translation.unyo: Ile Yuroopu yoo mu anfaani alalaafia kan wonu ojo asekagba ti Ife-eye Ryder naa leyin ti yori jade kuro ninu awon idije oniboolu-merin ati awon onimerin ti ojo Abameta pelu ilewaju 10-6 lori orile-ede United States naa.
translation.dcyo: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu yóò mú ànfààni alálàáfíà kan wọnú ọjọ́ àṣèkágbá ti Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder náà lẹ́yìn tí yọrí jàde kúrò ninu àwọn ìdíje oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin àti àwọn onímẹrin ti ọjọ Àbámẹ́ta pẹ̀lú ìléwájú 10-6 lórí orilẹ-ede United States náà.

translation.unyo: Awon oni-imisi meji Tommy Fleetwood ati Francesco Molinari ni o dari idojuko naa pelu awon isegun meji lori Tiger Woods to nlakaka kan lati mu iye ayo tiwon je jinna ni Le Golf National de awon koko merin.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn oní-ìmísí méjì Tommy Fleetwood àti Francesco Molinari ni o darí ìdojúkọ náà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìṣẹ́gun méji lórí Tiger Woods tó ńlàkàkà kan láti mú iye ayò tíwọn jẹ́ jìnnà ní Le Golf National dé àwọn kókó mẹ̵́rin.

translation.unyo: Iko ile Yuroopu ti Thomas Bjorn, to nlepa lati tun di ife-eye ti won padanu ni Hazeltine lodun meji tokoja naa mu, je gaba le iko ti ile Amerika kan eyiti o nsi ibon yin ni oniboolu-merin ti owuro, to si gba sise-n-tele naa ni 3-1.
translation.dcyo: Ikọ̀ ilẹ̀ Yuroopu ti Thomas Bjorn, tó ńlépa láti tún di ife-ẹyẹ̀ tí wọ́n pàdánù ní Hazeltine lọ́dún méjì tókọjá náà mu, jẹ́ gàba lé ikọ̀ ti ilẹ̀ Amẹrika kan eyiti ó ńsì ìbọn yìn ní oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin ti òwúrọ̀, tó sì gba ṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé náà ni 3-1.

translation.unyo: Orile-ede U.S. naa fun won latako die sii ninu awon onimerin naa, tiwon si bori ninu awon idije meji, sugbon won ko lee jeun wonu gbese naa.
translation.dcyo: Orilẹ-ede U.S. náà fún wọn látakò díẹ̀ síi ninu àwọn onímẹ́rin náà, tíwọ́n sì borí ninu àwọn ìdíje méjì, ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò leè jẹun wọnú gbèsè náà.

translation.unyo: Iko ti Jim Furyk nilo awon koko mejo lati inu awon idije eleeyokan mejila ti ojo Aiku lati lee tun gba ife-eye naa.
translation.dcyo: Ikọ̀ ti Jim Furyk nílò àwọn kókó mẹ́jọ láti inú àwọn ìdíje ẹlẹ́ẹyọkan méjìla ti ọjọ́ Àìkú láti leè tún gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ náà.

translation.unyo: Fleetwood ni omo ile Yuroopu akoko naa toje odo tikoni iriri lati gba awon koko merin lera-lera laiduro nigbati oun ati Molinari tiwon so loruko ''Molliwood'' leyin opin-ose tope fun akiyesi kan je onibeji ikeji naa lati gba awon koko merin lati inu awon idije afiside merin ninu itan Ife-eye Ryder.
translation.dcyo: Fleetwood ni ọmọ ilẹ̀ Yuroopu àkọ́kọ́ náà tójẹ́ ọ̀dọ́ tíkòní ìrírí láti gba àwọn kókó mẹ́rin léra-léra láìdúró nigbati òun ati Molinari tíwọ́n sọ lórúkọ ''Molliwood'' lẹ́yìn òpin-ọ̀sẹ̀ tópè fún àkíyèsí kan jẹ́ oníbejì ìkejì náà láti gba àwọn kókó mẹ́rin láti inú àwọn ìdíje àfisíde mẹ́rin ninu ìtan Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder.

translation.unyo: Leyin tiwon ti te Woods ati Patrick Reed lori mole ninu awon oniboolu-merin won bugbamu  pelu agbara lati bori Woods ti taya ese re tijo ati odo ile Amerika tikoni iriri Bryson Dechambeau nipase 5 ati 4 torinle die sii.
translation.dcyo: Léyìn tíwọ́n ti tẹ Woods àti Patrick Reed lórí mọ́lẹ̀ ninu àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin wọn búgbàmu  pẹ̀lú agbára láti borí Woods tí táyà ẹsẹ̀ rẹ̀ tijò àti ọ̀dọ́ ilẹ̀ Amẹrika tíkòni ìrírí Bryson Dechambeau nípaṣẹ̀ 5 àti 4 tórinlẹ̀ díẹ̀ síi.

translation.unyo: Woods, eniti o wo ara re koja ninu gbogbo awon idije meji lojo Abameta, fi awon ibujade ise opolo han leekokan sugbon nisinsinyi o ti padanu mokandinlogun ninu awon idije mokandinlogbon re ninu awon oniboolu-merin ati awon onimerin ati meje laiduro.
translation.dcyo: Woods, ẹnití ó wọ́ ara rẹ̀ kọjà ninu gbogbo àwọn ìdíje méji lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, fi àwọn ìbújade iṣẹ́ ọpọlọ hàn lẹ́ẹ̀kọ̀kan ṣùgbọ́n nísinsìnyí ó ti pàdánù mọ́kàndínlógún ninu àwọn ìdíje mọ́kàndínlọ́gbọ̀n rẹ̀ ninu àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin àti àwọn onímẹ́rin àti méje láìdúró.

translation.unyo: Justin Rose, sinmi fun awon oniboolu-merin owuro naa, o pada sodo akegbe Henrik Stenson ninu awon onimerin naa si ijakule 2 ati 1 ti Dustin Johnson ati Brooks Koepka - awon towanipo ikinni ati iketa ni agbaye.
translation.dcyo: Justin Rose, sinmi fún àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin òwúrọ̀ náà, ó padà sọ́dọ̀ akẹgbẹ́ Henrik Stenson ninu àwọn onímẹ́rin náà sí ìjákulẹ̀ 2 àti 1 ti Dustin Johnson àti Brooks Koepka - àwọn tówànípò ìkínni àti ìkẹta ni àgbáyé.

translation.unyo: Ile Yuroopu kori gbogbo re gba ni ona won bottiwukori lojo didun, alategun kan ni iwo-oorun guusu ti ilu Paris.
translation.dcyo: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu kòrí gbogbo rẹ̀ gbà ní ọ̀nà wọn bottiwukori lọ̀jọ̀ dídún, alátẹ́gùn kan ní ìwọ-oòrùn gúúsù ti ìlú Paris.

translation.unyo: Akoni gboogi eleemeta ototo Jordan Spieth ati JustinnThomas sagbekale gbedeke maaki fun awon omo ile Amerika pelu koko meji lojo Abameta.
translation.dcyo: Akọni gbòógì ẹlẹ́ẹ̀mẹ́ta ọ̀tọ̀tọ̀ Jordan Spieth àti JustinnThomas ṣàgbékalẹ̀ gbèdéke máàki fún àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Amẹ́ríkà pẹ̀lú kókó méjì lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.

translation.unyo: Won gba ibori 2 ati 1 tikokunna kan lori Jon Rahm omo ile Sipeeni atinIan Poulter ninu awon oniboolu-merin tiwon si pada leyin naa lati lu Poulter ati RoryMcllroy ni 4 ati 3 ninu awon onimerin leyin ti won padanu awon iho afiside meji naa.
translation.dcyo: Wọ́n gba ìborí 2 àti 1 tíkòkúnná kan lóri Jon Rahm ọmọ ilẹ̀ Sipeeni àtinIan Poulter ninu àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin tíwọ́n sì padà lẹ́yìn nàà láti lu Poulter àti RoryMcllroy ní 4 àti 3 ninu àwọn onímẹ́rin lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n pàdánù àwọn ihò àfisíde méjì náà.

translation.unyo: Leemeji nikan ninu itan Ife-eye Ryder ni iko kan ti pada wa lati inu gbese onikoko-merin to nwonu awon eleeyokan, botilejepe awon tomu ife-eye dani nilo lati ta omi lati tun di ife-eye naa mu.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́ẹ̀mejì nìkan ninu ìtàn Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder ni ikọ̀ kan ti padà wá láti inu gbèsè oníkókó-mẹ́rin tó ńwọnú àwọn ẹlẹ́ẹyọ̀kan, botilẹjẹpe àwọn tómú ife-ẹ̀yẹ dáni nílò láti ta ọ̀mì láti tún di ife-ẹyẹ̀ náà mú.

translation.unyo: Leyin jije eniti o dara julo keji fun awon ojo meji, botiwukori, idahunsi-ikolu kan ti ojo Aiku dabi wipe yoo fere tayo won.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn jíjẹ́ ẹnití ó dára júlọ kejì fún àwọn ọjọ́ méjì, botiwukori, ìdáhùnsí-ikọlù kan tí ọjọ́ Àìkú dàbí wipe yóò fẹ́rẹ̀ tayọ wọn.

translation.unyo: Ariwa Koria sope 'kosi ona' ti oun yoo fi ko ohun ija ogun danu ni adanikanse laisi igbekele
translation.dcyo: Àríwá Kòríà sọpé 'kòsí ọ̀nà' ti òun yóò fi kó ohun ìjà ogun dánù ní àdánìkànṣe láìsí ìgbẹkẹlé

translation.unyo: Alaakoso oro ile okeere ti orile-ede Ariwa Koria Ri Yong so lojo Abameta fun Ajo Isokan Agbaye pe awon ijeniniya to ntesiwaju nmu aini-igbekele ninu orile-ede United States jinle sii atipe kosi ona ti orile-ede naa yoo fi ko awon ohun ija ado oloro re danu ni adanikanse labe iru awon ohun toyi oro naa ka bee.
translation.dcyo: Aláàkóso ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè ti orilẹ-ede Àrìwá Kòríà Ri Yong sọ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ̵́ta fún Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àgbáyé pé àwọn ìjẹniníyà tó ńtẹ̵̀síwájú ńmú àìní-ìgbẹkẹ̀lé ninu orilẹ-ede United States jinlẹ̀ síi àtipé kòsí ọ̀nà tí orilẹ-ede náà yóò fi kó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóro rẹ̀ dánù ní àdánìkànṣe lábẹ́ irú àwọn ohun tóyí ọ̀rọ̀ náà ká bẹ́ẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ri Yong Ho so fun ajo agbaye nibi Ipejopo Gbogbogboo ti Ajo Isokan Agbaye naa wipe Ariwa Koria ti gbe ''awon igbese ife inu rere tose pataki'' ni odun tokoja, bii dida awon idanwo ado oloro ati awon ado abugbamu tonfoloke duro, sise atupale ibi idanwo ado oloro, ati jije eje lati mase so awon ado oloro ati imo-ero ado oloro di pupo yanturu.
translation.dcyo: Ri Yong Ho sọ fún àjọ àgbáyé níbi Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbòò ti Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àgbáyé náà wipe Àríwá Kòríà ti gbé ''àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìfẹ́ inú rere tóṣe pàtàkì'' ní ọdún tókọjá, bíi dídá àwọn ìdánwò àdó olóró àti àwọn àdó abúgbàmu tóńfòlókè dúró, ṣíṣe àtúpalẹ̀ ibi ìdánwò àdó olóró, àti jíjẹ́ ẹjẹ́ láti máṣe ṣọ àwọn àdó olóró àti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àdó olóró di púpọ̀ yanturu.

translation.unyo: O ni ''Botiwukori, a kori idahun tobaramu eyikeyii lati odo orile-ede U.S.,'' .
translation.dcyo: O ni ''Botiwukori, a kòrí ìdáhùn tóbáramu èyíkeyìí láti ọ̀dọ̀ orilẹ-ede U.S.,'' .

translation.unyo: ''Laisi igbekele eyikeyii ninu orile-ede U.S. koni si igbokanle ninu aabo orile-ede wa atipe labe iru awon ayika bee kosi ona  ti a o fi koko ko ohun ija ogun ara wa danu ni adanikanse.''
translation.dcyo: ''Láìsí ìgbẹkẹ̀lé èyíkéyìí ninu orilẹ-ede U.S. kòní sí ìgbọkànlé ninu ààbò orilẹ-ede wa àtipé lábẹ́ irú àwọn àyíká bẹ́ẹ̀ kòsí ọ̀nà  tí a ó fi kọ́kọ́ kó ohun ìjà ogun ara wa dánù ní àdánìkànṣe.''

translation.unyo: Nigbati Ri tun tenumo awon edun okan ti Ariwa Koria eyiti gbogbo aye mo nipa atako Washington si igbese ''onipele'' si kiko awon ado oloro danu labe eyiti won ti fun Ariwa Koria lere bi o bati ngbe awon igbese onipelepele, gbolohun re farahan bi eyito se pataki nitoripe ko ko kiko awon ohun ija ado oloro danu ni adanikanse kuro ni owo bi Pyongyang tise se nigba kan seyin.
translation.dcyo: Nigbati Ri tún tẹnumọ́ àwọn ẹ̀dùn ọkàn ti Àríwa Kòríà eyiti gbogbo ayé mọ̀ nípa àtakò Washington sí ìgbéṣẹ̀ ''onípele'' sí kíkó àwọn àdò olóró dànù lábẹ́ eyiti wọn ti fún Àríwá Kòríà lérè bí ó báti ńgbé àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ onípẹ̀lẹ̀pẹlẹ̀, gbólóhùn rẹ̀ farahàn bí eyito ṣe pàtàkì nitoripe kò kọ kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóro dànù ní àdánìkànṣe kuro ní ọwọ́ bí Pyongyang tiṣe se nígbà kan sẹyìn.

translation.unyo: Ri tokasi gbolohun alajose kan ti Kim Jong Un ati Donald Trump jo gbejade nibi ipade akoko laarin aare orile-ede U.S. towanipo kan ati olori Ariwa Koria kan ni Singapore lojo kejila osu Okudu, nigbati Kim se ileri lati sise fun ''kiko awon ohun ija oloro kuro ni erekusu Koria'' nigbati se ileri awon idaniloju fun aabo Ariwa Koria.
translation.dcyo: Ri tọ́kasí gbólóhùn alájọṣe kan ti Kim Jong Un àti Donald Trump jọ gbéjáde níbi ìpàdé àkọ́kọ́ láàrin ààrẹ orilẹ-ede U.S. tówànípò kan àti olórí Àríwá Kòríà kan ní Singapore lọ́jọ́ kejìlá oṣù Òkúdu, nigbati Kim ṣe ìlérí láti ṣiṣẹ́ fún ''kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró kuro ni erékùsù Kòríà'' nigbati ṣe ìlérí àwọn ìdánilójú fún ààbò Àríwá Kòríà.

translation.unyo: Ariwa Koria ti nwa opin alakosile kan si Ogun Koria todun 1950-53, sugbon orile-ede United Ststes ti sope Pyongyang gbodo koko ju awon ohun ija ado oloro re sile.
translation.dcyo: Àríwá Kòríà ti ńwá òpin alákọsílẹ̀ kan sí Ogun Kòríà tọdún 1950-53, ṣùgbọn orilẹ-ede United Ststes ti sọpé Pyongyang gbọ́dọ̀ kọ́kọ́ ju àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóró rẹ̀ sílẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Washington tun ti tako awon ipe lati de e die nipa awon ifiyajeni tagbaye lile lori Ariwa Koria.
translation.dcyo: Washington tún ti tako àwọn ìpè láti dẹ̀ ẹ́ díẹ̀ nípa àwọn ìfìyàjẹni tàgbáyé líle lórí Àríwa Kòríà.

translation.unyo: ''Orile-ede U.S. ntaku lori ''kikoko ko awon ohun ija ado oloro danu'' naa ti o si nmu ipele ininilara nipa awon ifiyajeni naa posii lati lee gba eredi won ni ona ifipamuni kan, tosi ntako ''ikede ti opin ogun naa,'''' bii Ri se so.
translation.dcyo: ''Orilẹ-ede U.S. ńtakú lórí ''kíkọ́kọ́ kó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóró dànù'' náà tí ó sì ńmu ipele ìninilára nípa àwọn ìfìyàjẹni náà pọ̀síi láti leè gba èrèdí wọn ní ọ̀nà ìfipámúni kan, tósì ńtako ''ìkede ti òpin ogun náà,'''' bii Ri ṣe sọ.

translation.unyo: ''Oju-iwoye naa wipe awon ijeniniya lee mu wa wa sori awon orunkun wa je ala kan ti ko lee se ti awon eniyan tiwon je alaimokan nipa wa.
translation.dcyo: ''Ojú-ìwòye náà wipe àwọn ìjẹniníyà leè mú wa wá sórí àwọn orúnkún wa jẹ́ àlá kan tí kò leè ṣẹ ti àwọn eniyan tíwọ́n jẹ́ aláìmọ̀kan nípa wa.

translation.unyo: ''Sugbon isoro naa nipe awon ijeniniya to ntesiwaju nmu aini-igbekele wa jinle.''
translation.dcyo: ''Ṣùgbọn ìṣòro náà nipé àwọn ìjẹniníyà tó ńtẹ̵̀síwájú ńmú àìní-ìgbẹkẹ̀lé wa jinlẹ̀.''

translation.unyo: Ri ko so ohun kankan nipa awon eto fun ipade eleekeji kan laarin Kim ati Trump eyiti olori orile-ede U.S. tenumo nibi Ajo Isokan Awon Orile-ede Agbaye nibere ose naa.
translation.dcyo: Ri kò sọ ohun kankan nípa àwọn ètò fún ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀keji kan láàrin Kim àti Trump eyiti olórí orilẹ-ede U.S. tẹnumọ́ níbi Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Àgbáyé níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọ̀sẹ̀ náà.

translation.unyo: Alaakoso naa dipo tenumo awon ipade meta laarin Kim ati olori Guusu Koria Moon Jae-in laarin osu maarun tokoja ti o si fi kun un pe: Bi eniti oro kiko awon ohun ija oloro danu yii kan baje Guusu Koria ti kii se orile-ede U.S., oro kiko awon ohun ija oloro danu naa ki bati duro soju kan.
translation.dcyo: Aláàkóso náà dípò tẹnumọ́ àwọn ìpàdé mẹ́ta láàrin Kim àti olóri Gúúsù Kòríà Moon Jae-in láàrin oṣù máàrún tókọjá tí ó sì fi kún uń pé: Bí ẹniti ọ̀rọ̀ kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró dànù yìí kàn bájẹ̵́ Gúúsù Kòríà tí kìí ṣe orilẹ-ede U.S., ọ̀rọ̀ kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró dànù náà kì bátí dúró sójú kan.

translation.unyo: Ani bee, ohun ti oro Ri naa yato lona toyanilenu si ti odun tokoja, nigbati o so fun U.N. Ipejopo Gbogbogboo wipe sise afojusun ori-ile ti orile-ede U.S gan-an pelu ero-bi-ofa abugbamu je nnkan ti kosee yago fun leyin ti ''Ogbeni Aare Buburu'' Trump pe Kim ni ''okunrin eleero-bi-ofa abugbamu'' to nlepa lati pa ara re.
translation.dcyo: Àní bẹ́ẹ̀, ohun ti ọ̀rọ̀ Ri náà yàtọ̀ lọ́nà tóyanilẹ́nu sí ti ọdún tókọjá, nigbati o sọ fún U.N. Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbòò wipe ṣíṣe àfojúsùn ori-ilẹ̀ ti orilẹ-ede U.S gan-an pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rọ̀-bí-ọfà abúgbàmù jẹ́ nǹkan tí kòṣeé yàgò fún lẹ́yìn tí ''Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Ààrẹ Búburú'' Trump pe Kim ni ''ọkùnrin ẹlẹ́ẹ̀rọ̀-bí-ọfà abúgbàmù'' tó ńlépa láti pa ara rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Lodun yii ni Ajo Isokan Awon Orile-ede Agbaye naa, Trump, eniti o dunkooko lodun tokoja lati ''pa  Ariwa Koria run patapata'', ro ojo oriyin sori Kim fun igboya re ninu gbigbe awon igbese lati ko ohun ija danu, sugbon o sope opo ise si wa lati se atipe awon ifiyajeni gbodo wanipo won titi ti Ariwa Koria yoo fi ko awon ohun ija oloro danu.
translation.dcyo: Lọ́dún yìí ní Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Àgbáyé náà, Trump, ẹnití ó dúnkòokó lọ́dún tókọjá láti ''pa  Àríwá Kòríà run pátápátá'', rọ òjò oríyìn sórí Kim fún ìgboyà rẹ̀ ninu gbìgbé àwọn ìgbẹ́sẹ̀ láti kó ohun ìjà dànù, ṣùgbọ́n ó sọpé ọ̀pọ̀ iṣẹ́ sí wà láti ṣe àtipé àwọn ìfìyàjẹni gbọ̀dọ̀ wànípò wọn títí ti Àríwá Kòríà yóò fi kó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró dànù.

translation.unyo: Lojo 'Ru, Trump sope oun koni feremu akoko fun eyi, to si nsope ''bi o ba gba awon odun meji, odun meta tabi osu maarun - kose nnkan kan.''
translation.dcyo: Lọ́jọ́ 'Ru, Trump sọpé òun kòní férémú àkókò fún èyí, tó sì ńsọpé ''bí ó bá gba àwọn ọdún méjì, ọdún mẹ́ta tabi oṣù máàrún - kòṣe nǹkan kan.''

translation.unyo: Orile-ede Saina ati Rosia wi awijare wipe ajo U.N. Igbimo lori Eto Aabo nilati fun Pyongyang lere awon igbese toti gbe.
translation.dcyo: Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà àti Rọsia wí àwíjàre wipe àjọ U.N. Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo níláti fún Pyongyang léré àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ tóti gbé.

translation.unyo: Amosa, orile-ede U.S Akowe ti Oro Ile Okeere Mike Pompeo so fun ajo UN wipe Igbimo lori Eto Aabo lojo 'Bo wipe: ''Fifi ipa mu awon ifiyajeni ti Igbimo lori Eto Aabo se gbodo tesiwaju pelu agbara ati laikuna titi a o fi de leekunrere, opin, kiko awon ohun ija ado oloro danu.
translation.dcyo: Àmọ́sá, orilẹ-ede U.S Akọ̀wé ti Ọ̀rọ̀ Ilẹ̀ Òkèèrè Mike Pompeo sọ fún àjọ UN wipe Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo lọ́jọ́ 'Bọ̀ wipe: ''Fífi ipá mú àwọn ìfìyàjẹni ti Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo ṣẹ gbọdọ̀ tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lu agbára àti láìkùnà títí a ó fi dé lẹ́ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́, òpin, kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóró dànù.

translation.unyo: Igbimo lori Eto Aabo naa ti fi kun awon ifiyajeni lori Ariwa Koria pelu ifohunsokan patapata lati odun 2016 ninu ilepa lati di ofun riri owo na fun awon eto ado oloro ati awon ado abugbamu tonfoloke ti Pyongyang.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo náà ti fi kún àwọn ìfìyàjẹni lórí Àríwá Kòríà pẹ̀lú ìfohùnṣọ̀kan pátápátá láti ọdún 2016 ninu ìlépa láti di ọ̀fun rírí owó ná fún àwọn ètò àdó olóró àti àwọn àdó abúgbàmu tóńfòlókè ti Pyongyang.

translation.unyo: Pompeo pade Ri ni awon igba towodile ni ajo U.N. Ipejopo Gbogbogbo ti o so leyin naa wipe oun yoo sabewo si Pyongyang leekan sii losu to nbo lati gbaradi fun ipade eleekeji kan.
translation.dcyo: Pompeo pàdé Ri ní àwọn ìgbá tọ́wọ́dilẹ̀ ni àjọ U.N. Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbò tí ó sọ lẹ́yìn náà wipe òun yóò ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Pyongyang lẹ́ẹ̀kan sii lóṣù tó ńbọ láti gbaradì fún ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì kan.

translation.unyo: Pompeo ti sabewo si Ariwa Koria leemeta teletele lodun yii, sugbon irin-ajo re togbeyin ko lo daradara.
translation.dcyo: Pompeo ti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Àríwá Kòríà lẹ́ẹ̀mẹta tẹ́lẹ̀tẹ́lẹ̀ lọ́dún yìí, ṣùgbọ́n ìrìn-àjò rẹ̵̵̀ tógbẹ̀yìn kò lọ dáradára.

translation.unyo: O kuro ni Pyongyang losu Agemo wipe itesiwaju tiwaye, o ku nikan fun Ariwa Koria laarin awon wakati lati ko 'awon ibeere biiti-odaran'' sile.''
translation.dcyo: Ó kúró ní Pyongyang lóṣ̵ù Agẹmọ wipe ìtẹ̀síwájú tíwáyé, ó kù níkan fún Àríwá Kòríà láàrin àwọn wákàtí láti kọ 'àwọn ìbéèrè bíiti-ọ̀daràn'' sílẹ̀.''

translation.unyo: Ariwa Koria se ileri ninu ipade kan pelu Moon losu yii lati satupale ibi idanwoawon ado abugbamu tonfoloke kan ati ile nla fun ise ado oloro kan bi orile-ede United States naa ba gbe ''awon igbese idahun tobaramu.''
translation.dcyo: Àríwá Kòríà ṣe ìlérí ninu ìpàdé kan pẹ̀lú Moon lóṣù yìí láti ṣàtúpalẹ̀ ibi ìdánwòàwọn àdó abúgbàmu tóńfòlókè kan àti ilé ńlá fún iṣẹ́ àdó olóró kan bí orilẹ-èdè United States náà bá gbé ''àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìdáhùn tóbáramu.''

translation.unyo: O sope Kim so fun oun wipe ''awon igbese idahun tobaramu'' naa ti Kim nwa je awon idaniloju aabo ti Trump se ileri ni Singapore ati awon igbese soju awon ibasepo botiye pelu Washinhton.
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé Kim sọ fún òun wipe ''àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìdáhùn tóbáramu'' náà tí Kim ńwá jẹ́ àwọn ìdánilójú ààbò tí Trump ṣe ìlérì ní Singapore àti àwọn ìgbésẹ sójú àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ bótiyẹ pẹ̀lú Washinhton.

translation.unyo: Awon omo ile iwe Havard ko eko ninu nini isinmi topeye
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọmọ ilé ìwé Havard kọ ẹ̀kọ́ ninu níní ìsinmi tópeye

translation.unyo: Eko tuntun kan ni ile iwe Yunifasiti Havard lodun yii ti gba gbogbo awon akekoo-gboye akoko re lati maa ri oorun sun sii ninu ilepa lati gbogun ti asa isebi-okunrin ti kikekoo nipase oogun-bi-epo-oko 'amunimasun-nigbogbo-oru'.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀kọ́ tuntun kan ní ilé ìwé Yunifasiti Havard lọ́dún yìí ti gba gbogbo àwọn àkẹ́kọ̀ọ́-gboyè àkọ́kọ́ rẹ̀ láti máa rí oorun sùn síi ninu ìlépa láti gbógun ti àṣà ìṣebí-ọkùnrin ti kíkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípaṣẹ̵̀ òògùn-bí-epo-ọkọ́ 'amunimásùn-nigbogbo-oru'.

translation.unyo: Oluko-agba kan sawari wipe awon akekoo ni yunifasiti onipo ikinni laagbaye naa lopo igba niwon kii mo ohun toye lati se nigbati o ba kan awon ohun ipile nipa bi won tise lee mojuto ara won.
translation.dcyo: Olùkọ́-àgbà kan ṣàwárí wipe àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní yunifasiti onípò ìkínní láàgbáyé náà lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà níwọn kìí mọ ohun tóyẹ láti ṣe nigbati ó bá kan àwọn ohun ìpìlẹ̀ nípa bí wọn tiṣe leè mójútó ara wọn.

translation.unyo: Charles Czeisler, ojogbon ninu isegun oorun ni Ile Eko nipa Isegun ti Yunifasiti Havard ati akosemose kan ni Ile Iwosan Brigham ati awon obinrin, lo sagbekale eko naa, eyiti o gbagbo wipe o je akoko iru re ni orile-ede US.
translation.dcyo: Charles Czeisler, ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n ninu ìṣègùn oorun ní Ilé Ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Ìṣègùn ti Yunifasiti Havard àti akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ kan ní Ilé Ìwòsàn Brigham àti àwọn obìnrin, ló ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà, eyiti o gbàgbọ́ wipe ó jẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ irú rẹ̀ ní orilẹ-ede US.

translation.unyo: O ni imisi lati bere eko naa leyin ti o fun won ni idanilekoo lori ipa ti aifojulooorun nko lori ikekoo.
translation.dcyo: Ó ní ìmísí láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà lẹ́yìn tí ó fún wọn ní ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ lórí ipa tí àìfójúlóoorun ńkó lórí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́.

translation.unyo: <seg id="6">'Lopin re omobinrin kan dide to mi wa ti o si sope: 'Kinni idi tojepe nisinsinyi ni e nso eyi fun mi, nigba ti mo ti wa ile ekoo agba?'
translation.dcyo: <seg id="6">'Lópin rẹ̀ ọmọbìnrin kan dìde tọ̀ mi wá tí ó sì sọpé: 'Kínni ìdí tójẹ́pé nísinsìnyí ni ẹ ńsọ èyí fún mi, nígbà tí mó ti wà ilé ẹ́kọ̀o àgbạ̀́?'

translation.unyo: O sope enikeni ko figba kankan so fun ohun ri nipa pataki oorun sisun - eyiti o yami lenu,' o so fun iwe iroyin The Telegraph.
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé ẹnikéni kò fìgbà kankan sọ fún ohun rí nípa pàtàki oorun sísùn - eyiti ó yàmí lẹ́nu,' ó sọ fún ìwé ìròyìn The Telegraph.

translation.unyo: Eko naa, tiwon gbe jade fun igba akoko lodun yii, nsalaye fun awon akekoo awon ohun koseemaani bi awon iwa oorun sisun todara se nran isesi ikekoo ati are idaraya lowo, atipe o njeki imudarasii ba igbaye-gbadun won lona gbogbo.
translation.dcyo: Ẹ̀kọ́ náà, tíwọ́n gbé jáde fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ lọ́dún yìí, ńṣàlàyé fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àwọn ohun kòṣeémáàní bí àwọn ìwà oorun sísùn tódára ṣe ńran ìṣeṣí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti aré ìdárayá lọ́wọ́, àtipé ó ńjẹ́kí ìmúdárasíi bá ìgbáyé-gbádùn wọn lọ́nà gbogbo.

translation.unyo: Paul Barreira, ojogbon nipa aisan opolo ni Ile Eko Isegun ti Havard ati oludari ti awon ise eto ilera ti yunifasiti naa sope yunifasiti naa pinnu lati safilole eko naa leyin isawari wipe awon akekoo je awon ti oorun njeniya laarin ose.
translation.dcyo: Paul Barreira, ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n nípa àisán ọpọlọ ní Ilé Ẹ̀kọ́ Ìṣègùn ti Havard àti olùdarí ti àwọn iṣẹ́ ètò ìlera ti yunifasiti náà sọpé yunifasiti náà pinnu lati ṣàfilọ́lẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà lẹ́yìn ìṣàwárí wipe àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ jẹ́ àwọn ti oorun ńjẹníyà láàrin ọ̀sẹ̀.

translation.unyo: eko oni wakati gigun naa ni oni awon imusese onisise-n-tele kan ninu.
translation.dcyo: ẹ̀kọ oni wákàtí gígùn ́náà ní oni àwọn ìmùṣẹ́ṣe oníṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé kan ninu.

translation.unyo: Ninu abala kan ni aworan ti yara kan ninu ibugbe awon akekoo kan wa, nibiti awon akekoo ti nfowo ta awon ife kofi, awon aso iboju ferese, awon akonilekoo awon so fun won nipa awon ipa ti kafininni ati imole ati bi aisi oorun tise nla ipa lori isesi ere idaraya, ati pataki nini akoko ibusun tomonilara.
translation.dcyo: Ninu abala kan ni àwòrán tí yàrá kan ninu ibùgbé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan wa, níbití àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ti ńfọwọ́ ta àwọn ife kọfí, àwọn asọ ìbòju fèrèsé, àwọn akọ́nilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àwọn sọ fún wọn nípa àwọn ipa ti kafínìnnì àti ìmọ́lẹ̀ àti bí àìsí oorun tiṣe nla ipa lórí ìṣeṣí eré ìdárayá, àti pàtàkì níní àkókó ibùsùn tómọ́nilára.

translation.unyo: Ninu abala miran, awon akopa niwon so fun nipa bi aisi oorun onigbatogun ti lee mu awon ewu ti awon ikolu okan, aromolapa-rolese, irewesi ati aisan jejere posii.
translation.dcyo: Ninu abala miran, àwọn akópa níwọ́n sọ fún nípa bí àìsí oorun onígbàtógùn ti leè mú àwọn ewu ti àwọn ìkọlù ọkàn, arọmọlápá-rọlẹ́sẹ̀, ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sí àti àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ pọ̀síi.

translation.unyo: Aworan ogba ile iwe naa, pelu awon ami isami ibaraenisepo, leyin naa nsekoriya fun awon ise ojoojumo totidibaraku fun won.
translation.dcyo: Àwòrán ọgbà ilé ìwé náà, pẹ̀lú àwọn àmi ìṣàmì ìbáraẹniṣepọ̀, lẹ́yìn náà ńṣekóríyá fún àwọn ìṣe ojoójúmọ tótidibárakú fún wọn.

translation.unyo: 'A mope koni yi awon akekoo pada' ninu iwa won loju-ese.
translation.dcyo: 'A mọ̀pé kòní yí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ padà' ninu ìwà wọn lójú-ẹṣẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Sugbon a gbagbo wipe won ni eto lati mo - gegebi iwo naa ti ni eto lati mo awon ipa ti ilera ti yiyan lati maa mu awon siga,' ni Ojogbon Czeisler fi kun un.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n a gbàgbó wípé wọ́n ní ẹ̀tọ́ láti mọ̀ - gẹ́gẹ́bí ìwọ náà ti ní ẹ̀tọ́ láti mọ̀ àwọn ipa ti ìlera ti yíyàn láti máa mu àwọn sìgá,' ni Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Czeisler fi kún un.

translation.unyo: Asa ti igberaga ninu 'fifa gbogbo-oloru kan' si wa sibe, ni o so, to si nfi kun un pe imo-ero tigbalode ati inira to nposii laiduro lori awon akekoo tumo siipe ifoorundunara-eni je isoro kan to ndagbasoke.
translation.dcyo: Àṣà ti ìgbéraga ninu 'fífa gbogbo-olóru kan' sì wà síbẹ̀, ni ó sọ, tó sì ńfi kún un pé ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tìgbàlódé àti ìnira tó ńpọ̀síi láìdúró lórí àwọn akẹ̵́kọ̀ọ́ túmọ̀ síipé ìfoorundunara-ẹni jẹ́ ìṣòro kan tó ńdàgbàsókè.

translation.unyo: Ririi daju wipe o ri oorun topeye sun, tosi dara kan, ye ki o je 'ohun ija ogun asiri' ti akekoo kan lati gbogun ti inira-okan, aare, ati ipaya, ni o so - ani lati yago fun fifi iwon kun iwon titobi ara-eni, nitoripe aifojulooorun nfi opolo naa si ipo ebi, tosi njeki ebi maa pa won nigba gbogbo.
translation.dcyo: Ríríi dájú wípé ó rí oorun tópéye sùn, tósì dára kan, yẹ kí ó jẹ́ 'ohun ìjà ogun àṣírí' ti akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan láti gbógun ti ìnira-ọkàn, àárẹ̀, àti ìpayà, ni ó sọ - àni láti yàgò fún fífi ìwọn kún ìwọn títóbi ara-ẹni, nitoripe àìfójúlóoorun ńfi ọpọlọ náà sí ipò ebi, tósì ńjẹ́kí ebi máa pa wọ́n nígbà gbogbo.

translation.unyo: Raymond So, eni odun mokandinlogun ara California kan to nkekoo nipa imo baoloji ti eroja kemika ati nnkan afojuri, ran Ojogbon Czeisler lowo lati sagbekale eko naa leyin ti o ti kekoo ninu awon kilaasi re ni odun akoko re ni Havard.
translation.dcyo: Raymond So, ẹni ọdún mọ́kàndínlógún ara California kan tó ńkẹ̀kọ̀ọ́ nípa ìmọ̀ bàọ́lọ́jì tí èròjà kẹ́míkà àti nǹkan àfojúri, ràn Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Czeisler lọ́wọ́ láti ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà lẹ́yìn tí o ti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ninu àwọn kíláàsì rẹ̀ ni ọdún àkọ́kọ́ rẹ̀ ní Havard.

translation.unyo: O sope eko naa ti si oju oun ti o si ti fun oun ni imisi lati taari re fun eko gbogboo kan ninu ogba naa.
translation.dcyo: Ó sọpé ẹ̀kọ́ náà ti sí ojú òun tí ó sì ti fún òun ní ìmísí láti taari rẹ̀ fún ẹ̀kọ́ gbogbòò kan ninu ọgbà náà.

translation.unyo: Igbese tokan naa, to nreti, ni lati beere lowo gbogbo awon akekoo to nkekoo gboye eleekeji lati pari eto eko tofarajo o saaju ki won to darapo mo ile iwe onifiga-gbaga naa.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbésẹ̀ tókàn náà, tó ńretí, ni láti bèèrè lọ́wọ́́ gbogbo àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tó ńkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ gboye ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì láti parí ètò ẹ̀kọ́ tófarajọ́ ọ saáju kí wọ́n to ́darapọ̀ mọ́ ilé ìwé onífiga-gbága náà.

translation.unyo: Ojogbon Czeisler gba awon akekoo lamoran wipe ki won ronu nipa siseto aago itaniji kan lati so akoko lati lo sori ibusun, ati igba toye lati ji, ati ki won si sora fun awon ipa tolewuto 'itansan imole alawo aro' ti awon iboju iworan ntu sita ati imole LED, eyiti o lee da obiri ise ati oorun sisun ojoojumo eni ru, ti yoo si yoridi awon isoro airi-oorun sun.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Czeisler gba àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ lámọ̀ràn wipe ki wọ́n ronú nipa ṣíṣètò aago ìtanijí kan láti sọ àkókò láti lọ sórí ibùsùn, àti ìgbà tóyẹ láti jí, àti kí wọn sì sọ́ra fun àwọn ipa tóléwuto 'ìtànsán ìmọlẹ̀ aláwọ̀ aró' tí àwọn ìbòjù ìwòran ńtú síta àti ìmọ́lẹ̀ LED, eyiti o leè da òbìrí iṣẹ́ àti oorun sísùn ojoójúmọ ẹni ru, tí yóò sì yọrídí àwọn ìṣòro àìrí-oorun sùn.

translation.unyo: Livingston 1 - 0 Rangers: Boolu ti Menga gba wole te awon okunrin Gerrard losile
translation.dcyo: Livingston 1 - 0 Rangers: Bọ́ọ̀lù ti Menga gbá wọlé tẹ àwọn ọkùnrin Gerrard lọsílẹ̀

translation.unyo: Rangers je iya awon ikoro ti ojo-iwalajo miran bi ikolu-aitase ti Dolly Menga ti ko iko ti Steven Gerrard alaisinisokan sinu iya 1-0 kan ni Livingston.
translation.dcyo: Rangers jẹ ìyà àwọn ìkorò ti ọjọ-ìwàlájò miran bí ìkọlù-àìtàṣé ti Dolly Menga ti kó ikọ̀ ti Steven Gerrard aláìsínísọ̀kan sínú ìyà 1-0 kan ní Livingston.

translation.unyo: Iko ti Ibrox naa nwa lati sakosile ibori akoko won loju ona lati igba ibori 4-1 tiwon ni ni St Johnstone ninu osu Erena, sugbon iko ti Gary Holt se wonni ipalara ijiya eleekeji ti Gerrard yoo ni ninu awon idije mejidinlogun gegebi olusakoso lati fi awon koko mejo ti iko re sile laini afojusun Hearts iko Ladbrokes tiwon je adari Liigi Akoko.
translation.dcyo: Ikọ̀ ti Ibrox náà ńwá láti ṣàkọsílẹ̀ ìborí àkọ́kọ́ wọn lójú ọ̀nà láti ìgbà ìborí 4-1 tíwọ́n ní ni St Johnstone ninu oṣù Ẹrẹ́ná, ṣùgbọ́n ikọ̀ ti Gary Holt ṣe wọ́nní ìpalára ìjìyà ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì tí Gerrard yóò ní ninu àwọn ìdíje méjìdínlógún gẹ́gẹ́bí olùṣàkóso láti fi àwọn kókó mẹ́jọ ti ikọ̀ rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ láìní àfojúsùn Hearts ikọ̀ Ladbrokes tíwọ́n jẹ́ adarí Líìgí Àkọ́kọ́.

translation.unyo: Menga se ose aitase ni iseju meje saaju idaji-akoko ti iko Rangers eyiti o se alaini inisi kofi igba kankan wo rara bi enipe won fe bawon dogba.
translation.dcyo: Menga ṣe ọṣẹ́ àìtàṣe ní ìṣẹ́jú méje saájú ìdajì-àkókò tí ikọ̀ Rangers eyiti ó ṣe aláìní ìnísí kòfi ìgbà kankan wò rárá bí ẹnipé wọ́n fẹ́ báwọn dọ́gba.

translation.unyo: Nigbati Rangers jawale bayii si ipo ikefa, Livinston fo si ipo iketa ti won siwa leyin Hibernia nikan lori iyato iye ayo gbigba wole.
translation.dcyo: Nigbati Rangers jáwálẹ̀ báyìí sí ipò ìkẹfà, Livinston fò sí ipò ìkẹta tí wọn sìwà lẹ́yìn Hibernia nìkan lórí ìyàtọ̀ iye ayò gbígbá wọlé.

translation.unyo: Atipe isoro pupo sii si lee wa ni ipamo fun Rangers leyin ti won nilati toju okunrin to nkiyesi ila ori-papa Calum Spence fun ipalara ori kan leyin ti o han wipe won ju ohun kan lati iha ibiti awon alejo naa wa.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé ìṣòro púpọ̀ síi sì leè wà ní ìpamọ́ fún Rangers lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n níláti tójú ọkùnrin tó ńkíyèsí ìlà orí-pápá Calum Spence fún ìpalára orí kan lẹ́yìn tí ó hàn wipe wọn ju ohun kan láti ìhà ibiti àwọn àlejò náà wà.

translation.unyo: Gerrard se awon iyipada mejo si iko naa eyiti o gba rekoja Ayr wonu idije to kangun si asekagba Ife-eye Betfred naa.
translation.dcyo: Gerrard ṣe àwọn ìyípadà mẹ́jọ sí ikọ̀ náà eyiti ó gbá rekọjá Ayr wọnú ìdíje tó kángun sí àṣèkágbá Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Betfred náà.

translation.unyo: Holt, ni apa miran, lo pelu Livi mokanla kannaa ti o mu koko kan kuro lara Hearts lose tokoja ti inu re ki ba si dun pelu ona ti awon iko totiko daradara re fi fun awon alatako won lorun ni gbogbo ibiti won ba koju si.
translation.dcyo: Holt, ní apá miran, lọ pẹ̀lú Livi mọ́kànlá kannáà tí ó mú kókó kan kúró lára Hearts lọ́sẹ̀ tókọjá tí inú rẹ̀ kì bá sì dùn pẹ̀lú ọ̀nà tí àwọn ikọ̀ tótikọ́ dáradára rẹ̀ fi fún àwọn alátakò wọn lọ́rùn ní gbogbo ibiti wọ́n bá kọjú sí.

translation.unyo: Rangers lee ti ni awon boolu pipelese topojulo sugbon Livingston se pupo pelu boolu naa tiwon ni.
translation.dcyo: Rangers leè ti ní àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù pípẹ́lẹ́sẹ̀ tópọ̀jùlọ̀ ṣùgbọ́n Livingston ṣe púpọ̀ pẹ̀lú bọ́ọ̀lù náà tíwọ́n ní.

translation.unyo: O ye kiwon ti gba ayo wole ni iseju meji nigbati  boolu alaatesile akoko ti Menga ran Scott nise wo oju ile Allan McGregor sugbon ti onipo-aarin naa gba anfaani nla re danu sigbo.
translation.dcyo: Ó yẹ kíwọ́n ti gbá ayò wọlé ní ìṣẹ́jú méji nigbati  bọ́ọ̀lù aláàtẹ́sílẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ ti Menga rán Scott níṣẹ́ wọ ojú ile Allan McGregor ṣùgbọ́n tí onípò-ààrin náà gbá àǹfààní ńlá rẹ̀ dànù sígbó.

translation.unyo: Igbasoju-ile alaisi-atako tojinle ti Keaghan Jacobs leyin naa ri asiwaju Craig Halkett sugbon akegbe alaabo re Alan Lithgow kan lee  gunbe danu ni eyin oju-ile naa.
translation.dcyo: Ìgbásójú-ilé aláìsí-àtakò tójinlẹ̀ ti Keaghan Jacobs lẹ́yìn náà rí asíwáju Craig Halkett ṣùgbọ́n akẹgbẹ́ aláàbò rẹ̀ Alan Lithgow kàn leè  gúnbẹ dànù ní ẹ̀yìn ojú-ilé náà.

translation.unyo: Rangers kuku ja isakoso gba sugbon o dabi enipe ireti pupo wa ju igbagbo nipa ayo gbigba won ninu ipari eleeketa naa.
translation.dcyo: Rangers kúkú já ìṣàkóso gbà ṣùgbọ́n ó dàbí ẹnipé ìrètí púpọ̀ wà ju ìgbàgbọ́ nípa ayò gbígbá wọn ninu ìparí ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kẹta náà.

translation.unyo: Alfredo Morelos ro pelu idaniloju wipe o yeki oun gba penariti gbigba kan loju ami ida kan ninu ida merin wakati bi oun ati Steven Lawless tikolu ara won sugbon refiri Steven Thomson juwo danu si awon ebe omo ile Colombia naa.
translation.dcyo: Alfredo Morelos rò pẹ̀lú ìdánilójú wipe ó yẹ́ki òun gba pẹnariti gbígbá kan lójú àmì ìdá kan nínú ìdá mẹ́rin wákàtí bí òun àti Steven Lawless tíkọlu ara wọn ṣùgbọ́n rẹfirí Steven Thomson juwọ́ dànù sí àwọn ẹ̀bẹ̀ ọmọ ilẹ Colombia náà.

translation.unyo: Rangers ri ogbon da lati gba awon boolu gbigbona meji tolo soju ile ni idaji idije akoko sugbon asole Ibrox Liam Kelly kofi bee ri isoro rara nipase boolu aforigba ti Lassana Coulibaly ati ikolu Ovie Ejaria tiwon mu so.
translation.dcyo: Rangers rí ọgbọ́n dá láti gba àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù gbígbóná méjì tólọ sójú ilé ni ìdajì ìdíje àkọ́kọ́ ṣùgbọ́n aṣọ́lé Ibrox Liam Kelly kòfi bẹ́ẹ̀ rí ìsọro rárá nípaṣẹ̀ bọ́ọ̀lù aforígbá ti Lassana Coulibaly àti ìkọlù Ovie Ejaria tíwọn mú ṣo.

translation.unyo: Nigbati boolu afiside towole ti Livi lee je eyiti tolodi si bi idije ti nlo, kosi eniti o lee se wipe won ye fun un nitori ohun tiwon gba nikan.
translation.dcyo: Nigbati bọ́ọ̀lù àfisíde tówọlé ti Livi leè jẹ́ eyiti tólòdì sí bí ìdíje tí ńlọ, kòsí ẹnití o leè ṣẹ́ wipe wọn yẹ fún un nitori ohun tíwọ́n gbà nìkan.

translation.unyo: Leekan sii Rangers kuna lati yanju oro pelu atopapo-eleyo tojinle kan.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́ẹ̀kan sii Rangers kùná láti yanjú ọ̀rọ̀ pẹ̀lú àtòpapọ̀-ẹlẹ́yọ tójinlẹ̀ kan.

translation.unyo: Scott Arfield ko dahun bi Declan Gallagher ti taari boolu si Scott Robinson eniti o farabale  lati yo Menga jade fun ipari to rorun kan.
translation.dcyo: Scott Arfield kò dáhùn bí Declan Gallagher ti taari bọ́ọ̀lù sí Scott Robinson ẹnití ó farabalẹ̀  láti yọ Menga jáde fún ìparí tó rọrùn kan.

translation.unyo: Gerrard se nnkan ninu isinmi naa bi o ti paaro Coulibaly fun Ryan Kent ti iyipada naa si fere pese ipa kan loju-ese bi onipo-igun naa ti gba boolu sinu fun Morelos sugbon Kelly to morieni wu sare kuro loju ila re lati dena.
translation.dcyo: Gerrard ṣe nǹkan ninu ìsinmi náà bí ó ti pààrọ̀ Coulibaly fún Ryan Kent ti ìyípadà náà sì fẹ́rẹ̀ pèsè ipa kan lójú-ẹṣẹ̀ bí onípò-igun náà ti gbá bọ́ọ̀lù sínú fún Morelos ṣùgbọn Kelly tó móríẹni wú sáré kuro lójú ìlà rẹ̀ láti dènà.

translation.unyo: Sugbon Livinston tesiwaju lati fa awon alejo naa si gbigba ayo lona idije naa tiwon gbadun, pelu Lithgow ati Halkett tiwon ngba boolu gigun leyin boolu gigun.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọn Livinston tẹ̀síwájú láti fa àwọn àlejò náà sí gbígbá ayò lọ́nà ìdíje náà tíwọ́n gbádùn, pẹ̀lú Lithgow àti Halkett tíwọ́n ńgbá bọ́ọ̀lù gígùn lẹ́yìn bọ́ọ̀lù gígùn.

translation.unyo: Iko Holt koba ti fa ilewaju won wonu awon ipele ipari sugbon McGregor duro dide botiye lati fi ayo dun Jacobs ki Lithgow to fi ori gba a danu lati igun naa.
translation.dcyo: Ikọ̀ Holt kòbá ti fa ìléwájú wọn wọnú àwọn ipele ìparí ṣùgbọn McGregor duro dìde bótiyẹ láti fí ayò dun Jacobs kí Lithgow tó fi orí gbá a dànù láti igun náà.

translation.unyo: Afiropo Rangers Glenn Middleton ni awijare igbeyin miran fun penariti gbigba bi o ti lo mo Jacobs sugbon leekan sii Thomsom wo ibomiran.
translation.dcyo: Àfirọ́pò Rangers Glenn Middleton ni àwíjàre ìgbẹ̀yìn miran fún pẹnariti gbígbá bí o ti lọ́ mọ́ Jacobs ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́èkan síi Thomsom wo ibòmíràn.

translation.unyo: Alimanaaki Asagbelero ti Olonka Geiger naa
translation.dcyo: Álimánáàkì Aṣàgbélẹ̀rọ́ ti Olóǹka Geiger náà

translation.unyo: Atipe nisinsinyi oju-ewe kan kuro si Alimanaaki ''Sunday Morning'' wa: Ni Ogbonojo osu Owewe, lodun 1882, lodun merindinlogoje looni, tosi tun NKA... ojo naa ni won bi onimo ijinle ohun afojuri ojo iwaju Johannes Wilhelm ''Hans'' Geiger ni orile-ede Jamani.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé nísinsìnyí ojú-ewé kan kúrò sí Álimánáàkì ''Sunday Morning'' wa: Ní Ọgbọ̀nọjọ́ oṣù Owewe, lọ́dún 1882, lọ́dún mẹ̵́rìndínlógóje lóòní, tósì tún ŃKA... ọjọ́ náà ni wọ́n bí onímọ̀ ìjìnlẹ ohun àfojúrí ọjọ́ iwájú Johannes Wilhelm ''Hans'' Geiger ní orilẹ-ede Jamani.

translation.unyo: Geiger sagbekale ogbon-atisennkan fun didamo ati sise odiwon awon itujade tiwon pe ni oniseredio, agbelero eyiti o papa yorisi ero naa tiwon mo si Geiger Counter.
translation.dcyo: Geiger ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ọgbọ́n-àtiṣenǹkan fún dídámọ̀ àti ṣíṣe òdiwọ̀n àwọn ìtújáde tíwọn pè ni oníṣẹ́rédíò, àgbélẹ̀rọ eyiti o pàpà yọrísì ẹ̀rọ náà tíwọ́n mọ̀ sí Geiger Counter.

translation.unyo: Opomulero kan ti imo sayensi lati igba naa, Olonka Geiger di opo fun asa pop bakannaa, botiri ninu aworan sinnima odun 1950 ''Awon Agogo ti Colorado,'' eyiti awon onimo sayensi tiwon funnise agbase wonyen ti a ko lero ROY Rogers ati Dale Evans ti kopa:
translation.dcyo: Òpómúléró kan ti ìmọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì láti ìgbà náà, Olóǹkà Geiger di òpó fún àṣà pop bákannáà, bótirí ninu àwòrán sinnimá ọdún 1950 ''Àwọn Agogo ti Colorado,'' eyiti àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹ́nsì tíwọn fúnníṣe àgbàṣe wọ̀nyẹn tí a kò lérò ROY Rogers àti Dale Evans ti kópa:

translation.unyo: Okunrin: ''Kinni nkan naa?''
translation.dcyo: Ọkùnrin: ''Kínni ǹkan náà?''

translation.unyo: Rogers: ''Olonka Geiger kan ni, tiwon nlo lati mo ibi ti awon eroja alumooni oniseredio, bii yureniomu wa.
translation.dcyo: Rogers: ''Olóǹkà Geiger kan ni, tíwọn ńlò latí mọ ibi ti àwọn èròja àlùmọ́ọ̀nì oníṣẹ́rédíò, bíi yureniọmu wà.

translation.unyo: Nigbati o bafi awon foonu eti wonyi seti, o lee gbo awon ipa ti awon atoomu tiwon tu jade nipase ise redio ninu awon alumooni naa.''
translation.dcyo: Nigbati o báfi àwọn fóònù ètí wọ̀nyí sétí, o leè gbọ́ àwọn ipa ti àwọn átọ́ọ́mù tíwọ́n tú jáde nípaṣẹ̀ iṣẹ́ rédíò nínú àwọn àlùmọ́ọ̀nì náà.''

translation.unyo: Evans: ''Sope, o ntu jade nitooto nisinsinyi!''
translation.dcyo: Evans: ''Sọpé, ó ńtú jáde nítòótọ́ nísinsìnyí!''

translation.unyo: ''Hans'' Gieger ku lodun 1945, ni o ku awon ojo die si ajodun ojo-ibi iketalelogota re.
translation.dcyo: ''Hans'' Gieger kú lọ́dún 1945, ni ó kù àwọn ọjọ́ díẹ̀ sí àjọ̀dún ojọ́-ìbí ìkẹtàlélọ́gọ́ta rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Sugbon ise agbelero naa eyiti o nje oruko re si wa laaye titi lai.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n iṣẹ́ àgbélẹ̀rọ náà eyiti ó ńjẹ́ orúkọ rẹ̀ sí wà láàyé títí lái.

translation.unyo: Abere ajesara fun aisan jejere tuntun lee ko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati 'ri' awon seeli ole.
translation.dcyo: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára fún àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ tuntun leè kọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti 'ri' àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè.

translation.unyo: Abere ajesara fun aisan jejere tuntun lee ko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati 'ri' awon seeli ole ki o si pa won
translation.dcyo: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára fún àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ tuntun leè kọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti 'ri' àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè kí ó sì pa wọn

translation.unyo: Abere ajesara nko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati da awon seeli ole mo gegebi ara itoju
translation.dcyo: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára ńkọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti dá àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè mọ̀ gẹ́gẹ́bí ara ìtọ̀jú

translation.unyo: Ona atisise ni wiwa awon seeli eto ilana ago-ara idaaabobo jade kuro lara alaisan kan ninu, ki a si yiwon pada ninu yara ise imo ijinle
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀nà àtiṣiṣẹ́ ní wíwa àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara ìdáààbòbò jáde kúrò lára aláìsàn kan nínú, kí á sì yíwọn padà nínú yàrá iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀

translation.unyo: Leyin naa won lee 'ri' eroja puroteeni towopo si opo awon jejere tiwon yoo si tunwon gbe mi
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn náà wọ́n leè 'ri' èròja puroteeni tówọ́pọ̀ sí ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn jẹjẹrẹ tíwọn yóò sì túnwọn gbé mì

translation.unyo: Abere ajesara kan ti a ndanwo lowo nfi awon esi oniileri han ninu awon alaisan tiwon ni oniru-iru awon aisan jejere.
translation.dcyo: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára kan tí a ńdánwò lọ́wọ́ ńfi àwọn èsì oníìlérí hàn ninu àwọn aláìsàn tíwọ́n ní onírú-irú àwọn àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ.

translation.unyo: Obinrin kan tiwon toju pelu abere ajesara naa, eyiti o nko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati ri awon seeli ole, rii ti jejere ti eya-ara fun eyin ibimo re poora fun awon osu toju mejidinlogun lo.
translation.dcyo: Obìnrin kan tíwọ́n tọ́jú pẹ̀lú abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára náà, eyiti ó ńkọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti ri àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè, ríi ti jẹjẹrẹ ti ẹ̀yà-ara fún ẹyin ìbímọ rẹ̀ pòórá fún àwọn oṣù tóju méjìdínlógún lọ.

translation.unyo: Ona atisise naa ni wiwa awon seeli eto ilana ago-ara idaaabobo jade kuro lara alaisan kan ninu, ki a si yiwon pada ninu yara ise imo ijinle kan ki won lee 'ri' eroja puroteeni towopo si opo awon jejere tiwon npe ni HER2, atipe leyin naa ki won si tun awon seeli naa gbe mi.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀nà àtiṣiṣẹ́ náà ní wíwa àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara ìdáààbòbò jáde kúrò lára aláìsàn kan nínú, kí á sì yíwọn padà nínú yàrá iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀ kan kí wọ́n leè 'ri' èròja puroteeni tówọ́pọ̀ sí ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn jẹjẹrẹ tíwọ́n ńpe ni HER2, àtipé lẹ́yìn náà kí wọ́n sì tún àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì náà gbé mi.

translation.unyo: Ojogbon Jay Berzofsky, ti Ile Eko Aisan Jejere ti Orile-ede Amerika ni Bethesda, Maryland, sope: ''Awon esi wa nso fun wa wipe a ni abere ajesara oniileri gidigidi kan.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Jay Berzofsky, ti Ilé Ẹ̀kọ́ Àìsàn Jẹjẹrẹ ti Orilẹ-ede Amẹrika ní Bethesda, Maryland, sọpé: ''Àwọn èsì wa ńsọ fún wa wipe a ní abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára oníìlérí gidigidi kan.

translation.unyo: HER2 ''nwako idagbasoke ti opolopo oniruuru jejere,'' ninu eyiti ti awon oyan, ti ago-ara eyin ibimo, fuuku ati ti ifun isale wa, ni Ojogbon Berzofsky se alaye re.
translation.dcyo: HER2 ''ńwakọ̀ ìdàgbàsókè ti ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ onírúurú jẹjẹrẹ,'' ninu eyiti ti àwọn ọyàn, tí àgọ́-ara ẹyin ìbímọ, fùùkû ati tí ìfun ìsàlẹ̀ wà, ni Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Berzofsky ṣe àlàyé rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ona to farajo o kan ni mimu awon seeli eto ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo kuro lara alaisan naa ati ''kiko'' won bi won yoo ti maa safojusun awon seeli jejere ti sise ninu titoju iru aisan jejere ti eleeje.
translation.dcyo: Ọ́ná tó farajọ ọ́ kan ni mímú àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì ètò àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò kùrò lára aláìsàn náà àti ''kíkọ́'' wọn bí wọn yóò ti máa ṣàfojúsùn àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì jẹjẹrẹ ti ṣiṣẹ́ ninu títọ́jú irú áìsàn jẹjẹrẹ ti ẹlẹ́ẹ̀jẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Kanye West Bere Ikoluni Oloro Eebu fun Atileyin-Trump kan, to nde Ate-ori MAGA, Leyin Ifarahan SNL re.
translation.dcyo: Kanye West Bẹ̀rẹ̀ Ìkọluni Ọlọ́rọ̀ Èébú fún Àtilẹ́yìn-Trump kan, tó ńdé Ate-ori MAGA, Lẹ́yìn Ìfarahàn SNL rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ko Lo Daradara
translation.dcyo: Kò Lọ Dáradara

translation.unyo: Kanye West ni awon ero ho le lori ninu situdio naa nibi eto Saturday Night Live kan leyin ere sise eyiti o yapa kuro lona ninu eyiti o ti gboriyin fun orile-ede U.S. Aare Donald Trump ti o si sope yoo dije fun ofiisi lodun 2020.
translation.dcyo: Kanye West ni àwọn èrò hó lé lórí ninu situdio náà níbi ètò Saturday Night Live kan lẹ́yin eré ṣíṣe eyiti ó yapa kuro lọ́nà ninu eyiti ó ti gbóríyìn fún orilẹ-ede U.S. Ààrẹ Donald Trump tí ó sì sọpé yóò díje fún ọ́fíìsì lọ́dún 2020.

translation.unyo: Leyin ti o ko orin iketa re ti ale naa, ti o pe ni Ghost Town nibi ti o ti nde fila So Amerika Di Nla, o tesiwaju pelu oro eebu lodi si awon omo egbe oselu Democrats ti o si tun tenumo atileyin fun Trump.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn tí ó kọ orin ìkẹta rẹ̀ ti alẹ́ náà, tí ó pè ni Ghost Town níbi ti o ti ńdé fila Sọ Amẹrika Di Ńlà, ó tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú ọ̀rọ̀ èébu lòdí sí àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Democrats tí o sì tún tẹnumọ́ àtìlẹ́yìn fún Trump.

translation.unyo: ''Ni opo igba ni Mo nso fun eniyan funfun tiwon wipe: ''Bawo ni o se nilati feran Trump, eleyameya ni?''
translation.dcyo: ''Ní ọ̀pọ̀ ìgbà ní Mo ńsọ fún eniyan funfun tíwọn wipe: ''Báwo ni ó ṣe níláti fẹ́ràn Trump, ẹlẹ́yàmẹ̀yà ni?''

translation.unyo: O dara, bi iwa eleyameya ba kan mi N koba ti jade kuro ni Amerika nigba totipe seyin,'' ni o wi.
translation.dcyo: Ó dára, bí ìwà ẹlẹ́yàmẹ̀yà bá kàn mi N kòbá ti jáde kuro ní Amẹrika nígba tótipẹ́ sẹ́yìn,'' ni o wí.

translation.unyo: SNL bere eto naa pelu ere itage eyiti Matt Damon kopa ninu re nibiti irawo Hollywood naa ti fi eri Brett Kavanaugh niwaju Igbimo Eto Idajo ti Ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin Agba lori awon esun ikoluni nitori ibalopo ti Christine Blassey Ford fi kan an se yeye.
translation.dcyo: SNL bẹ̀rẹ̀ ètò náà pẹ̀lú eré ìtàgé eyiti Matt Damon kópa ninu rẹ̀ níbití ìràwọ̀ Hollywood náà ti fi ẹ̀rí Brett Kavanaugh nìwáju Ìgbìmọ Ètò Ìdájọ́ ti Ilé Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà lori àwọn ẹ̀sùn ìkọluni nitori ìbálòpọ̀ tí Christine Blassey Ford fi kàn án ṣe yẹ̀yẹ̵́.

translation.unyo: Botilejepe kii se eto agbejade, aworan fidio ti oro eebu ti West naa ni ko goke sinu oju-opo ibasepo ayelujara lati owo Chris Rock.
translation.dcyo: Botilẹjẹpe kìí ṣe ètò àgbéjáde, àwòrán fídíò ti ọ̀rọ̀ èébú ti West náà ni kó gòké sínú ojú-òpò ìbáṣepọ̀ ayelujara láti ọwọ́ Chris Rock.

translation.unyo: Ko tii han kedere boya Rock ngbiyanju lati fi West se eleya ni pelu agbejade naa.
translation.dcyo: Kò tíì hàn kedere bóyá Rock ńgbìyânjú láti fi West ṣe ẹlẹ́yà ni pẹ̀lú àgbéjáde náà.

translation.unyo: Bakannaa, West ti fesun kan sodo awon olutetigbo naa wipe oun ti ni akoko tole gidi kan leyin itage nipa ate-ori re.
translation.dcyo: Bákannáà, West ti fẹ̀sùn kan sọ́dọ̀ àwọn olùtẹ́tígbọ́ náà wipe òun ti ní àkókò tóle gidi kan lẹ́yìn ìtàgé nípa ate-ori rẹ̀.

translation.unyo: ''Won hale mo mi leyin itage.
translation.dcyo: ''Wọ́n halẹ̀ mọ́ mi lẹ́yìn ìtàge.

translation.unyo: Won sope, 'mase jade lo sita nibeyen pelu ate yen lori.'
translation.dcyo: Wọ́n sọpé, 'máṣe jáde lọ síta níbẹ̀yẹn pẹ̀lú ate yẹn lórí.'

translation.unyo: 'Won hale mo mi!
translation.dcyo: 'Wọ́n halẹ̀ mọ́ mi!

translation.unyo: Atipe leyin naa won sope Mo wa nibi tojinwonu kan, ni o so, gegebi Washington Examiner ti wi.
translation.dcyo: Àtipé lẹ́yìn náà wọn sọpé Mo wà níbi tójìnwọnú kan, ní ó sọ, gẹ́gẹ́bí Washington Examiner ti wí.

translation.unyo: West tesiwaju: ''Se o fe lati ri ibi tojinwonu naa?'' to si nsope oun yoo ''wo ewu alailapa ti okunrin alagbara sorun, nitoripe eyi tumo sipe o ko lee so ohun toye ki nse funmi. O fe ki aye tesiwaju bi?
translation.dcyo: West tẹ̀síwájú: ''Ṣe o fẹ́ láti rí ibi tójìnwọnú náà?'' tó sì ńsọpé òun yóò ''wọ ẹ̀wù aláìlápá ti ọkùnrin alágbára sọ́rùn, nitoripe èyí túmọ̀ sípé ò kò leè sọ ohun tóyẹ kí ńṣe fúnmi. Ó fẹ́ kí ayé tẹ̀síwájú bí?

translation.unyo: Gbiyanju lilo ife.''
translation.dcyo: Gbìyànjú lílo ìfẹ́.''

translation.unyo: Awon oro re fa ariwo ihonu ni o kere tan leemeji lati odo awon olutetigbo ati awon omo egbe akopa ninu ere SNL tiwon dabi enipe oju tiwon, ni Variety royin, pelu enikan nibe to nso agbejade naa. ''Gbogbo situdio naa dake minimini.''
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ fa ariwo ìhónú ní ó kéré tán lẹ́ẹ̀mẹjì láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn olùtẹ́tígbọ́ àti àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ akópá ninu eré SNL tíwọn dàbí ẹnipé ojú tìwọn, ni Variety ròyìn, pẹ̀lú ẹnìkan níbẹ̵̵̀ tó ńsọ àgbéjáde náà. ''Gbogbo situdio náà dákẹ́ minimini.''

translation.unyo: West ni won ti mu wole bi ipaaro igbeyin fun akorin Arian Grande, eniti orekunrin re teleri, akorinbieniti-nsoro naa Mac Miller ti ku ni awon ojo die seyin.
translation.dcyo: West ni wọ́n ti mú wọlé bí ìpààrọ̀ ìgbẹ̀yìn fún akọrin Arian Grande, ẹnití ọ̀rẹ́kùnrin rẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀rí, akọrinbíẹ̵nití-ńsọ̀rọ̀ náà Mac Miller ti kú ní àwọn ọjọ́ díẹ̀ sẹ́yìn.

translation.unyo: West jo opolopo loju pelu iko orin re I Love it, to wo ewu bii Igo Perrier kan.
translation.dcyo: West jọ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ lójú pẹ̀lú ìkọ orin rẹ̀ I Love it, tó wọ ẹ̀wù bíi Ìgò Perrier kan.

translation.unyo: West gba atileyin lati owo olori egbe oselu conservative TPUSA kan, Candace Turner ti o ko ateranse si tweeter: ''Si okan ninu awon emi toni igboya julo: ''A DUPE LOWO RE FUN DIDIDE DURO SI OPO ERO NAA.''
translation.dcyo: West gba àtìlẹ́yìn láti ọwọ́ olórí ẹgbẹ́ oṣèlú conservative TPUSA kan, Candace Turner tí ó kọ àtẹ̀ránṣẹ́ si tweeter: ''Sí ọ̀kan ninu àwọn ẹ̀mí tóní ìgboyà jùlọ: ''A DÚPẸ́ LỌ́WỌ́ RẸ FÚN DÍDÌDE DÚRÓ SÍ Ọ̀PỌ̀ ÈRÒ NÁÀ.''

translation.unyo: Sugbon olugbalejo eto oro siso naa Karen Hunter ko ateranse tweeter wipe West pelu irorun ''nje eniti i se atipe iyen je eyiti o dara gidigaan.''
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n olùgbàlejò ètò ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ nàà Karen Hunter kọ àtẹ̀ránṣẹ́ tweeter wipe West pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn ''njẹ́ ẹnití i ṣe àtipé ìyẹn jẹ́ eyiti ó dára gídígáà́n.''

translation.unyo: Sugbon Mo yan LATI MASE san ere fun enikan (nipa rira orin re tabi aso tabi sise atileyin fun ''ise owo'' re) eyiti mo gbagbo wipe o diromo ti o si ntu awon ero eyiti o lewu si awujo mi jade lenu.
translation.dcyo: Ṣùgbọ́n Mo yàn LÁTI MÁṢE san èrè fún ẹnìkan (nípa ríra orin rẹ̀ tàbí asọ tàbí ṣíṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ''iṣẹ́ ọwọ́'' rẹ̀) eyití mo gbàgbọ́ wipe o dìròmọ́ tí ó sì ńtu àwọn èrò eyiti ó léwu sí àwùjọ mi jáde lẹ́nu.

translation.unyo: O ni ominira.
translation.dcyo: Ó ní òmìnira.

translation.unyo: Beeni awa naa,'' ni o fi kun un.
translation.dcyo: Bẹ́ẹ̀ni àwa náà,'' ni ó fi kún un.

translation.unyo: Saaju eto naa, akorinbieniti-n-soro naa kede lori Twitter wipe oun ti yi oruko oun pada, tosi nsope oun ni bayii ni ''eni naa tiwon mo tele bii Kanye West.''
translation.dcyo: Saájú ètò náà, akọrinbíẹnití-ń-sọ̀rọ̀ náà kéde lori Twitter wipe òun ti yí orúkọ òun pada, tósì ńsọpé òun ní báyìí ni ''ẹni náà tíwọ́n mọ̀ tẹ́lệ bíi Kanye West.''

translation.unyo: Oun koni osere akoko naa ti yoo yi oruko won pada ti o ntele awon igbese ti Diddy, tiwon tun mo si Puff Daddy, Puffy ati P Diddy.
