translation.unyo: Bi o tile je pe ejo wa ni ile-ejo, amo awon eeyan kaakiri ori intaneeti ti bu enu ate lu tokotaya naa fun iwa t’on wu.
translation.dcyo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ejọ́ wà ní ilé-ẹjọ́, àmọ́ àwọn èèyàn káàkiri orí íntánẹ́ẹ́tì ti bu ẹnu àtẹ́ lu tọkọtaya náà fún ìwà t’ọ́n wù.

translation.unyo: Leta ti eeyan kan ko fi han pe eru n ba ile-itewe Paddington tori pe won ni o seese ki awon eeyan maa ri ogbon ninu atejade to ni aja igbo n soro.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́tà tí èẹ̀yàn kan kọ fi hàn pé ẹ̀rù ń ba ilé-ìtẹ̀wé Paddington torí pé wọ́n ní ó ṣẹéṣe kí àwọn èèyàn máa rí ọgbọ́n nínú àtẹ̀jáde tó ní ajá igbó ń sọ̀rọ̀.

translation.unyo: Karen Jankel, omo ti Bond bii leyin ti awon eeyan tewogba iwe yii lo soro nipa leta naa. O ni: “Nje o seese lati fi ara eeyan si ipo eni to ko kawe yii k’on to te e?
translation.dcyo: Karen Jankel, ọmọ tí Bond bíi lẹ́yìn tí àwọn èèyàn tẹ́wọ́gba ìwé yìí ló sọ̀rọ̀ nípa lẹ́tà náà. Ó ní: “Ǹjẹ́ ó ṣẹéṣe láti fi ara èèyàn sí ipò ẹni tó kọ́ kàwé yìí k’ọ́n tó tẹ̀ ẹ́?

translation.unyo: Bi o tile je pe gbogbo wa le so nipa aseyori nla ti Paddington latari iwe yii.”
translation.dcyo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé gbogbo wa lè sọ nípa àseyọrí ǹlà ti Paddington látàrí ìwé yìí.”

translation.unyo: O ni baba oun to ko iwe naa sise onifidio pelu BBC rii. O ni baba oun ni imisi lati ko iwe naa latari aja igbo olomolangidi. O ni okan kan ni baba oun fi ko iwe naa bi o tie n beru pe awon eeyan le maa tewogba a. “Ibanujeoounayo” ni pe o ti to ogota odun ti iwe naa ti jade bi o tile je pe baba oun ku ni odun to koja.
translation.dcyo: Ó ní bàbá òun tó kọ ìwé ná́à ṣiṣẹ́ onífídíò pẹ̀lú BBC rìí. Ó ní bàbá òun ní ìmísí láti kọ ìwé náà látàrí ajá igbó ọlọ́mọlangidi. Ó ní ọkàn kan ni bàbá òun fi kọ ìwé náà bí ó tiẹ̀ ń bẹ̀rù pé àwọn èèyàn lè máa tẹ́wọ́gbà á. “Ìbànújẹ́oọunayọ̀” ni pé ó ti tó ọgọ́ta ọdún tí ìwé náà ti jáde bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé bàbá òun kú ní ọdún tó kọjá.

translation.unyo: O ni Paddington “ti di ara ebi wa,” atipe inu baba mi dun si aseyori e.
translation.dcyo: Ó ní Paddington “ti di ara ẹbí wa,” àtipé inú bàbá mi dùn sí àṣeyọrí ẹ̀.

translation.unyo: ”Eeyan jeje ti ki i se onigberagaa ni.”
translation.dcyo: ”Èèyàn jẹ́jẹ́ tí kì í ṣe onígbèrágaa ni.”

translation.unyo: Tori ajose Paddington ati baba mi wonu ara won, aseyori Paddington je iwuri fun baba mi tori baba ati omo ni awon mejeeji.
translation.dcyo: Torí àjọṣe Paddington àti bàbá mi wọnú ara wọn, àṣeyọrí Paddington jẹ́ ìwúrí fún bàbá mi torí bàbá àti ọmọ ni àwọn méjèèjì.

translation.unyo: Bi ajose won se ri niyen.
translation.dcyo: Bí àjọṣẹ wọn ṣe rí nìyẹn.

translation.unyo: Ogbeni Flake ni, “Ki ni okunri yii fe gan-an – iwadii ti ko ni pe, tabi iwadii to mo niwon? Iba dara ka mo ibi ti a n lo gan-an. O tun ni “iyapa” ti wa laarin igbimo oluwadii latari ibajosepo peu awon oloselu.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Flake ní, “Kí ni ọkùnri yìí fẹ́ gan-an – ìwádìí tí kò ní pẹ́, tàbí iwádìí tó mọ níwọ̀n? Ìbá dára ka mọ ibi tí à ń lọ gan-an. Ó tún ní “ìyapa” ti wà láárin ìgbìmọ̀ olùwádìí látàrí ìbájọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀ú àwọn olóṣèlú.

translation.unyo: Ki lo de ti Ogbeni Kavanaugh ati awon omo egbe Republican tako iwadii FBI?
translation.dcyo: Kí ló dé tí Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Kavanaugh àti àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Republican tako ìwádìí FBI?

translation.dcyo: Ní ọjọ kẹfà, oṣù kọkànlá, nìbò ọlọ́dún mẹ́jì máa wáye, Bí egbẹ́ Republican ‘ò bá se dáadáa, ó ṣeéṣe kí ẹni t’ọ́n fẹ́ yàn sí ipo ní ilé-ẹjọ́ to ga jùlọ má débẹ̀.

translation.unyo: George W. Bush pe opolopo Sinato lati ro won ki won gbarukuti Ogbeni Kavanaugh, osise Ogbeni Bush ni White House. Lati ipase e ni Ogbeni Bush pade Ashley, iyawo ile e to sise pelu nigba kan ri gege bi akowe,
translation.dcyo: George W. Bush pe ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ Sìnàtọ̀ láti rọ̀ wọn kí wọ́n gbárùkùtì Ọ̀gbẹni Kavanaugh, òṣìṣẹ́ Ọ̀gbẹni Bush ní White House. Làti ipasẹ̀ ẹ̀ ni Ọ̀gbẹni Bush pàdé Ashley, ìyàwó ilé ẹ̀ tó ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú nígbà kan rí gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ̀wé,

translation.unyo: Ki lo maa sele leyin iwadii FBI?
translation.dcyo: Kí ló máa ṣẹ̀lẹ lẹ́yìn ìwádìí FBI?

translation.unyo: Ibo maa waye ni Ile Asofin Agba laarin Sinato 51 fun Republicans, 49 fun Democrats.
translation.dcyo: Ibò máa wáyé ní Ilé Aṣòfin Àgbà láàrin Sínátò 51 fún Republicans, 49 fún Democrats.

translation.unyo: Ko si eni to le so boya Kavanaugh maa ni to ibo 50 to ni lo ki Mike Pence, igbakeji aare, le bura fun un gege bi adajo ni Ile-ejo Agba.
translation.dcyo: Kò sí ẹni tó lè sọ bóyá Kavanaugh máa ní tó ibò 50 tó ní lò kí Mike Pence, igbákejì ààrẹ, lè búra fun un gẹ́gẹ́ bí adájọ́ ní Ilé-ẹjọ́ Àgbà.

translation.unyo: Awon ti won kuro ni North Korea ti dinku lati igba ti Kim ti gori oye
translation.dcyo: Àwọn tí wọ́n kúrò ní North Korea ti dínkù láti ìgbà tí Kim ti gorí oyè

translation.unyo: Iye awon omo North korea t’on lo si South Korea ti dinku laarin odun meje ti Kim Jong-un ti di aare. Omo ile-asofin South Korea lo so bee.
translation.dcyo: Iye àwọn ọmọ North korea t’ọ́n lọ si South Korea ti dínkù láàrin ọdún méje tí Kim Jong-un ti di ààrẹ. Ọmọ ile-aṣòfin South Korea ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Park Byeong-seug ni akosile ajo Unification ti South Korea ni eeyan 1,127 omo North Korea lo darapo mo South Korea ni odun to koja. O ni 2,706 ni won ni 2011.
translation.dcyo: Park Byeong-seug ní àkọsílẹ̀ àjọ Unification ti South Korea ní èèyàn 1,127 ọmọ North Korea ló darapọ̀ mọ́ South Korea ní ọdún tó kọjá. Ó ní 2,706 ni wọ́n ní 2011.

translation.unyo: Ogbeni Park ni ohun to fa edinku yi ni ise asobode to lagbara laarin North Korea ati China. Ati iye owo tabua ti won n gba lowo awon olo.
translation.dcyo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Park ni ohun tó fa ẹ̀dínkù yí ni iṣẹ́ aṣọ́bodè tó lágbára láàrin North Korea àti China. Àti iye owó tabua tí wọ́n ń gbà lọ́wọ́ àwọn olo.

translation.unyo: Pyongyang ‘o soro rara nipa e.
translation.dcyo: Pyongyang ‘ò sọ̀rọ̀ ràrà nípa ẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Pupo ninu awon omo North Korea to darapo mo South Korea lo ti di omo South Korea bayii.
translation.dcyo: Púpọ̀ nínú àwọn ọmọ North Korea tó darapọ̀ mọ́ South Korea ló ti di ọmọ South Korea báyìí.

translation.unyo: Leyin Ogun Korea t’odun 1953, Seoul ni o to 30,000 omo North Korea lo ti gba enu ona North Korea koja laigbase.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn Ogun Korea t’ọdún 1953, Seoul ní ó tó 30,000 ọmọ North Korea ló ti gba ẹnu ọ̀nà North Korea kọjá láìgbaṣẹ.

translation.unyo: Enubode North Korea si China ni opo ninu won n gba salo. O rorun lati gba enubode yi ju enubode North Korea si ti South Korea tori awon ologun po nibe.
translation.dcyo: Enubodè North Korea sí China ni ọ̀pọ̀ nínụ́ wọn ń gbà sálọ. Ó rọrùn láti gba ẹnubodè yí ju ẹnubodè North Korea sí ti South Korea torí àwọn ológun pọ̀ níbẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Awon ajeji lona ti ko ba ofin mu ni China ka awon ti won n sa kuro yi kun. Lopo igba, won maa da won pada ni.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn àjèjì ̀lọ́nà tí kò bá òfin mu ni China ka àwọn tí wọ́n ń sá kúrò yí kún. Lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà, wọ́n máa dá wọn padà ni.

translation.unyo: Ajosepo North ati South Korea – bii pe won n ba ara won ja ni – tun sunwon die si lenu ojo meta yii.
translation.dcyo: Àjọṣẹpọ̀ North àti South Korea – bíi pé wọ́n ń bá ara wọn jà ni – tún sunwọ̀n díẹ̀ si lẹ́nu ọjọ́ mẹ́ta yìí.

translation.unyo: Ni ibere osu yi, awon olori mejeeji pade ni Pyongyang lati jiroro lori idekun ohun ija oloro, ijiroro ti won pati tele.
translation.dcyo: Ní ibẹ̀rẹ̀ oṣù yí, àwọn olórí méjèèjì pàdé ní Pyongyang láti jíròrò lóri ìdẹ́kun ohun ìjà olóró, ìjíròrò tí wọ́n patì tẹ́lẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Ipade yii waye leyin ipade ti Aare Amerika, Donald Trump ati Kim Jong-un se ni Singapore losu kefa. Won fenuko pe orile-ede Korea ‘o ni seda ohun oloro mo.
translation.dcyo: Ìpàdé yìí wáyé lẹ́yìn ìpàdé tí Ààrẹ Amẹ́ríkà, Donald Trump àti Kim Jong-un ṣe ní Singapore lóṣù kẹfà. Wọ́n fẹnuko pé orílẹ̀-èdè Korea ‘ò ní ṣẹ̀dá ohun olóró mọ́.

translation.unyo: Amo ni ojo Satide, Minisita ile-okeere ni orile-ede North Korea, Ri Yong-ho, da Amerika lebi latari ijiya to fi n je North Korea gege bi idena si oro ajoso yii.
translation.dcyo: Àmọ́ ní ọjọ́ Sátidé, Mínísítà ilẹ̀-òkèèrè ní orílẹ̀-èdè North Korea, Ri Yong-ho, dá Amẹ́ríkà lẹ́bi látàrí ìjìyà tó fi ń jẹ North Korea gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìdènà sí ọ̀rọ̀ àjọsọ yìí.

translation.unyo: ”Bi awon omo-ogun wa ‘o ba fokantan orile-ede Amerika, won ‘o ni dekun ogun tabi dekun iseda ohun ija oloro,” oro Ogbeni Ri ni ipade Ajo UN ni New York.
translation.dcyo: ”Bí àwọn ọmọ-ogun wa ‘ò bá fọkàntán orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà, wọn ‘ò ní dẹkun ogun tàbí dẹ́kun ìṣẹ̀dá ohun ìjà olóró,” ọ̀rọ̀ Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Ri ní ìpàdé Àjọ UN ní New York.

translation.unyo: Nancy Pelosi ni “alawada” ni Brett Kavanaugh. Fun idi eyi, ko to si i lati wa ni Ile-ejo Agba
translation.dcyo: Nancy Pelosi ní “aláwàdà” ni Brett Kavanaugh. Fún ìdí èyí, kò tọ́ si i láti wà ní Ilé-ẹjọ́ Àgbà

translation.unyo: Nancy Pelosi, Olori Egbe Onipo Keji ni Ile Asoju-Sofin, ni ‘alawada’ ni Brett Kavanaugh, eni ti aare yan si Ile-ejo Agba. O ni iwa omode wa laraa.
translation.dcyo: Nancy Pelosi, Olórí Ẹgbẹ́ Onípò Kejì ní Ile Aṣojú-Ṣòfin, ní ‘aláwàdà’ ni Brett Kavanaugh, eni tí ààre yàn sí Ilé-ẹjọ́ Àgbà. Ó ní ìwà ọmọdé wà làráà.

translation.unyo: Pelosi soro yi ni ojo Satide ninu iforowanilenuwo ni Texas Tribune Festival in Austin, Texas.
translation.dcyo: Pelosi sọ̀rọ̀ yí ní ọjọ́ Satidé nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò ní Texas Tribune Festival in Austin, Texas.

translation.unyo: Ninu ero Pelosi nipa ijerii Kavanaugh ni Ile Asofin Agba to waye ni ojo Isegun, o ni “Bi obinrin ba se ohun to se, ‘alawada’ lo maa di.”
translation.dcyo: Nínú èrò Pelosi nípa ìjẹ́rìí Kavanaugh ní Ilé Aṣòfin Àgbà tó wáyé ní ọjọ Ìṣẹ́gun, ó ní “Bí obìnrin bá ṣe ohun tó ṣe, ‘aláwàdà’ ló máa dì.”

translation.unyo: Kavanaugh soju fuuru, o se esun ifipabanilopo laarin e ati Dokita Christine Blasey Ford nigba ewe won.
translation.dcyo: Kavanaugh ṣojú fuúrú, ó sẹ́ ẹ̀sùn ìfipábánilopò láàrin ẹ̀ àti Dókítà Christine Blasey Ford nígbà èwe wọn.

translation.unyo: Bi Kavanaugh se bere oro e, bee lo n kigbe soro lasiko to n soro nipa ebi ati ile-iwe girama to lo.
translation.dcyo: Bí Kavanaugh se bẹ̀rẹ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ, bẹ́ẹ̀ ló ń kígbe sọ̀rọ̀ lásìkò tó ń sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ẹbí àti ilé-ìwé girama to lọ.

translation.unyo: O wo awon omo egbe Democrat t’on wa ninu igbimo to forowalewo wole. Bee lo ni esun ifipabanilopo t’on fi kan oun jamo “ibanilorukoje” lati owo awon ti inu won ko dun pe Hilary Clinton ‘o bori ni ibo aare to waye ni 2016.
translation.dcyo: Ó wọ́ àwọn ọmọ egbẹ́ Democrat t’ọ́n wà nínú ìgbìmọ̀ tó fọ̀rọ̀walẹ́wò wọ́lẹ̀. Bẹ́ẹ̀ ló ní ẹ̀sùn ìfipábánilopò t’ọ́n fi kan òun jámọ́ “ìbanilórúkọjẹ́” láti ọwọ́ àwọn tí inú wọn ko dùn pé Hilary Clinton ‘ò borí ní ìbò ààrẹ tó wáyé ní 2016.

translation.unyo: Pelosi ni oro enu Kavanaugh fi han pe ko le sise ni Ile-ejo Agba tori o soro si awon omo egbe Democrat.
translation.dcyo: Pelosi ni ọ̀rọ̀ ẹnu Kavanaugh fi hàn pé kò lè ṣiṣẹ́ ní Ilé-ejọ́ Àgbà torí ó sọ̀rọ̀ sí àwọn ọmọ egbẹ́ Democrat.

translation.unyo: O ni “O ti wogi le ara e latari awon oro to so si ebi Clinton and omo egbe Democrat.”
translation.dcyo: Ó ní “Ó ti wọ́gi lé ara ẹ̀ látàrí àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tó sọ sí ẹbí Clinton and ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Democrat.”

translation.unyo: Pelosi so oro so nigba ti won bii leere so maa gbiyanju lati yo Kavanaugh t’on ba fun ni ipo naa tabi ti Democrats ba di pati akoko ni Ile Asoju-sofin
translation.dcyo: Pelosi ṣọ́ ọ̀rọ̀ sọ nígbà tí wọ́n bíi léèrè ṣó máa gbìyànjú láti yọ Kavanaugh t’ọ́n bá fun ní ipò náà tàbí tí Democrats bá di pátì àkọ́kọ́ ni Ile Aṣojú-ṣòfin

translation.unyo: Pelosi ni “Bi ko ba so ooto fun awon asofin tabi ajo otelemuye FBI, ko letoo lati wa ni ile-ejo Agba ati kootu to wa lowolowo .”
translation.dcyo: Pelosí ní “Bi kò bá sọ òótọ́ fún àwọn aṣòfin tàbí àjọ ọ̀tẹ̀lẹmúyẹ́ FBI, kò lẹ́tọ̀ọ́ láti wà ní ilé-ẹjọ́ Àgbà àti kọ́ọ̀tù tó wà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ .”

translation.unyo: Adajo ni Kavanaugh ni Kootu Kotemilorun to wa ni D.C. Circuit.
translation.dcyo: Adájọ́ ni Kavanaugh ní Kọ́ọ̀tù Kòtẹ́milọ́rùn tó wà ní D.C. Circuit.

translation.unyo: Pelosi ni gege bi omo egbe Democrat oun mo pe Kavanaugh maa dajo to lodi si Abadofin Affordable Care tabi Roe V. Wade tori adajo tie ‘o gbagbo ninu awon abadofin naa.
translation.dcyo: Pelosi ní gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Democrat òun mọ pé Kavanaugh máa dájọ́ tó lọdì sí Àbádòfin Affordable Care tabí Roe V. Wade torí adájọ tiẹ̀ ‘ò gbàgbọ́ nínú àwọn abádòfin náà.

translation.unyo: Lasiko ti won n forowalenuwo fun ipo tuntun yii, Kavanaugh fi ogbon fo awon ibeere to ni so maa dajo lodi si awon idajo Ile-ejo Agba saaju akko tie.
translation.dcyo: Lásìkò tí wọ́n ń fọ̀rọ̀walẹ́nuwò fún ipò tuntun yìí, Kavanaugh fi ọgbọ́n fo àwọn ìbéèrè tó ní ṣo máa dájọ́ lòdì sí àwọn ìdájọ́ Ilé-ẹjọ́ Àgbà sáájú àḱkò tiẹ̀.

translation.unyo: Pelosi ni “A ‘o wa alawada, tabi tinu-maase eda gege bi adajo, lai ma pariwo sita.”
translation.dcyo: Pelosi ní “A ‘ò wá aláwàda, tàbí tinú-màáṣe ẹ̀dá gẹ́gẹ́ bí adájọ́, láì má pariwo síta.”

translation.unyo: Awon Obinrin Gbodo Lo O

translation.dcyo: Ìbáwí olódodo èèyàn, àti ọ̀rọ̀ bínú fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ oṣù, kò lè kúrò láa láì sunkún.

translation.unyo: ”Ki i se ohun to sajeji, abi?”
translation.dcyo: ”Kì í ṣe ohun tó ṣàjèjì, àbí?”

translation.unyo: O tun soro lo. O ni,”Oga ile-ise kan lo je ki i mo pe ki i se ohun to sajeji fun eeyan lati sunkun to ba n binu. O ni ti oun ba wa ni ipo yi oun maa so fun awon eeyan pe ki i se ibanuje lo n mu oun sokun.
translation.dcyo: Ó tún sọ̀rọ̀ lọ. Ó ní,”Ọ̀gá ilé-iṣẹ́ kan ló jẹ́ ki i mò pé kì í ṣe ohun tó ṣàjèjì fún èèyàn láti sunkún tó bá ń binú. Ó ní tí òun bá wà ní ipò yí òun máa sọ fún àwọn èèyàn pé kì í se ìbànújẹ́ ló ń mú òun sọkún.

translation.unyo: Ibinu ni,”
translation.dcyo: Ìbínú ni,”

translation.unyo: O tun soro lo.
translation.dcyo: Ó tún sọ̀rọ̀ lọ.

translation.unyo: Ohun to daa ni mo pe.”
translation.dcyo: Ohun tó dáa ni mò pé.”

translation.unyo: Ekun sissun je afihan ibinu amo awon eeyan ‘o mo.
translation.dcyo: Ẹkún síssun jẹ́ àfihàn ìbínú àmọ́ àwọn èèyàn ‘ò mọ̀.

translation.unyo: Mo ranti nigba ti mo wa ni ibise kan, okunrin lo po ju ni ibise naa. Lopo igba tinu ba bi mi, bee ni maa bu sigbe. Ni ojo kan ni oga wa kan, mama arugbo ni won, ni won fa mi lo si egbe kan, amo eru n ba mi bi won se mu mi dani.
translation.dcyo: Mo rántí nígbà tí mo wà ní ibiṣẹ́ kan, ọkụ̀nrin ló pọ̀ jù ní ibiṣẹ́ náà. Lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà tínú bá bí mi, bẹ́è ni máa bú sígbe. Ní ọjọ́ kan ní ọgá wa kan, màmá arúgbó ni wọ́n, ni wọ́n fa mí lọ sí ẹ̀gbẹ́ kan, àmọ́ ẹ̀rù ń bà mí bí wọ́n ṣe mú mi dání.

translation.unyo: ”Ma sunkun mo niwaju awon eeyan,” ni mo n gbo.
translation.dcyo: ”Má sunkún mọ níwájú àwọn èèyàn,” ni mò ń gbọ́.

translation.unyo: Ko ye won pe inu lo n bi e.
translation.dcyo: Kò yé wọn pé inú ló ń bí ẹ.

translation.unyo: Patricia Schroeder, omo egbe Democrat ati asofin ni Colorado nigba kan,ba Gary Hart sise nigba to n du ipo aare.
translation.dcyo: Patricia Schroeder, ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Democrat àti aṣòfin ní Colorado nígbà kan,bá Gary Hart ṣiṣẹ́ nígbà tó n du ipò ààrẹ.

translation.unyo: Ni odun 1987, ti won ni Ogbeni Hart ni ajosepo pelu obinrin miiran ninu oko oju-omi Monkey Business, bi Hart ‘o se dije fun ipo naa mo niyen. Isele yi ‘o dun mo Aya Schroeder ninu. Bi o se pinnu lati gbegba ibo aare niyen.
translation.dcyo: Ní ọdún 1987, tí wọ́n ní Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Hart ní àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú obínrin mìíràn nínú ọkọ ojú-omi Monkey Business, bí Hart ‘ò ṣe díje fún ipò náà mọ́ nìyẹn. Iṣẹ̀lẹ̀ yí ‘ò dùn mọ́ Aya Schroeder nínú. Bí ó ṣe pinnu láti gbégba ìbò ààrẹ nìyẹn.

translation.unyo: Leyin ogbon odun, o ni “ipinnu yen ‘da to o.
translation.dcyo: Lẹ́yìn ọgbọ̀n ọdún, ó ní “ìpinnu yẹn ‘da to ó.

translation.dcyo: ”Àwọn méje ti wà nílẹ̀, tí wọ́n dìje du ipò ààrẹ. Wọn ‘ò wa kẹ́lòmíì darapọ̀ mọ́ wọn.

translation.dcyo: Fíìmù kan tí àkọlé ẹ jẹ́ “Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs” ni èèyàn kan kà á kún.”

translation.unyo: Tori o pe ki omobinrin yii to jaHde lati dije, bee ni ko ni owo lowo, o pinnu lati wawo to to milionu 2 dola ko to bere si ni lo kaakiri.
translation.dcyo: Torí ó pẹ́ kí ọmọbìnrin yìí tó jaHde láti díje, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni kò ní owó lọwọ́, ó pinnu láti wáwó tó tó mílíọnu 2 dọ́là kó tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ni lọ káàkiri.

translation.unyo: Ija ti ko le bori ree.
translation.dcyo: Ìjà tí kò lè borí rèé.

translation.unyo: Awon t’on fun ni 250 dola, maa fun awon okunrin egbe e ni 1000 dola.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn t’ọ́n fún ni 250 dọlà, máa fún àwọn ọkùnrin ẹgbẹ́ ẹ̀ ní 1000 dọ́là.

translation.unyo: ”Se won ro pe edinwo wa fun mi ni?” ni ibeere to n bi ara e leere.
translation.dcyo: ”Ṣé wọ́n rò pé ẹ̀dínwó wà fún mi ni?” ni ìbéèrè tó ń bi ara ẹ̀ léèrè.

translation.unyo: Nigba to kede pe oun ‘o ni se ikede nla, o so edun okan e – o dupe lowo awon t’on gbarukuti, soro lori isoro lori oro owo ti o ni lo fun ikede si awon oludibo ati irunu si iyato to waa laarin okunrin ati obinrin – gbogbo ohun to muu dori gongo.
translation.dcyo: Nígbà tó kéde pé òun ‘ò ní sẹ ìkéde ńlá, ó sọ ẹ̀dùn ọkàn ẹ̀ – ó dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn t’ọ́n gbárùkùtí, sọ̀rọ̀ lóri ìsoro lóri ọ̀rọ̀ owó tí ó ní lò fún ìkéde sí àwọn olùdìbò àti ìrúnú sí ìyàtọ̀ tó waà láàrin ọkùnrin àti obìnrin – gbogbo ohun tó muú dorí góńgó.

translation.dcyo: ”Bíi ìgbà tí mo ní àrùn lára ni àwọn oníròyìn sọ mí dà.”

translation.dcyo: ”Ọ̀pọ̀ ló ní ile-iṣẹ́ Kleenex jẹ́ agbátẹrù mi.

translation.dcyo: Mo ròó débi pé kí ni àwọn èèyàn máa kọ síbi ìtẹ́kùú mi?

translation.unyo: Beijing lo maa je anfaani ija to da lori oro-aje to wa laarin Amerika ati China
translation.dcyo: Beijing ló máa jẹ àǹfààní ìjà tó dá lórí ọrọ̀-ajé tó wá láàrin Amẹ́ríkà àti China

translation.unyo: Awon onimo ni ija to da lori oro-aje to wa laarin Amerika ati China ko ni ojutuu, atipe ko le pari. Nigbeyin, Beijing lo maa je anfaani ija yi.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn onímọ̀ ní ìjà tó dá lórí ọrọ̀-ajé tó wá láàrin Amẹ́ríkà àti China kò ní ojútùú, àtipé kò le parí. Nígbẹ̀yìn, Beijing ló máa jẹ àǹfààní ìjà yí.

translation.unyo: Donald Trump, Aare Amerika, fidi oro yi mule ni ibere odun yii. O gbowo le owo-ori awon oja bii sola, irin ati alumi t’on ti China waa.
translation.dcyo: Donald Trump, Ààrẹ Amẹ́ríkà, fìdí ọ̀rọ̀ yí múlẹ̀ ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọdún yìí. Ó gbówó lé owó-orí àwọn ọjà bíi sólà, irin àti alumí t’ọ́n ti China wàá.

translation.unyo: Lose yi afikun to de ba owo-ori kan iye oja to to bilionu 200 dola. China ni awon oja yi ti n wa si Amerika.
translation.dcyo: Lọ́sẹ̀ yí àfikún tó dé bá owó-orí kan iye ọjà tó tó bílíọ́nù 200 dọ́là. China ni àwọn ọjà yí tí ń wá sí Amẹ́ríkà.

translation.unyo: Beijing naa se tie. O gbe owo to le ni ida marun-un si mewaa lori awon oja to to bilionu 60 dola lori awon oja to ti Amerika wa.
translation.dcyo: Beijing náà ṣe tiẹ̀. Ó gbé owó tó lé ní ìdá márùn-ún sí mẹ́wàá lorí àwọn ọjà to tó bílíọ́nù 60 dọ́là lórí àwọn ọjà tó ti Amẹ́ríkà wá.

translation.unyo: China ni ohun ti Amerika ba se ni oun naa maa se e. Bee ni ko si ohun to le mi oro-aje China to wa ni ipo keji lagbaaye.
translation.dcyo: China ni ohun tí Amẹ́ríkà bá ṣe ni òun náà máa ṣe e. Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni kò sí ohun tó lè mi ọ̀rọ̀-ajé China tó wà ní ipò kejì lágbàáyé.

translation.unyo: T’Amerika ba jowo sile bii igba ti won n se ohun ti awon eeyan fe ni. Sugbon fun Xi Jinping, Aare China, ko ni gba si Amerika lenu tori ohun itiju ni.
translation.dcyo: T’Ámẹ́ríkà bá jọwọ́ sílẹ̀ bíi ìgbà tí wọ́n ń ṣe ohun tí àwọn èèyàn fẹ́ ni. Ṣùgbọ́n fún Xi Jinping, Ààrẹ China, kò ní gbà sí Amẹ́ríkà lẹ́nu torí ohun ìtìjú ni.

translation.unyo: Awon onimo tenumo pe bii Beijing ba ta ayo e daadaa, oun lo maa je anfaani ija yi nigbeyin. Igbarale oja to n ti iu kookan jade ma dinku
translation.dcyo: Àwọn onímọ̀ tẹnumọ pé bíi Beijing bá ta ayò ẹ̀ dáadáa, òun ló máa jẹ àǹfààní ìjà yí nígbẹ̀yìn. Ìgbáralé ọjà tó ń ti ìú kọ̀ọ̀kan jáde ma dínkù

translation.unyo: ”Yala lati Washington tabi Beijing, ohun ti awon olori ilu yii ba so le mu ki oro-aje won dojubole. O buru ju bii awon orile-ede to ku se lero lo,” lero Abigail Grace, oniwadii lori oro Asia lati Center for New American Security -egbe to n ran awon orile-ede lowo lati se agbekale eto-isuna ati oro-aje.
translation.dcyo: ”Yálà láti Washington tàbí Beijing, ohun tí àwọn olórí ìlú yìí bá ṣọ lè mú kí ọrọ̀-ajé wọn dojúbolẹ̀. Ó burú ju bíi àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó kù ṣe lérò lọ,” lèrò Abigail Grace, oníwádìí lóri ọ̀rọ̀ Asia láti Center for New American Security -ẹgbẹ́ tó ń ran àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè lọ́wọ́ láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ètò-ìṣúná àti ọrọ̀-ajé.

translation.unyo: Minisita lori oro ile-okeere ni Syria ‘setan’ lati gba awon omo Syria ti won sa kuro ni Syria pada
translation.dcyo: Mínísítà loŕi ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀-òkèèrè ní Syria ‘setán’ láti gba àwọn ọmọ Syria tí wọ́n sá kúrò ní Syria padà

translation.unyo: Syria ti setan lati gba awon omo ilu e ti won fe pada si orile-ede won pada. Bee ni won rawo ebe si awon eeyan lati ran awon lowo lati tun orile-ede ti ogun odun meje t run se.
translation.dcyo: Syria ti ṣetán láti gba àwọn ọmọ ìlú e tí wọ́n fẹ́ padà sí orílẹ̀-èdè wọn padà. Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni wọ́n rawọ́ ẹ̀bẹ̀ sí àwọn èèyàn láti ran àwọn lọ́wọ́ láti tún orílẹ̀-èdè tí ogun ọdún méje t run ṣe.

translation.unyo: Minisita lori oro ile-okeere, Walid al-Moualem, so fun ajo Agbaye pe nnkan pada bo sipo ni orile-ede naa.
translation.dcyo: Mínísítà loŕi ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀-òkèèrè, Walid al-Moualem, sọ fún àjọ Àgbáyé pé nǹkan padà bọ̀ sípò ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.

translation.unyo: O ni, ”Nnkan ti da ju ti ateyinwa lo. Abo ati itesiwaju ti de ba awujo latari igbogunti ajangbila.”
translation.dcyo: Ó ní, ”Nǹkan ti da ju ti àtẹ̀yínwa lọ. Àbò àti ìtẹ̀síwájú ti dé bá àwùjọ látàrí ìgbógunti àjàngbilà.”

translation.unyo: Ijoba tun gbogbo ibi ti awon alajangbila ti baje se tori ki itesiwaju le de ba awujo.
translation.dcyo: Ìjọba tún gbogbo ibi tí àwọn alájàngbilà ti bàjẹ́ ṣe torí kí ìtẹ̀síwájú lè dé bá àwùjọ.

translation.unyo: Nitori naa, awon omo ilu ti won sa kuro ni orile-ede won latari ajangbila ati oro-aje to bur jai le pada pada bayii.
translation.dcyo: Nítorí náà, àwọn ọmọ ìlú tí wọ́n sá kúrò ní orílẹ̀-èdè wọn látàrí àjàngbilà àti ọrọ̀-ajé tó buŕ jáì lè padà padà báyìí.

translation.unyo: Ajo UN ni omo orile-ede Syria to le ni milionu 5 lo sa kuro nibe ni odun 2011.
translation.dcyo: Àjọ UN ní ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Syria tó lé ni mílíọ́nù 5 ló sá kúrò níbẹ̀ ní ọdún 2011.

translation.unyo: Awon milionu 6 ti won wa ni orile-ede naa nilo iranlowo awon ajo oniranlowo.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn mílíọ́nù 6 tí wọ́n wà ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́ àwọn àjọ onírànlọ́wọ́.

translation.unyo: Al-Moualem ni ijoba Syria nilo gbogbo iranlowo lati tun orile-ede naa se.
translation.dcyo: Al-Moualem ní ìjọba Syria nílò gbogbo ìrànlọwọ́ láti tún orílẹ̀-èdè náà ṣe.

translation.unyo: Amo ‘o ni awon ‘o wa iranlowo kilobade tabi lati odo awon orile-ede t’on je onigbowo fun awon lajangbila.
translation.dcyo: Àmọ́ ‘ò ní àwọn ‘ò wá ìrànlọ́wọ́ kílóbádé tàbí láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè t’ọ́n jẹ́ onígbọ̀wọ́ fún àwọn lájàngbìlà.

translation.unyo: Omo Uroopu lo bori ni idije ti Ryder ni Paris
translation.dcyo: Ọmọ Úróópù ló borí ní ìdíje ti Ryder ní Paris

translation.unyo: Awon egbe ti won wa lati Uroopu na awon egbe ti Amerika ni 16.5 si 10.5 ni Le Golf National to wa nitosi Paris ni Faranse.
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tí wọ́n wá láti Úróópù ná àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tí Amẹ́ríkà ní 16.5 sí 10.5 ní Le Golf National tó wà nítòsí Paris ní Faransé.

translation.unyo: Elekeefa ree ti egbe ti Amerika maa padanu idije ti Ryder leralera ni ile Uroopu lati odun 1993
translation.dcyo: Ẹlẹ́kẹ̀ẹfà rèé tí ẹgbẹ́ ti Amẹ́ríkà máa pàdánù ìdíje ti Ryder léraléra ní ilẹ̀ Úróópù láti ọdún 1993

translation.unyo: Thomas Bjorn, omo orile-ede Denmark ati olori agbaboolu fun egbe ti Uroopu ni maaki 14.5 t’on nilo lati na egbe ti Amerika.
translation.dcyo: Thomas Bjorn, ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Denmark àti olórí agbábọ́ọlù fún ẹgbẹ́ ti Úróópù ní máàkì 14.5 t’ọ́n nílò láti na ẹgbẹ́ ti Amẹ́ríkà.

translation.unyo: Phil Mickelson, ti ko se daadaa ni idije naa, gba boolu lati ibi tee lo sinu omi. Bi Francesco Molinari se naa niyen.
translation.dcyo: Phil Mickelson, tí kò ṣe dáadáa ní ìdíje náà, gbá bọ́ọ̀lù láti ibi tee lọ sínú omi. Bí Francesco Molinari ṣe nàá nìyẹn.

translation.unyo: O ye Molinari, omo egbe agbaboolu goofu tori o yege ninu gbogbo ifesewonse marun-un to gba. O je okan ninu awon merin to ni iru aseyori yii.
translation.dcyo: Ó yẹ Molinari, ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ agbábọ̀ọ̀lù gọ́ọ̀fù torí ó yege nínú gbogbo ìfẹsèwọnsẹ̀ márùn-ún tó gbá. Ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn mẹ́rin tó ní irú àṣeyorí yìí.

translation.unyo: Thorbjorn Olesen, bi o tile je pe ko mo goofu gba daadaa, sibe o na Jordan Spieth, omo Amerika ni 5 si 4.

translation.unyo: Awon ohun tuntun t’on sele nipa iji inu omi: Iji yi ko ja mo ni awon abule bii Pinellas, Manatee ati Sarasota
translation.dcyo: Àwọn ohun tuntun t’ọ́n ṣẹlẹ̀ nípa ìjì inú omi: Ìjì yí kò jà mọ́ ní àwọn abúlé bíi Pinellas, Manatee àti Sarasota

translation.unyo: Ajo to n ri si oro eja ati eran igbo ni Florida ni iji omi ti dekun ni awon agbegbe Tampa Bay.
translation.dcyo: Àjọ tó ń rí sí ọ̀rọ̀ ẹja àti ẹran igbó ní Florida ní ìjì omi ti dẹ́kun ní àwọn agbègbè Tampa Bay.

translation.unyo: Ajo Florida yii ni koo si iji omi ni awon abule bii Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte ati Collier.
translation.dcyo: Àjọ Florida yìí ní koọ sí ìjì omi ní àwọn abúlé bíi Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte àti Collier.

translation.unyo: Ariwa Pinellas ni iji omi yii ti san de gusu abule Lee. O to ibuso 130 ti iji omi naa dee.
translation.dcyo: Àríwá Pinellas ni ìjì omi yìí ti sàn dé gúsù abúlé Lee. Ó tó ibùsọ̀ 130 tí ìjì omi naà deé.

translation.unyo: Apa iji omi yii wa ni ibuso 10 si abule Hillsborough, amo ko po to ti ose to koja.
translation.dcyo: Àpá ìjì omi yìí wà ní ibùsọ̀ 10 sí abúlé Hillsborough, àmọ́ kò pọ̀ tó ti ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọjá.

translation.unyo: Iji omi naa ja ni abule Pasco.
translation.dcyo: Ìjì omi náà jà ní abúlé Pasco.

translation.unyo: Laarin ose bii meloo kan, Iji yi ti dinku ni Pinellas ati agbegbe e. O tun dinku si ti abule ati agbegbe Hillsborough, Mantee, Sarasota, Charlotte, Lee ati Collier.
translation.dcyo: Láàrin ọ̀sẹ̀ bíi mélòó kan, Ìjì yí ti dínkù ní Pinellas àti agbègbè ẹ̀. Ó tún dínkù sí ti abúlé àti agbègbè Hillsborough, Mantee, Sarasota, Charlotte, Lee àti Collier.

translation.unyo: Isoro pelu eemi po ni abule Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Lee, ati Collier.
translation.dcyo: Ìṣòrò pẹ̀lú èémi pọ̀ ní abúlé Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Lee, àti Collier.

translation.unyo: Amo ko si isoro pelu eemi ni ariwa-iwo-oorun Floria lose to koja.
translation.dcyo: Àmọ́ kò sí ìṣòrò pẹ̀lú èémí ní àríwá-iwọ-oòrùn Floria lọ́sẹ̀ tó kọjá.
